name: Birdsong Studio by Beach--Jasmine Gardens
description:
Welcome to Jasmine Garden Oasis Retreat House—3 block walk to quiet beaches. We have two upstairs independent guest studios inside our home, each with queen bed and extra beds for $30 charge: Jade Studio with private second-story deck, and Birdsong Studio with south-facing French Doors overlooking garden. We offer garden hot tub, meditation & QiGong instruction, bicycle loan, allergy-free, healing sessions in-room, and EMF-free option--renewing for heart, body & soul. Sunrise/sunset at beach.

The space
BIRDSONG STUDIO has a queen bed, private bathroom with shower, private entrance via back stairs, French Doors overlooking the garden to the south, west-facing window over side garden, and a small but cute kitchennette space. When the surf is high, you can hear the waves through the open west window.
PRIVATE BUT NOT PRIVACY: The studio is inside our home so although we may never see you, we may hear you and you may hear us because noise carries through the wal
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is a relatively quiet neighborhood with an assortment of people who enjoy living near the beach--including long-time residents, families, retired people, UCSC students, and surfers interspersed to keep it characteristic of Santa Cruz.
Two blocks away is a modest shopping center which hosts the local farmer's market on Sunday mornings. A handful of eateries and a coffee shop, from fast food to upscale dining, line the two blocks toward the beaches. A back way to the beach (our special secret) is three lovely blocks, two of which are walking/biking trails, one lined with Cypress trees, and the next along a lagoon lined with Eucalyptus trees. Wonderful Farmer's Market across 17th Street on Sunday mornings is not to be missed!
The Harbor and Crows Nest restaurant and nightclub are a several blocks to the west along the shore. Downtown Santa Cruz is 3 miles west and Capitola, a quaint seaside town, is 2 miles east. Both are easily accessible by bike lanes, public
host_about: We, Peter & Marie, are a married couple who relish offering our sweet space & location to guests. We enjoy living in a tranquil atmosphere and want to share this with others of like mind at our home, Jasmine Garden Oasis Retreat House near the Sea. It is a modest home tucked away in a modest neighborhood three blocks from the beach in east Santa Cruz with two independent Airbnb studios upstairs, and expand to include the whole house when we offer guided retreats. We keep gentle gardens and cosy comfortable atmosphere for people who want a time of  renewal for body and soul. Mornings we enjoy a short tree-lined walk visit the quiet beach to listen to the surf and watch the dawn followed by morning meditation which we invite guests to join, and evenings the dusk. We have a list of healing artists who have offered to deliver their services to our guests in their private rooms.

name: West Cliff Wharf View
description:
Pet Friendly. Hot Tub. Views. Walk to several West cliff Beaches~ Steamers lane, It's Beach and Lighthouse field/Surf Museum. Walk to the Boardwalk and Wharf in under 10 minutes.

The space
Large 3 bd 2ba sleeps up to 7 adults + 1 kid under 8 possible. There are 5 beds total.
Two story home. Just a short walk to West Cliff. Cowell's beach,Municipal Wharf ,Boardwalk , and the Lighthouse Surf Museum. Hot Tub in a large private back yard.This home is off the beaten path yet close to everything.

Guest access
Two downstairs bedrooms share a bathroom with a shower. The larger room has three twin beds and a tv.. The other room has sliding doors to the back yard and hot tub. This room has a queen bed. There is a large 2 car garage down a short flight of stairs from the first floor. The upper level has a large living room with windows and views of the wharf. There is porch off of the living room. The dining area adjoins the living room and the
neighborhood_overview:
You will be able to walk from the front door to West Cliff Drive in under 3 minutes. The wharf is just another 5 minutes, and then you have the Boardwalk and Cowell's beach another couple of minutes from there. There are several wonderful restaurants on the wharf. During the summer months you will find salsa dancing and live outdoor music at the Ideal bar and grill located at the entrance of the wharf. There are also free Friday night concerts at the boardwalk. from June til September.
If you bring your dog there is a great walk the other direction on west cliff towards the lighthouse and surfing museum at lighthouse field. Mitchell's Cove has off leash hours for free running, and Frisbee. About a 10 minute walk to the lighthouse. West cliff drive takes you from the wharf all the way to natural bridges beach.

name: Private, peaceful, love pets, easy access to all
description:
Thanks for checking us out! Please read everything on this entire page carefully. Our sunny, small, fully self contained studio, has a comfy double/full bed, a great shower and a complete kitchen. Also a private deck for coffee or ? We're in Day Valley, a rural setting, yet close to beaches. Best of both worlds! 15 minutes to Santa Cruz and 30 minutes to Monterey, depending on traffic. Bring the pup, off leash Seascape Beach is minutes away! Easy check in/out. No smoking, please.

The space
View of rolling hills and beautiful trees (cypress, eucalyptus, black walnut and oak). In less than 10 minutes, you can be at the stunning Seascape Resort beach. We are in-between downtown Santa Cruz and Moss Landing/Monterey, so day trips to the aquarium in Monterey, kayaking in Moss Landing and the best Santa Cruz surfing beaches are easy! Our own Aptos Village is welcoming, walkable and features some wonderful restaurants. PLEASE NOTE: the studio is small, approx 300 sq ft
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, rural setting, friendly neighbors.  Lots of places to walk your dog on leash. Our location is central to the entire Monterey Bay and a great "stop off" if you're going from So Cal to SF Bay area. Easy access to Highway 1, beaches, restaurants, Moss Landing, Santa Cruz and Monterey.
host_about: We love where we live and we love sharing our area with people from all over. Pet's are welcome, we have a sweet pup named Trixie. Our area is so much fun to explore and we're happy to give you local tips on the best beaches, trails and restaurants! Please feel free to ask us any questions about the studio, and our area. We know the Monterey side of the Bay well, we love Big Sur, Carmel Valley,  Moss Landing, anywhere within a 50 mile radius and we can get you to the best of whatever!

name: Guest apartment in beautiful Tuscan Villa 2Br 1Bth
description:
If you are looking for something special and high quality this is the perfect "Get Away" Set in an amazing spot this peaceful and gorgeous guest home will renew and revive your spirits. Gorgeous grounds beautifully appointed overlooking the Monterey Bay. Hiking, golfing. Close to the Seascape resort, Short drive to Santa Cruz, Capitola Village, Aptos Beach (2 min). Drive south on highway 1 to Monterey, Carmel, Pebble Beach, and Big Sur. High speed internet, Satellite HD TV, private parking

The space
Detached and private guest apartment with independent access, sweeping ocean views, exquisitely appointed with all the comforts of home. modern kitchen and full bathroom with tub, The apartment sits on gorgeous property overlooking the Bay, it has two bedrooms with a very comfortable and cozy living and dining area. Fireplace, HD Satellite TV.
Enjoy Romantic and relaxing walks to the beach or hikes in the wooded canyon directly across the street, play golf at th
neighborhood_overview: This is a quiet residential area with great neighbors, there is lots to see and do. People come here for different reasons but no matter what they are looking for the serenity and peace of the environment is something that everyone enjoys and comments on. the weather very comfortable generally warm but rarely get over 87 degrees humidity is low.
host_about: I am semiretired I speak three languages, I moved here thirty years ago, I love the area and want to see people visit and enjoy everything that the Monterey Bay has to offer. I enjoy meeting new people and love to travel.

name: Private RDM Coastal Studio with Patio
description:
Welcome! Relaxing, comfortable private coastal studio with a 5 minute flat stroll along the creek to RDM Beach awaits you. BBQ on the patio! Don’t miss the sunset.

Walking distance to Cafe Rio, Pixie Deli, coffee shop & Sea Cliff Shipwreck.

Fun activities include wine tasting, hiking in Nisene Park, paddle boarding, biking, lounging on the beach, swimming, surfing, bonfire at the beach, dog walking and more!

Not too far from Capitola Beach, Beach Boardwalk or kayaking at Moss Landing.

The space
The Studio is detached from the main house and has it's own private entrance. In the front of the home. Attached full bathroom with shower. Kitchenette includes a small refrigerator, sink, counter, microwave, portable burner, toaster oven and cooking gear, plates and utensils.

Propane BBQ grill on your private patio.

The setting is very tranquil, surrounded by beautiful, old Oak and Maple trees with the sounds of
neighborhood_overview: I love walking down the creek to the beach and the walkway to Sea Cliff Beach Pier and looking out at the Shipwreck. Love sitting outside at Cafe Rio and ordering the grilled artichoke. This area is pretty mellow and the ocean really is a marine sanctuary. I always see seals by the shore and dolphins frolicking about and certain times of the year loads of whales. Free admission to Sea World out there and with the birds and everything it's like something out of National Geographic at times.
host_about:
No act of kindness,
no matter how small,
is ever wasted.
   - AESOP

Favorite travel destinations include:
Azores Islands, Portugal - I could be a bit bias here, as my family is from the beautiful island of Pico, Azores. 
I was very fortunate to have backpacked on my own for 9 months all throughout SE Asia, New Zealand, Australia, Nepal and Hong Kong and love every one of these places. It was the best time of my life.

Single mom, woman owned small business owner. 

Thank you for your support!

name: Spacious Family Home-Hot Tub
description:
An architecturally unique and fabulous home with open beams and plenty of modern yet cozy style. A short walk to Twin Lakes Beach. Just under 5 min. (less than 3 blocks) and you are at one of the most popular beaches in Santa Cruz. Dogs allowed on leash.
Fire rings available on beach when claimed early. Wood available in wood bin on property.

The space
Just under 5 min. (less than 3 blocks) and you are at one of the most popular beaches in Santa Cruz. Also within walking distance is the Crow’s Nest restaurant, and the harbor.

The upper great room includes a gas fireplace (bring own presto logs please), dining area, gourmet kitchen with a gas range and Subzero fridge. Master bedroom (queen bed) and one bathroom with a Jacuzzi tub on the upper floor. The upper bedroom opens to the hot tub area. There is also a table with an umbrella on this upper deck. One dog allowed under 35 lbs. High speed Wi-Fi, a computer and printer also located in the livi
neighborhood_overview: Quiet family neighborhood close to the beach and centrally located.  Previous guests have really enjoyed the environment and location.
host_about: Living the dream in Santa Cruz by the sea

name: Steps to Beach, Comforts of Home
description:
This cozy 1-bedroom in-law unit is just steps to Rio del Mar beach, walking distance to restaurants, and a quick drive to hiking, kayaking, whale watching, wine tasting and more! Full kitchen, wifi, streaming video TV (Roku), beach gear. A maximum of two guests allowed.

The space
PRIVATE IN-LAW UNIT
This brand-new in-law unit is located on the first floor of our house. It is completely separate from the main house with its own private entrance and internal dividing door.

We live in a residential neighborhood, so this space is great for people wanting to come enjoy the area, but not a good fit for loud parties.

PERFECT BEACH GETAWAY FOR 2
There is a bedroom area with queen-sized bed, dresser, and large closet. A half wall separates the bedroom from the living area. The bathroom is located off the hallway, outside of the bedroom. We allow a maximum of two guests only.

KITCHEN
The kitchen is fully equipped with dish
neighborhood_overview:
The Rio del Mar / Aptos area allows you to be close to nature while still having all the conveniences of a charming town. It's also a great base for exploring the Central Coast - Monterey and Carmel are just a half-hour away!

From our place you can walk for miles along the beach, and you will often see dolphins, seals, all kinds of sea birds, and even whales right from the shore. You can also walk to restaurants, bars and cafes in Rio del Mar and Seacliff Village, or drive about a mile to find shopping, restaurants, and grocery stores in Aptos Village. Capitola-by-the-Sea, Downtown Santa Cruz, and the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk all just about 10-15 minutes away by car.

Just a little over a mile away there is awe-inspiring hiking among the redwoods at Nisene Marks park. Kayak rentals and whale watching trips are available nearby out of the Santa Cruz Harbor and also at Moss Landing. Drive about 15 minutes from here for wonderful wine tasting in Soquel or Corralito
host_about:
A Bay Area native, my heart has always belonged to the beach! I studied at UC Santa Cruz and in 2014 relocated to Aptos from San Francisco. I love exploring the area on foot with my husband Andy and our dog, Betty - ask me about our favorite walking routes! I'm a fan of the arts and you can often find me watching live music or a dance performance, locally or in San Francisco. 

I look forward to meeting you!

name: Beach Suite- HotTub AquariumPasses E-Bikes&Surfbrd
description:
Beautiful, cozy guest suite in adorable beach house jungle yard! 1 block from some of the best beaches for surfing, paddle boarding, tidepooling, and bonfires. Explore town on the electric cruiser bikes, use the surfboards, and soak in the hot tub! And then visit the Monterey Bay Aquarium with our 2 guest passes.

See house rules for cleaning fee options.

The space
A really incredible little space that we have put a lot of time and love into so that you can come relax by the beach! It's a perfect spot to come back from the beach or to use as a home base for exploring Santa Cruz.

Things to note about the space:
This is an in-law studio unit attached to our home, so we only share a wall.
The space is small, being a studio (only the bedroom and bathroom and outdoor space). It sleeps 3, but we honestly don't recommend it for 3 adults as it'll be a bit snug, haha. But if that doesn't bother you, that's totally fine.

Guest
neighborhood_overview: An incredible location and neighborhood, truly our favorite in Santa Cruz. Block and a half to beaches and surf. 4 blocks from pleasure point and right in the middle between Capitola village and the boardwalk.

name: Butterfly House Healing Retreat at FaeryGlenn
description:
Enjoy a Healing Retreat in The Magical Redwood Forest of Faery Glenn. Meditate in a Faery Ring. Kids play area. Bedroom w/CalKing, Bonus area w/2 Twins. Full kitchen. Take a Technology Break. WIFI for cell only, No Internet.. TV w/DVD provided. Get away from it all, close to town. Subject to PGE black outs, no generator.

The space
****Please Read All Information In Each Section Before Booking.****
*Faery Glenn is a semi-off grid, Natural Forest Environment in the Santa Cruz Mountains in the County of Santa Cruz.
*Enjoy the Fresh Clean Airand Pure Clean Water that is pumped from 300 feet down into the Aquifer. Drink all you want straight from the tap!
*This is a Place To Unhook From Technology, Reconnect With and Harmonize with Nature, Spirit, and You.
* The house is 850 sq ft, room to move. The large bedroom accommodates a California King with ample room for a baby bed. Most of the cabins in this area barely fit a full size couples bed,
neighborhood_overview:
*Faery Glenn is located on a private one lane road, in a semi-off grid Redwood Forest, providing a nice level of privacy for all.
*There are 6 properties with good neighbors (including Faery Glenn) that share the road.
*Please BE CONSIDERATE, drive VERY, VERY SLOWLY ( Maximum 5mph).
*Pilger Rd is one lane, with places to pull over if you meet another car coming the opposite direction. Take a look as you drive the road to be aware of places to pull out in case needed.
*It is dark here at night as there are no street lights in this area.
*The road is paved, with worn gravel filled sections that may be a little bumpy, the slower the easier. There is no need for 4 wheel drive, but a very low car might hit bottom on a few spots. (I drive under 5 MPH myself)
* You will pass by a neighbors small recycling business on your way up the road.
host_about:
I am a "Nature Bunny" and love living in "Oneness" with nature and spirit. I love offering my Healing Retreats in this Magical Place. I began facilitating "Sacred Channels Healing" 24 years ago, following an out of body experience from which I returned much expanded and received my purpose for this life as a Healing Channel for Divine Beings and Energies.  I enjoy a quiet,simple, uncomplicated life and appreciate sharing with others who desire the same. Be sure and read all the information provided before booking. You can also learn more about me and my healing practice at Sacred Channels. 
 Thanks in advance!

name: Penthouse Beach Studio Flat, Views!
description:
Panoramic ocean views from very private Penthouse Studio flat on the 3rd story of house above 100' cliff. The entire 3rd floor is for your use only. The first queen size bed is in the sun room. The 2nd bed is round with the tent cover (as in the picture), and is outside with shower & sink. The toilet is in a separate changing room, next to your very own hot tub. Upon request there is a indoor bathroom for your use. Not suitable for kids or animals. Come Sea for Yourself!

The space
This home has been on the Annual Symphony League Home Tour two times, and the local newspaper called the Fanti-Sea house. The panoramic view is all the way from Capitola to Monterey. The private studio measures 11' x 18. It has a queen bed, a small kitchen table; with several chairs, cable T.V., music, refrigerator, coffee maker. The hot tub is top of the line Hot Springs. It is next to the studio on its own private deck. The hot tub maintenance man cleans the filters on Frida
neighborhood_overview: Quiet Street. The State Park surrounds the property. Great for bike riding & hiking. Less than a mile away from restaurants, stores, shopping, etc. Unsurpassed, unimpeded panoramic, ocean, bay, cement ship & whitewater views! Moments to Seacliff Village with famous Manuel's Mexican Restaurant, Marianne's Ice Cream, Hwy 1 Pizza within a mile from beach studio.
host_about: I have lived in Santa Cruz County for over 40 years. Very active in sports.  I am licensed to care for foster children, and have been doing this for over 8 years.

An additional detached bonus room has a queen bed and a full bathroom.

A detached room under the house has an additional queen bed and its own bathroom. It is accessed by going on back deck and down the stairs. There is also a twin folding mattress available in the master bedroom closet for your use. The space is great for families or groups of friends. Neighborhood is w

description:
Our beach cottage in Seabright has a harbor view deck, 1 1/2 blocks to beach, kitchenette, queen bed, and washer/ drier. Great weekend getaway. Next to Yacht Club. Walk to nearby restaurants and harbor activities, sailing, kayaking, surfing, biking and hiking.

Rustic, wood paneled, close to beach and harbor, view of harbor from deck, outdoor shower. Studio cottage with queen bed.

The cottage is detached from main house. Walking distance to harbor and beach.

2 Night minimum stay. Rate is for 2 guests, $25 per additional guest or pet. There is an 11% transient occupancy tax collected for short term rentals
neighborhood_overview: Close to sailing and beach activities. Great for couples or family

name: Santa Cruz Mountain Ocean Views (Los Gatos)
description:
Peaceful Santa Cruz Mountain home half way between the Silicon Valley (Los Gatos) and Santa Cruz. Distant Ocean and Monterey Bay views. 20 min to beach. Wineries, hiking & biking trails nearby.

The space
The property is very private. You cannot see another house from it except for the main house house (which is where the owners live).

Guest access
Guests are welcome to enjoy the four acres of property.

Other things to note
The road to our house is a bit windy as are many Santa Cruz Mountain roads. It is worth the privacy and views! Enjoy the Santa Cruz Mountain wildlife, including deer, coyote, wild turkeys and hawks. We have a Keurig Coffee Maker if you would like to bring pods.
neighborhood_overview: The Santa Cruz mountains is rural and wooded yet 25 minutes to the beach and 25 minutes to Silicon Valley or 75 min to San Francisco.  Monterey, Pebble Beach and Carmel are about 50 miles or a little over an hour without traffic. The property is 15 minutes from the Soquel Demonstration Forest famous for mountain biking trails.  Local hiking trails, christmas tree farms and wineries close by.
host_about: I am an Instructional Designer and learning and development professional. My family and I love to travel and mostly be with our extended families in Nevada and Wisconsin.

Spacious two bedroom apartment that's close to everything! Walking distance to Upper Seabright Neighborhood shops, restaurants, and bars. Five minute drive to downtown Santa Cruz/ Seabright Beach/Main Beach/Boardwalk. Ten minute drive to UCSC. This is NOT a party rental, it is a quiet place.

NO pets please

No smoking anywhere on the property. If you are a smoker, this is not the place for you, sorry. This is a mellow spot.️ 4 people maximum, do not even think about sneaking people in:)

The space
Very spacious two bedroom fully furnished apartment 5 minutes drive from the beach .Washer and dryer inside unit. Nice and super sunny private patio to relax on, all the amenities you would need for a long or short stay. Hi-speed wifi and cable TV included. SMART TV to stream Netflix. host_about: I have lived in Pleasure Point for  over twenty years and I love it!! name: Magnolia Garden Bungalow Dogs/Hot Tub
description:
The house is located walking distance to Capitola Village ( 5 min stroll),it has a fabulous beach and a large selection of places to eat and shop. Pleasure Point is also close with 38th ave Surf Sanctuary, Privates beach, Verve Coffee Roast Co., Bike Paths and numerous restaurants.

The space
The home has a comfortable and tasteful feeling. Front bedroom has a King bed and mirrored closet doors ( &TV).The second Living room has a Queen bed and French doors to Hot Tub ($TV). All beds have quality linens. Original art from local artists, Crate & Barrel couches & ottoman, Velvet curtains, high end linens, beds, pillows, quality comfortable mattresses, new hardwood flooring, carpeting, chandelier, carved glass door to bathroom, etched side lights in front bedroom, (by Heather Glass a local Artist) concrete kitchen counter tops, new blinds, Thermador stove/oven, Wine Cooler/refrigerator, barbeque, front yard area with table and chairs, hot tub (maintained by a water
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy this lovely, tranquil neighborhood.  A short stroll to amazing restaurants and local beaches. Close by is “The Surf Sanctuary” which is a wonderful walk way along the ocean, where people walk their dogs and ride their bikes, and you can catch top notch surfers riding waves.  Magnolia Garden Bungalow is also a 5 min walk down to Capitola,  a charming Oceanside European style, village, where you can choose from a variety of delicious food, including Pizza ( Pizza My Heart; voted # 1 in the world) to go for a meal on the beach. The neighborhood stays cool on warm days with a bay breeze, not the big winds off the open ocean. Enjoy the front yard with a lush garden or the side yard with a barbecue. Both yards have table and chairs to relax for meals and drinks.
host_about: I've lived in Santa Cruz for about 35 years and still enjoy the beauty and variety of beaches, restaurants, and the  ambiance of a resort town. I am an Animal Portrait Painter, gardener, and ride my horse (Dressage). So I enjoy having and meeting people and their dogs/animals that come to visit.

name: A Holiday Ocean Lover’s Delight!
description:
Three minute walk to the ocean! Close to UCSC and Boardwalk.

The space
Come enjoy your vacation at this family friendly upscale home only a three minute walk from the ocean! We love our home and Santa Cruz and we can’t wait to share it with you.

We remodeled it with all wood floors, stone countertops, luxury master bathroom, gourmet kitchen, king sized bed, cathedral ceilings and many other wonderful details.

This is a family home not some empty beach rental, you'll be able to tell that kids live here.

The lot is beautifully landscaped with lots of edible fruit so don’t be shy about picking a strawberry or a peach for your morning cereal!

The master bedroom has a walk in closet, its own spa-quality bathroom and a sliding glass door to the very private back yard. This is definitely a perfect spot for a lover’s retreat. The master bed is also at the far end of the house from the other two bedrooms so it feels like a priv

name: Sparkling clean and ready for a relaxing getaway
description:
With 1,100 square feet of living space, perfect for families but also affordable for couples. It has a spacious open floor plan with the dining room, kitchen and living room for socializing. The bedrooms and bathroom are separated by a door and hallway for those who are sleeping. The kitchen is amazing with all the amenities, appliances and it is stocked with the basic supplies. The beds are super comfortable. If you have a larger group, see below for an option for five additional people.

The space
This sweet 1100 square foot home has a sunny and spacious living room with an open kitchen and dining room. Perfect for the family get-together. There are two bedrooms. One bedroom has a comfy California king size bed. The other bedroom has a queen bed and a desk for those who are still working remotely. There is a pull-out memory foam sleeper in the living room.

The kitchen is well equipped with quality pots, pans, rice cooker, juicer, Vitamix blende
neighborhood_overview:
My home is centrally located to all the fun stuff in Santa Cruz - Capitola Village, the beach, Santa Cruz Harbor, Capitola Mall, the Boardwalk, the mountains, etc.

Within walking distance, there is a grocery store, two Mexican restaurants, two coffee shops, Farrell's Donut House, Toadal Fitness gym, and two convenience stores/gas stations.
host_about:
I love welcoming visitors and sharing Santa Cruz with them!  We have a special community here.  It is truly a funky little beach town.

I grew up in Virginia but lived in Seattle for most of my adult life.  I moved to Santa Cruz in April 2013.   

I spend a lot of time outdoors. I like road biking and I am planning to learn to mountain bike in 2016.  I love to hike in the mountains and on the beach with my dogs.  I am vegetarian and love to cook.  

Santa Cruz is my favorite travel destination! I love welcoming my guests and sharing this paradise.

name: Mountain Retreat w/Pool & Views
description:
Wonderful house amongst the beautiful hills of Aptos, California (30 minutes from Santa Cruz) featuring plenty of space (sleeps 8+), hammocks at every turn, a pool, hot tub, gourmet kitchen, BBQ, indoor & outdoor dining, sound systems, & fireplace.

The space
Six acres of land, excellent and very expansive views of the Monterey Bay, surrounding redwoods, and starry skies. Also, a sparkling pool and hot tub surrounded by beautiful landscaping, and so much more. A true getaway and very enjoyable space.

The bedrooms include a spacious master with a king bed and private bath, a guest room with a queen bed and private bed, a kids room with bunk beds and a couch, and a large hidden bedroom with a queen bed, a private living area and a shared bath.

Guest access
Pool, hot tub, BBQ, great music systems, six acres of land, hammocks, a huge terrace with fountain, top-notch kitchen, and plenty of hang out and rest space.

Other t
neighborhood_overview: A peaceful mountain community surrounds the house, and Aptos is a 20 minute drive down the hill, which has a long beach, massive redwood state park (Nisene Marks), as well as a few boutiques, markets and eateries.

Your cozy patio is downstairs, behind a private gate. You will be nestled up one flight of stairs, two blocks from the ocean and beautiful West Cliff Drive, close to restaurants, warehouse wineries/ brewpubs, farmers markets, surfing and downtown. Quiet, peaceful, non smoking, plenty of on-street parking.

The space
2 blocks to the ocean and gorgeous West Cliff Drive, tucked upstairs separate from and behind the main house in a quiet, private location, yet close to everything: restaurants, surfing, beaches, downtown, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and Wharf, wineries. Sparkling clean, quiet and perfect for the single traveler, comfy for a couple. Plush Queen bed in the bedroom. Complete kitchen with all amenities, full en-suite bathroom with shower/tub, Washer/dryer, private do
neighborhood_overview:
I have great neighbors who appreciate the kind of people who come stay at my rental. It is a quiet spot with a short two blocks to the ocean. You can walk through our greenbelt to watch the waves, the dolphins and whales!

*LONG TERM BOOKINGS: Cleaning fees for 2 weeks=$100, for 3 weeks=$125, for monthly=$150 (additional fees will be added at booking).

Santa Cruz City Transient Occupancy Tax (TOT) for short term rentals (less than 30 days) is 11% and is incorporated into the total price of the booking (rent plus cleaning fee). West Cliff Hideaway is a registered Short Term Rental with the city of Santa Cruz as #000998. Once AirBnB funds my account the 11% TOT is remitted to the City of Santa Cruz after your stay.

name: Sea Crest Ocean View Villa
description:
New Spectacular Ocean View Villa located across from Wharf and Cowells Beach & walk to Boardwalk. Luxury abounds in 4 Bed 4 bath w/ Viking appliances, Granite Counters, Travertine Floors, Spa Bathrooms. Location and amenities cannot be beat!

The space
The Sea Crest Villa is a Spectacular New Construction Ocean View Villa located across from Santa Cruz Wharf and Cowells Beach. Luxury abounds in 4 Bed 4 bath w/ Viking appliances, Granite Counters, Travertine Floors, Spa Bathrooms. Location and amenities cannot be beat! Enjoy custom finishes, warm contemporary décor and thoughtful attention to detail at every turn. A graceful home-away-from-home. 5 night minimum during peak seasons required.

There is a private parking garage with two spaces per guest, as well as ample on street parking. There are two Villas on site, and a penthouse suite. The Sea Crest villa is single level and there is a elevator available for guests with access needs.

Each
neighborhood_overview: Perched directly across from the ocean and the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary Visitor's Center. Take the free summertime trolley offering service to downtown Santa Cruz with a stop outside your front door. Walk to the lighthouse museum at Lighthouse Field or hop on the old fashion locomotive train to Roaring Camp Redwoods. Enjoy 30+ restaurants and shops, rent surfboards, watch the whales and dolphins, enjoy the boardwalk or retreat on your own private deck with fantastic ocean views.

name: 3BD 2.5Bath Townhouse
description:
3 Bedroom 2.5 Bath Townhouse in central Scotts Valley. Located close to shops, Sky Park, Henry Cowell State Park and only 10-15 minutes from Santa Cruz and the beaches. Come and hike, bike, surf or just relax.

The space
This is our home and we love our home. We think you will find the accommodations to be very comfortable. You have room to spread out, relax and enjoy the area. The kitchen is a food preppers delight. There is ample counter space to make the most elaborate meals, and the dining table seats 6 very comfortably. There is a 4th bedroom on the 1st floor that is not accessible to you. At times we may stay in first floor bedroom at the beginning or the end of a trip or a friend may stay there, but you will not share any space and likely not see or hear anyone if there is anyone staying in the room.

Guest access
1 master bedroom with California King bed
1 bedroom with Queen bed
1 bunk bed room with optional queen air mattre
neighborhood_overview: We are in a very family friendly townhouse community. It is a quiet neighborhood with mostly young professionals. There are many kids in the neighborhood so you may heear them running around and playing during the day. We are about a 5 minute walk to Sky Park and only 2 miles from a trail entrance and 10 minute drive to the main entrance at Henry Cowell State Park. We love the outdoors and the opportunities within a short drive are endless.
host_about: My wife and I are nurses. We enjoy running, biking, hiking, and anything outdoors. We are pretty low key, but like to think we have fun! We really enjoy traveling. We spent half a year in South America, half a year in New Zealand, and a few months in Central America. We have also traveled quite a bit in the US.

name: West Side Santa Cruz house  at Natural Bridges
description:
Beautiful home with a view of the ocean across the street from Natural Bridges State Park. 3 bedrooms, a loft for 2 kids and 2 bathrooms.
Large deck with view of the ocean with a patio table and chairs, and umbrella, perfect for watching the sunset. The deck has a nice BBQ.
Guests can use our cruiser bikes, and user our wagon to take our surf board, beach toys and beach chairs down to the beach at the end of the street.

The space
Spend some time at our beautiful beach house overlooking Natural Bridges State Park. Hear the surf and see the ocean through the trees from the living room and the expansive deck. Drift into sleep listening to the waves from your bedroom. Walk down the block to the beach, build a sand castle, and play in the waves. Stroll down West Cliff and watch the surf crash against the cliffs. The house is also a short walk to Swift Street Courtyard, home to Kelly’s French Bakery, the Cellar Door Café, Santa Cruz Mountain Brewing,
neighborhood_overview:
We love this house. The sound of the surf "rocks" us to sleep at night.
The deck is a great place to hang out, BBQ and people watch or read. There is a comfortable table with a large umbrella. The table seats 7 or more. We enjoy coffee and many meals on the deck.
You can see the ocean form the deck, the living and dining rooms too.
When it is cold there is a nice fireplace that heat the upstairs quite well.
host_about: We are a friendly family that rents our beach house with the goal of living in Santa Cruz full time in 5-7 years.  We love this place.  Please treat our home like you love it too.  (We think you will love the place.)

name: Redwood Retreat
description:
A peaceful creek-side studio in a redwood grove. Private entrance with a own bathroom & mini-kitchen. Unit is attached to the main house but it's very private and feels like a cabin
Hang out in the cozy room, in the private glen by the creek or go explore Henry Cowell Redwoods state park, Felton restaurants & tourist train. 20 min drive to ocean & Santa Cruz. Wylder Ranch state Park is pretty close too.
A good Hub for exploring Monterey, Big Sur. San Francisco is close enough for a day trip.

The space
Cozy studio with a super comfy bed, private bathroom, sitting area and kitchenette with table and two nice chairs. TV (for DVDs with a selection of movies and Netflix && Hulu if you have an account), Microwave, hot plate, sauce pan and fry pan, toaster, coffeemaker, little frig. and a tea pot, dishes etc. Towels and shampoo too.
Very quiet and very private apartment. It's attached to the main house but on a separate level and feels like a cabi
neighborhood_overview:
Quite mountain neighborhood but close to Hwy 9 and the little town of Felton. Felton has a couple of great restaurants and some good take out places plus the best natural foods market. Felton Music Hall has a different musical act every night. Walk to Monte's Log Cabin - a classsic dive bar.
Walking distance to Henry Cowell Redwoods state park (with a great short hike to see the giant trees) and Roaring Camp tourist train (take a train to the beach boardwalk). Short drive to Fall Creek park (great hiking) and only 15-20 minutes from eclectic downtown Santa Cruz and the beautiful beach, wharf and boardwalk.
host_about:
I've been living in Santa Cruz for over 30 years and love it here. I used to be in the restaurant business, the electronics business and worked for CASA (a non-profit).
I'm semi-retired now, doing a little teaching
I love to hike and be outdoors - do I live in the right place or what?

name: Mountain Vista, Disinfected Daily, Clean & Safe!
description:
separate unit for essential workers only. Beautiful, spacious bedroom with gorgeous view of mountain canyons! All guests agree to CDC pandemic guidelines. No shared bathrooms, See below for details**
Queen bed Private bath, private deck, gorgeous view.
Drive 5 mins to beautiful beaches, ocean-view restaurants, grocery. Airbnb reviews required. No smokers. **

The space
** For your health, Host will ensure Guests enjoy a fully disinfected space. $35 cleaning fee reflects extra disinfecting service for every surface. Kitchen gets disinfected after each use by a guest.
No bathroom sharing: each bedroom gets its own bathroom.
-kitchen News is one person at a time only--please use house guidelines for 15 minute disinfecting list after kitchen use. Cooler provided for your Private use so everyone’s food can stay separate and safe.
Plenty of paper towels for hand drying. Cost will cover the cost of hand sanitizer , disinfectant cleaner, and g
neighborhood_overview: This is a beautiful neighborhood with a warm, casual vibe.  Suburbs that feel rural. Nearby trails wander thru acres of open-space hills that reach almost to the ocean.  Neighbors know each other and look out for each other; no crime; very safe.
host_about:
(profile photo: sharing famous Abbot Pizza "salad pizza" with my  niece in Venice Beach, California")
I absolutely love living in Santa Cruz -- how did I get so lucky? Sharing my home is a real pleasure, and so is getting to see a little slice of the world through the eyes of my guests. I enjoy playing tour director and socializing, or giving people space to bask in the peace and beauty of my home and gorgeous surroundings.
When you're here you can share lots of food I make available. Coffee, tea, toast, jam, and all your basic kitchen stuff like butter, olive oil, spices. Use cupboards / fridge for your food. Join forces and share occasional meals when we catch each other on the same schedule.  Lounge on the deck and wile away another day in paradise. It's a five minute drive to good food, deluxe markets, plain ol' safeway, lots of cafes, and best of all spectacular beaches and mountain hiking. Cute beach-village 10 minutes away is Capitola, tons of novelty shops, art, jewelry etc.
Hope to have the chance to host you for some R&R in our little slice of heaven.

name: Peaceful Treehouse with Ocean View
description:
Featured by Sunset Magazine as a “chic escape.”
Inside, mid-century furniture and architectural details are made of natural materials like wood and stone setting a calming, sanctuary tone throughout. Curl up with a good read by the light streaming through floor to ceiling windows and under soaring wooden beams or tuck in for the evening by closing the sliding doors inspired by Japanese screens.

Strive to provide a safe environment for guests to enjoy. We thoroughly clean and sanitize after each guest.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a quiet secluded neighborhood next to Nicene Marks Redwood Forest State Park, just outside of the city of Santa Cruz. It's perched on top of a small valley, overlooking the ocean.

The neighborhood is very quite a private - please do not disturb our neighbors. Absolutely no parties or outside amplified music.

description:
This beautiful newly remodeled villa is located in the amenity-rich Seascape Resort in Aptos, CA. Walk on the gorgeous beach, this vacation rental is perfect for a romantic getaway, or a week away from it all with the family. There are 3 pools, Sanderling's restaurant on-site as well as restaurants and shops across the street. The beach spans for miles. Walk the grounds or enjoy the pools, beach and restaurant!

The space
Newly remodeled and gorgeous! Bright, sunny light and expansive ocean views!

There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not available to private renters. Pools and hot tub are
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

Refer to the Guest Welcome Binder upon arrival for additional information on the property and local attractions.

The space
Close proximity to world class surfing and an outdoor shower.
Master bedroom has a King bed. 1 additional bedroom has a King bed and 1 additional bedroom has a Queen bed.

Guest access
Includes bed linens and towels.
Outdoor grill and outdoor firepit (may or may not have briquettes and firewood).

Other things to note
Unless arranged otherwise check in is at 4pm and check out is at noon.
neighborhood_overview:
Walk to West Cliff Drive.
Walk to beaches.
Lovely neighbors.
Quiet yet close to the action.
Las Palmas Taco Bar and Sawasdee Thai food within walking distance.
The Dream Inn has a nice bar and the restaurant has a great view. Food is iffy.
Same thing with Ideal Bar and Grill. Pricey for what you get.
host_about: I rent my home in Santa Cruz through Airbnb as well, so I understand how important it is to treat your place as though it is my own.

name: Sunny Beach Bungalow
description:
This is a 640 sq ft (60 sq mts) beach bungalow with detached 120 sq ft bonus room with privacy and all the extras to make your stay in this charming beach town perfect. Easy walk to beach, food and music venues.

The space
This is a 640 sq ft (60 sq mts) beach bungalow with all the extras to make your stay in this charming beach town perfect. House has new bamboo floors, gas fireplace, new Italian gas stove in kitchen,washer/dryer and completely private landscaped backyard with outdoor fire pit and picnic table. House has fast wifi service throughout and a bonus detached room with full bed that sleeps two (120 sq ft/11 sq mts). There is also a couch that is very comfortable to sleep on as well as a queen blow up mattress available. We are 1 mile (1.5 km) from beach and house is equipped with foam surfoards and boogie boards that you can use for your beach outings. You can walk there in about 15 mins, bike or drive in less than 5 mins.Downtown and the Santa Cruz
neighborhood_overview: Our house is close to the beach and in a super quiet neighborhood with families. It is a great place to get away and has a fully stocked organic grocery store and conventional grocery about 5 blocks away. We have sushi, Thai, crepes, asian fusion, Italian and a great cafe all within walking distance.
host_about: We are into the outdoors and being around and in the ocean. We travel whenever we can and love to share our space with respectful folks when we are away.

name: Harmony & Labyrinth by the Bay
description:
Your room with a private en-suite shower, queen bed, heated dual controlled mattress pad below flannel sheets under a large domed skylight. Wifi, private entry via French door from the deck overlooking a lush zenlike garden property with a 22' labyrinth for your meditative walk. Recently added amenities include a mini refrigerator and a classic small microwave. The yard has outdoor tables for dining with guest's discardable food containers and dishes. We do not allow the use of our kitchen.

The space
Private large room with light filled charm in a home built in 1926 and situated on a third of an acre. An ideal, close to everything, mid-county setting. A Zen garden/pond with 22 ft wide labyrinth, mature fruit trees, a small pond with flowing water feature and a bench-swing for peaceful viewing. A large aviary next to the room with Canary and Finch singing and harmonizing with amazing toned wind chimes. A flock or 8 hens, now reduced to 2! who reside within an en
neighborhood_overview:
Live Oak is an unincorporated mid county area situated between the cities of Santa Cruz and Capitola extending from Pleasure Point at the coast to the village of Soquel! Our home is a 5 minute bike ride from the beach and close to the surfing mecca of famed Pleasure Point breaks and the Yacht Harbor. Close by is the upper yacht harbor entrance to the new bike/bridge path across Arana Gulch that is both scenic and fun.
Santa Cruz is a unique and special place that can revive your spirit quickly, especially here on this beautiful Santa Cruz property!
host_about:
Former California Highway Patrolman and VP of Sales and Marketing for Pacific Cookie Co. Grandfather to ten including 8 year-old twin grandsons who live in the South Bay of LA. Love the ocean, both in it and on it, gardening, biking, walking in beautiful Santa Cruz, especially along the new E. Cliff Ave walkway. 
After leaving the highway patrol, I took a path that essentially went from CHiPS to chocolate chips!
Author and Founder of DriversYoga (website hidden) a mental technique to keep you in the moment while driving. The guidebook, The Art of Looking Through the Windshield can be purchased from Amazon.
Most say I get along well with being a very genial host.
You can talk to me about Nowhere Yoga!
Over the years we have created a mature and unique garden landscape full of beauty and sound in the mode of a zen temple sanctuary between the cities of Santa Cruz and Capitola. A visual stress remover! Come and experience, we're here for you. A relaxed self download if you will! 
Following the earthquake of 1989 we purchased 8K handmade bricks from the demo site of the downtown Oddfellow's building. (next door to the Cooper House building, now O'Neill's Surf. The bricks were vertical from the date of 1893 to 1989! So while here you are walking on a lot of Santa Cruz history and the building that housed the original town clock!
Airbnb ask me to tell guest if I have a life motto. Well yes in fact I do;  
Flexible indecision with all seriousness aside and forward to the rear"!  "It's always 'the ole same space"
And if you come, welcome to Santa Cruz---The gem of the central coast—-A special place! 
Aloha and Namaste
Pete

name: The Cowboy Room @ FlipJack Ranch Bed & Breakfast
description:
Rustic charm with a woodburning fireplace. The Cowboy room is on the second floor of the historic building, our largest room. Ensuite bath, Queen bed, twin bed, and a private deck overlooking the redwoods. Wake up to fresh coffee delivered to your room, followed by a sumptuous farm to table breakfast. Wifi, fridge, desk for your convenience.

The space
We have high hygiene standards at our very small 4 room BnB. In response to COVID-19, we are followinLooking for a safe haven during Covid? Our rooms are widely distanced and separated. g best practices of increased cleaning and disinfecting from the CDC, Santa Cruz Health Department and the California Hotel and Lodging Association. We use approved CDC cleaners and steam sanitization of soft goods like pillows and comforters. Public spaces are disinfected frequently during the day. Guestrooms and entries are widely separated and breakfast service is at separated areas.

FlipJack Ranch is an historic 188
neighborhood_overview: Historic Bonny Doon (Santa Cruz Mountains) is a sleepy rural mountain village set among redwoods, wineries and pastures. Some of the best beaches in California are just two miles away. Enjoy the peace and quiet, or drive to civilization just 3 miles away.
host_about:
My love of food, cooking, wine and art has lead me on a lifelong journey. Years ago, I was a restauranteur in Chicago, then a full time studio potter, then a career in corporate sales and marketing.

I've traveled extensively, usually on a quest to find indigenous, traditional regional foods. Desert beans in India, grilled squid from a street vendor in Hong Kong, fresh rambutan in Thailand, black mole in Mexico, and hay soup in Austria are just a few memorable tastes. I am inspired by these experiences and I cook with international flavors.

A few years ago, I began to dream about having a farm where I could produce more of the foods, meats, and wines that I love. That dream came true when we bought FlipJack Ranch. Ranch life suits me, waking up to gather fresh eggs, cuddling the baby chicks and baby bunnies,  walking out to see the garden with a cup of coffee in hand. The whole 'farm to table' thing is real here on the ranch and the sustainable, organic and free range food products are my inspiration for daily menus. I love to forage too, here or nearby,  bringing back mushrooms, salad greens or mussels for the table. 

As a traveler myself, I value warm hospitality and those little things that make a stay memorable. I love it when I can go to a place and just unwind, assured that everything is there and I can just relax. I hope to make your stay with us memorable.

name: Beautiful Home in Pleasure Point
description:
Newly remodeled home and brand new on the market minutes from epic surf in the heart of Pleasure Point. All new appliances, state of the art kitchen, high speed internet, back deck and yard. Step outside to hear the sound of the waves breaking near by!

The space
2 blocks to the ocean and walking distance to 8 epic waves in Pleasure Point.

Guest access
The entire private unit and backyard are all yours...enjoy!

Other things to note
It’s a super cute, quaint, surf-centric neighborhood. Very special place and you’ll love it.
neighborhood_overview: Charming neighborhood - minutes walking distance to  world class surf spots perfect for all all levels, cafe's, restaurants, bars, live music, and ground transportation.
host_about: I split my time between San Francisco, Santa Cruz and adventuring abroad. I am passionate about creating beautiful spaces and sharing them with others! I would love to welcome ya into either of my homes :).

name: SantaCruz-Aptos-Beach-Home-by-The Sea
description:
Our 1- bedroom beach home was cosmetically renovated in late 2015. Bathroom renovated recently in 2020.

Home is decorated with a cozy beach theme. We know you will enjoy the home and the amenities of Aptos-Santa Cruz .

Only a 5 minute walk to the beaches, restaurants, hiking & biking trails. Wine tastings nearby.

A Romantic Get-Away!

The space
An Adorable and Romantic updated 1- bedroom separate unit is attached to our main house upstairs.

If you like Mediterranean feel with an interior beach-decor and a beautifully renovated bathroom , you will like this place for your get-away.

It is only a 5 minute walk to Rio Del Mar beach and restaurants.

This unit sleeps 2 (queen bed in bedroom and full size futon couch in the living room).

Effective June 2020, no pets allowed.

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole downstair unit with own private door. Unit
neighborhood_overview:
We love the neighborhood of Rio Del Mar in Aptos.
Nice walk to the the beach; depending on the time of the year, you can see dolphins migrating back and forth from Monterey Bay to Santa Cruz in the morning and late afternoon.
If hiking & biking 🚴‍♀️ are your cup of tea , Nisene Marks Forest is a great spot, and only 4 minutes from the house.

The restaurants are nearby : Cafe Sparrow in the APTOS Village and Cafe Rio down by the beach , to name just a couple. Many more fun restaurants available!

Carmel and Monterey is only 40 minutes south of Aptos. Santa Cruz 15 minutes north of us. San Francisco 45 minutes north of us.
host_about:
I love to live by the waters; whether it be by the ocean or by the lake.  Therefore, I have a home by the ocean and a lake cabin in South Lake Tahoe by Heavenly Valley Ski Resort, both of which I rent as a vacation rental. 
I love to cook and hosts friends. Friends and families are what makes life richer, meaningful and fun! 

I enjoy having  guests to our home upstairs from the rental unit in Aptos for a glass of wine and cheese if our guests are up for it.

  Sharing a home in Lake Tahoe allows me to host new friends as well. It's always fun to share a part of you to like-minded people (who wants a home away from home). 

I love to travel and see new places and to know more about different cultures.  I enjoy going to Europe: Paris, Greece, Italy, Croatia, and Turkey.  I love the history, the culture, the food and wine! 

I have families in France, Canada, Hong Kong and Shanghai.  I feel blessed that we get to visit fun and exotic places. 

I love to read a good book every so often (both fiction and non-fictions books) when I’m not traveling.

I like Christian music and mainstream jazz and classic rock. 

My  life motto is to live a life of loving people!  Because we all need to love and be loved! (no matter where we've been or what we have done in the past).

name: Charming Santa Cruz Getaway
description:
Perfectly located private back house in mid-town Santa Cruz.
1.5 miles to beach, 1 mile to downtown, 3 blocks from world-class music venues, and walking distance to dining.
Great for world travelers, musicians, families, or a romantic getaway.

The space
Private and welcoming back house with own entrance. Main floor has piano, eating area, TV/lounge area, & bathroom. Loft has two full-size beds. Lush backyard, deck & outdoor furniture perfect for relaxing or enjoying a meal. Located directly in Santa Cruz's "banana belt," which means there's always sunshine & warm temps.

3 blocks to the Rio Theater. Quick walk to downtown. Easy access to east-side & west-side beaches, Pleasure Point & Steamer Lane surf spots, shopping & restaurants. 3 blocks to bike rentals for guests to explore Santa Cruz.

Kitchenette: Mini-fridge, hot plate, microwave,coffee maker,electric tea kettle and eating area available.

Please notice the ladder
neighborhood_overview:
You cannot beat our location!
1.5 miles to beach, 1 mile to downtown, 3 blocks from some of Santa Cruz' favorite restaurants & world-class music venue, The Rio (worth checking into the lineup if you're a music fan).
Easy access to Redwood trees and epic hiking trails. About a 10-minute drive to UCSC. Easy access to all of the best surf spots in Santa Cruz. And, the Boardwalk is an easy (and delightful) walk from our doorstep.
host_about:
We are empty nesters who spend our free time outside, exploring, and being active. Walks along the coast and hiking are our main activities. We love Santa Cruz for it's funky free spirit, vibrant vitality, diverse community, and its central location to countless other areas—San Francisco, Monterey, Carmel, Big Sur, Highway 1, Yosemite, and Tahoe, among other amazing places!

We have been hosting guests for 8 years via word of mouth and are excited to now open it up to all travelers. We love sharing our back house and community with others, and hope to provide a welcoming atmosphere that will make your stay perfect.

name: Jade Studio by Beach at Jasmine Garden Oasis
description:
Welcome to Jasmine Garden Oasis Retreat House—3 block walk to quiet beaches. We have two upstairs independent guest studios inside our home, each with queen bed and extra beds for $30 charge: Jade Studio with private second-story deck, and Birdsong Studio with south-facing French Doors overlooking garden. We offer garden hot tub, meditation & QiGong instruction, bicycle loan, allergy-free, healing sessions in-room, and EMF-free option--renewing for heart, body & soul. Sunrise/sunset at beach.

The space
JADE STUDIO has a queen bed, private bathroom with shower, kitchenette, private entrance via side stairs, and private second-story deck.
PRIVATE BUT NOT PRIVACY: The studio is inside our home so although we may never see you, we may hear you and you may hear us because sound travels easily through the walls.
ADDITIONAL BED:
For 1 or 2 guests, the queen bed is provided. If you would like separate beds, please tell us and we will set up the futon bed
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is a relatively quiet neighborhood with an assortment of people who enjoy living near the beach--including long-time residents, families, retired people, UCSC students, and surfers interspersed to keep it characteristic of Santa Cruz.
Two blocks away is a modest shopping center which hosts the local farmer's market on Sunday mornings. A handful of eateries and a coffee shop, from fast food to upscale dining, line the two blocks toward the beaches. A back way to the beach (our special secret) is three lovely blocks, two of which are walking/biking trails, one lined with Cypress trees, and the next along a lagoon lined with Eucalyptus trees.
The Harbor and Crows Nest restaurant and nightclub are a several blocks to the west along the shore. Downtown Santa Cruz is 3 miles west and Capitola, a quaint seaside town, is 2 miles east. Both are easily accessible by bike lanes, public transportation and car.
host_about: We, Peter & Marie, are a married couple who relish offering our sweet space & location to guests. We enjoy living in a tranquil atmosphere and want to share this with others of like mind at our home, Jasmine Garden Oasis Retreat House near the Sea. It is a modest home tucked away in a modest neighborhood three blocks from the beach in east Santa Cruz with two independent Airbnb studios upstairs, and expand to include the whole house when we offer guided retreats. We keep gentle gardens and cosy comfortable atmosphere for people who want a time of  renewal for body and soul. Mornings we enjoy a short tree-lined walk visit the quiet beach to listen to the surf and watch the dawn followed by morning meditation which we invite guests to join, and evenings the dusk. We have a list of healing artists who have offered to deliver their services to our guests in their private rooms.

name: Pleasure Pt Beach Home/Moran Lagoon View
description:
Live like a local in this one of kind sunny, tranquil recently remodeled two story 2,010 sqft home which has multiple skylights and decks on both levels. Backing up to the greenbelt of Moran Lagoon, enjoy the views of the seabirds, monarch butterflies and ducks while listening to the waves. Perfect for families, romantic couples, and corporate retreats. Easy check in/check out with door access code. Santa Cruz County Vacation Rental Permit 141245.

The space
A unique, sunny, and spacious recently remodeled two story home consisting of 2,010 sq. ft, 3 bedroom, and two baths located in Pleasure Point.

The house is situated on a quiet dead end street that comfortably hosts 8 people. Home has multiple decks on two levels with beautiful views of Moran Lagoon. We strive to provide a very accurate description of the house, we want you to be happy and enjoy our stay!

The house is well-equipped for a relaxing and comfortable stay.

ROOM
neighborhood_overview:
Very quiet neighborhood on a dead-end street, no thru traffic. Houses on our side of this street back up to Moran Lagoon. Beautiful views of green-belt and quick walk to the beach. Enjoy the views of the monarch butterflies and ducks while listening to the waves.

The house is a 5-10 minute walk to several area beaches for a fun day of surfing, boogie boarding, sunbathing, and relaxing. Surfers only have a short walk to enjoy the world class surf at Pleasure Point break, the Hook, 38th, Sharks, and 26.

The restaurants and shopping on Portola and 41st are just a 15-20 minute walk or 10 minute bike ride away (0.9 miles).

Capitola and The Harbor/Crow’s nest are both a 2 mile walk, (Please note they are in opposite directions.) Walking 30-40 minutes, biking 20 minutes, and a 5-7 minutes drive.

The Pleasure Point Market is a short walk away or there are a number of grocery stores within a 5-10 minute drive (Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, Safeway.)
host_about: We are a couple who owns several rental properties in the Bay Area and Santa Cruz.  We love to travel and welcome fellow travelers to our vacation rental home in Santa Cruz.  Some of our favorite things to do when in Santa Cruz is walking the beaches to Capitola during low tide and collecting, shells, driftwood, and beach glass or riding our bicycles all over town. We love traveling throughout Europe and especially Italy.  Our bucket list of near-future travel destinations are Spain, Portugal, Morocco and Ecuador & Colombia.

name: Vacation at Seahaven in Santa Cruz!
description:
This beach house offers a private fenced back yard with BBQ and a Hot Tub. Just a 5-minute walk to the Beach and mins drive to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and Capitola. Enjoy taking in the beach lifestyle in a lovely sanctuary while spending quality time by the ocean. We take great care in the comfort and safety of our guests. Our home is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized after each guest per California Guidelines.

The space
This lovely home features 4 bedrooms, 2 full baths and a basic equipped kitchen. We have 3 kings, 1 queen, and 2 twin bunk bed sets. Our occupancy per our license with Santa Cruz County is max 8 persons (children under 6 not included).

Note: Pets are welcome at $100 pet fee for the 1st pet and an additional $50 for the second with pre-approval. (Please read our House Rules for more information.)

Guest access
You have full access to the home except for the master bedroom closet and the garage.
<
neighborhood_overview:
Just 1.5 blocks from Pleasure Point! The most amazing spot to watch the surfers, walk the paved path along the beautiful cliffs or do some surfing! The other direction is 26 Avenue beach where you can sit in the sun, watch the surf, take a dip in the ocean, body surf, run the dogs on the beach, or have an evening fire! Bathrooms are located across the street in the parking area.

Just a short 10 minute drive or a long walk to Downtown Capitola! Food, beaches, shopping! Or just a great place for a stroll.

Just 15 minute drive to Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. Fun under the sun! Games, rides, Miniature Golf, Arcade, or bowling. Walk the pier and see the fishermen bringing in their fresh haul! Great restaurants for all types of taste.

Want to go to a Farmer's Market? There is a fabulous one at Cabrillo College in Aptos just about a 20 minute drive from the house.

How about going to Downtown Santa Cruz and enjoy the color of the area?

name: Updated Beach House; 5 minute walk to Beach
description:
Great Value! This charming beach bungalow is only ~500 steps from Twin Lakes /Black's beach & a short walk to the harbor & Sunny Cove beach.

The home is newly remodeled & features new cabinets, counters, wood floors & stainless steel appliances. Outdoor solar shower for rinsing off. Fully fenced yard- perfect for families. Washer & Dryer in the garage.

We are complying with enhanced COVID-cleaning protocols and ask that guests limit social exposure when outside the home. No auto booking

The space
Walk to Black's beach / Twin Lakes beach in less than 5 minutes (less than 500 steps to beach). Best beach in Santa Cruz with easy access - right at the end of 14th ave.

New listing because this house has just been entirely remodeled from top to bottom. The rustic and modern feel in the house adds warmth and ambiance. The home has an open concept floor plan with exposed beams & upgraded lighting.

Sleeps 4 adults, and 2
neighborhood_overview:
Great location. So close to the beach that you can see the ocean from the street. Very easy, quick beach access down 14th ave. Blacks Beach, Twin Lakes Beach and Sunny Cove all within short walking distance.

Walking distance to groceries, dining, Sunday farmers markets, harbor and more.
host_about:
We love surfing, biking, our beautiful beaches & redwoods.  We've been on the Airbnb platform for several years and LOVE IT because of the connections we create with diverse people. We've made some great, lasting connections over the years & we have guests that return several times a year for pleasure and for business.  Regardless for your reasons for travel, it is our goal to make sure that you have a fantastic stay at our properties. We like introducing people to this wonderful town and helping to facilitate great experiences and memories. 

We are also inclusive and welcome guests of all orientations and backgrounds. Family Friendly. LGBTQ friendly.

name: La Maison: Summertime Splendor in a ring of oaks
description:
We have a New England style home with a light Continental touch and modernist details. Our house was built in 1927, totally remodeled in 2015. It has been the residence of good people for 60+ years. We provide a retreat of homeliness in a sanctuary of towering Ponderosa Pines and welcoming Live Oaks. We are 15 minutes from warm beaches, 5 minutes from old growth redwoods and in no time you’ll be enjoying the restful beauty of La Maison.

The space
Peace and quiet hover over this spot. Wildlife abounds.
neighborhood_overview: Mount Hermon Christian Conference Center makes this spot what it is. It bustles in the summer. Conference attendees make the trek past the house twice a week to eat a pancake breakfast at the top of the hill. Near by Mount Hermon Redwood Adventures takes you on a tour of some of the most beautiful views in creation.

name: Sun-flooded Peace of Paradise/UCSC
description:
Large light and spacious room easily fits 2, with beautiful view of garden and big window seats. Private bath. Peaceful private deck with outdoor shower on a quiet street in upscale neighborhood. Downtown, Hiking, Beach and Restaurants all within just 2-3 miles.

The space
Sun-flooded spacious room with beautiful view of garden and big window seats. Peaceful private deck with outdoor shower in case you are coming from the beach or surfing. Private bathroom. Fridge, microwave, BBQ, coffee maker at your convenience.

Guest access
Separate entrance through side gate of garden (left of garage). Guests are welcome to use the BBQ and private outside deck in romantic garden setting. Beach chairs and boogie boards, yoga mat are waiting for you to be used.

Family with two boys live (part-time) in the family home. Very low noise level and mostly quiet. But If you'd prefer zero noise level at all times and n
neighborhood_overview: Very friendly, quiet and upscale upper Westside neighborhood. Great to just walk or run around the neighborhood or to Pogonip (less than a 1 mile), a wonderful huge open space just below the university. It's very peaceful and everybody is friendly.
host_about: Originally from Germany, I love living here in peaceful Santa Cruz, close to the beach and palm trees and with sun almost every day… I'm a local Open Studios artist and my passion is creating one-of-a-kind jewelry. I also like going for a run at Pogonip (big open space next to UCSC), right around the corner, or on West Cliff Drive at the beach I enjoy SUPing alone and with friends. Yoga is one of my biggest passions followed by my happy vegetable garden, and Santa Cruz is perfect for it! My favorite country is Thailand (I lived there for 6  months and even speak a little Thai) and my favorite city is Barcelona. Now I am enjoy beautiful Santa Cruz and I often say: I live in paradise!

We have a great commute location to Silicon Valley (30 to 50 minutes or so) and superb hiking is nearby in Felton and Santa Cruz.  Santa Cruz is a 15 to 20 minute drive.  The Monterey Bay Aquarium and Carmel are a 1 hour drive.

description:
Best place to stay! Gorgeous Onyx Limited Edition Airstream. Only 6 miles up the road from Santa Cruz, in our lovely backyard. Enjoy the redwoods of Felton, with a private rock/sand beach on the San Lorenzo River. 20 minutes to the Santa Cruz Beach or the Boardwalk.

The space
#liverivited by spending your vacation exploring the wonders of Airstream living... Close proximity to everything, this location is in the heart of Felton, 6 miles to downtown Santa Cruz, and a stones throw from Scotts Valley. Stay under the redwoods. Take a dip in the San Lorenzo River with private entrance to sandy beach, deep swimming hole, and rope swing. Enjoy local eats and beach life in Santa Cruz... and enjoy our lovely Airstream! Queen size bed for one or two. All stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, stove top, oven, and microwave).

Guest access
Enough parking for two (tandem). Shared backyard with large deck, fire pit, and of course the redwoods. Access

name: Sunny Private Studio Near Harbor & Beach
description:
Our sanitized, comfortable and private studio, with attached full bathroom, includes a private entrance and small patio. While attached to the main house, it is completely separate space that is an ideal base for exploring and enjoying all that Santa Cruz offers. Our perfect escape for two is 3/4 mile from the S.C. Harbor and centrally located between Capitola and downtown Santa Cruz.

The space
This is a large (12' x 15') sunny studio, with private full bathroom, that is locked off from the main house. The bedroom is furnished with a comfy king size bed, a relaxing chair with footstool, a closet (with a load of hangers), a large desk, and night stands. There is a 43" flat-screen smart TV with access to Netflix, Amazon (and other apps) and high-speed wifi. The room also has a small refrigerator (with separate freezer), a microwave, kettle (with coffee and tea) and blackout curtains for your comfort.

Guest access
Guests have access to their o
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is a unique mixture of residential, commercial, a school and a cool founder's cemetery nearby (quiet neighborhood). We don't have neighbors on either side (a tire shop on one side and a school on the other). We are within walking distance of the harbor and beach (20 minute walk). We are also close bicycle ride to most of Santa Cruz and Capitola.
host_about:
I live in Santa Cruz, California with my wonderful wife Katharina and our son Oliver. I am a professional Airbnb host and a teacher and Katharina is an amazing person and an incredibly talented creative director. Oliver is a bright, energetic and friendly fellow that loves the water, bike riding, exploring and solving the mysteries of the universe. We have one incredibly friendly and mellow cat (Dexter), six chickens and we enjoy spending time with friends--hiking, biking, great home-cooked meals, good wine and beer, and generally enjoying all that life has to offer.

We have a passion for travel--nothing is more exciting then finding yourself in a new and unfamiliar place with nothing to do but explore and interact with new people!

We are also extremely responsible people. We own our home and take great pride in having a place that is clean, comfortable and inviting. As guests in other people's homes, we feel the same responsibility and respect for their space.

name: Manresa Surf House
description:
Santa Cruz is known around the world for its Surf, Culture, Climate, music, arts & outdoors activities. The Santa Cruz Surf House offers its guests a unique opportunity to experience Santa Cruz like a local. Just 0.3 of a mile to one of the best beaches in the county, sitting on a half acre with a private skate bowl in the back yard. Featuring an entertaining area with a wood fired pizza oven, outdoor surf showers, hot tub, and soft top surfboards for your convenience

The space
Santa Cruz is known for world class waves and was the first placed surfed outside of Hawaii. Manressa and La selva beach have great exposure to pick up both northwest swells in the winter and south swells in the summer. The inside whitewash is great for learning to pop up on a surfboard for the first time. For experienced surfers there are dozens of sandbars up and down the beach. Dodging the crowds means more waves for you and your friends. When you done surfing, come back and ro
neighborhood_overview: Manressa beach and private La Selva beach.  These beaches have great exposure to pick up northwest swells in the winter and south swells in the summer.  The inside whitewash is great for learning to pop up on a surfboard for the first time. Dozens of sandbars down the beach for experienced surfers to find an uncrowded wave.  When you done surfing, come back and roll around in the skate pool or fire up the pizza oven with the friends.

name: Cozy room, a private suite, on the westside
description:
STR18-0122
We are situated in the BEST area! We are a 20 minute walk to downtown and 20-25 minute walk to West Cliff Dr. We have many restaurants within walking distance: Mexican, Thai, Chinese, burger, Greek, falafel. There's a great bakery a block away.

The space
The room and bathroom are cozy and private. Hardwood floors throughout. The bed is a queen with a comfy gel top and the sheets are cotton sateen. There is a microwave and fridge, a coffee maker with coffee and cream, tea and sweeteners. I also have breakfast items and various snacks and filtered water. There's a flat screen tv with directTV. There is also wifi. Shampoo, conditioner, bath soap and a hair dryer are provided. An iron and ironing board are available on request.
Although the ironing is not great, the linens are freshly laundered after each guest!
Ceiling fan for those warm days.
For those who want to do laundry, there's a laundromat at the end of the block.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great.  I am centrally located.  A short walk to downtown and west cliff drive.  West side Santa Cruz is the home of many restaurants and coffee houses and bakery's.  We have wine tasting and brewery's.  It's a great location for those who want to go to the university, the beach or downtown!  It's good for walkers because everything is close.  It's good for bikers with trails such as Wilder ranch a short ride away.  There's a bike shop close by to rent bikes if you'd like.  If you want to take public transportation, there's a bus stop at the end of the street.
host_about: Love traveling and seeing new places.  I like to walk around and discover a new place on foot.  I love reading and movies, good food and meeting new people.  I lived in Athens, Greece for 5 years.  I loved my time there.  One of my favorite places besides Greece that I've visited is Shanghai, China.  It's great opening my house to travelers.  I look forward to staying in an airbnb when I travel next!!

name: Peaceful, Sunny Zayante
description:
Our cozy, stand alone, private studio is nestled in the garden, surrounded by redwood and bay laurel trees. Enjoy this simple room with futon bed and desk. Full shared bath and kitchen upstairs in the main house. Quiet location close to hiking, biking, beaches.

The space
Detached studio in the garden, steps away from the main house; very private and quiet.

Guest access
You are welcome to our full guest bathroom and family kitchen upstairs in the main house. Patios, outdoor fireplace and deck are also yours to enjoy the peaceful, beautiful view of the Zayante valley.

You will have the utmost privacy in the stand alone studio, and also a chance to mingle with and meet our family in shared spaces. We are happy to open our family life to you, and look forward to your stay.

Other things to note
We live in the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains on a quiet, quirky, one-lane, paved private road, with a few rough and
neighborhood_overview:
Our home in the mountains feels remote, yet is only 4 miles from downtown Felton. Please note that our street is a private, quirky, one-lane road with some rough parts. It is paved and quiet. Please drive slowly and safely.

We live on the same road as Club Zayante--the legendary Santa Cruz Mountains music club from back in the day. Club Z burned down in 2006, but you can still see the old brick wall and pool.

The Zayante Market is within walking distance, and Zayante Creek offers a sweet swimming hole for those hot summer days. A couple miles down the road is the Trout Farm Inn, another historic jewel of the San Lorenzo Valley.
host_about: Hans and Karen delight in family, good food, the ocean and did we mention dessert? Sometimes we have a full house of kids, but we've always got room for you. We enjoy meeting new folks and hearing their stories, and of course making awesome stories of our own.

name: Amazing Seabright Beach Cottage
description:
Classic and sweet Santa Cruz cottage. This is literally our Grandma's beach house. 3 bedroom home that is 2 doors away from one of the best beaches in Santa Cruz. 2 queen bedrooms upstairs and 1 full downstairs.

Could be described as "shabby chic" but we see it as the adorable original rustic vacation house it was built as and has been its whole 130 years. The kitchen is updated but maintains it's old charm. The rest (aside from the addition of indoor plumbing) is still pretty much the same.

The space
Our home is the funnest place in the world (possibly an overstatement but we think it is). This cozy cottage has been in the family for generations, it has a big set of stairs to get inside and a small spiral staircase to the upstairs bedrooms, the only bathroom is on the main level. It is a fantastic way to spend a few days, we usually have boogie boards and other beach toys around, instead of tracking them we have adopted a more casual approach and are
neighborhood_overview:
Seabright beach is one of the best beaches in Santa Cruz and it is walking distance to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.

Java Junction, Betty's Burgers, Seabright Brewery, Linda's Sea Breeze Cafe, and Engfers Pizza are just a sampling of what Seabright has to offer just 2 short blocks away.

The small but mighty natural history museum is just up the street with a giant whale sculpture for kids to climb on.

description:
