description:
Gorgeous La Selva Beach home: 3 spacious Bedrooms, 2 Baths, 5 minute walk to the beach. The home is light and airy with the sea breeze floating through all day. Interior is well styled. Enjoy the front or back patio.
The beaches are flat and almost endless for the beach walkers, ideal for surfing, watching the sunset, long walk or run. Great restaurants and shops nearby. Short drive to activities including Santa Cruz Boardwalk, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Capitola, Nisene Marks State Park

The space
Living room and dining room have vaulted ceilings, fireplace, flat screen smart tv that connects to Pandora, Netflix etc

The kitchen is fully stocked with pots, pans and knives for cooking meals. You'll find drink glasses, wine glasses, coffee mugs and travel mugs for your use.

We have cutting boards, toaster, coffee pot and basic spices.

Bathrooms were fully remodeled in Jan 2019.

Guest access
Guests have ac
neighborhood_overview:
Enjoy the endless beaches in this area which is great for a beach run or walk. You can walk on the beach to Seascape resort to enjoy the sunset or grab a coffee in the morning. The beaches tend to be sparsely populated from other beaches to the north. It's great for a bonfire and some s'mores!

In the nearby neighborhood, you will discover The Shops at Seascape Village where you’ll find a market and deli, liquor store, coffee shop, pizza, seasonal Farmer’s Market and a variety of great restaurants and shopping options. You can also enjoy Rio Del Mar, Aptos or Capitola in under 15 minutes or journey a bit further to hit the Santa Cruz Boardwalk or the Monterey Aquarium. You have nearby options for kayaking and hiking in Nisene Marks state park.
host_about: You'll find that I love distressed furniture, all things teal, hiking and being healthy.  I love time with family and friends and spoiling niece and nephews.  I love trying new restaurants and a good wine.  I am always looking for cute home furnishings, finding something to remodel or trying a new Pinterest project.  I love to travel and explore the world.

The open 1,500 square foot house has a reverse floor plan. [There is no back yard or garage.]

The first floor has 3 bedrooms, a full bath, and laundry room with sand shower.

The second floor has a full bath and the rest is an open “great room” – combined kitchen, li

name: Bamboo Cottage in Aptos Mountain Retreat & Spa
description:
Om Oasis is a beautiful and lush retreat center on several acres of a remote and peaceful 15 acre mountain top property. We host guests who wish to connect with the beauty of nature and experience peace. We are 10-15 minutes up the mountain and partially off-grid with little to no cell reception but with a great WiFi connection. There are a total of 6 guest accommodations (including this one) spread out over our developed 3 acres, making it always a very private experience and easy to distance.

The space
This small complete home contains a full kitchen, bathroom, living room, high ceilings, and lots of light pouring in from three sky lights.
The cottage is located on the upper portion of our property (rolling luggage may want to be carried). There is a bamboo garden and meditative pond just outside the door. See it illuminated at night!
The living room has air purifying plants, decoartive shelves, a mirrored closet, a bar with stools joining the kit
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a ridge top with excellent views of the sunset, moon, and stars. We're also ten minutes from the town of Aptos where you'll find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery/health food stores, and boutiques. The entrance to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Sea Cliff State Beach and Rio Del Mar State Beach are all just 12-15 minutes from our home.

PLEASE NOTE that we live on a windy private country road (not maintained by the city) with two-way traffic and parts that become one lane at times. Please drive carefully and be aware of this.
host_about: Hi there! Raine & her family live part time in Hawai'i/ part time at our beautiful Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California.  Emberlie is the on-site manager, overseeing the property and booking. She provides body work and yoga classes, sound healing and spa services... with the intention to care for you during your stay! Happy Travels & welcome OM.

description:
Our cozy retreat is within Mount Hermon near local beaches, restaurants, family-friendly activities, downtown Pacific Avenue, hiking, biking, wine tasting & breweries.

You’ll love our home because of the cozy, comfortable quarters, privacy, weather, patio, gorgeous Redwood trees/trails, close location to Santa Cruz beaches, conference center coffee shop, bookstore, adventure ropes courses & zip line.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, & families.

Guest access
The whole lodge style unit is yours for your stay as well as a gorgeous outdoor patio with fountain and chairs and a sitting area with perfect view of the redwoods! No backyard access beyond that point, because it is a leech field, but we provide directions to a nearby redwood trail just 100 yards from the cottage. You’ll love exploring the area!
neighborhood_overview: Mount Hermon is a small town that grew around an old Conference Center started in 1906. Mount Hermon is full of small trails, tight roads, wonderful redwoods and beautiful, hidden byways and sanctuaries. If you're here on a weekend or during summer make sure to check in with Registration to see when the coffee shop, book store, and soda fountain are open for guests!
host_about: We love people and traveling. We run a ministry called Soul-Care, helping people find rest for their souls. With one-on-one appointments, group sessions, custom weekend retreats, and resources, we create space for people to take notice of their heart and be intentionally involved on their journey of growth in any area of life. We love the outdoors, drinking tea, reading, learning, and adventures.

name: 472 Ocean Perch *OCEAN FRONT*
description:
Tri-Level Oceanfront Condo at Place de Mer with Beach Access from unit!  Perfect Family Getaway! 2 Nts Off Season/4 Nts Summer *472*

The space
Wonderful tri-level townhouse with ocean views from every room!  Enter into the top level with full bathroom, 2 bedrooms with bay windows facing the ocean.  Master bedroom has TV with cable.  Go down one flight to the living, dining and full kitchen and second bath with shower.  Living room has gas fireplace and TV with cable and DVD player, access to balcony deck with chairs, gas BBQ (with direct feed into the house) and access to steep ladder type stair to bottom level walkway to main stairs to the sand.  Go down to the 3rd, bottom level with studio type room with private bathroom with shower only, sink area with microwave, sitting area with TV/Cable.  Door to walkway to main stairs to the sand.  Parking for 2 cars in driveway and 2 permits for street parking.  NO SMOKING OR PETS ALLOWED. 
BED SIZES: 2 QUEENS, 2 TWI
host_about:
Kendall & Potter was established as a real estate company in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The brokers Skipper Kendall and William Pottermoved to Aptos to fulfill their dream of working in a small town in Santa Cruz County. In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , they expanded their services to include property management and relocation from Santa Cruz to Monterey Coast.

Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

Rita has worked for Kendall & Potter in the property management and the Santa Cruz real estate industry for 20 years. A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. Current member of California Association of Realtors CAR and National Association of Property Managers, NARPM.

Kendall & Potter Property Management offers a variety of home services – including complete property management services, leases on unfurnished properties and rental homes in Santa Cruz, as well as Monterey Coast & Santa Cruz vacation rentals management and corporate housing.

description:

name: CAPITOLA PERFECT LOCATION! Steps 2 Beach/Shops
description:
Stay in the the heart of idyllic downtown Capitola. House is perfectly situated just 2 short blocks to the beach and steps to shopping and dining.
House decor is hip and cozy-- AND an ideal layout for families. It includes a lovely outdoor patio, perfect for grilling, complete with lounge seating,and dining table.

The space
Kitchen is open to dining area and sunroom, creating a comfortable living space. Dining room table expands to seat 6-10. Sunroom has cozy, gas burning fireplace, and lounge seating facing the backyard. A perfect spot for morning coffee. description:
Beauty, elegance and style...that's just the beginning. An outstanding beachfront location with unsurpassed views of surf, sunsets, and city lights. Spacious 3br/3ba unit with living rm including big screen smart HDTV & WiFi, fully stocked gourmet kitchen, washer/dryer, outdoor eating/viewing area with natural gas BBQ on wrap around deck. Your family and friends will never forget the time spent reconnecting at Villa Vista while they witnessed the awesome beauty of the Pacific from the front row

The space
•A spacious living room with spectacular ocean and beach views.
•Three master bedrooms with three private bathrooms to accommodate six people comfortably.
•A fully equipped, gourmet kitchen.
•A large outdoor deck with patio furniture and BBQ
• All bedrooms have king size beds. Can be made as twins (they do not separate). We have a portacrib and a high chair.
•Complete home entertainment center including a large Smart HDTV with cable and
neighborhood_overview: Walk right down to the beach and enjoy the surf and sand or walk a few blocks south and you're on the beautiful bluffs above the Pleasure Point cliffs watching world class surfing or exploring the many coves and tide pools.. Within a 5-10 minute drive (or a 15 minute bike ride), you are at the famous Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, the quaint beachside resort of Capitola Village or on downtown Santa Cruz's Pacific Avenue, home of boutique shops, restaurants, coffee houses and world-class entertainment.
host_about: Over 30 years ago, my parents designed, built and began renting Villa Vista, their beautiful 2 unit beach house in Santa Cruz, CA.  Those three decades of renting either the upper or lower to two and three generations of families produced an unexpected and amazing gift for my folks: hundreds, possibly thousands, of people created some of their dearest and sweetest memories with family or friends while staying at Villa Vista. Whether it was annual family vacations or reunions, weddings or funerals, the start of someone's life or, sometimes, the end, the beach house played a central role and has a special place in so many people's hearts. Fast forward to 2020 and Covid-19 forced most people to remain home bound for months beginning in March.  Any chance to get away, even for a few days, has been a welcome change.  As a host, my goal is to help you make the most of those special days by providing memorable accommodations and a unique experience, allowing guests to soak up local coastal culture in style. Villa Vista, our oceanfront home, is available to provide the back drop for your sweetest memories, too.

Feel free to make yourselves at home and get away from it all with amenities like WiFi, a SmartTV, fully stocked kitchen, a sitting area and king size comfortable new tempurpedic bed.

This bright, airy, and updated two-bedroom rental in Santa Cruz has a furnished balcony, warming gas fireplace, and plenty of space for four.

Head over to the beautiful beach at Seabright located less than a mile away for sun, swimming, and surfing, or take a short half-mile trip into the heart of Santa Cruz for several unique shops, museums, and excellent restaurants.

Modern and very chic, this inviting home has a living area with a sofa, armchairs, gas fireplace, TV with Roku, and sliding door access out to the furnished balcony. A dining area with a table for six sits adjacent to the living room plus there's a well-equipped, full kitchen with a host of essentials and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher!

There are two cozy bedrooms and two full baths in this rental: the master suite has a queen-size bed, and the guest room has another soft queen-size bed. WiFi is provided to allow you to get
host_about: Hi, we’re Vacasa, North America’s largest vacation rental management company. Owners of vacation homes around the world trust us to deliver exceptional service throughout your entire vacation. Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. We like to think we offer the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, without compromising on service and convenience. Check out our listings, and get in touch if you have any questions. Your vacation is our full-time job, and we'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

name: Quaint Family Cabin at Mount Hermon
description:
My place is close to Mount Hermon Conference Center, local forests and beaches, restaurants, downtown shopping and family-friendly activities including adventure ropes courses, hiking, biking, surfing, kayaking, canoeing, swimming and more!

You’ll love my place because of the outdoors location, wonderful weather, convenience of forest beauty while being minutes from the beach. You'll love Mount Hermon's coffee shop, bookstore, ice cream fountain, and adventure ropes courses.
neighborhood_overview: Mount Hermon is a small town that grew around an old Conference Center started in 1906. Mount Hermon is full of small trails, tight roads, wonderful redwoods and beautiful, hidden byways and sanctuaries. If you're here on a weekend or during summer make sure to check in with Registration to see when the coffee shop, book store, and soda fountain are open for guests!
host_about: We love people and traveling. We run a ministry called Soul-Care, helping people find rest for their souls. With one-on-one appointments, group sessions, custom weekend retreats, and resources, we create space for people to take notice of their heart and be intentionally involved on their journey of growth in any area of life. We love the outdoors, drinking tea, reading, learning, and adventures.

We're located 1 mile from downtown and the Santa Cruz beach boardwalk. The cozy cabana is located near the lively Seabright neighborhood, which is full of great restaurants and boutique shops. This private entry room is equipped with a full sized bed, side tables, a larger accent table that can also be used as a laptop work space, and a sitting chair to relax in and enjoy the view.

name: Hidden Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains
description:
Santa Cruz County Airbnb Permit # 181196.

With easy access from Highway 17 you will arrive on the edge of a secluded canyon with spectacular views to relax in your luxurious Santa Cruz Mountain home. The guest house (attached to the main house) has it's own private entrance to a large living room, a large comfortable bedroom and a full bathroom. The seasonal pool and deck area also offer spectacular views. Perfect for relaxing, reading, painting, or just doing nothing! Stargaze at night!

The space
The large deck and seasonal pool area is very peaceful, romantic and private with amazing long range views. The very large living room offers comfortable seating overlooking the canyon. There is TV/Directv, Internet access, and an excellent surround sound system. There is a full bathroom and we ask you take showers only due to water conservation and septic considerations.
The large bedroom is furnished with a very comfortable (memory foam) queen
neighborhood_overview:
We live in the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains, at 2000' above sea level, at the end of a private driveway on the edge of a canyon that offers amazing long range views and spectacular sunsets. This is an excellent location for either a quiet restful stay or a great location for a busy sightseeing trip or a business stay as we are convenient to everything including 25-30 minutes to Silicon Valley and 10 minutes to Los Gatos, Scotts Valley and 25 minutes to Santa Cruz.

Our community has excellent services including the Summit Store (sum(URL HIDDEN) Nonnos famous pizza in Redwood Estates, ((URL HIDDEN)
Award winning wineries - Loma Prieta Winery, Wright Station, Villa Del Monte, Silver Mountain, David Bruce, Byington, and more. The community has award winning schools, four churches and active involved community groups.

The Summit Store (4.5 miles away) has an expresso bar, sushi bar and a wonderful deli. They also have a great selection of groceries and wine
host_about: Both Mike and I are Irish born and now enjoy living in the Santa Cruz Mountains above Los Gatos and Santa Cruz California.  We have travelled to many parts of the world and love meeting new people.  We look forward to welcoming you to our Airbnb and will do everything we can to make sure your stay with us is enjoyable and comfortable.

description:
My place is in Felton, close to Roaring Camp Railroad, Loch Lomond Rec Area, Henry Cowell's State Park, Mount Hermon Conference Center, Felton Covered Bridge Park. The Boardwalk and beaches of Santa Cruz are a 25 minute drive from the cabin. You will be deep in the heart of redwoods and ferns with sounds of a trinkling creek. A moonlit night in the hot tub tops it all off! Fun for couples, girlfriends getaways, writers, poets, solo adventurers, and families (with kids). NO PETS 831/477-6498

The space
Tranquility Base is a 600 Sq ft cabin with high ceilings in every room except the bathroom. The bedroom has a queen bed, cable TV, private entry door as well as a door common to the house. The front bedroom has a queen bed, cable TV, skylight. The den has a queen bed, cable TV and a door that opens out into the hot tub yard. In the closets there are folding futons, roll-away bed, porta crib. The bathroom has a large, roomy shower, no bathtub.

The f
neighborhood_overview:
Tranquility Base is located in a quiet neighborhood near the end of the road.
The creek runs alongside the road. The houses are rather far apart which gives privacy. Parking is at street level. In Felton town, a 15 minute drive from the cabin there is 24/7 Safeway, CVS, Round Table Pizza, Sushi San,
nail salon, fine coffee roasters, donut shop, USA bank Metro bus stop. Across the street is Felton Covered Bridge Park with picnic tables, a playground, a big grass play area, and the San Lorenzo river running under the tallest covered bridge in the United States. (Guiness Book of World Records). All along Hwy 9 there are more restaurants, shops and Wild Roots Market Organic Mkt, Rite Aid, Post Office, auto repair, liquor store, banks, the Big Foot Museum, Henry Cowell's State Park. Cabaret.
host_about:
I was raised in Northern California. Having just closed out an electrical business
that I shared with my husband for 40 years, I can now devote my time to creating
a fun, unique place to rejuvenate the soul under the beautiful redwoods of the Santa Cruz Mountains. The Golden Rule is how is how I roll. Travel to Scotland, Tahiti, and to experience the Northern Lights may be in my future.

neighborhood_overview:
Seabright neighborhood is very unique in some important ways, fast is becoming a mecca of hipster chic, thanks to its bike shops, home furnishing stores, cafes, restaurants and sweet live music venues. As for the laid-back Seabright neighborhood, with its clutch of bars and eateries Seabright also serves as the entryway to Seabright Beach, a long sandy beach between Santa Cruz Harbor and the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and a
popular spot bonfires. The area has a lively nightlife scene with bars and breweries featuring live music, open micas and karaoke. There are also several neighborhood restaurants, shops and businesses.
host_about:
We are world travellers ourselves. Along with our three children we have travelled around the world. We love decorating and improving our home, and love living in it. We enjoy people and love to share our local knowledge with guests. We enjoy inspiring and being inspired by the friends we make. We live close to most a beautiful ocean and beaches and love to get in them everyday! From kayaking, stand up paddle and traditional surfing, cycling, hiking, and photography, we do it all. The focus is fun and we will put you in the right place to maximize yours.

Meeting people from around the world and travelling are our passions. We also enjoy sharing our home with others so they can experience our bit of paradise in special unique ways. We love hosting travellers because we think our home, and the area where we live in, gives visitors a true sense of what it's like to live where we do. Come experience our home as your home. Like a Local! We want to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We look forward to hosting you soon!

name: Ocean View Beach Home, Pet Friendly, Sunlit
description:
Bella Casa Vista has beach-facing balconies on the third and second floor. Great for entertaining friends and family! There is also a spacious patio on the back for barbecuing and relaxing.

You'll be very close to the beach - less than 2 minutes to Rio Del Mar beach! 20 minutes to Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk!

You’ll love the natural light, kitchen, and beach view. Good for families (sleeps 6 adults + 4 kids) and dogs.

The space
Sleeps up to 6 adults and 4 children
2 Bedrooms + 1 additional sleeping area
3 full bathrooms.
2 car parking + 1 street space

On the third floor living room there is a Flat Screen (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) TV with Netflix. Wireless Internet is available throughout the house. The kitchen area is on the third floor with ocean views.
neighborhood_overview: If you have never been to the Rio Del Mar area, you have to experience it for yourself!  Please feel free to reach out to us for a recommendation.  We are always discovering new gems in the Santa Cruz area!

Lovely rustic cabin feel one bedroom apartment. Nestled on a hilltop, in a quiet neighborhood tucked away from Highway 9 yet only a short 4 mins drive to quaint & historic downtown Boulder Creek. View of the redwoods from every window. UPSTAIRS UNIT OF A DUPLEX with separate & private entrance.

Host does not live on premises so you have privacy.

The space
- Surround yourself in nature. Sit on your own private deck overlooking the redwoods. Spectacular 360 degrees view of the lovely redwoods from high up.
- Sunny apartment with two skylights in living room & bathroom.
- Separate dining room with lovely view of the redwoods.
- PLEASE NOTE THERE IS STRICT HOUSE RULES FOR QUIET HOURS OF 10PM - 8AM TO ENSURE PEACE AND QUIET FOR GUESTS AT BOTH UNITS.
- Queen size bed in the bedroom and Queen size futon in the living room with a skylight.
- Full bathroom with tub/shower also with a skylight.

neighborhood_overview: Quiet, peaceful & serene neighborhood set on a hill with towering redwoods.  Tucked away from Highway 9 yet downtown Boulder Creek with its historical charm is only 4 minutes drive away.  It has two grocery stores, gas station, restaurants, antique shop, etc.  Easy and pleasant drive to Henry Cowell State Park, Big Basin Redwood Park, Santa Cruz, Felton and many other nearby attractions.
host_about: My wife, Cynthia and I are retired professionals from the high tech industry of Silicon Valley.  We love to be with nature, love all creatures big & small, especially our dog, Obi, who is adoringly called my "teddy bear".  Enjoy travels to immerse ourselves in the local culture, and food.  It gives us great pleasure to facilitate an experience for our guests to connect/re-connect with nature during their home away from home stay with us. We love sharing with others the natural beauty of the redwoods, and/or creek-side setting of our homes in the Santa Cruz mountains.

name: Kid Friendly Home w/Gourmet Kitchen near Capitola
description:
Recently remodeled, this open, bright single-level home is perfect for your family vacation to Santa Cruz. Strategically located between the cities of Santa Cruz and Capitola and an easy 1.5 miles to the beach. Walk to Trader Joe's, Capitola Mall, shops, restaurants, banks, etc. Enjoy cooking in the gourmet kitchen, relax in the spacious living room and let the kids play with the chickens in the backyard.

The space
Our house is approximately 1775 s.f. and is located in a quiet neighborhood with very little traffic. Our kids play in the street all the time, although we do have a fenced yard as well.

When you enter our home, you enter into the spacious living room. Kick back on the L-shaped couch and watch a movie on the TV. There is a Roku (with Netflix, Amazon, etc), a BlueRay/DVD player and an extra HDMI cable. There is also a piano in the corner of the living room and we ask that you be respectful because it is an old family piece.

name: Cozy garden westside king suite  STR18-0122
description:
This cool and comfortable private space is a great spot to stay while visiting Santa Cruz. Close to everything yet private with its own private entrance and in a quiet setting with an outdoor sitting area. The neighborhood is old Santa Cruz and close to everything. Don’t forget the comfortable king bed! The best deal in Santa Cruz!
Make sure to read INPORTANT NOTE!

The space
The unit has its own entrance. Very private with an outdoor garden sitting area. The bed is a cal king with a comfy gel top and the sheets are 100% cotton sateen. There is an air mattress available for a third person. The main room is laminate flooring with area carpets.

There is a kitchen and bathroom with Saltillo tile floors. The kitchen has a toaster oven, microwave, refrigerator and coffee machine. No stove. Coffee, tea, cream and sugar are provided along wth filtered water. I also have breakfast items and various snacks. There is a flat screen tv with a fire sti
neighborhood_overview: My house is located in the BEST location. The neighborhood is centrally located.  Its a short walk downtown or to west cliff drive.  Westside Santa Cruz is  home to many restaurants, coffee houses, bakery's and brewery's.  It's a great location if you want to go to the university, the beach or downtown where you can find even more restaurants and bars!  It's a great place for walkers because everything is relatively close.  It's also good for bikers with bike rentals close by and some of the best biking trails in the area such a Wilder Ranch not far away.  There is also public transportation at the end of the street.
host_about: Love traveling and seeing new places.  I like to walk around and discover a new place on foot.  I love reading and movies, good food and meeting new people.  I lived in Athens, Greece for 5 years.  I loved my time there.  One of my favorite places besides Greece that I've visited is Shanghai, China.  It's great opening my house to travelers.  I look forward to staying in an airbnb when I travel next!!

name: Woodland Nest - Cozy, Private Apt in the Redwoods!
description:
Nestled in the stunning redwoods awaits the "Woodland Nest." Enjoy a 700-800 sq. ft apartment w/ a fully equipped kitchen, private entrance/parking, & porch. Perfect for a family, couples, business traveler(s), a personal retreat, or a friend's getaway! Only 10 miles to Santa Cruz's famous Beach Boardwalk, downtown shopping, restaurants and our beautiful coastal beaches. Walkable to Mount Hermon's Conference Ctr & historical Roaring Camp. Just 45 minutes from Silicon Valley and San Jose airport.

The space
* Private Parking
* Private Entrance w/stairs (not suitable for persons with limited mobility)
* Complimentary WiFi
* Sleeps up to 4 people (1 extra person fee = $25/night)
1 Bedroom (queen)
1 Bathroom (w/shower only)
* Livingroom includes: trundle daybed (two twin mattresses that can be side-by-side or one on the bed and one on the floor) - great for kids (not safe for infants)
* Fully equipped kitchen
* Keurig & Micr
neighborhood_overview:
This is a fantastic place to explore! Here are just a few activities near by:
* Mount Hermon's Redwood Canopy Tour (2 hrs of 6 zip lines 150 feet up in the Redwoods - ask me for reservation information)
* Mount Hermon trails and creek-walking
* Walkable to Roaring Camp (Steam Engine Train - rides in the mountains or to the Beach Boardwalk)
* 10 miles to Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk
* 2 miles to Henry Cowell State Park (Hiking and Bike Trails)
* W. Cliff Drive - wonderful walking path along the cliffs (Lighthouse/Surf Museum/Surfer-Watching)
* Santa Cruz Mystery Spot
* Local Wine Tasting
* Downtown Shopping, Bakeries, Restraunts & Cinemas
* Monterey Bay Aquarium or Carmel (within 1 hour south)
* San Francisco (1 hour north)
host_about: I love life! I have a passion for travel and enjoy exploring new places and meeting new people. I've travelled all over the world and am in awe of various architecture, art and cultures. I'm a reader, learner, artist and woman of deep faith. I enjoy the simple pleasures of walking amongst the redwoods with my dog and spending time with friends over good food and a glass of wine. No matter where I go, there's nothing quite like coming home to "Paradise"! Living in the Santa Cruz mountains amongst the majestic Redwoods, temperate climate and a quick 10 minute drive to the beautiful coast has spoiled me! I wake up every day counting my blessings and recognizing the beauty around me!

During the week there will be an increase in traffic during school drop off and pick up times as there is a small elementar
neighborhood_overview: Our treehouse is in the Happy Valley neighborhood of Santa Cruz. Very close to  the Mystery Spot, Santa Cruz Mountain wineries, and 5 miles from downtown Santa Cruz and beaches. Our street is a popular route for road bikers. Hikers, runners and mountain bikers enjoy the trails at Delaveaga Park, approximately 3 miles away. There is also a golf course, driving range and disc golf course at the park.

My husband, Tim, and I are thrilled to be a part of the AirBnB community - first as guests and now as hosts. I am from Canada and Tim is a native of Santa Cruz where we live with our two boys. 

Santa Cruz, CA

From the apartment many of the counties experiences; biking, hiking, surfing, food, wine, music, art are only 15 minutes away. .

The space

Upstairs a queen size bed, .5 bath and a large size living area with couch, table ( w/2 chairs ) and large s

description:
Studio apartment beautifully located on the San Lorenzo River in Felton, CA. A gorgeous 15 minute drive to Santa Cruz on Hwy 9, along the river through the redwoods.

Henry Cowell State Park is only 2.5 miles away.

Enjoy visiting nearby Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, shopping in lovely downtown Santa Cruz on Pacific Street, nearby ocean beaches, Capitola Village & Los Gatos just minutes away & Pacific Grove/Monterey/Carmel-By-The-Sea/San Francisco about 1 hr away.

Maximum occupancy 2 people.

host_about:
Yosemite Region Resorts has been in business for more than 30 years.

Rob & Tara have been in the real estate and property management industry since 1989. 

Yosemite Region’s home is located in Groveland, California (95321), United States.

PINE MOUNTAIN LAKE AMENITIES 
Airport, 18-Hole Championship Golf Course, Country Club with indoor & outdoor dining, Tennis Courts, Community Pool, Horseshoe Pits, Equestrian Center, Three Sandy Beaches on the Lake (Marina Beach, Lake Lodge Beach, Dunn Court Beach). The Marina Beach is the largest most popular beach and offers: expansive sandy beach & lawn area, BBQ pits, picnic benches, volleyball net, sailboat / kayak / paddle boat / standup paddle rentals.

Yosemite Region Resorts specializes in Pine Mountain Lake real estate sales, property management services, vacation & long term rentals.

Pine Mountain Lake is a gated resort community located in Groveland, just 25-miles from the entrance of Yosemite National Park, Hwy 120 corridor.

name: Garden Oasis Guesthouse Relax, Surf & Adventure
description:
Welcome to our Artistic Garden retreat! Centrally located in the heart of Santa Cruz, 1 mile from Sunny Cove Beach and Pleasure Point. Close to the boardwalk, yacht harbor, Downtown Santa Cruz & Capitola. Completely detached guesthouse & spacious lush yard, private entrance, fully furnished, outdoor area and more. Our 1/2 acre farmhouse lot is a garden oasis with lush palms, proteas, bamboo & succulents weaving throughout. Our garden and private lot have it all! 1 night stay ok on weekdays.

The space
Santa Cruz! When you drive into the property, you’ll be treated to several exotic species of tropical bamboo groves and a tree top deck. We can often accommodate a 1-night stay, please inquire by message.
Come on in and relax in the expansive private garden. Our home (which is separate) as well as your completely detached guesthouse are located on a half acre of landscaped property, lush and artistic grounds with fruit and nut trees as well as bamboo and exoti
neighborhood_overview:
Our Farmhouse was built in 1932 during a thriving area for Live Oak as the crown jewel of hens and egg production. The chickens are gone but their history has left us with rich fertile soil where we have taken advantage of this resource to plant a flourishing garden.

Live Oak and Santa Cruz raised the second most number of chickens in the State after Petaluma, in the heyday of egg production in the first half of the 20th century. Chanticleer Ave is named after the Chanticleer chicken, and Live Oak was epicenter, being the location of the local Farmer’s Exchange, an enterprise modeled after the mid west member-owned Co-ops. Two trains a day brought ingredients for chicken feed to the Exchange and they were milled and blended into feed for the members.
host_about: Greetings! We look forward to travels and adventure.

name: Bedroom with View - Steps From Beach Boardwalk
description:
THIS PLACE IS FUN!! Every room in this beautifully crafted 3 story Mediterranean town-home has amazing views! It is just steps away from the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, and Wharf. Arguably, you're in the best location in Santa Cruz. With an 8 minute walk to downtown, driving is not necessary. This cheerful bedroom is on the first floor, has a private bathroom and views. You will have access to the beautiful open living space and kitchen. You won't want to leave.

The space
This luxury, 3 story, 2,000 square foot, townhome sits above the boardwalk in the desirable Beach Hill neighborhood. It was built to take full advantage of the stunning views. The windows on every floor in the front of the home have unsurpassed views of the ocean, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and the wharf. Grab your morning coffee or tea and enjoy the beautiful sunrises over the ocean. The other side of the home has mountain views.

Once you have parked your car there is no need to mo
neighborhood_overview:
Beach Hill is a quaint neighborhood of historic Victorian homes. Located on Main Beach yet only an 8 minute walk to downtown, it's close to everything. Here are just some of the activities and locales you can enjoy within walking distance.

- The Santa Cruz Boardwalk is just steps away. So when you need a break from the fun or want to make a bite to eat, pop back in.

- Adjacent to the boardwalk are 15 beach volley ball courts open for all to use, free of charge.

- Walk to the wharf for the great tacos and margaritas at Olita's. And you have to try the gelato at Riva.

- Head towards the beach, take a right and enjoy a walk up the scenic West cliff drive. Visit the surf museum at the lighthouse along your way.

-Paddle boarding at Cowell Beach is world famous. Located on the right side of the wharf, bring your own board or rent at Cowell Surf Shop across the street.

- If you're up for surfing the famous Steamers Lane, you

My job allows me to work a majority of the time from home and I maintain a workspace in the garage so will often be available to answer questions and direct you to some of my favorite eating spots and activities.  Some of the Santa Cruz activities I participate in are mountain biking, paddle boarding, kite boarding and beach volleyball.

name: Creekside Cottage
description:
Brand new studio/cottage on the west end of Santa Cruz. Close proximity to downtown Santa Cruz, Beach Boardwalk, and UCSC. My guest retreat is lovely, quiet, cozy, charming, and extremely welcoming, and is adjacent to the main home. Private entrance in a lovely, residential neighborhood. There is a flowing natural creek to greet guests.

The space
What makes the cottage unique is that it was designed with a Scandinavian influence in mind....small space with lots of functionality. The full bed is cozy and comfortable!

Guest access
Guests should park in front of the residence located at 212 Dimond Street or across the street (right behind my white Tahoe). Sorry, but no access to back yard.

Other things to note
Check in time is 3:00 p.m. (or later) depending on your arrival to Santa Cruz. Check out time is 11:00 a.m.!
neighborhood_overview: This is a unique neighborhood is very quiet with the natural Spring Street Creeks flowing in this area.  Most families are lifelong residents of Santa Cruz!
host_about:
I am a retired educator from Santa Cruz City Schools, and am a lifelong resident of Santa Cruz.  My favorite things to do are spend time with my family and friends.  I enjoy my beautiful gardens, reading historical fiction, traveling to Hawaii and Ireland, but most of all I enjoy sharing delicious food with family and friends.  
Life's motto:  Every day is a gift!

name: Beach Front Villa at Seascape Resort
description:
Our 2020 remodeled unit offers new flooring, new kitchen, stainless steel appliances, bathrooms, carpeted stairs and more. Check out our photos and welcome to our new home!

Beautiful villa just a short walk from the beach. Bring your partner, family, and friends to enjoy this quaint space with an expensive view of the ocean and the resort. Live comfortably in 2 luxurious master suites upstairs and an open concept living room and kitchen downstairs. It will surely be an unforgettable experience!

The space
My wife fell in love with the place at first sight due to the peaceful atmosphere and the convenient location. We've had so many great memories from birthday parties, graduation celebrations, anniversary gateways, and much more. Our experiences confirm that "Life is better at the beach!" Now it is our pleasure to list our vacation home for rental and share the happiness with all of you.

This villa is very comfortable in that there is not ano
neighborhood_overview:
Live like a local by creating unique experience and memories, try the following:
- Spend the day finding sand dollars on the beach
- Adventure out onto the abandoned train rack
- Enjoy breakfast at the local Seascape Foods
- Make a dinner reservation at the award winning Shadowbrook restaurant
- Watch a movie at CineLux Capitola Cafe & Lounge
- Experience the one and only Mystery Spot
- Rent a bike for you to experience the city
- Explore the Seascape Village across the street which contains restaurants, boutique shops, a salon and a spa.
- Relax at the Seascape Golf Course and the Seascape Fitness, Swim and Tennis Club
- A day trip to Capitola, one of the the oldest resort towns on the west coast is just a few miles away

name: Mama's House "The Bunny & Badger"
description:
Located within walking distance to Rio Del Mar beach, close to Highway 1, leading to Monterey or Santa Cruz. Overlooking a vineyard, surrounded by oaks. Wake up to finches, blue jays, or red tailed hawks, bunnies & coyotes. Breakfast can be made available on weekends. Wifi, laundry, & plenty of off street parking available. Come see us!!! Now that Springtime is here, you could not pick a better location for centrality to hiking, surfing, or sightseeing!

The space
It's a very homey place. Our house is a living museum to the farming & ranching of our local community's past. We love visitors & we are proud of our local history. If you like, you can hang out with us, watch a movie, cuddle a dog. Or you can get out into the community & enjoy Santa Cruz County!

Guest access
Half a mile to the beach. Walking distance to the forest of Nicene Marks. Visit the UCSC arboretum, the missions, the aquarium in Monterey, numerous brew pubs & wineries. Apt
neighborhood_overview: Sidewalks & streetlights. Great coffeshops & restaurants right down the hill.
host_about:
My door is always open to the traveler Job 31:32

Hello to anyone reviewing my home. I hope we will meet you soon.

I am sorry to say my home is not very accessible at all. We HAVE accommodated a gentleman who just had knee surgery, and two guests with canes, who took good advantage of my staircase bannisters. 

I have a large ledge up to my front door, and my rooms are up a staircase.  My home is in a neighborhood with streetlights and sidewalks, and I have a very long driveway so you can park off the street.

Fall is upon us, and the days are crisp and sunny, while the nights are in the 40's and 50's.

The beaches are less occupied, and the community has taken on its less rushed and busy feel. 

Hope to be hosting you soon. 
Peace to all and safe travels.

name: The "Sea Pearl" at Seabright Beach in Santa Cruz
description:
The "Sea Pearl" is a luxury beach bungalow in the heart of Santa Cruz's exclusive and sought-after Seabright community, just steps to Seabright Beach. Walking distance to the Santa Cruz Nature Museum, Beach Boardwalk, and Yacht Harbor, this quaint and distinctive cottage is the perfect place to stay and play.

The space
With a foundation-up remodel completed in January 2016, this clean and modern gem boasts owner's pride in the use of environmentally conscious materials and top quality in every detail.

Kitchen has Wolf range, Subzero refrigerator, hand-made farmhouse sink, recycled glass countertops, and Fireclay tile.

Master bedroom has California King and ensuite bathroom complete with fully-tiled walk-in shower, both rain and adjustable shower heads and unique handmade heartwood vanity.

Second bedroom has twin beds and access to a second full bath, with European-style circular shower equipped with both rain and adjustable showe
neighborhood_overview:
Seabright has a long and colorful story; inside the home you'll find some Seabright Newsletters and books to learn more about the neighborhood. Keep your car at home and stroll through this beautiful area of Santa Cruz. The historic homes and natural ocean-side beauty of Seabright make this a community where families return year after year.

The 'Sea Pearl' cottage is two short blocks to Seabright Beach and walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, and small market for necessities.
host_about: My family has been coming to Santa Cruz for generations and I'm so proud to welcome you to be part of our family tradition! I or my co-host Darlene will be your contact. We hope you have a wonderful stay at the Sea Pearl.

description:
Newly remodeled and gorgeous!!! Large end unit ground level- one bedroom condo at beautiful Seascape Resort! Walk to the beach or one of the 3 pools onsite. Single level ground floor end unit. Light and bright, private back patio with views of the canyon. Located right on the beach path. Sleeps 5 comfortably with a pull out sofa and 2 extra sleeping mats.

The space
There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not available to private renters. Pools and hot tub are accessible and pool towels are provided to guests in the unit.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

Refer to the Guest Welcome Binder upon arrival for additional information on the property and local attractions.

name: Victorian at the Beach
description:
This beautiful 1905 Victorian home was totally upgraded and remodeled in 2005. It is on the walking tour of Historic homes in Live Oak. The home is 2950 square feet. It boasts 30 stained glass windows, A perfect location, it is only 2 blks to Twin Lakes Beach and 2 blks Yacht Harbor.
The home is 3 levels. Spacious dining area and outdoor area with seating for 16+. Large jacuzzi as well. Gourmet kitchen w/ a 5 burner gas range, double ovens, dishwasher, microwave and an informal bar.

The space
Our home is unique as it is the only Vacation Beach Victorian in the area. It has beautiful hardwood floors and area rugs. It is on the Santa Cruz walking tour of Historic homes. The inside has many nooks and crannies with the original redwood. With the upgraded electric and plumbing gives the home all of the modern conveniences while it retains its charm with all of the modern amenities. Cable and wi-fi also in the home. 3 full baths and 2 half baths .5 bedroom
neighborhood_overview: A wonderful quaint neighborhood at the Yacht Harbor.  There are 5 restaurants within walking distance along with the world famous Crows Nest on the water.  A must see!!  Has a great happy hour and beach partys on Thursday nites.  Take a sunset cruise from the Yacht Harbor as well.

name: Twin Lakes Hideaway - walk to the beach or harbor
description:
Welcome to sunny Santa Cruz, CA. If you have to shelter in place, then this is place to do it! Our home sits on a hidden,quiet cul-de-sac and features 3 bedrooms, large living room and open kitchen space. Amenities include fullsized arcade game cabinets, 50" TV with Starz, Hulu,AmznPrime,HBO,etc. large patio areas, BBQ & more. We sit a short walk from Twin Lakes Beach and less than 2 miles from the Beach Boardwalk. Shopping, bars and dining all conviently located within a short distance.

The space
Large bedrooms, open floor plan, two covered patios (one in backyard one in front), large back yard, skylights let in natural light throughout the house, unique artwork throughout the house, full kitchen with a gas range, new google wifi mesh system for high speed internet, amazon echo (Alexa), 50"
Sharp hd smart tv with netflix, hulu, amazon prime and more in the living room and two sharp lcd flat screen tvs in the bedrooms. The back yard has a little pond wit
neighborhood_overview: Twin Lakes sits in the middle of Santa Cruz and has easy access to Capitola or the beach board walk via multiple surface streets.  Less thank 2 miles from highway 1 and less than a mile from the beach.  For boat enthusiasts we're about 500 yds from the inner harbor. ★ Now offering special 3+ day rates ★

The second level of the home features a spacious and stocked kitchen, very large open living room with fireplace, dining area, and window seating area. The master bedroom has a king size bed and private attached master bath. There is also an additional shared half bath next to the kitchen. The first level of the home has 2 bedrooms, a living area, and a mini-kit
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is a perfect get away if you're planning to visit Carmel, Monterey, Pescadero, Big Sur, or Big Basin. We are in Soquel mountains, so we have easy access to Santa Cruz, Scotts Valley, Los Gatos and Capitola.

Mystery Spot - 10 minutes
Capitola - 15 minutes

Sunny cabin surrounded by towering redwoods on a gently sloped hill. Quiet/serene/peaceful setting, tucked away from Hwy 9. Only 4 mins drive into historic & quaint downtown Boulder Creek. Spacious feel, high cathedral ceiling & skylights. Vintage thermostat fireplace. Private deck to enjoy the views.

Host does not live on premises so you have privacy.

The space
Sunny cabin surrounded by towering redwoods on a gently sloped hill. Quiet/serene/peaceful setting, tucked away from Hwy 9. Only 4 mins drive into historic & quaint downtown Boulder Creek. Spacious feel, high cathedral ceiling & skylights. Vintage thermostat fireplace. Private deck to enjoy the views.

Host does not live on premises so you have privacy. Use as a base to explore area attractions; Henry Cowell, Big Basin, wineries, Mount Hermon zip line, Santa Cruz.

Guest access
Entire home to include private deck, dedicated guest parking, and laundry room.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, peaceful & serene neighborhood set on a hill with towering redwoods.  Tucked away from Highway 9 yet downtown Boulder Creek with its historical charm is only 4 minutes drive away.  It has two grocery stores, gas station, restaurants, antique shop, etc.  Easy and pleasant drive to Henry Cowell State Park, Big Basin Redwood Park, Santa Cruz, Felton and many other nearby attractions.
host_about: My wife, Cynthia and I are retired professionals from the high tech industry of Silicon Valley.  We love to be with nature, love all creatures big & small, especially our dog, Obi, who is adoringly called my "teddy bear".  Enjoy travels to immerse ourselves in the local culture, and food.  It gives us great pleasure to facilitate an experience for our guests to connect/re-connect with nature during their home away from home stay with us. We love sharing with others the natural beauty of the redwoods, and/or creek-side setting of our homes in the Santa Cruz mountains.

name: Luxury Country Apartment with Beach Access.
description:
Stay with us and hear the ocean sounds from your rooms.
Our 5 Star Apartment is a spacious, totally self contained private area with it's own side entrance attached to the main house.
It is over 610 space feet with 4 separate rooms and French doors leading to our back garden with areas to relax.
We are a short walk to the beach along Monterrey Bay and with a car you will be half way from Santa Cruz to Carmel by the Sea for shopping or entertainment with many places to visit in between.

The space
Our house is a brand new Tuscany style home with a separate apartment for guests with their own entrance, bedroom off the back garden with queen bed, living room area with a large TV, game table, ocean view and sofa bed, full marble tile bathroom with tub shower, linens, beach towels, hair dryer, double sinks, and kitchenette with small fridge, microwave, and coffee pot.
We require all our guests to refrain from any smoking in the apartment or on th
neighborhood_overview:
Adriana and I live in the countryside area of La Selva Beach, California just south Santa Cruz over looking the picturesque and famous Monterrey Bay.
It is a rural farming area with strawberry fields and miles of sandy beaches.
We are blessed with very friendly neighbors who are part of our neighborhood organizations including bi-annual community meetings, daily internet communications and even our own water company.
host_location: La Selva Beach, California, United States
host_about: My wife, Adriana, and I have just built our new home over-looking the Monterrey Bay.  We love nature, gardening, literature, music, the arts, photography, traveling, keeping up with the news and politics. We specifically love to learn about famous historical figures and love all the music of the 60's. Both of us are from academic backgrounds. Retiring into Santa Cruz area with many great restaurants and whales, seals, otter sightings makes it easy to enjoy the surroundings and easier to accept less traveling due to aging concerns. I was a special education professional in Orange County working with autistic young adults and an administrator of a school for neglected and delinquent teenagers in San Francisco and Adriana is from Europe where she was an actress, fashion model, broadcast narrator and a news announcer in Slovakia, Germany, and USA. She is an avid nature-lover and plants trees wherever she is, especially in fire devastated area in the USA and through Arbor Day Foundation depleted areas of the jungle forests around the world. Adriana is a linguist who speaks 6 languages fluently (English, Japanese, Italian, Slovak, German, Russian) and loves talking to new people of different cultural backgrounds and customs. We love this semi-rural sea breeze area living among our flower and tree garden, taking walks to the beach and experiencing acres of strawberry fields where herons, eagles, hawks and plenty of other birds give us company during the day and hearing all the owls and coyotes at night. When traveling we require separate, clean smoke free and pet free accommodations.
neighbourhood: La Selva Beach, California, United States

name: At the BEACH, steps to Harbor & Boardwalk.
description:
Our cottage is the perfect place for a couple. Inside you will find it light, bright and cozy. We are situated 1 block and a half from the beach in Santa Cruz's picturesque Seabright neighborhood, a favorite. Cottage is within walking distance to cafés and wonderful restaurants, boardwalk, beach and harbor. Our neighborhood is quiet and very safe. You will love this location.

The space
Many guests love the cottage mostly because of the fantastic location, but also because the cottage itself meets all their needs. The building was constructed using green building materials. We designed the building and interior ourselves and although small, it feels spacious and practical for it's size. Every square inch was considered. PLEASE NOTE: THERE IS A STEEP ( but very solid and strong) LADDER/STAIRS TO THE LOFT BEDROOM- see pictures. If you get vertigo from heights, or, if you need to use the bathroom several times a night, this rental may not work for you.

neighborhood_overview: We are at the beach!!! Seabright Beach. Best location in Santa Cruz. Beautiful neighborhood, friendly atmosphere. Restaurants, brewery and cafes all within walking distance.
host_about: Hello, I was born in California however raised in England and Peru, and have been back on the California coast for over 16 years, living by the beach with my husband Reggie (California native!), and our two children Tomas and Genevieve.

name: Santa Cruz, Near Beaches, Private, Quiet & Sweet!
description:
Sweet and charming space for one or two, in the heart of Live Oak, Santa Cruz. Our home is close to beaches and upper harbor (1.3 miles) and 10 minutes by car to SC Beach Boardwalk and Capitola by the Sea. Comfy double-sized vintage iron bed, a small separate bathroom and a small but charming outdoor area! This is a totally self-contained space with a private entrance!

The space
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY SO THERE ARE NO SURPRISES!

Approximately 240 square feet and can house one or two guests. It has a *small* separate bathroom with toilet, stall shower and a toilet tank sink. There are pictures of the toilet tank sink in our listing photos and we recommend that you check them out if you have never seen one before!

PLEASE NOTE: The bed is a Full-sized vintage iron bed with iron headboard and footboard. This is noted on the original listing page. Full size mattresses are approximately 52 x 74 inches so it can accommodate guests a little over 6 f
neighborhood_overview: Our home is in a neighborhood that has children, dogs/cats and chickens.  We have 2 dogs, 1 cat and 3 chickens ourselves - so it is a bit like the country in our back yard.  Animal noise is there but not intrusive.  Guests are welcome to text us if there are any noise disturbances that we can attend to.
host_about:
Hi - I'm Maria! I am retired from the University of California (in Santa Cruz) after 29 years as an Academic Advisor.  I live with my husband, Geoff, and our younger daughter, Sarah.  Our older daughter lives and works in Manhattan. We live in the eastern, unincorporated part of Santa Cruz know as "Live Oak."  We are located between the cities of Santa Cruz and Capitola -
 close to the Upper Harbor, beaches and shopping.

In addition to two daughters, we have two dogs, one cat and three chickens!  We love animals and you may see the chickens pecking around in the backyard from your room's window or hear the dogs making mischief!

My husband and I are musicians who have been performing in different bands over the last three decades!  We don't perform as much but we play music every day.  

When I retired from UCSC, I began making goat-milk soap in beautiful molds and wonderful fragrances.  I wholesale my soaps to a few small shops in the area and call my small, cottage business "Goat Girl Goods!"

We have worked very hard and put our hearts and souls into creating a warm, clean and safe place for our guests.  As hosts, we are welcoming, relaxed and here to make your stay as wonderful as possible.  We look forward to meeting you!   ~ Maria and Geoff

name: Seacliff Ocean View House, Recently Remodeled
description:
Hear the waves from our remodeled Seacliff beach house we affectionately call Bikini Bottom, Spongebob's pineapple home. Located in a quiet neighborhood on the bluff above the beach, with 130 steps down to the sand. Ocean view off the upper rear deck. Two bedrooms downstairs with a bathroom, and "kids' domain" upstairs with a second bathroom. All the modern conveniences, easy walk to Aptos favorites Manuel's, Marianne's and the sand! **THIS IS NOT A PARTY HOUSE, THIS IS A QUIET AREA**

The space
Guests will enjoy using the entire property including view deck, rockin' kitchen, Samsung 4K Ultra definition tv, WiFi and an easy walk to the Seacliff Steps, which get you to the sand in less than 5 minutes.
neighborhood_overview: We love watching the sunsets from the upper deck, walking to Manuel's, Marianne's ice cream, and playing basketball, badminton and frisbee in the wide, quiet street.

name: Ocean view condo w/ deck, balcony & shared pool - walk one block to the beach!
description:
The space
On the bluff right above Rio Del Mar State Beach, this spacious condo is a wonderful escape for beach-going families and groups of friends. Decorated in soothing blue hues that reflect the colors of the ocean, the upstairs living space is open, breezy, and full of sunlight and the sounds of the ocean. Read a novel on the plush sofa or on one of the rattan armchairs, play a few tunes on the stereo system, and light the gas fireplace as the cool evening breezes begin to pick up. Outside, the private terrace is perfect for observing diving pelicans, playful dolphins, and gorgeous sunsets. This outdoor space also offers a lounge chair and a patio table for relaxing happy-hours, friendly card games, and casual meals in the fresh ocean air. Back inside, the kitchen is beautifully equipped for the group chef, with stainless steel appliances (including a dishwasher), a bar counter with three stools, and an adjacent circular dining table with ample space

description:
The space
Ready to visit one of the best beach destinations in central California? From its terrific location to the cozy atmosphere awaiting within, your family and friends will love this seaside home just as much as you will.

This home for eight is just a block away from Santa Cruz's breathtaking West Cliffs, with gorgeous views of the Pacific and soft, golden-sand beaches only moments from your door. Spacious front and back yards give you all the room you need to relax in the sunshine after a morning by the sea.

Inside, wide windows and brightly colored walls give this home an open, energizing atmosphere that's perfect for a home base near the beach. Admire the hardwood floors and occasional potted plant as you head over to the sectional sofa or daybeds to relax. Wireless internet and a flatscreen cable TV make the living area a nice place to pass the time.

The kitchen is only a few steps away and boasts everything

name: Bedroom with full bed in quiet neighborhood
description:
We have a quiet and empty nest since our two grown daughters moved out. We occasionally fill it with gentle, relaxing music, ether recorded or live as we are avid musicians, but never too loudly.

The house is set in restful, serene and retreat-like, Californian suburbia. Both the redwoods and ocean are minutes away. Scotts Valley provides basic shopping and entertainment but Santa Cruz, a bigger city, offers more. We have the best of both worlds.

The space
The bedroom is on the ground floor and has a full-size bed (sleeps two adults) and a spacious closet. The flooring is hardwood. The full bath on the upper floor and half bath on the ground floor are fully available to guests. (For the benefit of non-Americans, a half bath means it has no shower or bathtub). An additional full bath in the host's master bedroom on the ground floor may be used on request if necessary.

Breakfast is not served though there is coffee, tea, hot chocolate
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is usually quiet.  Some neighbors habitually take walks throughout the day but mostly in the late afternoon/early evening just before sunset.  They are usually quiet but are friendly and courteous and most will greet or return greetings.  Traffic is minimal and by local residents and visitors only.  Due to our secluded location, there is never any through traffic, except during the Christmas period when most residents here put up festive, colorful lights on their houses.  Over the years this has become somewhat of a competitive obsession in this neighborhood and it has attracted many viewers who drive through to enjoy the sights.  They usually drive very slowly and there has never been a problem.  This is probably the only time when the neighborhood gets any through traffic.  This is a very safe neighborhood.
host_about:
Most of my friends call me Slim on account of the name Steve Lim. You're welcome to call me either.  I'm a recently retired software engineer; worked in silicon valley in the field of electronic design automation for 27 years. My home is an empty nest since my two grown daughters moved out. We have a four-bedroom house with two and a half baths. Three rooms are now vacant.  I now spend my time on home DIY projects and landscaping, playing, composing, and teaching music, and doing some art. 

I live in a friendly and quiet mature neighborhood on the summit of a little knoll. There is plenty of green with lots of trees, flowering shrubs and lawn. Our neighbors are friendly and we look out for one another, making it a safe and happy place. Traffic is mainly local residents; there is no through traffic.

My home is two minutes from Scotts Valley town center where there are many stores and restaurants - Safeway, Nob Hill, Kmart, Walgreens, CVS/Pharmacy, ACE Hardware, Dollar Tree, and fast-food restaurants (all the usual ones, most of which have drive-thru lanes) and coffee shops Starbucks, Pete's, and our own local Coffee Cat.  There are at least two Chinese, three Japanese, one Thai and three Mexican restaurants and several 'American-fare' places (burgers, steaks, pancakes, pasta, vegetarian, etc) notably Heavenly Roadside Cafe, Aunt Mame's, and Mollie's Cafe. There are no fewer than seven gas stations. Also here in Scotts Valley are CineLux Theatres (12 screens with cafe and lounge), Wells Fargo, Chase, Bank of America, Los Pollos (Mexican restaurant specializing in chicken), Baskin Robbins, Jamba Juice, Winchester Auto, O'Reilly Auto, Skip's Tires, and Integrity Automotive. So this (population 11,580) is a big little small town.

We are minutes from downtown Santa Cruz or the beach, minutes from the redwoods in the Santa Cruz mountain range, and 20-30 minutes from Silicon Valley, literally best of all worlds.

name: Schwann Lake Bungalow
description:
The Schwann Lake bungalow is a quick walk to Twin Lakes Beach. One of the most popular beaches in Santa Cruz.
Bring your family or friends to enjoy this slice of paradise. A very quiet and peaceful hidden gem. Beautifully landscaped yard. Recently Updated vintage bungalow. All one level. Two bedrooms one with a king bed and one with a very comfy new ikea fold out bed.+an airbed. Large main living area with a sectional and 60" digital satellite TV. A kitchen equipped well enough for any gourmet.

The space
A very private relaxing space. This home has all you need to enjoy your time in Santa Cruz. The central location and close access to Twin Lakes Beach makes the Schwann Bungalow a perfect choice for your small family of small group of friends. View of schwann lake from the master bedroom. A breezy beach decor. Bamboo flooring throughout. Maximum 4 guests at this home.

Guest access
The entire home is yours to enjoy. The garage is owner
neighborhood_overview: Twin Lakes beach is just a short walk away. Take the family to the beach for a bonfire. Fire Rings provided. Walk to the harbor and catch a dinner cruise on the sailboat Chardonnay. The Wednesday evening 5-7 pm. sailboat regatta is always a beautiful sight. Walk to the Crows Nest for dinner, dancing or a Sunday night comedian. Close to the boardwalk and the Santa Cruz Natural History Museum as well. The Schwann Lake Bungalow is the perfect family beach rental.

name: Quiet Healing Suite in Santa Cruz
description:
This gorgeous upstairs master bedroom suite with private sundeck is fully furnished with very comfy king size bed and large private bathroom with Jacuzzi tub. Suite has vaulted ceilings and is sunny and spacious (500 square feet including deck). Screen door on sundeck allows for fresh air and expansiveness.

The space
Reset. Recharge. Unplug. Give yourself the gift of self-care in beautiful Santa Cruz and create your own personal retreat in this beautiful safe healing quiet space.

• Enjoy quiet peaceful surroundings
• Take a bath in the Jacuzzi tub
• Take one of the many yoga classes Santa Cruz has to offer
• Meditate in the meditation corner of the room
• Journal
• Treat yourself to a massage
• Start your next creative project or finish a work-in-progress.
• Bring that stack of books you’ve always wanted to read.
• Walk through the quiet beauty of nearby redwood forests
• Exercise or swim at nearby fitn
neighborhood_overview:
Enjoy staying at this centrally located beautiful Santa Cruz home by the yacht harbor, just ¾ mile from Twin Lakes beach and 5 minute drive to downtown. Many nice coffee shops and restaurants close by (Harbor Café, Crows Nest, Java Junction, Linda’s Seabreeze Café, Charlie Hong-Kong’s, Dharma’s)
Very close to many natural food shops: Staff of Life, New Leaf and Whole foods… where you can get outstanding organic produce as well as smoothies, veggie drinks and hot bar food.
host_about: Santa Cruz resident for over 35 years.  After a 20 year computer engineering career I became a massage therapist, nutritionist and author. Every day I swim and practice yoga (Bikram and restorative).  I value my alone time, am very quiet but also am a good resource to answer questions especially about ideas for healthy things to do in Santa Cruz.

name: Beautiful Beach House - Short Walk to the Beach!
description:
This spacious beautiful home has a comfortable open floor plan. The large kitchen designed for the chef at heart provides plenty of space for family or friends to enjoy. The well-landscaped backyard has a trampoline to enjoy. Just a short walk to the beach, close to Seascape Golf Course. We strive to provide a safe environment for our guests to enjoy. We thoroughly clean and sanitize after each guest per CA guidelines.

The space
This home has two levels with all the bedrooms upstairs and an open floor plan downstairs for your enjoyment. Enjoy an ocean view from the large master bedroom suite. There are sand toys, a wagon, beach towels, beach chairs, an outdoor shower and just about everything you will need for a relaxing vacation.

Guests must be over 21 to rent our beach house. Absolutely no parties. Our neighbors are sensitive to noise after 10 pm. Normal level conversations and laughing isn't a problem inside the house after 10 pm.

•
neighborhood_overview: There is so much to do here! Built near the beach, just a stroll down the hill to the sand, grab your beach towels and soak in the sun. Enjoy an afternoon lunch at Cafe Rio restaurant or a cup of coffee at the nearby Espresso Rio. There is plenty to enjoy in the small quaint town of Aptos. Seascape Golf Cours is just around the block making Tee Time easy.  The Forest of Nisene Marks State Park is a short 7 min drive if you love hiking. It boasts waterfalls and is breathtaking. Afterwards, don't forget to hit the beach or enjoy a beautiful sunset.  The Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is only 20 minutes away or visits Monterey Bay (Monterey Bay Aquarium and Dennis the Menace Park) just 30 minutes down the coast.

name: Castle Beach Cottage
description:
The perfect little beach house! Warm cozy comfortable cottage located just steps to Seabright Beach. Walking distance to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Santa Cruz Harbor and several local favorites like The Crow's Nest, Betty's Burgers, Verve Coffee Shop and Seabright Deli. Relax in the backyard hot tub under the stars while listening to the sound of the ocean waves. The beach house is definitely our happy place and it just might become your happy place too!

The space
The cottage was originally built in 1888. It's in a great location, in a great neighborhood and close to one of Santa Cruz's best beaches. We have lovingly restored it while trying to keep the historic beach cottage charm. We hope all of our guests feel comfortable, relaxed and at home!

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire house and backyard.

Other things to note
Watch the high curbs around the house! The parking area is extra wide. This a
neighborhood_overview: Seabright is a popular neighborhood in Santa Cruz. It's loved for the friendly people, laid-back relaxing atmosphere and beach town vibe. Seabright is a great walking neighborhood too. You can walk to beaches, the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, the Harbor, the Lighthouse, natural food stores, great restaurants and coffee shops. We love to walk or ride our bikes along the river trail. It takes you right into Downtown Santa Cruz.
host_about: We're from the Bay area and host a cottage in Santa Cruz, California near the Boardwalk. We love the outdoors and enjoy seeing new places!

name: Seabright Sanctuary in the heart of Santa Cruz
description:
Enjoy a clean, cool environment at this backyard paradise in the heart of Santa Cruz. One comfortable queen Murphy bed and a queen sofa bed are both available in the studio. The backyard has a play structure/toys that children love to use as well as a seating area. Great food, surf/beaches, the boardwalk and downtown are all close by. Open the double doors to let in the fresh ocean air or close the blackout curtains and turn on a movie with our included streaming services.
Please note for last minute cancellations you will only receive a refund for the cleaning fee.

The space
We use eco-friendly and allergen free cleaning products. Solar power brings you electricity when you stay here and the location is one of the best in town. Walk to countless restaurants, the Rio Theatre, beaches and Boardwalk are close by, a nature trail to the marina and Twin Lakes beach is within reach and downtown is not far. Centered between West side Santa Cruz (UCSC) and East sid
neighborhood_overview: We are a very short drive from most of the highlights of Santa Cruz. Fine and casual dining, Seabright and Twin Lakes beaches, downtown shopping, and the beach boardwalk are all 5 to 10 minutes away. Numerous surf spots, UCSC, Natural bridges as well as the surrounding communities of Capitola and Aptos with hiking and biking trails are 10 to 15 minutes away.

name: Serenity at Natural Bridges  - 5 min Walk to Beach
description:
Just a 5 min walk to Westcliff Dr. and across the street from Natural Bridges State park. Enjoy our spacious 4 bedroom 3 bath, clean, beautiful, bright, and well equipped Santa Cruz Beach House. This is a perfect spot for beach and hiking lovers! Well equipped with a surfboard, boogie board, sand toys, bikes & beach chairs. You will LOVE it here! This is a perfect get away for work or families. The house has reliable and fast wifi. Our home is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized after each guest

The space
The house is big and bright. Located on a corner lot with lots of windows for natural lighting. The house has 3 bedrooms upstairs and 2 full bathrooms. The kids room has lots of toys and books, baby gates for the stairs, a pack in play and portable high chair. Downstairs you will find a 4th bedroom and full bathroom with a walk in shower. Downstairs also has 2 living areas (family and living room) and 2 dining areas(formal and casual). There's plenty of space
neighborhood_overview: You will love this house and enjoy that it is just a few minutes walk to West Cliff Drive and Natual Bridges State Beach. This is an ideal family vacation place any time of the year! The house is equipped with bikes, beach chairs, sand toys and beach towels. West Cliff Drive offers white water views of boats, whales, dolphins, sea otters, pelicans and other wildlife. If you enjoy watching surfers catch the ultimate wave head to Steamers Lane near Lighthouse field. In the fall you will see 1000's of Monarch Butterflies during their annual migration. Walk or bike to westside cafes and restaurants, the Lighthouse, Natural Bridges, downtown, the wharf, bakeries and excellent breweries, wineries are a 10-minute bike ride away. Art openings in the neighborhood and a farmer's market each Saturday just .5 miles away.  The downtown farmer's market is on Wednesdays. Santa Cruz is the ultimate place to find fresh organic produce.   Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is an 8 min drive or 2.4 miles down De

name: Country French Beach House
description:
Our colorful , Country French Beach House allows you to enjoy the ocean view from the upper decks. Relax with your choice of stereo, CD player and DVD , and TV on our comfortable leather couch and side chairs. French Doors open out to front/ back decks to create an inside out feel.. Three of four bedrooms have their own decks. No common walls between bedrooms, for your privacy. Charcoal /gas grills. Lounge furniture on decks. Party lights on on back decks for nighttime chats.

The space
This home is a show stopper. Cars drive by, slow down and just stare. We have replicated what we've experienced during our many trips to France. There's good parking on our brick courtyard. Our home is streaming with color and authentic antiques. There are gas and charcoal BBQ's, several decks, Viking Stove and quiet Bosch Dishwasher, custom designed gourmet kitchen and lots of privacy. The beds are dreamy with high thread count sheets and duvets , with a choice of
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is located on one of two main arteries that lead directly to the to the water. It is on a hill and is a short 6/10 of a mile to the water downhill (of course its uphill to get back home). The neighborhood is mostly residential with houses on each side being permanent residents.
I don't recommend walking to the beach with little ones. Like most beach neighborhoods there are no sidewalks until you get to the flat area, so if you are taking little ones to the beach I'd recommend driving. There is public parking at the beach.
host_about:
I am a happily retired Marriage and Family Therapist.   My life therefore has been about relationships that matter. 
     I am a photographer.  I love travel and color and the combination of both is  ideal for me.  
     I love hosting couples, groups of women as well as their family members. I g love their complete immersion into the pleasure of our home and its' surrounding areas.  I love my reviews when people "get it" when it comes to our  beach home.  It's fun to hear they spent time trying to imagine the stories that went behind each segment  of decor.    I LOVE France, and then Italy, and Morocco.  Canada is up there too, because they speak French (even though I don't). 
    I also fancy myself a chef (colorful, tasteful, healthy food).   Don't forget to check out all the cookbooks and international magazines.   You will know that I love cooking when you see our custom designed kitchen, the myriad of cooking utensils, french door refrigerator, Viking Stove and Bosch Dishwasher.   The french doors off the dining area open out  to extend your eating areas and invite you for morning  a cup of coffee outside.   The french doors off the living room invite you to watch the fog roll away under the palm tree.  This is yet another thing I love. 
       Walt and I have been married for 35 years.  He is still in practice as a psychologist and has taught mindfulness meditation for about 30 years.  He is the quiet type but rarely sits still.
     Interior design with elegance, color, history and a sense of whimsy would well describe another of my passions.  I like changing things up from time to time so my return guests get to do it all over again.  I love exploring our area for new things for us to do as well as always keep it fun for our guests and their children.  As nice as the house is I encourage everyone to get out there and enjoy  the outside and outlying areas as well.  Nicene Marks is almost within walking distance   The beach is a short stroll.
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) like establishing a relationship with my guests before they arrive, so I know what they need and they know what I appreciate in a guest.  People ask me, "how can you let strangers come in to this lovely home"?  Oddly, its not a problem.  To me our home is not a typical rental.  It is a shared lovely home and I think my guests understand that and feel honored to be there.  They want to maintain our relationship and so do I.
     You will get a feel for my passions as you sit on the couch in front of the fireplace, or on one of the many decks and peruse the books on design, photography, cooking and sweet novels that take place on or near the beach.
  I say to you welcome, come be an honored guest.  Wouldn't like to be my "first" Air bnb guest?
