You will love your stay in our private guest suite hopping distance to beautiful Hidden Beach in Aptos, CA. We are a stones throw from the Seascape Resort and shopping center and are a quick drive to downtown Capitola and Santa Cruz. The suite has two bedrooms with queen beds, 1.5 baths and spectacular views of the beach from the rooftop deck. Enjoy your days hanging out at the beach, enjoying a glass of wine from the deck, or hiking on the nearby trails. Now featuring pool/spa/hot tub in 2020.

The space
Location, location, location! Relax in our peaceful guest quarters walking distance from the beach. Our guest quarters are locked off from the rest of our house, with a private entrance, so your interaction with us will be minimal. We offer a 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath suite that is ideal for a few friends, a couple or a small family. We now have a pool and spa for your use!

You are welcome to use our expansive, rooftop deck for hanging out. We will leave yo
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is in the Seascape area, right by the beach and 10 minutes walk from the Seascape resort and shopping center.

name: Cozy Mountain Retreat
description:
Welcome to our peaceful part of the forest. George has thought of many details to make your stay enjoyable. Adventure, relax and rejuvenate in a beautiful private mountain and garden setting. We are also a short drive to the beach. Guests from all backgrounds are welcome.

The space
Private and separate cozy tiny house in a beautiful setting.. There is a bedroom (with a dresser and desk,) and a kitchen. The table and chairs are on the patio. There is a Keurig coffee maker with coffee pods, assorted creamers and sweeteners, a full size fridge, a two burner hot plate, microwave/convection oven, toaster, blender, dishes, pots and pans, cooking oils, spices, teas.
We offer a few snacks for you as well, such as fruit, granola bars, oatmeal, and sometimes other items. There is a water cooler with bottled water provided.
This is a tiny home and the bathroom is part of the kitchen. The toilet is inside the shower, like in a travel trailer, but it is bigger. The
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Santa Cruz Mountains with lots of redwoods and a year round stream that is great for exploring. Private dead end road, great for relaxing walks. There are neighbors but it is usually very quiet. Easy access to Silicon Valley and coastal areas. We are five miles inland from Capitola Beach.
host_about: We are a nature loving family with two young, adventurous children. We love going to the beach, music and spending time with family and friends. We also enjoy cooking, gardening, creek walking, camping, exploring and being silly. We appreciate kindness and positive energy. Namaste.

name: Large room in a home in park-like setting
description:
Private room in a home in a park-like setting of oak and redwood trees. Seven miles from downtown Santa Cruz and just minutes by car from local beaches. Steps from the Forest of Nicene Marks State Park. We are hosting a private room and adjacent private bathroom in our home. We offer a family friendly environment as we have two little ones-2 and 4 years old.

The space
Outdoor patio.

Guest access
There is a coffee pot, microwave and hotplate in the room and a sink and full refrigerator in the garage. There is also a porch downstairs and a deck upstairs with beautiful tree lined views.

Other things to note
We do have two small children (2 and 4 years old). We do our best to be respectful of our guests and keep them quiet, but please be prepared that you may hear them at some point during your stay.
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood setting steps from Nicene Marks State Park.  Walk out our front door for a beautiful walk or strenuous hike in the redwoods. We are ideally situated in the heart of some of the region's best single track mountain biking straight out of the driveway.  Five minutes to Capitola beach and village. Surfers are just minutes from The Hook and world class Pleasure Point. Fifteen minutes to downtown Santa Cruz.

Trundle bed can be set up as 1 king bed OR 1 or 2 twin beds. Walk to the beach, town, Boardwalk, & variety of popular local markets & restaurants, shops & music venues. Enjoy the deck with coffee or tea AM or a glass of wine PM. Hear waves at night and enjoy a star filled sky. Wifi is included; Off street parking & private entry.

The space
This cottage is approximately 300 square feet large including the large main room (200 sf), entryway (39sf) and bathroom (60sf). It is perfect for people who love to explore town and nature and will enjoy the surrounding garden. We are walking distance to Seabright Beach and Downtown and Midtown SC as well as Arana Gulch, SC Harbor and the Boardwalk. Walk to great food, shops and markets as well as beach and nature areas.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: Desirable and convenient  neighborhood, close to stores, shops, music venues, beach and town.

name: Redwood Yurt in Aptos Mountain Retreat & Spa
description:
Om Oasis is a beautiful and lush retreat center on several acres of a remote and peaceful 15 acre mountain top property. We host guests who wish to connect with the beauty of nature and experience peace. We are 10-15 minutes up the mountain and partially off-grid with little to no cell reception but with a great WiFi connection. There are a total of 6 guest accommodations (including this one) spread out over our developed 3 acres, making it always a very private experience and easy to distance.

The space
The Redwood Hideaway is a private yurt with access to amenities and outdoor/indoor meditation spaces. This unit has a private detached bathroom and access to two sets of outdoor showers and a claw foot soaking tub under the bamboo. The yurt is located on the lower portion of our property near a beautiful fairy circle of redwoods and the deck is just steps from the yurt door. As you enter the yurt you will find a cozy room with a queen sized bed and a skylight.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a ridge top with excellent views of the sunset, moon, and stars. We're also ten minutes from the town of Aptos where you'll find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery/health food stores, and boutiques. The entrance to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Sea Cliff State Beach and Rio Del Mar State Beach are all just 12-15 minutes from our home.

PLEASE NOTE that we live on a windy private country road (not maintained by the city) with two-way traffic and parts that become one lane at times. Please drive carefully and be aware of this.
host_about: Hi there! Raine & her family live part time in Hawai'i/ part time at our beautiful Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California.  Emberlie is the on-site manager, overseeing the property and booking. She provides body work and yoga classes, sound healing and spa services... with the intention to care for you during your stay! Happy Travels & welcome OM.

description:
Private cabin in a serene, wooded setting, 10 min. to Santa Cruz. Main house has two bedrooms and a loft, plus there are two detached glam camping gazebos, equipped with beds, electric blankets, and televisions. Large hot tub, outdoor shower, outdoor kitchen, gas barbecue, large deck with views. Indoors has a modern, well-equipped kitchen, great room, gas fireplace, loft, master bedroom, guest bedroom, two bathrooms. Quality furniture, comfortable beds, stylish sectional, large dining table.

The space
This home is my private home and I love this space. It is a serene sanctuary in a very private setting where I can relax and enjoy nature. It is very important to me to keep the house smoke free and pet dander free so I ask that guests not bring their animals or smoke inside the home or on the grounds. The house is in a forest where there are devastating forest fires every year. The no smoking policy is primarily to protect my home and the neighborhood from
neighborhood_overview: Mt Hermon is a small community near Felton, just a 10-minute drive to Santa Cruz.  Because the home is located in a rural, forest setting it can be a little challenging to find.  If you follow the directions exactly you will be able to find the house easily.  The speed limit in Mount Hermon is 15 mph and this limit is enforced by several nasty speed bumps throughout the village, so keep your eyes open for those.  The terrain is hilly with lots of trees.  A creek runs through the valley and can be accessed for wading and water play.  Mount Hermon Association offers a world class zip line course through the redwood canopy.  Hiking trails throughout.  Roaring Camp steam train ride through the redwoods.  Henry Cowell Redwood Park offers views and a self-guided tour of ancient redwoods. Safeway grocery store, CVS drug store, and restaurants a mile away.
host_about: My husband and I love to travel and we also bicycle on our travels.  We write reports with photos about our experiences along the way.  We often book rooms with Air B&B and have had many wonderful experiences.  So, we thought we might try listing our beautiful vacation cabin for travelers to try.

name: Country Garden Private Guest Suite (Dog friendly)
description:
Charming garden guest suite with private entrance & private patio, located down the street from Henry Cowell State Park, Pasatiempo Golf Course & 6 miles from the 1440 Multiversity with great freeway access and only minutes from the beach and hiking. Suite includes private bathroom, hallway, mini-fridge, microwave & coffee. We welcome everyone regardless of race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, political affiliation, gender & orientation. Friendly, well-behaved dogs are welcome too.

The space
We have beautiful gardens you can enjoy (along with our ducks who roam around). Our yard is completely fenced in & there's a smaller patio attached to your guest suit that any dog is sure to like. We just remodeled the guest bedroom with recessed lighting, crown molding & fresh paint.

Guest access
You'll have complete and sole access to the guest suite (bedroom, bathroom, hallway coffee/microwave area, washer/dryer) with parking in the front.
neighborhood_overview: We live in a rural area & there are horse paddocks across the street from our home.  We live on a main street, but that shouldn't affect you except it means that you have quick access to the freeway.  When you walk down the street, you'll be at the Horse Showgrounds & next to Henry Cowell State Park (which offers beautiful trails through the redwoods with a vista of the ocean).  We're a 5 minute drive from the wonderful Jewell Theatre & Tannery Arts Center.  Downtown Santa Cruz has great restaurants & an interesting art museum.  We're about a 10 minute drive from the University of California, Santa Cruz.
host_about: I'm a retired nonprofit management professional.  I'm currently an artist and community volunteer. I enjoy painting, sewing and reading.  The photo on my profile is when my rescue dog (really, rescue diva) Coco won 1st place in the Haute Dog fashion show in SF.  I love dogs.  And fashion. My life motto would be to take advantage of opportunities as they present themselves and not to be a "shoulda coulda woulda" The 5 things I can't live without?  Friends, Family, Dogs, Creating something & Humor.  I'm pretty laid back but I like a clean bathroom.  I've thought about hosting as we live in beautiful Santa Cruz and it really is paradise.

name: Adobe Casita in Aptos Mountain Retreat & Spa
description:
Om Oasis is a beautiful and lush retreat center on several acres of a remote and peaceful 15 acre mountain top property. We host guests who wish to connect with the beauty of nature and experience peace. We are 10-15 minutes up the mountain and partially off-grid with little to no cell reception but with a great WiFi connection. There are a total of 6 guest accommodations (including this one) spread out over our developed 3 acres, making it always a very private experience and easy to distance.

The space
The Adobe Casita is a private, single room structure with access to a private detached bathroom a short walk from the accommodation, as well as 2 options of shared (private once you enter) outdoor showers, one of which is complete with a claw foot bath tub under the bamboo forest.

This tall ceiling room is located closest to the parking portion of our property with easy walking access. There is a redwood grove and deck nearby for yoga and meditation.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a ridge top with excellent views of the sunset, moon, and stars. We're also ten minutes from the town of Aptos where you'll find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery/health food stores, and boutiques. The entrance to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Sea Cliff State Beach and Rio Del Mar State Beach are all just 12-15 minutes from our home.

PLEASE NOTE that we live on a windy private country road (not maintained by the city) with two-way traffic and parts that become one lane at times. Please drive carefully and be aware of this.
host_about: Hi there! Raine & her family live part time in Hawai'i/ part time at our beautiful Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California.  Emberlie is the on-site manager, overseeing the property and booking. She provides body work and yoga classes, sound healing and spa services... with the intention to care for you during your stay! Happy Travels & welcome OM.

name: Castle Beach Retreat
description:
Castle Beach Retreat offers an exciting atmosphere unmatched by other beach rentals. Perfect for extend family reunions and retreats.

Castle Beach Retreat is a 2-story, 3000sq ft home directly across from one of the best beaches in Santa Cruz - Seabright Beach. Full-length windows overlook the beach and Santa Cruz Pier - allowing you to watch the sunset while barbecuing on the spacious balcony or lie in bed listening to the waves.

Pricing include Santa Cruz's 11% ToT tax (Permit No. 001134)

The space
Seabright State Beach, known to locals as Castle Beach, is a south-facing beach with the reputation of being the warmest, sunniest beach on the Monterey Bay. Great for families, this State Beach has restrooms, lifeguards*, and since Castle Beach Retreat sits at the beach's main entrance, there are no stairs or cliffs to negotiate. Enjoy roasting marshmallows on one of the only beaches that allows bonfires. Plus due to limited beach parking, traf
neighborhood_overview: The Seabright area is one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Santa Cruz. Centrally located, you are only a short walk from coffee shops, delis and great restaurants. There is also several theaters in the downtown shopping district and there are activities likes concerts, roller skating, bowling, laser tag, climbing, hiking, biking and much more just minutes away. Guest should be aware that being so close to the beach does mean that occasionally beachgoers leaving can be noisy at night. This isn't always an issue but it does unfortunately happen.
host_about: My wife and I love to travel. I am a native Californian who is also an Airbnb host.

name: Santa Cruz Guesthouse Surrounded by a Redwood Forest
description:
Get back in touch with nature in a farmhouse-style property next to abundant woodlands and hiking trails. It's an airy, skylit space with honey-colored hardwood floors and a well-equipped kitchen. Bathe in a claw-foot tub and relax on a wooden porch.

Please note that this house shares the property with the owners who live in the main house, and an Airstream.
neighborhood_overview: The house is in the redwood area of Santa Cruz. Drive to downtown and the beach in a few minutes. It's close to the historic Mystery Spot, and is across the street from DeLaveaga Park with its great hiking trails.
host_about: WeHost is a small team that is laser focused on hosting guests at amazing vacation rentals! We believe that memorable vacations are centered around beautiful homes that are comfortable and stocked with all the amenities that make for an amazing stay.

name: Amazing house on the Beach!!!..ON SITE MAIDS
description:
Nestled along the Monterey Bay is one of the most scenic stretches of California's central coastline. Spanning 1 1/2 miles of pristine beach, the house is in a secluded, gated community with a collection of beautiful beachfront homes.

Perfect family vacation, Pajaro Dunes is located 4 miles West of Watsonville, and 20 miles South of Santa Cruz which is home of the Beach Boardwalk and Santa Cruz Mountain Redwoods. 20 minutes to Monterey.

Tennis, pickle,basketball,bocce ball,volleyball,horse sho

The space
Whole home, gigantic deck facing the beach, basically elevated right on the beach , outdoor dining etc, bbq on second deck, great family house, very social, parking in cul de sac, full kitchen, laundry room, 2 private bathrooms for 2 king bedrooms upstairs, flat screen tv’s, very comfortable and private, gated with 24 hour security, so anytime one has any questions someone is there to help.

Guest access
All

An area thatSan Franicscans have bought or rented for getaways for generations.  Close to Santa Cruz, 15-20 minutes, close to Monterey, 20 minutes.  Lots of golf choices, biking

name: Kinderwood Farms Suite
description:
March 1st-3 new baby goats born and ready for cuddles! Now is the time to visit!

Nestled in an enchanting forest of redwood trees and ferns, lies a treasured, eco-friendly/sustainable nano-farm, waiting for you to explore & enjoy. Sample farm to table fare, join us for goat milking, baby goat feeding, handmade soap or cheese making demos, and more.

*As this is a working farm, all activities must be scheduled through messaging prior to arrival.
**Also available: Kinderwood Farms Bedroom

The space
Your cozy accommodations are attached to the main house and include a private entrance, private bathroom, & bedroom. Within the bedroom is a simple food prep space including a sink, mini fridge, Keurig coffee maker, & dishes. There is also a door in the hallway that leads to the main house for the purpose of emergency egress. We ask that you remove your shoes when entering and keep the door closed to keep the farm outside.

Guest
neighborhood_overview: Although we are tucked away, we are only minutes away from gorgeous beaches, world class wineries & breweries, and scenic hikes. Check our guidebook for more info
host_about:
Hi, I’m Lauren! I’ve been in Aptos my whole life, except a few years in midtown Santa Cruz. I absolutely love living on the edge of the forest that I grew up hiking in. For me, the magic of the redwood trees, ferns and moss never fades. 

My husband Mack and I raise our super sweet animals, mostly goats, as well as pigs, our amazing guardian dogs (sweet as pie with humans), and our little shiba inu/terrier mix that thinks he is the king of the castle. And of course chickens, because I love making scrumptious omelets. I had the pleasure of going through the culinary arts program at our local community college, so I am passionate about cooking. I absolutely adore teaching and sharing the things I’ve learned over the years from my incredible instructors and mentors. My latest passion has been cultivating a very strong and delicious sourdough starter. And of course making cheese, from our goats’ milk, though I put the cheesemaking on hold when we have lots of babies eating the milk. 

We very much look forward to having you come visit us and experience the fun and peaceful lifestyle of forest/beach/farm life. If you would like the full experience, please be sure to book Kinderwood Farms. Thank you! 

If you would like to read some articles and write ups about us, look up Cabrillo College Grads at Work and Good Times Santa Cruz Goat Yoga.

name: Pleasure Point Beach Cottage
description:
Enjoy Pleasure Point living in this sweat cottage. Just a few minutes stroll and you’re at the beach and some of Santa Cruz’s best surf. Cruise the cliffs on bikes, hit the waves, or BBQ and soak up the sun! You’re sure to enjoy this special little house and its big back yard.

Enjoy the fully stocked kitchen, 50 inch 4k TV, hot outdoor shower, big gas BBQ, 2 beach cruisers, 2 soft surf boards, beach toys, a wagon (great for beach transport), and much more!

The space
Pleasure point area is incredibly special neighborhood. It’s laid back with a focus on the natural wonder of the ocean. The ocean view from just the end of the street is breath-taking. The beach options are endless. Choose from uncrowded cove beaches or join the excitement at Capitola or the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.

The house is a cozy beach bungalow with a great back yard. It’s the perfect spot to BBQ and enjoy the afternoon sun!

Guest access
You w
neighborhood_overview: Pleasure Point is great beachy neighborhood.  Foot and bike traffic typically out number cars on 34th Avenue, with the main destination being the beach.  The Point Store is a local focal point, where you can get basic supplies for home or get a prepared meal.  The burritos are great!
host_about: My big five are family, friends, activity (surf, mountain bike, etc.), good food, and travel.  These things make my life complete.

name: Hippy VW Westy in Redwoods
description:
Step back into the groovy times of the VW Bus heyday! Come and enjoy a unique experience in a VW Westfalia, ours is named Daisy.

Come and breathe the fresh mountain air and enjoy your stay in Daisy, our Westfalia, in the redwood forest. The campsite is completely private and separate from the main house. Walk out front door to trails through the redwoods. Excellent restaurants in small, quaint town of Felton, home to majestic Henry Cowell State Park. Or drive 20 minutes to Santa Cruz.

The space
Westy is a 1979 VW Westfalia that is all original, a unique experience that you will never forget. The Westy is equipped with a water heater, a french-press coffee maker, coffee, half/half and sugar are available.

You are hooked up to electricity for your mobile devices (YES and WiFi), and lights. Equipped with a portable heater, and extra blankets, should you need it.

The common area has a firepit that can be used by our guests.
neighborhood_overview:
Felton/Santa Cruz is full of things to do:
- The Roaring Camp & Big Trees Narrow Gauge Railroad is a 3 ft narrow-gauge tourist railroad.
- Henry Cowell State Park, most famous for the 40-acre grove of towering old-growth redwood trees.
- Mystery Spot: Experience gravity-defying demonstrations on the short but steep uphill walk.
- Garden of Eden: Secret swimming hole with lots of fun boulders to jump off and swim around. We will fill you in on how to get there.
- Cruise on bikes down West Cliff Drive
- Hang out at beach and relax...
- And of course, world famous surfing in Santa Cruz
host_about: Life Motto: Work hard, play harder.

name: Tranquil Private Casita!
description:
Short Term Rental - This quiet home is available on a 31 to 120 day basis. What a great location, close to Santa Cruz and Silicon Valley!

The space
Beautifully appointed home and yard. The house is fully furnished with cable TV and internet. Fully equipped kitchen, including coffee maker, toaster, microwave, dishwasher. Cozy living room with TV, small electric fireplace heater and plenty of reading lights. The master bedroom has it's own full bathroom and a sliding door to the deck. The second bedroom has a trundle bed with single mattresses.

Tons of natural light pour into the house! Washer & dryer included for your convenience. There is a private tennis court on the property for your use, if you bring your own equipment.

You are 30 minutes to Los Gatos, 10 minutes to Capitola, 15 minutes to downtown Santa Cruz and UCSC. Quite and convenient!!

This is a private guest house. The owners live in the main house on the same property.
host_about: We are a property management company, helping a few owners with there Vacation Rentals in the beautiful Santa Cruz area. Heather is your contact person.

name: Two bedroom cottage just blocks from the beach in Pleasure Point, Santa Cruz!
description:
Pleasure Point Cottage makes the perfect home base for a great adventure on Monterey Bay (half way between San Francisco and Carmel-by-the Sea). It will be professionally cleaned before you arrive!

The space
The kitchen for this two bedroom cottage is equipped with all of the basic appliances, including a gas stove, dishwasher and microwave, electric coffee pot, dishes and cookware.

The master bedroom has a queen size bed, fresh linens, an open beam ceiling, walk-in closet and a new HDTV.

The second bedroom has two extra-long twin size beds which are comfortable for adults as well as children. High chair and portable crib are available upon request.

This attached cottage has off-street parking and its own private, fenced yard. All of the utilities - cable TV, Wi-Fi, laundry, gardener, BBQ, and outdoor table are provided. Yes, your dog is welcome too! He/she will appreciate the fenced yard and walks throughout the dog-friendly
neighborhood_overview:
Begin your day by strolling along Opal Cliffs. Watch surfers challenge the waves; listen to the pounding surf while the sea gulls call from overhead; inhale the fresh ocean air while you sip a cup of hot coffee at the corner deli and consider your options. Northern California coastal communities are vibrant with activities and opportunities to explore. All are easily discoverable near this Pleasure Point getaway. For starters, the surf is 2 blocks from the front door. The Boardwalk amusement park is about 2 miles.

Santa Cruz County has 29 miles of beaches to explore: Cowell's Beach, Steamer Lane, (a favorite surfing spot), Twin Beach, and Castle Beach, are all near the Santa Cruz Wharf. Driving south from Pleasure Point Cottage, you will find Manresa Beach, La Selva, Capitola Beach, Seacliff Beach (sunken cement ship), Seascape Beach, and Sunset Beach (romance). Driving North look for the Santa Cruz Harbor (great place for breakfast, lunch or dinner and evening enter
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my wonderful family.

name: This one bedroom unit is located just blocks from Pleasure Point!
description:
Our delightful one bedroom, attached cottage is about two blocks from one of the most popular surfing spots on the west coast! It will be professionally cleaned before you arrive!

The space
The climate is mild, the scenery is spectacular, and there is always something happening.

Just one block from the Surf breaks at Pleasure Point! Pleasure Point Cottage has its own kitchen with all of the dishes, pots and pans you will need, as well as a coffee pot, microwave, full range, and a side by side refrigerator.

The living room has a white leather sectional sofa, plus desk with internet and cable TV. The bathroom has a walk-in shower, fresh, clean towels and a hair dryer.The bedroom has a queen size bed with clean linens.

The cottage even has a small private fenced yard, perfect for well behaved dogs, and a patio with a bistro set and barbeque.

All utilities, gardener, TV and Wi-Fi and off street parking are provided.

name: Snug and Cozy between the Skyline and the Sea
description:
Super private, peaceful, and quiet; an excellent place for the traveler who is excited about exploring the Santa Cruz mountains and coast.

Completely private In-law unit with extras needed to make it cozy. Snuggled between Scotts Valley, Felton, and Santa Cruz it's near Henry Cowell Redwoods State Park, 1440 Multiversity, and Mount Hermon Conference Center yet less than an hour from Silicon Valley.

The Airbnb cleaning handbook is followed making this one of the cleanest places you’ll stay at!

The space
Your cozy, airy room comes with a queen-sized bed, private bath with shower, a "kitchenette" with a table for two, small refrigerator, microwave, electric kettle and French press coffee maker (instructions for the French press are included in the house manual).

You'll also find supplies for your morning coffee or tea, fruit and some food items just right for a light breakfast before you start your day.

Be sure to browse
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood feels rural but you're only about a mile from grocery stores, drug stores, restaurants and a movie theater. Scotts Valley is home to 8 coffee houses. Our favorite, Coffee Cat, is just over a mile away. They roast their coffee on site and it's their coffee you'll find in the refrigerator.

You're also less than 1/4 a mile away from the hiking trails of Henry Cowell Redwoods State Park. If hiking is your passion you found the right place to stay! Several former guests have left annotated maps indicating their favorite trails. Feel free to borrow them for your hiking pleasure.
host_about: My husband and I love to travel and getting to know the people who live in the communities we're visiting. If I'm not home I'm usually out hiking in the nearby mountains. I hope you enjoy your stay at my home!

name: Private Home at foot of Santa Cruz Mountains
description:
Nestled right at the foot of the Santa Cruz Mountains, this brand new 3600 sq ft home is the perfect place for your family and friends to get away. Located an hour south of San Francisco and an hour north of Monterey/Carmel, with the Santa Cruz beaches only 15 minutes away, this home allows you access to day trips all over the Bay Area (30 mins to San Jose) with a great place to come home to at the end of your daily adventure to rest, relax, and recharge!

The space
Construction was just completed on this home in October 2016. It has a phenomenal layout with an open concept kitchen/dining/living room. The kitchen is extremely spacious making it hard for their to ever be "too many cooks in the kitchen!"

Master Bedroom (king bed) and bathroom as well as guest bedroom (queen) are located downstairs. Upstairs has 3 bedrooms, and a play room. Extra twin mattresses are available for the floors in the upstairs rooms if necessary. The layout of this home
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, peaceful neighborhood.  Fantastic access to highway 17, yet far enough away, with enough mature trees to block freeway noise!
host_about: I'm a husband and father of 3.  Our family just moved into this home after we built it from the ground up in 2016.  My wife and I have always loved house projects, that combined with my dad's experience in building homes, we made it a family project to build the home of our dreams!  We have been living here since October 2017 and love it!

name: Welcome to Harbor House. Your Favorite Home at the Beach.
description:
Prepare to enjoy this retreat close to the ocean with warm light and comfortable furnishings. Relax and experience a beautiful sense of calm from this quiet retreat. This home is completed by a stained-glass motif on the front door and maritime themed art.
New this year 2020! Relax and enjoy the new fire pit table during the cool summer nights on the updated deck or enjoy a dinner under the stars using the new BBQ in the new outdoor dining area. **BBQ AND FIRE PIT TABLE are for SUMMER USE $40 EACH OR $80 FOR BOTH DURING YOUR STAY (Limit 1 tank per BQQ and 1 tank per FIRE TABLE each stay)
neighborhood_overview: This home is located on a serene tree lined street by the harbor. Wonderful restaurants, nightlife, shopping, the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, and hiking options are all in walking distance. There is a local pub called Brady's Yacht Club on SeaBright Ave that can cause some noise on the weekends. Some guests do like to walk over for a pint and a game of pool.
host_about: Owner manager of a top rated air bnb in Santa Cruz Ca.  Love to travel and meet new people.

name: Half Our Home is Yours- Enjoy Beaches & Redwoods!
description:
Welcome to one of the most amazing locations on earth! Sun, oaks/ redwoods to gaze at: a place to relax, to enjoy the quiet and culture of the mountain or jazz it up with exciting excursions- the beach, unique Santa Cruz and Monterey shopping, local attractions, nightlife, UC Santa Cruz, and miles of hiking/biking trails. 2 private bedrooms/ bathrooms and decks, a semi-private living room, breakfast nook and dining room, and a shared kitchen. Let us share this awesome place with you!

The space
The floor plan of our home enables you to experience your own private "family/group vacation" home: private entrance, use of two bedrooms/bathrooms, a living room/TV, laundry, deck, the full size kitchen (shared with host), and your own breakfast nook. A formal dining area which seats 8 is available to you if requested ahead of time. Brian and I simply stay in the other section of the home most of the time. There is also plenty of room to park in our driveway.
neighborhood_overview: We live within 5 minutes of great walking/hiking trails and within 20 minutes of unbelievably beautiful state parks,  beaches,  fun and funky mountain communities and of course, Santa Cruz with its unique vibe. The Santa Cruz and Monterey Bay areas have too many attractions to name... just ask us  and we can give you all kinds of options depending on what you love to do! We truly live in an amazing place.  And if you desire to drive a bit further, San Jose and the whole Silicon Valley is an hour away and within 2 hours you could be gazing at the Golden Gate Bridge in that special city called San Francisco!
host_about: I moved from Silicon Valley area in 2016 to the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains with Brian, my husband of 39 years:)   We are both psychotherapists and instructors; Brian of psychology students and I of art/watercolor novices!  In addition to supporting our guests/clients/students we love hiking, the arts of all kinds, the beach, time with friends and family, traveling to Hawaii and the Sierras and being with our two grown sons when we can.  Above all we are grateful for the blessing of living where we do and it gives us great joy to share it with guests and friends!  Welcome!

The space
Enjoy a BBQ and cocktail on the balcony with a view of the ocean and the Boardwalk!
This is a 3 story unit with entry, garage and laundry on the first floor, bedrooms on the second floor and living room, dining room and full bath on the third floor. The high ceilings Make it really open and spacious.
Brand new quartz counter tops and mew cabinets in kitchen and both bathrooms. Master bathroom shower also remodeled with quartz.
The kitchen is fully equipped and the dining table seats 6.
There are TV's in the living room and the master bedroom.
Utilities and wifi are included.
There is 1 spot in the garage for parking, and one spot in the driveway.

name: Ocean-View Paradise w/ Hot Tub, 1 Block to Beach
description:
Just a 3-minute walk from the ocean, this 3BR/2BA Santa Cruz home puts coastal attractions on your doorstep. Explore dozens of beaches, 50+ wine tasting rooms, world-class surf spots, dining, hiking trails, and sunset bay tours close to home. Sleeps 8.

The space
Live the ultimate Santa Cruz beach life! This expansive corner home is snuggled just one block off of West Cliff Drive and directly across the street from Lighthouse Field State Park. The entire house faces the park and the ocean, bringing abundant nature and sparkling views of Monterey Bay into nearly every room. Your neighbors here are the seals, otters, sea lions, dolphins, whales, seabirds, and Monarch butterflies that live in the butterfly sanctuary across the street.

Minutes from home, you can explore Santa Cruz Surfing Museum, hit downtown shops, or enjoy a steam-powered train tour on the Roaring Camp Railroad. With endless dining options, sunset bay tours, world-class surfing spots, do
neighborhood_overview:
One block from the surfer statue and the magic of Cypress Point, this spacious home is the closest house to Lighthouse Beach and the world-famous surf breaks of Steamer Lane. It is also an easy walk to Cowells, hailed as the best place to learn to surf in North America!

Enjoy a leisurely 15-minute walk to Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk -- one of dozens of beaches in the local area. Relax on the sand or play arcade games, and then stroll down Santa Cruz Wharf for seafood restaurants and beach shops. Soak in a sunset stroll along the cliff path back to this great vacation home.

THE TURNKEY ADVANTAGE

Your vacation rental is TurnKey Rental Certified. All photos, calendar, and rates are 100% accurate. We will notify you proactively when early check-in and/or late check-out are possible. You'll receive the comforts of home with a starter supply of shampoo, soaps, paper products and hotel-quality towels and linens.

We make it easy to stay with us!

We’re a bunch of passionate travel professionals creating extraordinary experiences for you … Every Home. Every Stay. Every Time.℠ That’s our promise. From easy check in with our digital locks on all homes, to our local, in-market teams available 24/7, we are here to ensure your needs are taken care of. And we know that a clean home makes for a happy stay. That’s why we maintain a 93% guest satisfaction rating of cleanliness upon check in. This is all part of how our team won the Travel Weekly Magellan Award for Vacation Rental Hospitality. Selecting a TurnKey property, you can truly relax and know you’ve made the right vacation rental decision for your travel needs. TurnKey is truly the smarter way to vacation rental.℠

name: Stillpoint Los Gatos
description:
The guest house is located at 2200' on the original site of Stillpoint with amazing mountain top views. Wildlife is everywhere with walking trails around the 4 acre property. Sunrise and moon rises are amazing. You will be staying where Gia-Fu Feng and Jane English translated the original work of LAO TSU in the 6th century TAO TE CHING or Simply be. from (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

The space
Located 12 minutes from downtown Los Gatos and 25 minutes to Santa Cruz. There are 2 homes on this property with Mature Madrones, Douglas Fir, Maple, and Black Oak. This site has fog, sun, wind, calm and lots of natural beauty.

Guest access
Your access will be to the guest house and the paths around the property. Including a rope swing and large net suspended in the trees.

Other things to note
Be ready for some crickets at night.

name: Elegant Small Farm Getaway in the Mountains
description:
THIS IS A NON-SMOKING PROPERTY. Our studio is NOT APPROPRIATE FOR MORE THAN 2 ADULTS AND 2 SMALL CHILDREN. Plz be aware that we are 25 minutes out of town in the Santa Cruz Mountains but only about 12 minutes off of Hwy 17. Please do not book your stay here and then leave an unfavorable review in regards to location. If you want to be in the mountains, then this is a great place, if not, please don't book.

The space
Please join us on our small working farm. We live in the Santa Cruz Mountains about 25 minutes out of town off of Hwy 17 (you can get into town by taking the back roads-please do not penalize us in a review process for our location, only book because you want to be in the mountains off the beaten path). If you love animals and don't mind the farm life, then please be our guest in our comfy, elegant, well-designed studio with a touch of class and elegance. Inside you will find a large flat-screen TV with a DVD player and dish network channels, a
neighborhood_overview: We live on a private road on a ridge line.  It is a great road for walks.
host_about: Hello and thank you for considering us.  We take great pride in providing exceptional accommodations and we always feel tremendous honor when someone chooses to spend their hard-earned dollars on our place.  It is a privilege to serve our guests and if you are reading this, we hope you come and visit.

description:
LIVE CAPITOLA'S DREAM IN THIS FULLY FURNISHED GEM OF A CONDO starting April 1st, monthly basis. It is a home away-from-home, cozy, clean and peaceful. Bring your suitcase. I provide the rest.

STUNNING CENTRAL CALIFORNIA COAST Location!
This condo is only a short walk to Ocean Cliffs, Surfing Spots, biking, quaint village, all shops, movies, gym, restaurants . It is also 10 minutes to downtown Santa Cruz/30 minutes to Monterey/40 minutes to Carmel/1 hour to Big Sur/1 hour and half to SF!

The space
MUST-SEE
There is an amazing Q size Tempurrpedic bed, home office with desk in the second bedroom and sofa pullout for second bedroom. WIFI, cozy living room, bright, comfortable dining room and clean / bright kitchen equipped with everything you could imagine. + Small Outdoor Patio with sun and shade among greenery and flowers for sipping coffee, wine or just reading among the serenity of the bubbling fountain.

*no cats, no dogs, no sm
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
The condo is literally half a block down the street from Whole Foods, Dharma's, one block from New Leaf Market, Spa Fitness, the Movies, 5-10 minute walk to Opal Cliff beach, the Point, Marine Sanctuary Scenic Ocean Promenade and to the Capitola village filled with restaurants, wine bars, beach in the opposite direction. name: Cozy & Sunny 2-bedroom cottage in Seabright
description:
Conveniently located in a sunny and peaceful midtown residential neighborhood an easy walk to Seabright restaurants*** , beaches, and the harbor; close to downtown. Pretty and comfortable with wood floors, a patio for dining, a great kitchen with new appliances, direct TV + Roku. Great for friends and families--can accommodate 6 if 1 person takes loft bed.

The space
A block away from Midtown shops and restaurants. Easy walk to downtown and to Seabright Beach. Comfortable house with brand new mattresses on beds and additional memory foam topper for sofa bed.

Guest access
Access south side of house through private gate using 4 digit code. Full use of main section of house includes living room, dining room, kitchen with nook, two bedrooms, patio with wicker table and small grill, string lights for night time.

Other things to note
Self-check in. Will contact guests with code for entry gate before their arrival.
neighborhood_overview: The Seabright Neighborhood, known for its sea breezes and sunshine,  is considered one of the more desirable locations in Santa Cruz as it is close to everything while being, at the same time, quiet, friendly, and residential. Soquel, its main Midtown avenue, with the addition of several very good restaurants and night spots, is fast becoming a local upscale trend setter.  Grocery shopping is a treat with two popular well-stocked, local groceries within easy walking distance--the Staff of Life Natural Foods and Shopper's Corner (two of Santa Cruz' favorites)--as well as a Whole Foods a block away.  A great way to start the day is a walk west on Soquel to The Buttery for pastries and coffee on their patio or straight down Seabright toward the ocean to Linda's Seabreeze Cafe, recently voted #1 in Santa Cruz by Trip Advisor.
host_about:
I am a retired teacher who is currently enjoying reading, her garden, pets, and most of all family and friends.  Also watching a lot of great movies via Netflix--in other words, enjoying my "retired" status although I do need to put it in quotes as I, like so many of my friends, am busier than ever.  I do the occasional  substitute teaching, when I know it will be fun, and the occasional Uber driving day.  My talented and handsome grandson currently lives with me at least through his freshman year of college.  The piano in the living room is his and he has a passion for music. We live in a separate area of the house that is attached to the back but with its own entry on the right or north side.  
I enjoy entertaining and look forward to combining this with business as an Airbnb host.  The main section of the house, where my daughter and her family used to live, belongs to the guests for the length of their stay.  I occasionally cook something in the big house oven but will give you plenty of notice before I come in and notice should I have guests. The outbuildings you see in the photo on the backyard show my living space with deck and also two small bungalows (sheds actually) which are my art studio and my grandson's music studio. 
Oh, and I enjoy travel and plan to avail myself of airbnb on my next trip.  Sue

name: Redwood Pine House in Mt. Hermon
description:
Redwood Pine House has a two bedroom, one bath main house. The front deck has outdoor chairs and end tables, so you can enjoy your coffee outside in the morning, or enjoy the coolness of the evening.

There's a private patio in the back, with seating for 6.

The space
Our home is a warm and inviting space in the heart of the Redwoods. Our home has both indoor and outdoor spaces to read, play games, enjoy meals and relax. The guest house provides added privacy for two, and many an adult friend has enjoyed the comfortable bunk beds! The kitchen is well-stocked with dishes, pots, pans and utensils, and the Weber BBQ in the back patio grills up terrific fish and steaks. We love our home and hope you enjoy it too!

Guest access
The Santa Cruz Boardwalk is a short 20-minute drive down the hill, and there's tons of hiking and biking trails all around our house. There's Redwood Canopy Tours down the street that has awesome Zipline tou
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is quiet and the neighbors are lovely.  You'll meet and greet people walking the streets, enjoying the trails and shopping in downtown Felton.  There's a great organic market, New Leaf, plus a large Safeway and CVS Pharmacy for your convenience. Felton's Farmer's market has the finest produce and flowers available; open Tuesdays starting in May; ends in October. The Cremer House restaurant and bar is a local favorite, as is Sushi San and the Cowboy Bar & Grill.  There's lots to do in and around Mt. Hermon, and the Santa Cruz Boardwalk is a quick 20 minute drive down the hill.
host_about: Tim and I live in Manhattan Beach and our two daughters went to University of Wyoming.   Kim has been coming to camps at Mt. Hermon since she was in third grade, and we've continued that tradition with our family.  Tim and I enjoy North Lake Tahoe and we just went to Paris France and London with our daughters.  And yes, we stayed in (Hidden by Airbnb) s.  Loved it!  Which inspired us to try Airbnb.  We loved the homes, how well they were taken care of by the owners, and we loved living in the area versus a hotel.  Hope you like Redwood Pine House as much as we do!

name: Beautiful Hide-away in the Redwoods
description:
Welcome to one of Earth's most amazing locations! Sun, calming oaks/ redwoods and the milky way to gaze at: Come relax, enjoy the culture of the mountain or jazz it up with day trips to local beaches and all they offer, visit the Monterey Bay Aquarium, check out unique Santa Cruz shopping and nightlife venues, or UC Santa Cruz. Head into the forest of Big Basin to walk and hike; everywhere you look there is an experience waiting for you, let us share this fantastic place with you!

The space
The bedroom is large enough to accommodate 1-2 air mattresses in addition to the Queen bed if needed (provided for an extra fee).

There is consistent WIFI throughout the home/bedrooms due to an added WFI extender.

Guest access
As we have 2 bedrooms in our home available for guests, you may be sharing the living room, kitchen and breakfast nook and large deck with another guest. You will probably see us in the kitchen at times to
neighborhood_overview: We live within 5 minutes of great walking/hiking trails and within 30 minutes of unbelievably beautiful state parks,  beaches,  fun and funky mountain communities and of course, Santa Cruz with its unique vibe.   Within one hour you can be in Monterey/Carmel or San Jose/Silicon Valley and within 2 hours, San Francisco!  Use our home as a "base" for adventures and spend your money on fun vs. an expensive urban hotel room  AND you get to experience the Milky Way and the singing crickets:)
host_about: I moved from Silicon Valley area in 2016 to the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains with Brian, my husband of 39 years:)   We are both psychotherapists and instructors; Brian of psychology students and I of art/watercolor novices!  In addition to supporting our guests/clients/students we love hiking, the arts of all kinds, the beach, time with friends and family, traveling to Hawaii and the Sierras and being with our two grown sons when we can.  Above all we are grateful for the blessing of living where we do and it gives us great joy to share it with guests and friends!  Welcome!

description:
In the heart of the Capitola Village, next to Pacific Ocean, there is a secret place that you can call home while on vacation, yet never lift a finger. We are offering a magical experience for you, your family and your friends. Imagine having 10 Bedrooms, 10 bathrooms and a common space with concierge services, restaurants across the Esplanade, activities for everyone and free parking for 10 cars! We can't wait to host you!
Calendar is not up to date - Must Request Dates.

The space
We are a tiny boutique hotel in the heart of the Capitola Village and we invite you to experience our entire property as your own. We have onsite staff serving breakfast in the morning and offering help for reservations for everything else. Our housekeeping team will service your room daily and ensure you have fresh towels and amenities so you never run out.

Guest access
Our guests have access to our lobby/lounge area as well as our beautiful courtyard. Pa
neighborhood_overview: The Capitola Village is a 2 block seaside village located about an hour south of San Francisco.  We are directly on the Pacific Ocean and within the village you will find restaurants, shops and activities such as paddle boarding, surfing, fishing and kayaking.
host_about: Our beautifully furnished, boutique hotel is located in the heart of the Capitola Village.  We are family owned and operated and our passion is delighting our guests!  We offer a continental breakfast, afternoon cookies and tea and weekend wine and cheese service, all included with your stay!  If you are looking for the perfect destination next to the Pacific Ocean, look no further!

name: Beach Cottage located blocks from the beach at Pleasure Point, Santa Cruz!
description:
This one bedroom cottage is located in the desirable Pleasure Point area to the east of Santa Cruz; a bustling, booming little beach zone suitable for old and young alike!

The space
Ideally situated just one block from the beach, this Pleasure Point cottage comes fully furnished. The kitchen is equipped with all of the basic appliances, including a gas stove, microwave, electric coffee pot, dishes and cookware. The bedroom has a queen-size bed complete with fresh linens. The bathroom has a shower with towels and soap. Please note, the living room lounge area and bed are in one big open room with sliders leading to private backyard. The kitchen and dining room are in a separate room.

Nice size cottage with lots of sunshine, space, and privacy, just please note the bed and tv area are in the same room :)

All of the utilities, cable TV, Wi-Fi, laundry room, gardener, barbecue and picnic table are provided.

This attached cottage has
neighborhood_overview: Begin your day by strolling along Opal Cliffs. Watch surfers challenge the waves; listen to the pounding surf while the sea gulls call from overhead; inhale the fresh ocean air while you sip a cup of hot coffee at the corner deli and consider your options. Northern California coastal communities are vibrant with activities and opportunities to explore from Camel by the Sea to San Francisco. All are easily discoverable from this Pleasure Point getaway. For starters, the surf is 2 blocks from the front door. The Boardwalk amusement park is about 2 miles. Santa Cruz County has 29 miles of beaches to explore: Cowell's Beach, Steamer Lane, (a favorite surfing spot), Twin Beach, and Castle Beach, are all near the Santa Cruz Wharf. Driving south from Pleasure Point Cottage, you will find Manresa Beach, La Selva, Capitola Beach, Seacliff Beach (sunken cement ship), Seascape Beach, and Sunset Beach (romance). Driving North look for the Santa Cruz Harbor (great place for breakfast, lunch or dinn
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my wonderful family.

description:
Shake off your shoes and walk barefoot over smooth hardwood floors and lush carpets at sunny Casa Tropicale' - a lovely vintage cottage near Capitola Beach, dining and shops. Enjoy peaceful, private garden areas, tropical décor, huge sunny windows. Not suitable for children under 12. Please no smoking, no pets. 2 week minimum. Close to all Capitola offers. Groceries 2 blocks away. $75 final cleaning fee. If renting more than 3 weeks $175 extra covers cleaning twice monthly during longer stays.

The space
Gaze through huge windows to lush gardens. Enjoy privacy in most spaces. This cottage is small yet there are many areas to enjoy - separate dining, beautiful bedroom, daybed in the living room, two desk areas.

Guest access
Entire home.

Other things to note
Must love Hummingbirds !
neighborhood_overview: Upper Capitola Village is a quaint area enjoyed by walkers and bikers, and garden gazers. Usually parking is easy and all neighbors very friendly.
host_about: We are a yoga teacher/realtor and master woodworker in Northern California and love to travel and explore.  We own rental properties and manage two for clients, so appreciate all efforts involved in managing rentals. description:
Walk to the beach! Beautiful Mediterranean style home. Close to everything in Santa Cruz. 3 Bedrooms with an extra bonus room that has 4 bunks for kids & a fridge. 2 full bathrooms and another half bath in the living area. Nice deck with BBQ and OCEAN VIEW. HUGE smart 4K TV with Blu-ray and DVD player, WiFi, cable, awesome fireplace and a great kitchen with dining room. All new furnishings. Very clean, peaceful and comfortable. Short walk to beach via Beachgate Dr. Great for 1-2 families.

Listen to the waves as you sleep. BBQ on the deck and look at the ocean. Plenty of entertainment on the giant 4k TV. Great space for cooking and dining. Beautiful architecture and comfortable all new furnishings.

Entire house and garage. Parking for 3 cars in driveway. Ocean view deck with BBQ.

name: Redwood Riverfront Getaway
description:
Awesome find! We are nestled in the beautiful California coastal redwood forest directly next to the San Lorenzo River. Our guests can enjoy our private guest suite with its own entrance and full bathroom. Our two acre property features tall trees, seasonal river swimming on our private beach, fishing, kayaking, and exploring. We are 90 seconds from Downtown Boulder Creek, minutes away from incredible Santa Cruz mountain wine tasting, hiking, fine dining, and the coastline.

SCC Permit #181307

The space
The space is a small guest suite attached to the main house. The guest suite comes with a living room area with large flat screen TV and entertainment system, full bath, and small bedroom with a queen bed. Our guest suite is cozy and meant for 2 guests only. neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet mountain community on the main highway about .6 miles away from the center of town.

name: Just Breathe @ the Pacific Looking Glass RDM Beach
description:
CZU Lightning Complex Evacuees Welcome! Sheltered from the west winds off the sunny north shore of the Monterey Bay, the Pacific Ocean is the panoramic view of this spacious one bedroom beach condo. Breathe in the sea air, pour a glass of wine and watch the sea come to life with a toast to a lovely sunset. Then walk to one of the areas best restaurants or create your own gourmet dinner using the fully equipped kitchen or outdoor grill. Wrap up your evening stargazing on the deck.

The space
The open floor plan (over 900 sq. ft.) is classically furnished, an elegant inviting space for relaxing while appreciating the beauty of the Pacific Ocean. Perfect for couples and small families. You'll find plenty of seating to enjoy the sunrises, stunning sunsets and nightly stargazing on the full deck. The restored Cape Cod styled kitchen is fully equipped for cooking and outdoor grilling. Dine on the fabulous deck while watching the dolphins, whales and sea life frolic in t
neighborhood_overview:
IN THE BEST POSSIBLE LOCATION…

Perfectly located on the Pacific Ocean halfway between Santa Cruz and the Carmel Valley on the Monterey, Peninsula. The characteristic surfing, fishing village of Rio Del Mar is just 1 block away. Rio Del Mar State Beach is connected to the North to Seacliff State Beach and New Brighton State Beach, and to the South, Platform and Hidden Beach. Within 2 miles from grocery stores, restaurants, gas stations, golf course, tennis court, and much more! Take a short drive to many other local villages, beaches, numerous hiking and biking areas such as Capitola by the Sea, the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Nisene Marks State Park, The Land of the Medicine Buddha, Elkhorn Slough, the Monterey Bay Aquarium and to countless other sights and activities. Walk the paved mile path known as the ‘Rio Walk’ past the Palo Alto, Cement Boat on Seacliff Beach towards New Brighton Beach for your daily exercise. name: Walk to downtown Santa Cruz & Boardwalk
description:
This is a short term rental between 1 and 6 months.
This home is in a very convenient location, walking distance to Downtown Santa Cruz, the Beach Boardwalk, and just a short drive to UCSC.
Recently remodeled home, very light and bright!

The space
The entry level has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and the laundry room. Updated vinyl flooring, carpet and quarts in the bathroom.
Upstairs you will find the kitchen, living room/dining room, 1.5 bathrooms, master bedroom and the office which can be used as a fourth bedroom.
This home has an open concept floor plan. High ceilings in the living room, lots of windows and skylights to let the Santa Cruz sunshine in!
Kitchen has been remodeled with quartz counter tops and stainless steel appliances.
The yard is fully fenced with a lawn. Perfect for families. Students may be a possibility, limited to 4, inquire about rates.

Guest access
You will have access to all the spaces.
neighborhood_overview: Very nice Downtown neighborhood. You are close to many things. The beaches, W. Cliff Dr., downtown, and the west side shopping also.
host_about: We are a property management company, helping a few owners with there Vacation Rentals in the beautiful Santa Cruz area. Heather is your contact person.

name: The East Room @ Redwood Croft
description:
In the Santa Cruz Mountain environs of UCSC, we are above North Coast beaches, surrounded by lush coastal redwoods and rural quiet. "Town" is a short drive - restaurants, pubs, entertainment.

The space
Redwood circles, songbirds, lawns, verandahs, hammocks, starry skies.
In-Room microwave/mini fridge/coffee maker. Indoor Roman Tub, high ceilings, and wood-burning stove, with Private Entrance, and Queen Bed. Pet-friendly. We are very Green-conscious in all that we do.

Guest access
You have a private room with Bath and Patio to yourselves. Enjoy the property's Verandah, native gardens and meadow. Birdwatch, Listen to Nature's Chorus, Jump on the Trampoline, and play Ping Pong.
neighborhood_overview: No sidewalks, but plenty of beautiful walks.  The "center" of our Neighborhood is the country school and church - school bell chimes through the arbors on weekdays.  On Sunday Morning, the little Church bell calls. 2 mi walk to the Beauregard Vineyards and tasting room.  Close by Bonny Doon Ecological Reserve is 200 acres of both easy and challenging hikes.
host_about:
I am artistically inclined, in fact the property is my "canvas" -- I am very dedicated to living with respect for nature, and  admire brilliance wherever I  see it. I have worked with a jazz trio as a singer around Santa Cruz.  I love dogs for the amazing qualities they've developed through eons of living close to humankind.  I am married to Dale, and we have raised 3 children.  
-- I get a kick out of people having a good time at our place, interested in such a variety of things, coming together serendipitously at Redwood Croft.  Of course, quiet retreats are invited, too. This could be my motto:  "Stay open; Stay responsible."

The yard is a botanical pleasure, spacious and private. There is a new, virtually chemical-free hot tub.
Enjoy wine tasting; surfing; cycling; walking trails, beaches & tide pools!

Dogs under 40 lbs considered. The property is fully fenced in and the house has an entry door for dogs.

name: Santa Cruz Beach Getaway - 3Bed 2Bath
description:
A super location for visiting Santa Cruz and the Monterey Bay! Just a 10 min walk to the beautiful Sunny Cove Beach at end of 17th Ave. Central to Santa Cruz and Capitola for all your needs! The home has been recently remodeled for your comfort and stylishly outfitted for you to have the best vacation ever! We would love to host you so please let us know if you have any questions!

The space
Santa Cruz Beach Getaway is a wonderful family oasis in the middle of everything. You have easy access to shops, coffee, beach and a direct line to Hwy 1. Located 1 mile is the Santa Cruz Harbor, 2.5 miles to Capitola Beach Downtown and the Boardwalk. This home is totally renovated - You will love the gourmet kitchen with new cabinets and appliances, tile floors and granite counters for making meals. When its time to get some rest you are sure to sleep like a baby with luxurious bedding, double-paned windows and solid doors. Beautiful original Hardwood oak floors caress your
neighborhood_overview: Live Oak Santa Cruz is a great blend of commercial, residential, and recreational establishments. You will find a great number of entertaining things to do during your stay. Just take a walk!
host_about: I have been a Vacation Property Manager for Beach and Bays Vacation and Real Estate Services here in Santa Cruz Co. since 2013. Hosting Vacation rentals is my passion and maintaining a perfect balance between guest experience and owner satisfaction is my main objective. A mom with 2 teen age kids and 1 giant Newfoundland keep me on my toes but don't worry, your home will be in great care when I am in charge!  Looking forward to meeting  with you!

name: BEACH! Views! Surf! DOG Friendly!
description:
Ocean Views-Steps to beach. Proximity ideal to Capitola, SC Boardwalk and surfing. Walk to dine and coffee. Gas BBQ, add’l dining and Ping Pong on the back deck. Conversation fire pit and views on the front deck. 2 Bikes. Corn hole, Far infrared Sauna. 4 Park spaces. Wifi, Smart Samsung flat screen tv’s in every room, Netflix and Amazon Prime. We are complimented most on our location to everything. Beds are divine. Pet friendly beach 4 doors down. No other Airbnb or hotel can match.

The space
Highly desired neighborhood. Pedestrian Beach Access 4 doors down with room for 4 cars. Great surfer beach known mostly to locals. Very Dog friendly. Situated perfectly between Capitola and the Santa Cruz harbor and boardwalk which are easily accessed on bike. Walk to Capitola 41st area with new brewery and sidewalk dining. Bike trail 2 houses away takes you all along Pleasure Point area with surfers galore! Views from Upper level great room and front deck. HUGE
neighborhood_overview: This highly desired beach neighborhood on 26th has long been our favorite, so to be able to live here and share it with others is a dream come true.  The home is full of sunlight and views of the ocean. And certainly close enough to hear the waves.  It's a very popular local surfing beach with majestic large waves in the winter months.  If you're a surfer, it's a dream spot and even if you're not, it's great entertainment.  Sunsets are incredible here.  The front deck is large with views and has a 3 door wide opening into the family great room with an open floor plan.  It also opens to a huge back deck with BBQ, extra dining space and a ping pong table.  The master opens up to an enclosed backyard.  It's centrally located with easy day trips to Carmel and Monterey or head north to explore the Coastline up highway 1.  Bike trails are everywhere going to charming Capitola Village or the Santa Cruz harbor which boasts the well known Crow's Nest restaurant for its dining and views.  Being
host_about: Happily married, empty nesters in mid 50’s.  We had a 15 year plan to become permanent residents in the Santa Cruz area after a lifetime growing up in Silicon Valley.  Which we accomplished on time just 4 years ago.  Living just doors from the beach with ocean views is a dream come true and something I cherish everyday.  My 8.5 year old golden lab plays a big role in our everyday beach life.  As the beach we live at is by far the best around for a non crowded beach and great dog fun. What I love:  exploring where I live which encompasses the great outdoors in so many ways.  New restaurants and fine dining.  Being of service to others and small get togethers with meaningful conversation.  Photography, catching life unexpected.  Quality time with family and friends.  And more then almost anything, is a good hearty laugh!

name: Sea Forever~ Oceanfront Home in Pleasure Point!
description:
Oceanside and unobstructed views from this beach house. This property offers the quintessential Cali surf vacation! With four bedrooms & three bathrooms, this property is located in the desirable Pleasure Point area to the east of Santa Cruz: a booming, bustling beach zone.

The space
A four bedroom oceanfront house. This home is perfect for large gatherings on the beach. Come enjoy the best surf & sunsets in Santa Cruz!

Guest access
The entire home is for your use.
neighborhood_overview:
Oceanview and surf-side - this house offers the quintessential California surf vacation! The property is located in the desirable Pleasure Point area to the east of Santa Cruz; a bustling, booming little beach zone suitable for old and young alike.

Pleasure Point is a charming Californian coastal hub with a thriving surf scene! A range of reef and beach breaks can be found along the pleasant Pacific stretch that Pleasure Point dominates, from the outskirts of Santa Cruz down to the pier at Capitola. All culinary tastes are catered for with a whole host of international dining options, and from the dog-friendly beaches to the commercial and entertainment sectors, Pleasure Point provides all the benefits of the quintessential California life.
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

name: 26Th Ave Family Beach House Steps to the Sand&Surf
description:
This house was custom built by the owners. It has maple hardwood floors vaulted ceilings throughout the entire home. There is an open floor plan throughout the living and kitchen area. We live in a great neighborhood that is centrally located to everything but not in the middle of the touristy areas one block up from 26Th Ave beach. Guests get to enjoy the wonderful community feel in our neighborhood during their stay.
During the Summer months there is a five day minimum stay requirement.

The space
The house has assortment of bikes, beach toys, chairs, wetsuits and Boogie boards. Many children toys and books in the garage as well as highchair and baby jogger.

Guest access
The entire property

Other things to note
During the Summer months from Memorial day to Labor day there is a five day minimum stay requirement.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is very friendly. Most of our neighbors have lived here for many years and we all know each other. We gather for sunsets and sunrises regularly.
We ride bikes and walk to most places. The house is in a great location very desirable area.
host_about: I've lived in Santa Cruz since 1987  originally from SoCal. I love being outdoors gardening, running, yoga, outrigger paddling, playing at the beach, sailing and I especially enjoy traveling to warm exotic places with white sand and clear warm water to swim in. We custom built the rental house for ourselves and lived in it for eight years when we then moved into the house that we built next-door to the rental. We maintain the rental ourselves and are close by if anything is needed.

name: Mountain Top Yurt in the Redwoods
description:
Peaceful, clean, spacious, beautifully decorated and quiet 24' Yurt completely surrounded by Redwoods on top of the Santa Cruz Mountains. Spend a couple days meditating, reading or writing the next chapter of your memoir. Walking distance to Mount Madonna Retreat Center (temporarily closed). County Park hiking and horseback riding trails located within 3 miles. Ideal place for photography and mountain/road biking. Please check us out on Instagram @mountaintopyurt.

The space
Covid-19 UPDATE:

So what are we doing to help mitigate the risks of COVID-19? For starters our professional cleaners know what they’re doing and pay attention to the important details of human cross-contamination. They pay close attention to all touch points in the yurt (door knobs, cabinet pulls, faucets, remote controls etc) disinfecting them as their last step in the cleaning procedure. Additionally, we’re providing the same disinfecting supplies for guests, so they can have that
neighborhood_overview:
Remote and rural mountaintop setting. Wild turkeys, deer, and peacocks often roam free along Summit Rd. Nearest town 15 minutes away. Walk less than a mile from the property to a panoramic view of Morgan Hill and the Diablo Range “viewpoint.” Kim Son Buddhist Monastery, within walking distance (closed until further notice for construction). Mount Madonna Retreat Center with unobstructed views overlooking the Monterey Bay, less than 2 miles away; Ocean View Bookstore, a beautiful Cafè, gardens and orchards, free yoga classes, massages, Ayurvedic consultations, and an Ayurveda health store located at Mount Madonna Center (closed until May 1). Horseback riding available at Mount Madonna Stables, less than 4 miles away. Hundreds of hiking trails in the Redwoods at Mount Madonna County Park, less than 4 miles away and Niscene Marks Forest, less that 20 minutes away)

Mt Madonna Cafè hours - vary by season ( currently closed )
Monday CLOSED
Tuesday - Friday 9am-10am;
host_about: I am semi-retired and enjoy teaching yoga, playing music, and traveling.

name: The Beach house
description:
This traditional 2 bedroom beach house is cozy and comfortable. Located in the desirable Pleasure Point Area. You can walk to the beach, surf the point or watch the sunset from the beautiful cliffs! Just 3 miles to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk! Experience Santa Cruz from this world renowned surf location and one of the most popular local surf spots! Our street is a popular street. There will be some car noise and people walking/ bicycling to the beach!

The space
The Beach house is small but cozy. Its full of sunshine with fresh sea air! Located in a friendly neighborhood just 3/4 of a mile to the ocean! It has a private yard with a sweet garden that provides privacy. Perfect to enjoy your morning coffee.
One bedroom sleeps two in a queen size Nova gel memory foam bed. The second bedroom Sleeps two in a full size bed. The couch also pulls out into a full size bed.
There is one parking space on the left side of driveway and additional free parking
neighborhood_overview:
Pleasure point is a small beach community. A world renowned surf spot. Home to the inventor of the wetsuit, “ Jack O’Neil “. Location of the movie “ Chasing Mavericks”
The Beach house sits 3/4 of a mile from the Beach. It’s a nice walk through the neighborhood to the end of the street where it dead ends at East Cliff Dr. which is a popular walking path along the ocean cliffs where you can watch the surfers. When the tide is out there are several small beach areas.
There are several great restaurants along 41st Ave and Portola Dr. all within a mile.
There is a New Leaf Market, and Whole Foods market, Trader Joe’s, lots of shopping, movie theatre and 2 different fitness centers all within a mile.
There is a nice park a couple blocks away with basketball, tennis courts, and children’s play area.
Just a little further away at approximately 1.7 miles to the south is the Capitola village. A sweet little beach with fun shops.
The Santa

Im a Santa Cruz Native.  I enjoy the outdoors, traveling, music and good food! I often find myself traveling for music and adventure! 
  I love animals and have horses, husky dogs and chickens. I like to hike or ride the many trails in our local county and national parks.

A generational getaway in the heart of Mount Hermon for families or friends to relax, retreat and make memories. Stay here and enjoy a gorgeous creek in your backyard, the fragrances of fresh pine and bay trees and winding trails through the Redwoods. We hope that you have a pleasant stay.

neighborhood_overview: Mount Hermon is a small town that grew around an old Conference Center started in 1906. Mount Hermon is full of small trails, tight roads, wonderful redwoods and beautiful, hidden byways and sanctuaries. If you're here on a weekend or during summer make sure to check in with Registration to see when the coffee shop, book store, and soda fountain are open for guests!
host_about: We love people and traveling. We run a ministry called Soul-Care, helping people find rest for their souls. With one-on-one appointments, group sessions, custom weekend retreats, and resources, we create space for people to take notice of their heart and be intentionally involved on their journey of growth in any area of life. We love the outdoors, drinking tea, reading, learning, and adventures.

name: Gorgeous private suite w/hot tub, walk to beach.
description:
Our guest suite is on the lower floor of our house in a quiet neighborhood, and is a 15 minute walk and 5 minute drive to a beautiful beach. There are two restaurants 3 blocks from our house, both have views of the ocean and outdoor seating. The suite has a bedroom with a king size bed and closet; also a private bathroom and den. Den is equipped with refrigerator, coffee maker, flat screen RokuTV, and microwave. Patio has gas fire pit, small deck, and hot tub.

The space
Newly remodeled completely private suite on the first floor of our home in Rio Del Mar. Walk to Seascape Beach. Short drive to wine tasting, hikes in the redwoods, and Santa Cruz, 40 minute drive to Monterey Bay Aquarium, hour and 15 drive to Big Sur. We live upstairs and the suite is the downstairs. We have a small 10 year old terrier named Phoebe that barks when people arrive but we will keep her barking to a minimum. She won't be allowed in suite or yard unless you request to be introduced. We
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is very quiet and safe and you can hear the ocean from our house, fairly often. There are many beautiful walks you can take from our location to the beach or the hills behind our neighborhood with spectacular views of Monterey Bay and the surrounding area. Also we are very close to Nisene Marks State Park which offers beautiful hikes. And we are about a 10-15 minute drive from Capitola, which has great restaurants and a beautiful beach area and village.
host_about: My husband and I love where we live.  My husband is an electrical contractor and I work at our local hospital, so when we’re not working we love to walk on the beach with our dog and go to the farmer’s market on Saturdays. We have our favorite restaurants that we go to on the weekends with our friends and family. We discovered Airbnb last year as travelers to visit our son and daughter-in-law and granddaughters and loved it. We enjoy meeting new people so Airbnb is a good fit for us. And now as hosts we feel like we can offer a great location to fellow travelers.

name: Walk from Casita de Capitola #1 down to the beach of Capitola by the Sea!
description:
This modern and newly remodeled one bedroom apartment lies on the hill above of Capitola village, a quaint California resort town.

The space
This apartment offers the quintessential seaside experience of coastal Cali; with all the amenities necessary to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible!

The property is located within walking distance of Capitola village and its scenic wharf, its charming shops, award-winning restaurants and assorted pubs – only a short distance from 41st Ave’s malls and services too!

Capitola is an historic and atmospheric little coastal town with plenty of surf spots, boutique shops and a whole host of commercial and entertainment outlets for young and old alike. The town is flourishing yet retains its distinctive and quaint character, beloved by families, dog-walkers and surfers.
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. name: A beach cottage located in the desirable Pleasure Point, Santa Cruz!
description:
The Driftwood Cottage is set in one of California's most desirable surf scenes! A lovely stretch of surf-centric coastline and a comfortable cottage perfect for surfers, adventurists or snowbirds alike!

The space
This 3 bedroom cottage is fully furnished. The kitchen is equipped with all of the basic appliances, including a gas stove, microwave, electric coffee pot, dishes and cookware. The bedrooms have a queen-size and twin beds complete with fresh linens. The bathroom has a shower with towels and soap. All of the utilities, cable TV, Wi-Fi, laundry room, gardener, barbecue and patio table/chairs are provided.

There are also adult cruiser bikes for you to explore the Pleasure Point and Capitola neighborhoods. Yes, your dog is welcome too for a one-time $50 pet-fee. He/she will appreciate the fenced yard, walks throughout the dog friendly neighborhood, and the trails around the local estuary and Light House.

Guest access
The en
neighborhood_overview:
Pleasure Point is a charming Californian coastal hub with a thriving surf scene! A range of reef and beach breaks can be found along the pleasant Pacific stretch that Pleasure Point dominates, from the outskirts of Santa Cruz down to the pier at Capitola.

Begin your day by strolling along Opal Cliffs. Watch surfers challenge the waves; listen to the pounding surf while the sea gulls call from overhead; inhale the fresh ocean air while you sip a cup of hot coffee at the corner deli and consider your options.

Northern California coastal communities are vibrant with activities and opportunities to explore from Camel by the Sea to San Francisco. All are easily discoverable from this Pleasure Point getaway.

For starters, the surf is 2 blocks from the front door. The Boardwalk amusement park is about 2 miles. Santa Cruz County has 29 miles of beaches to explore: Cowell's Beach, Steamer Lane, (a favorite surfing spot), Twin Beach, and Castle Beach, are all n

The suite is adjacent to a 20 acre greenbelt - wildlife abundant-bring your camera!
