Situated in exclusive Carbonera Estates, adjacent to a 20 acre Green Belt this Home with private studio (separate entrance) is just a couple of miles from downtown Santa Cruz and the beach. Less than one mile to Scotts Valley, The Mystery Spot, Pasatiempo and DeLaveaga Courses. Approximately 5 miles from Multiversity
Centrally located, we are about a mile from highways 17 and 1.
host_about:
My husband and I are a middle aged couple with three adult children.  We have lived in our beautiful home for the past 30 years on an acre of redwood/wildlife paradise.

I am a retired CEO and  subsequent  animal shelter  executive director and my husband is a Structural Engineer.

We love family, friends (old and new), animals and travel.

name: Remote Private Mountain Suite with Hot Tub
description:
One-bedroom private floor with private entrance-including relaxing den with large leather couch, flat screen tv (Roku-Netflix/no cable) kitchenette, and private bath. Supplied with bottle of local wine and breakfast essentials. Mountain location 2.5 miles down a narrow scenic ridge-top road on 6 beautiful acres of lush vegetation and towering redwood trees. Ideal for a couple or small family looking to explore the Santa Cruz Mountains, Bay Area and coast without breaking the bank.

The space
While we are remotely nestled in the majestic Santa Cruz mountains, we are 25 minutes to San Jose, the beach, numerous state parks, and Santa Cruz. Within 15-20 minutes of dozens of wineries. 1-2 hours to San Francisco depending on traffic. 1.5 hours to Big Sur.

Equipped with small kitchenette and pre-stocked with breakfast supplies (fresh eggs from chickens on the property , coffee, english muffins), a bottle of local wine (for visitors over 21) and cooking ba
neighborhood_overview:
Rural Mountain residential setting in the redwoods. Uber is not always dependable up here. 8-12 minutes from Hwy 17, Summit Exit. (the first time you drive here, this last stretch may feel longer even though its only 2 miles). Quiet, green and scenic with limited local traffic. Private road is great for evening or morning walks.

10 minutes to the locals favorite pizza spot and 15 minutes to a nearby brewery, grocery store and wide selection of restaurants and bars in Scott’s Valley. 20 minutes to Los Gatos. Unfortunately, food delivery is not available in our area.

Within 20 minutes to more than a dozen wineries
25-30 minutes to Santa Cruz/Surfing
20 minutes to Downtown Los Gatos
23 minutes to Good Samaritan Hospital
10 minutes to Scott’s Valley
60 minutes to Monterey
90 minutes to San Francisco
20 minutes to San Jose Airport
80 minutes to SFO

name: Pleasure Point cottage located just blocks from the premiere surf beach!
description:
The property is located in the desirable Pleasure Point area to the east of Santa Cruz; a bustling, booming little beach zone suitable for old and young alike.

The space
Pleasure Point Cottage is furnished with a modern yet comfortable design.

The yard is a botanical pleasure, spacious and private. There is a BBQ and a patio table and chairs.

Enjoy wine tasting; surfing; cycling; walking trails, beaches & tide pools!

Pleasure Point is a charming Californian coastal hub with a thriving surf scene! A range of reef and beach breaks can be found along the pleasant Pacific stretch that Pleasure Point dominates, from the outskirts of Santa Cruz down to the pier at Capitola. All culinary tastes are catered for with a whole host of international dining options, and from the dog-friendly beaches to the commercial and entertainment sectors, Pleasure Point provides all the benefits of the quintessential California life.
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

name: Hiking in the Redwoods or Beach Bum? You Choose :)
description:
A private, charming studio nestled in the Santa Cruz mountains and decorated with vintage furniture from the 60's. Minutes to all the wonderful hiking trails hidden in the redwoods and a short drive to the beach!

There's a kitchen with a fridge, microwave, coffee/tea maker, sink, dishes/silverware, but there isn't an oven/stove. Two adults will fit, with a child, but there's only one queen bed. A pack 'n play or twin air mattress would limit walking space, but you're welcome to bring one.

The space
Our house is located on a private road in a quiet neighborhood minutes away from downtown Ben Lomond, Henry Cowell Redwood Forest, Roaring Camp Railroads, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, and all the other wonderful things to do in Santa Cruz!

Guest access
The studio has a private entrance and it's own parking spot in the driveway.

Other things to note
The Studio also has a TV with Amazon Prime, Hulu, and Netflix, bu
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and private. Because the road in front of the house is private property it gets very little traffic. You can sit on the bench swing all day without being disturbed. It's a great place to drink your morning coffee or tea :)
host_about: We're easy going, respectful people that love living in the mountains! Spending time outdoors, hiking, beaching, and playing with the dog are some of our top activities. Visit our beautiful area and find out why we love it so much!

name: Sandpiper by the Sea Condo - Pools Closed
description:
This condo is located in a tranquil condo community, just two blocks from the longest beach in Santa Cruz County. You can walk in either direction for a couple of miles from this beach. Closely located to Seascape Golf Course and Seascape Resort. With the Monterey Bay, Capitola, and Santa Cruz within a short drive, this location is centrally located to many fun tourist spots, hiking trails, beaches, wineries, and so much more. And, the complex has two beautiful pools to enjoy.

The space
Amenities include one private patio facing the pool, a private deck off of the kitchen, and a one car garage filled with beach fun equipment. The complex has two pools to use, March through October. Two bedrooms have ocean peaks and with the windows open, you can fall asleep listening to the waves.

Guest access
You will have access to all parts of this spacious home and the surrounding grounds. Additional parking is available on the street.

<
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood surrounding the Sandpiper complex is made up of large homes, gated communities, and other condo complexes.  It is a short two block walk to the beach and down a staircase.  If using stairs to get to the beach is a problem, you can walk through a gated community down to the beach without having to use stairs. Across the street in the opposite direction is the beautiful Seascape Golf Course.
host_about: I am an educator from the Silicon Valley.  We love to get away for quiet weekends to explore different areas.  We also host our home in Aptos, which is in a great location to get to many attractions in the Monterey Bay Area.

name: Juju Paradise: Santa Cruz Redwoods Retreat
description:
This 1200 sq ft dodecahedron (12 sided) duplex house is in the Santa Cruz redwoods. Enjoy the entire second story 2 bed/1 bath unit that is only 15 min away from Rio Del Mar State beach. You get the best of both worlds- land & sea. You get to take in spectacular views of the redwoods on the 30 acre property with over 50 meyer lemon trees.

Breathe in the redwoods. Soak in the California sun. Immerse yourself in Santa Cruz culture. A true paradise.

We look forward to your stay.

Cal & Zara

The space
*420 Friendly*
The origins of the counter culture in the sixties, the majestic redwoods, a legacy of generations of farming and caring for the land. We are at 880 foot elevation three miles inland from Monterey Bay nestled in the redwoods and oaks.

Our roots at JuJu Paradise run deep. Born and raised on this mountain a quarter mile from the paradise, our family has protected and nurtured this land.

Judy (JuJu
neighborhood_overview: Please note the general location of Juju Paradise on the map Airbnb provides. Juju Paradise is located in the Santa Cruz Mountains. Juju Paradise is beautifully private, but please note that we are about a 15 minute drive from the Rancho Del Mar shopping center (Aptos Safeway, restaurants, shopping etc.) The last portion of the drive is uphill on a curved road that can be one lane at times. While we believe that our location provides a true Santa Cruz forest paradise experience, we urge our potential guests to review the general location.
host_about: Cal and Zaharah just celebrated their anniversary in Singapore where they got married 30 years ago. Cal works on the property at the redwood lumber mill. Zaharah enjoys gardening and crocheting. They live in the bottom unit of The Juju Paradise, so they are always around to answer questions or give suggestions about the area.

name: Beach Comber 200
description:
Enjoy all Santa Cruz county has to offer in this quaint, cozy, newly renovated home. Perfect retreat to get away from it all. Located on a corner, great for people watching and just a short walk to the largest beach in the county. Walking distance to deli, coffee, restaurant and bistro. Private off street parking behind a gate for 2 small cars or a large SUV

The space
Wonderfully refurbished 3 bedroom 2 bath two story home. Large open living and dinning space with partial ocean view. Short 3-4 minute level walk to beach. First level has two bedrooms, bath, bonus room (with two twins) as well as kitchenette and laundry area. Second level has living, dining, kitchen, bathroom as well as one bedroom with private deck.

Other things to note
Starter pack of paper products supplied. Tenant is responsible for anything more they may need with regards to the paper products supplied, but do not need to replace what was used.

ITEMS
neighborhood_overview: Great family neighborhood just a short walk to the beach. Close walking distance to deli, coffee house, and restaurants. Beach within eye sight, less than 5 minutes away.

name: Large Seascape getaway with ocean view 1089
description:
POOL IS CLOSED DUE TO COVID-19: Located in the Seascape area of Aptos, relax on the ocean view deck, inside by the fire or at the swimming pool. In close vicinity to the Seascape Golf course, about five minute walk to Seascape Beach and a short walk to coffee, pizza, or small market. Enjoy the views from living room, dining room, deck and master bedroom. This home is pet-friendly with a $200 pet rent and 25 lbs limit one dog only.

The space
Beautifully maintained 2 bedroom 2.5 bath plus bonus sleeping quarters and family room. This multi level town house has a 2 car garage and a large front patio with views of the ocean. Updated well stocked kitchen opens up to wonderful family room. The formal living room has a fireplace, TV and ocean view. Master bedroom offers a queen and attached bath with walk in shower. Second spacious room offers a queen bed and the bonus room offers two twins and a set of twin bunks. Perfect property for two families.

name: Beach Walk 307
description:
Enjoy all the Monterey Bay has to offer, centrally located between Santa Cruz and Monterey, and just minutes to the freeway. Walking distance to restaurants, coffee, ice cream and Seacliff state beach. Great home for multiple families and pets, 2 dogs max with additional pet rent of $200.

The space
Nicely furnished and well appointed. Newly built 2009, Two stories home with 2 car garage and fenced backyard, First floor has two bedrooms, bathroom with tub, kitchen, dining, garage, backyard and access to beach. Second floor has two more bedrooms, second bath, ocean view deck and family room. This home is great for two families, or large extended families. Also has a birds eye view of the ocean from the huge deck off the second floor living space.

Other things to note
If you choose to bring a pet (dog under 40 pounds) there is a $200. Pet rent fee to be collected before or after your stay. Must sign a pet agreement as well.

name: Capitola Home with a View
description:
Panoramic ocean views, walk to downtown Capitola, or New Brighton State Beach. Close to shopping, entertainment, transit, and freeways.

The space
Well appointed two bedroom condo end unit on top floor of three story building. One assigned carport parking space, guest parking available on site and plenty of street parking, Elevator, pool, sauna, laundry, guest room available to rent from HOA for guests. Walk to shopping, dining, grocery. Close to area attractions and colleges
neighborhood_overview: New Brighton State Beach is an easy walk from the condo, you can walk the beach to historic cement ship. Downtown Capitola is less than a mile walk with great restaurants; Sotola and Shadow Brook are two of our favorites. Mr. Toot's coffee is the original coffee house of Capitola. You can grab a nice breakfast at the Avenue Cafe or Gayle's Bakery.

name: Breathtaking River Views!!!
description:
Warm, modern, and bright interiors complement the surrounding beauty of redwood trees and ocean skies in this beautiful Beach Hill gem - steps away from the San Lorenzo river.

Three sets of sliding glass doors on the upper level of this two story condo grant fresh air and gorgeous views both to the north and east.

Enjoy morning coffee watching the ducks swim in on the river tides. Or, if you prefer a cozier scene, sit under the redwood canopy in your own private patio adjacent to the bedrooms.

The space
Separate kitchen, dining, and living quarters are spacious and light. Down one flight of stairs you'll find the bedrooms, full bathrooms, laundry and an enclosed patio – all available for full usage.

Use the fully stocked kitchen overlooking the downtown lights as you prepare your dinner. Or take a quick 5-10 minute jaunt to Pacific Avenue – Santa Cruz’s main hub for restaurants, drinks and live music – when you feel like getting
neighborhood_overview:
5 minute walk to downtown Santa Cruz, offering a wide range of shopping, dining, and nightlife activities.

5 minute walk to the historic Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. Enjoy warm sand, cool surf, hot rides and free entertainment at the only major seaside amusement park on the West Coast.
host_about: Santa Cruz is a beautiful and relaxing corner of the SF Bay Area. I've lived here since 2016 and love it. Sometimes I travel however, so my place is available from time to time.

name: Spacious Studio - Rio Del Mar - Fragrance Free
description:
Welcome! Our spacious, studio is nestled in quiet, residential Rio Del Mar, a neighborhood in Aptos. The studio is private, safe, peaceful, and filled with light. We offer a relaxing, unique space for our guests. Beaches, shops, grocery stores, dining, trails, and a redwood forest are all nearby. This is an attached studio. We have substantial discounts for monthly and weekly rentals. We clean with fragrance-free products. The booking is for 2 non-smoking adults. No third parties. No children.

The space
Our spacious studio, about 500 square feet, has skylights, and hardwood floors. This space offers a comfortable and relaxing stay near the beach, the redwoods, trails, and beautiful town of Aptos, off the beaten path in a charming residential ocean bluff neighborhood. We are not far from the hustle and bustle of Santa Cruz, but far enough to enjoy the calm of our quaint neighborhood. A 5-minute walk takes you to the beach and the sea path walk. The beach runs for
neighborhood_overview: A wonderful family neighborhood that is safe and quiet. Houses are well-kept. The bluff above the ocean is 1.5 blocks away. A winding path takes you from the bluff to the beach. You can walk to the beach, the sea walk, or drive to the redwoods all in minutes.
host_about: I have been a nurse and nursing professor for many years. I am also a published medical writer. We love Aptos and we hope you will too. My husband and I love  the outdoors and hiking. Ask us about our favorite hiking adventures.

description:
Enjoy a beautiful location with this panoramic, ocean view condo. If you want to entertain, BBQ, or just relax, this property has a rare, extra large patio for your pleasure overlooking the beach and ocean. Fully furnished, 1 bedroom, 1 bath, new kitchen appliances and flooring, this condo is a three minute walk down to Rio Del Mar Beach and the Cement Ship. Wifi included! Nearby is a small deli, corner grocery store and coffee house.
*Ask about off season promotion for a free night!

Other things to note
Cleaning fee includes cleaning and linens (we use 2 different companies for each.) Linen company will come by prior to your arrival and make beds with clean sheets and leave towels (1 set of towels per person the home sleeps are provided.) Upon departure linen service will come launder all linens and towels so you don't have to! Beach Towels are NOT provided.

name: Redwood Retreat
description:
The Redwood Retreat, easily located off highway 17/Summit, is nestled among hundred-year-old redwoods. The guest area is the lower portion of the main house, and has its own private entrance, as well as a spacious private deck to relax and enjoy the surrounding nature. You're in close proximity to hiking, biking, wine tasting, and swimming at the beach.

The space
The Retreat has two spacious bedrooms with queen-sized beds, a living room, bathroom/shower with heated flooring, laundry room with washer/dryer, and private deck.
The living room has a large-screen television as well as a ping-pong table.
There is an eating area with a warming kitchen (microwave, coffee maker, and toaster.) Ground coffee and a selection of teas are provided.
The private deck is peaceful and romantic. You can relax while listening to the birds sing. Sometimes you can spot deer coming to graze in the backyard.

Guest access
The guest suite has its o
neighborhood_overview: We live on a private road, which means that traffic is minimal, the area is quiet. Five minutes down the road is Summit Store, where you can not only find essentials, but also enjoy an espresso bar, deli, and sushi spot.
host_about: We have lived in the mountains for 20 years, after dozens of years living in China, Japan, and Singapore.

name: Social Distancing in the Redwoods - Casita
description:
Come and breathe the fresh mountain air in our brand new Casita in the redwood forest. Glamping in style, our Casita is situated on a ridge overlooking the summit of the Santa Cruz Mountains; The Casita is completely private and separate from the main house. Enjoy the view with a glass of wine on the front porch. Walk out front door to trails through the redwoods. Excellent restaurants in small, quaint town of Felton, home to majestic Henry Cowell State Park. Or drive 20 minutes to Santa Cruz.

The space
Best for couples who want a peaceful nature-filled getaway. Very private with a stunning view of San Lorenzo Valley. Close to all Santa Cruz has to offer - Mountain Biking, Surfing, Hiking, Beach Volleyball, etc...
La Casita is a small, heated comfortable space with a sleeping loft and a queen size mattress. A ladder leads to the loft and one has to be limber to access the loft.
The shower is outdoor and attached to the Casita itself. We provide super c
neighborhood_overview: Felton is a community of 6K residents who live in the beautiful redwood forest of the Santa Cruz Mountains. The two block long downtown area offers restaurants, market, shopping and sightseeing at the Big Foot Museum and Henry Cowell State Park with miles of single track running and mountain biking trails. Also, disc golf course nearby.
host_about: Life Motto: Work hard, play harder.

name: West Santa Cruz Exclusive Home
description:
My brand new 3 bedroom 3 bath home has two family rooms, a large backyard for bbq-ing and relaxing. This home is on the West Side of town, on a quiet cul-de-sac. This home is very centrally located, 5 minutes from both UCSC and downtown. Easy walking to neighborhood parks and eateries. Perfect retreat for two families, a corporate retreat/meeting, or for a relaxing getaway.

The space
My brand new home is meant to make you feel as though you are in your own home. The floor plan is open and inviting, 2200 square feet, with a large side yard and ocean views. This house is ideal for families, corporate retreats, relaxing getaways for a quiet group of friends. My house location is very convenient for families wanting to visit UCSC students (graduation, parent weekend, etc.).

Bedroom 1 (Master):
California King
Walk-in closet
En-suite walk-in shower, double sink
French door that lead to back yard patio
Large, Smart tv

name: Quiet Santa Cruz Family Home
description:
Our home is professionally cleaned after every visit. We want you to have peace of mind knowing the house is clean especially during this Covid outbreak.

Modern bright home mid town. Close to the highways, beaches, restaurants, bars and walking distance to downtown Santa Cruz. This is a great home if you want to be in a quiet place but close to everything. Private patio with gas grill. In being compliant with the Santa Cruz transient occupancy tax(11%) is included in price.

The space
This home was built in 1865. One of the first in Santa Cruz! This is a 2 story home with 2 bedrooms upstairs and one bedroom downstairs. Small patio in the back with a gas BBQ and picnic table. Full kitchen to cook with all your basic cooking needs. Full laundry. We provide you with all the basics. Front grassy area. One parking space in driveway. All other parking can be on the street. Beach chairs, towels and toys available to use. Please ask for any recommendations you
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is very quiet. We have a nice walking path behind the home as well as a park down the street. You can walk, drive or bike all around town. There are hiking trails a few minutes away as well as a golf course and the beach!! This is a prime location to be close to everything but in a quiet setting!
host_about: Hey I’m Seanna!! Santa Cruz native. I have 3 kids and my husband. We love to travel as a family!! We also have a great vacation house we would love to rent to you!!

name: Pleasure Point Surf Hideout!
description:
My wonderful, centrally located, apartment is nestled in the center of newly developed 41st Avenue - seated on the second floor, above newly established, retail shops, salons, coffee houses and restaurants - literally a couple of blocks from the cliffs & beaches of pleasure point, I am so excited to share my modern, cozy, beach side apartment with new friends!

The space
The apartment is located on the second floor of a recently remodeled apartment building in the heart of pleasure point. This is a one bedroom, one bathroom apartment comes furnished with all the comforts of home. The cozy, but spacious living room area as well as a fully equipped kitchen come appropriated with all the details necessary to have a fun weekend at the beach or a longer, comfy stay away on business. The apartment overlooks the end of 41st avenue, Verve coffee, various retail shops, restaurants, salons and boutiques - Freeline surfshop, Family cycling center, grocery stores and the beac
neighborhood_overview: The Pleasure point neighborhood and 41st avenue is a very centrally located - nestled in a residential beach neighborhood as well as a retail / restaurant area. The space overlooks the hustle and bustle of all the newly developed shopping and the dining experience below, but also is tucked away towards the rear of the building, incorporating guests into the local residential neighborhood. The two other full time building tenants are wonderfully sweet and love to say hello when passing in the communal hallway space. Noise is minimized inside the apartment and the outside night life tones itself down around 9:30-10pm - so late night noise is scarce. The beach is literally three blocks down the road and it is a lovely walk through the local neighborhood - and if you feel like walking a bit farther, Capitola village is a mile walk along the cliffs.
host_about:
Hi There!
My name is Courtney and Im excited to share my cozy beach shack with new friends!

name: Beach Hill Beauty-2 King Size Bedrooms-all yours
description:
Relax in the Golden Corridor of Beach Hill, Santa Cruz! Beach Hill is just above the Boardwalk, 3 blocks down to the beach and a short walk to downtown! Enjoy the quiet neighborhood before strolling down to the Boardwalk and West Cliff for fun beach activities, surfing, and people-watching! Great trails for walking & running & biking close by! Head to downtown for great outdoor restaurants or eat at the Wharf. It's all close and convenient!

The space
The home has been recently renovated. The rooms are spacious and stay cool in the summertime. The house is 3 stories, and your rooms are on the 1st floor. The 2nd and 3rd floors are off limits to you, but no one will be there during your stay. You do have a small kitchenette, but you do not have access to the main kitchen. The house is quiet, and you will feel as if you are staying in a nice, comfortable hotel. I also just had an outdoor patio put into the backyard. It’s a nice place to sit and relax at the end of
neighborhood_overview: The house sits on top of Beach Hill! You are blocks from the hustle and bustle of downtown on one side and the beach on the other.  It's a great central location! There is a walking path to downtown, and another walking path along West Cliff Drive.
host_about:
I am an active person who loves to run and ride bikes and be outside.  I love to see the world and meet and know people from different countries and backgrounds.  My goal is to see the world on my bike...
I have been an airbnb guest a few times and have enjoyed the experience.  I hope to be a super hostess and will need your feedback to be the best!

name: Santa Cruz Cottage w/Ocean View-close to Boardwalk
description:
This charming beach bungalow is perfectly located in the heart of Santa Cruz surrounded by everything Santa Cruz is famous for including fabulous ocean views and beach! This original home is perfectly located just a minutes drive from the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and popular surfing spots including Pleasure Point and Steamer Lane. Enjoy a beach bonfire, walk to the historic Walton Lighthouse, Harbor or the ever-popular Crow's Nest for a drink or dinner. Close to the Harbor, shops and more!

The space
Guests will have access to use the propane grill during their stay. Propane and grill tools will be provided for guest use.

Guest access
We will provide you with check in instructions the evening before arrival. Guests can access the entire space through lock box located on the back door. Guests can drive down the alleyway and park behind the house. We also provide a welcome binder with additional details about the property and the neighborhoo
neighborhood_overview: Most popular locations are within walking distance of the home.
host_about: We are a Real Estate and Property Management company located in the heart of Santa Cruz and Capitola.  We offer clean and fun getaways for you and your guests!

name: Amazing view midcentury modern beach retreat
description:
Top floor condo with breathtaking beachfront views and colorful midcentury modern decor to make your beach vacation special. Master with comfortable king bed. Second bedroom with queen and fold out bed can sleep 4. Updated bathrooms and high water pressure showers. Table for 6 for family dinners and a balcony for drinks with a view at sunset. Well stocked kitchen so you can eat at home while watching the dolphins and birds from the expansive 3rd floor views. Come relax, you won’t want to leave!

The space
The open living area has high ceilings with expansive views of Monterey Bay and the abundant wildlife that thrives in this bay including dolphins, porpoise, whales and shorebirds. I recently saw someone catch a tuna with his bare hands in the surf! So yes you can fish here! You look north west so you can leave the window shades open without getting too much sun. Beautiful sunset views over the ocean year round right from the living room.

There is a 70”
neighborhood_overview:
Pajaro Dunes is a resort community that is peaceful and surrounded by nature. Our location is Shorebirds which are the 3 story condos right on the beach.

Here is a link to the map:
https://www.pajarodunes.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/pajaro_dunes_map.jpg
host_about: We have owned our condo in Pajaro Dunes resort since 2013 and completed the remodel by 2018. You will see that we enjoy art, nature, literature and architecture from the library in our place. We love being part of the Airbnb community and look forward to sharing our place and welcoming the kind worldwide guests to our special beach retreat!

name: Like a Tree House
description:
Friendly, warm, brand new with garden access, close to the ocean and right next to a few Monterey Cypress trees. When the wind is right you can even hear the sea lions :)

The space
Our neighborhood is bike- and walkable and there is public transport to the University is close by. There is a really nice health food store one block away as well as a Safeway. If the wind blows right one can hear the sea lions. The apartment is very central yet very quiet

Guest access
Private Studio apartment with high ceiling and a double loft.

Other things to note
There are two little dogs which live on the property which might come over and want to be petted or snuggled.
neighborhood_overview: Lots of great walk to the beach. Hiking and great mountain biking is less then 10 min away. There are lots of friendly and helpful people in this neighborhood with great shops, groceries stores, yoga studies, bar and great restairants and cafes in less then 5 min walking distance
host_about: Friendly and social. Likes to travel and enjoys people with all kinds of backgrounds. I am a physicist originally and work as a homeopath.

name: Cute bungalow overlooking the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk!
description:
The ideal location to enjoy what Santa Cruz has to offer - walk to the beach, the boardwalk, or to town! This is a monthly rental only.

The space
This beach bungalow has a living room, full kitchen, ocean view deck, master bedroom with queen bed and bunk beds and a half bath. This location is wonderful! Walk to the boardwalk, the beach, and the yacht harbor. Enjoy an amazing ocean view from either of the two decks~ perfect for sunset viewing, bbq-ing, and sunbathing.

There is an outdoor shower off of the patio that is great for getting the sand off after a long day at the beach..

There is also a washer and dryer. One pet allowed, with prior approval and $125 pet fee.

This location is amazing!!

Guest access
The whole house is yours!
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

name: Sanctuary Inside the State Park: The Quail Room
description:
In a hillside meadow within the Forest of Nisene Marks State Park (hiking, biking, running), the house feels remote but we're just 5 minute's drive from the best walking beach in the area, and 15 minutes from Santa Cruz.
The newly decorated and spotless Quail Room is a quiet sanctuary with its own separate entrance and includes a queen bed, an en suite private bath, and the comforts of home.
We'll be there to greet you and to provide you with information about the area. Lots to do here!

The space
The general surrounding area has a lot of variety - natural wonders, plenty of coastline to explore, the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, museums, art galleries, shopping, restaurants, and a few local spots we'd be glad to point out, depending on your interests. (Note: Downtown Santa Cruz can be as close as a 15-minute drive, or can be 45 minutes or longer if the beach or commuter traffic piles up on Highway 1, and Monterey/Carmel can be an hour in normal traffic, or mo
neighborhood_overview: Trails for hiking, biking (a mountain biker's paradise), and running are at the end of our driveway. A 5 minute drive will get you to Aptos Village and plenty of shops and restaurants, as well as to the local Rio del Mar Beach and Seacliff State Beach (with a paved promenade that goes a few miles, and where you'll see plenty of locals walking their dogs. Be sure to give a high five to the large brass hand on the wall at the far end before you head back to the coffee shop or the Pixie Deli (best salmon steak sandwiches in the world, and a huge selection of soft drinks and other goodies).
host_about: We’re retired and are enjoying our art studio, where we do stained glass and fountains. We also do a lot of gardening and we have dear friends that we often meet for a meal or a hike, and we have family nearby, too. Love making guests feel welcome in our Airbnb sanctuary in the state park and we have fun visiting other Airbnb’s as well.

name: Beach Condo (S241)
description:
New Rental! Three bedroom Shorebirds condo on the ground floor! A three bedroom Shorebird condo is rare enough but with Shorebirds 241 there is an added advantage to being on the ground floor, the beach access is only a short walk from the front door. There are only 2-4 stairs down to the sand. Enjoy a long beach walk, swimming, fishing or bird watching. Catch the sunset in the evening and on a clear night Pajaro Dunes is a great place for stargazing.

TOT Certificate # CO-00094

Guest access
There may be just one or two owner closets that are locked for the owners person items otherwise you are welcome to access the whole condo.

Enjoy.
neighborhood_overview: Pajaro Dunes is a gate community on the beach with several full time residence. Please respect the 10 pm noise curfew.
host_about: My name is Brandelia Banuelos. I am co-owner of a local rental agency. The rental agency manages 34 property for various Pajaro Dunes Owners. We happily partner with Airbnb.

name: Breathtaking Ocean View, pool, 2 min. walk 2 Beach
description:
Breathtaking Ocean View. Panoramic windows in living area and deck toward the ocean. Very easy 2 minute walk to one of the best beaches in the county. Spacious 2 bedroom apartment with new furnishings, TVs, cable, blu-ray/dvd, wifi and fully stocked kitchen. Close to everything in the county. All new furnishings.

The space
Amazing Ocean view! Super close to Rio Del Mar Beach and Cement Ship at Seacliff Beach. Easy short drive to Boardwalk, surfing, harbor.

Guest access
Entire Apartment

Street only parking. Do not park in building parking lot.

name: Room and private bath in downtown Watsonville home
description:
This is our historic house with all the modern amenities! The house is on a cute street near downtown Watsonville, walking distance to restaurants, grocery store, park, trails and more. Great location for just passing through the area, visiting Santa Cruz, Monterey, Big Sur, the beach and redwoods, and longer stays as well. We've hosted many long term guests. The kitchen is shared with three other people and a cat - we do our best to be respectful and thoughtful of our guests. Hope to see you!

The space
Your bedroom and private bathroom are downstairs next to the kitchen; our bedroom and bathroom is upstairs.

Guest access
You will have access to our kitchen and all cooking wares. There is a washer and dryer available as well. We also have an enclosed backyard.

Other things to note
Keyless entry will be set up for you.
There will be a friendly cat named Mowgli hanging around the house. Feel free to show him some l
neighborhood_overview: This is a cute old house on a quiet street in historic downtown Watsonville. The town has a long history and has been and still is an important agricultural center. There are many beautiful Victorian and Craftsman homes and we love walking around the neighborhood. We appreciate being anle to walk to the farmers market, grocery store, restaurants, performing arts center, parks and more.
host_about: I am a young professional working as scientist in Watsonville, CA. I am a California native, but moved to the area in 2016. I love all the outdoor activities this area affords: the road biking is incredible, there are numerous places for mountain biking, opportunities abound for hiking, plus the beach is never far away. And do I even need to mention the incredible climate? I love getting to travel around California enjoying nature, but also going to Europe and beyond to visit family and witness the incredible history and beauty.

name: Modern and bright CA beach bungalow
description:
Location—our newly renovated modern and bright home is located just 4 blocks from the beach, 1 mile from the famous beach boardwalk, and 1.5 miles from downtown. Coffee shops, restaurants, beaches, hiking, and surfing are all within walking distance. Access it all using our loaner bikes and surfboards; or relax and enjoy the BBQ-ready back porch and spacious back yard. Our desirable westside neighborhood is quiet and family-friendly. Driveway parking and high-speed internet.

The space
Our home is a newly renovated 1950s California beach bungalow—super comfortable and full of light—on a quiet family friendly street. A short 4 block stroll puts you on beautiful Westcliff Drive, its 3-mile walking/biking path runs right along Monterey Bay and allows access to beaches, amazing views (wildlife, surfers, sunrises and sets), and surfing (watch or partake). Restaurants, local coffee shops, and grocery stores are all within walking distance, or grab the loaner beach cruis
host_about: Originally from Seattle, WA, and based in Santa Cruz, CA now. Love to travel (23 countries and counting), and prefer to be near the ocean at all times.

name: Victorian Fairytale Master Bed and Bath
description:
Come stay at this rare 1883 Victorian on the West Side! This beautiful master bedroom will transport you back to Victorian times, with a claw-foot bathtub, working gas fireplace in the bedroom for cozy foggy nights, picture windows, and queen size four poster bed. Share the big kitchen, a parlor, a ballroom, a pool and hot tub, and a huge front and back yard with us - my husband and I, our college age daughters, our border collie, and our 2 cats!

The space
This beautiful Victorian bedroom has a cozy four poster bed. Come relax and pretend you are royalty in Victorian times. Lounge by the pool and hot tub, harvest vegetables from our front yard urban farm. Cuddle with the kitties. (Our Santa Cruz license for officially being a short term rental is: 0/0/6/1/9/3/1/2

Guest access
You will have the private master bedroom and bathroom, which is at the top of the stairs. The master bedroom has a small fridge and tea kettle, but the full downstai
neighborhood_overview: We are one block from a small grocery store and bakery, and several restaurants. New rental electric bikes are one block away. The Boardwalk and Beach are walking or biking distance, and the West Side has tons of restaurants, bars, and cafes to choose from. UCSC is close by, and we are one block from Mission Street/Highway 1, with multiple bus stops to get around.
host_about: My husband and I are from Santa Cruz, California. I own Santa Cruz Pedicab, a bicycle powered taxi service and creator of the "pumpkin pedicab". I am also an artist who teaches the public and UCSC students how to run an urban farm.  My husband is an open source specialist and works for Red Hat.  We love to garden, host unique festivities, play music, and have raised our daughters here.  We enjoy traveling,  preserving foods, and living the Santa Cruz lifestyle!

name: Cozy Capitola Coastal Cottage-Santa Cruz, CA
description:
Beautiful Capitola cottage located in a peaceful neighborhood. Just a short walk to ocean views. Enjoy a 10 to 15 minute morning walk down to Capitola village for coffee or a short walk towards 41st Ave for dinner. It's in a prime location, whether it's adventure or relaxation you seek.

The space
It has two bedrooms, each with a Queen size bed. The house can sleeps a total of 6 to 8 guests with the use of the finished garage. The two car garage, which is separate from the house, is insulated, heated, dry walled and decorated. The garage has One set of twin bunk beds, comfy queen size hide a bed sofa, ping pong table and access to the bathroom inside the home. Perfect recreation room for the kids to play and sleep. (use of garage space is priced separately)
The updated cottage has a brand new kitchen & appliances so you can enjoy meals at home. There is a gas BBQ grill in the back yard. Complimentary WiFi & Cable TV.

The House sleeps 4 guests at
neighborhood_overview: This home is located in a quaint, quiet neighborhood with mature trees. Just 500 steps from ocean views, and a short walk further to sand.
host_about: Hey, I'm Michael.    I am a chef  and have lived in the Monterey Bay area for 25 years.  Moving from busy Manhattan where I trained at the Culinary Institute of America, I have embraced the tranquility of this coastal paradise. I love experiencing the outdoor wonder of this area. This area is not only beautifully scenic and full of adventure, it is a place where you can find serenity.  Whether you are breathing in the fresh, ocean air at the beach, paddle boarding on the water, hiking in the mountains, enjoying a glass of local wine, or talking with friendly locals, I know you will, like I have, find restoration and renewal here. This is our family home, built by my grandparents in 1972.  We love the memories we've had in this home, and hope that you make treasured memories of your own with your family and friends.

name: Downtown Cutie! Walk to Beach and Wharf!
description:
Walk to the beach and Boardwalk from this cute one bedroom apartment near downtown Santa Cruz! It's a short stroll to the Beach from this charming apartment built in the 1940's and recently renovated. Full kitchen and bath, this cutie is in a small complex with only three other apartments, very quiet and charming. Off-street parking, and coin-op washer and dryer on site.

The space
This is a 1940's one bedroom apartment on Riverside Avenue, one block from downtown Santa Cruz. It has been recently renovated, but still retains its charming roots! There is a full kitchen, full bathroom with a great bathtub, and a hallway between the bedroom and living area. There are quiet tenants on either side and overall it's a quiet complex. The whole apartment is yours during your stay , and has everything needed for your extended stay in Santa Cruz.

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours during your stay.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: Riverside Avenue is one block walking from downtown Santa Cruz, and three blocks to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. This apartment is directly on the river levee pathway (through a locked gate). It is a 10 minute drive from UCSC.
host_about: I have lived in Pleasure Point for  over twenty years and I love it!! I am very active, and love being a block from the ocean, as well as within biking distance to some epic trail rides in the Santa cruz mountains. I have travelled all over the world, and I always love coming home to my sweet little neighborhood by the beach:)

name: Modern Luxury with Breath Taking Views - sleeps 10
description:
Modern contemporary single level home located in Santa Cruz mountains. This meticulously designed home offers a fully loaded Italian kitchen and stunning indoor and outdoor space with hot tubs for outdoor relaxation and star gazing.

Spectacular views for entertaining guests, open concept living, large decks two master suites and two additional bedrooms, 4 bedrooms total. Casita in back that sleeps 2-3 persons.

Close to Santa Cruz's beaches, hiking, meditation, yoga and mountain biking.

The space
Speakers throughout the home & portable blue tooth speaker Hyperboom, 5 TV's with sound bar speakers in living area for movie watching. Hot tub in deck and gas fire place with outdoor blankets. Great for star gazing! Plenty of deck space, outdoor eating, BBQ and back area great for bird watching. Green area in far back next to the Casita. Lots of hummingbirds as well.

Guest access
Entire large home, not back offic
neighborhood_overview: House dead ends at my driveway so plenty of privacy.
host_about: I have done a lot of traveling around the world and would love to share my home with fellow Travelers or anyone just looking to get away and Escape the mundane.

name: 8 Palms
description:
Clean (Using Disinfecting Techniques for COVID 19) and Comfortable Ranch Style House in a Great Central Location!!! Close to Downtown, The Santa Cruz Beach and Boardwalk, The Santa Cruz Wharf, Seabright Beach, The Boat Harbor, The Crows Nest, Seabright Brewery, The Buttery, Lillians Italian Restaurant, The Crepe Place, Shoppers Corner, Whole Foods. Basically there are a bunch of great amenities very close.

The space
The space

Our cozy house has everything you need for a comfortable relaxing stay. It has recently been remodeled so every room is fresh and clean. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking and there is a partially covered patio that is great for a BBQ after a day on the beach or grilling up your catch from one of the local charter boats just down the street.

The living room has a comfy couch and the flat screen tv is hooked up to Xfinity cable. It has Apple TV also.

name: @visitpleasurepoint
description:
Location. Location. Location. This new to the market, freshly-updated 900 sqft beach house is located in the heart of Pleasure Point on a quiet residential street. Only 200 feet from the beach and the famed Jack O'Neill surf spot. The house is directly between surfing spots at The Point and The Hook, a 3 minute walk. It is also a short stroll along the beach to shopping and restaurants. If you are looking to live “The Point” lifestyle, there is no better location. You can walk everywhere!

The space
The beach house has just been updated and is super clean with new furniture and all the accouterments needed to make it truly a home away from home. This cozy 2 bedroom/2 bath has a comfy queen bed in each bedroom and the master also has a pull out double size futon that is great for kids. We also have a portable crib for little ones. The house can sleep up to 5. The master bedroom has french doors looking out onto the back deck and fire pit. Open up the French doors a
host_about: Bonjour!  I am from Cannes in the South of France but have lived in Santa Cruz for many years.  My husband, 2 children and I love to travel the world but are always happy to come home to Santa Cruz.  We hope you have a wonderful stay in this very special place called Pleasure Point!  If you dream of owning a beach house, I am a Realtor® and I can help you find your little piece of paradise! En espérant que vous passiez de superbes vacances!  Au plaisir de vous rencontrer.

name: Hummingbird House in Aptos Mountain Retreat & Spa
description:
Om Oasis is a beautiful and lush retreat center on several acres of a remote and peaceful 15 acre mountain top property. We host guests who wish to connect with the beauty of nature and experience peace. We are 10-15 minutes up the mountain and partially off-grid with little to no cell reception but with a great WiFi connection. There are a total of 6 guest accommodations (including this one) spread out over our developed 3 acres, making it always a very private experience and easy to distance.

The space
The Hummingbird House is the largest house on the property. It has a large open floor plan with lots of southern facing windows, day time light, and a gorgeous sunset view from inside and out.

This is a very unique and eclectic Spanish style home with beautiful decor from around the world. As you enter you will find a kitchen/living room space. The kitchen is fully equipped with a custom glass breakfast bar and 3 bar stools, a 6-burner gas stove, a
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a ridge top with excellent views of the sunset, moon, and stars. We're also ten minutes from the town of Aptos where you'll find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery/health food stores, and boutiques. The entrance to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Sea Cliff State Beach and Rio Del Mar State Beach are all just 12-15 minutes from our home.

PLEASE NOTE that we live on a windy private country road (not maintained by the city) with two-way traffic and parts that become one lane at times. Please drive carefully and be aware of this.
host_about: Hi there! Raine & her family live part time in Hawai'i/ part time at our beautiful Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California.  Emberlie is the on-site manager, overseeing the property and booking. She provides body work and yoga classes, sound healing and spa services... with the intention to care for you during your stay! Happy Travels & welcome OM.

name: Redwood Getaway #1
description:
2 bedrooms 1 bath setting in the majestic redwoods
15 minutes to Big Basin
35 minutes to Santa Cruz
Check-in: After 4:00 PM
Check-out: 11:00 AM

The space
The space is two bedrooms and a bathroom downstairs from the main house. There are TVs in each room. There is a double bed and a single available for use, and two desks. Also in one of the rooms is a recliner and a desk chair. There is NOT a kitchen in this space. There is a small refrigerator, microwave, and coffee pot.

Guest access
Guests can use the laundry room as well as the hot tub that is located steps from the entrance into the property.

BBQ available.

The space is suitable for 3 adult guests or a family of four with children.

name: Clean & Sunny Cottage Near Beaches and Boardwalk
description:
Clean, bright, and comfortable cottage in the sunniest part of town. Great central location: less then two miles from beautiful Seabright Beach, the harbor, downtown, and Boardwalk.

*COVID-19 update: We are participants in the ‘Commit to Clean’ program. The entire space is throughly cleaned and disinfected between guests.

Remote workers welcome, but please know we can not guarantee a completely quite workspace during daytime hours. We have a shared backyard and neighbors in close proximity.*

The space
Relax and enjoy the comfort and conveniences of home before heading out on your next fun Santa Cruz adventure.

In the living area: 55 inch wall mounted flat screen has Apple TV with HBO, Netflix, and Hulu. High speed Wifi with 1Gb fiber internet connection. Key-less entry. Cozy queen size bed with eco mattress and quality bedding. Built-in heating system and additional Dyson space heater. Clothing iron. Many windows with incredible m
neighborhood_overview: Located in a quiet and laid-back residential neighborhood, you’ll love being close to everything Santa Cruz has to offer while being just far enough away from the tourists and crowds. Ample street parking. Easy access to the highway. Safe environment. Awesome central location!
host_about:
Hi! We are an adventurous & friendly couple living in beautiful Santa Cruz, California. Mackenzie grew up locally and Kevin is from Colorado. Meeting new people, traveling, and being active outdoors are among our favorite things. We also love health, fitness, learning, and living in the moment.

How we became hosts: While sitting at a coffee shop, we made a detailed list of what our ideal home would be like. Some of those items included being near the beach, a fun central location, having a space for hens, etc. Within a month, and of course while sitting at another coffee shop ;), we found our dream home, just listed for sale... and here we are today!

We've been inspired by various other AirBNBs and have done our best to include our favorite aspects of them in ours. We truly enjoy hosting. We feel incredibly thankful to call Santa Cruz, California home and to share our dream with you!

name: Beach Hill Vacation Haven near Beach & Boardwalk!
description:
Relax in the Golden Corridor of Beach Hill, Santa Cruz! Beach Hill is just above the Boardwalk, 3 blocks down to the beach and a short walk to downtown! Enjoy the quiet neighborhood before strolling down to the Boardwalk and West Cliff for fun beach activities, surfing, amusement park rides, and people-watching! Great trails for walking & running & biking close by! Head to downtown for great restaurants and night life (or a SC Warriors game), or eat at the Wharf. It's all close and convenient!

The space
My home has been recently renovated. The bedrooms are spacious and stay cool in the summertime. The kitchen and living area have great lighting with a fireplace and a tv with Hulu and Netflix and Amazon. The tv in the living room is set up with an Apple tv. There is also a comfortable patio right off the kitchen where you can bbq and keep warm next to the fire pit. There is also a downstairs patio with 2 Adirondack chairs and a teak table that can be accessed
neighborhood_overview: The house sits on top of Beach Hill! You are blocks from the hustle and bustle of downtown on one side and the beach on the other.  It's a great central location! There is a walking path to downtown, and another walking path along West Cliff Drive.
host_about:
I am an active person who loves to run and ride bikes and be outside.  I love to see the world and meet and know people from different countries and backgrounds.  My goal is to see the world on my bike...
I have been an airbnb guest a few times and have enjoyed the experience.  I hope to be a super hostess and will need your feedback to be the best!

name: Charming House At The Beach
description:
Get cozy and comfortable in this charming beach house - enjoy all that the quaint town of Aptos has to offer. Connect as a family and spend quality time together - play board games, cook daily meals using the full-service kitchen or BBQ grill, or watch movies on one of three flat-screen televisions. Walk to Seacliff Beach to unwind and enjoy the ocean breezes. The entire home is disinfected and deep cleaned with Clorox between each guest.

The space
Located the second row from the water, you have a peek-a-boo view of the ocean from the deck but are just a 10-minute walk or 2-minute bike ride down the hill to Seacliff Beach in Aptos. For the same price as a hotel room, you can have a whole house to yourself, complete with kitchen facilities and all of the other comforts of home.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the house as well as the outside space but not to the shed in the back yard or locked owner’s closet.

Other thi
neighborhood_overview: Safe and friendly neighborhood, lots of folks walking their dogs and enjoying the ocean air.
host_about:
Hello! 

Welcome to our Aptos beach house. A little bit about me...

I spent 15 years living and working overseas with my family in Morocco, Lithuania, and Costa Rica. I returned to California in 2015 and fell in love with Aptos and the Monterey Bay for its beautiful beaches, mountains, and access to the San Francisco Bay Area. As a beach lover, surfer, runner, and hiker, I found Aptos to be the perfect spot to enjoy nature, the beach, and the mountains all with having quick access to San Francisco to see a Giant's baseball game or to head into Oakland or Berkeley for Ethiopian, Greek, or Indian food, to see a show, or hike in the hills. 

I love adventure travel and do most of my traveling with my kids so I understand what parents are looking for in a vacation - ease and simplicity, memory making, less time in the car and more time doing fun things together, etc.  I believe that showing children the world as often and as early as possible is important. 

“Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime.” - Mark Twain

I hope you enjoy our home and hope that you are able to explore, learn, enjoy life's simple pleasures, and make lasting memories there.

Warmly,
Sarah

description:

There are an accordion collection, a music studio, a lot of different music instruments, trails to meet beautiful sunsets in our beautiful quiet place.

I will be happy to play live music to our guests if they will want it.

description:
Hear the sea lions, smell the ocean breeze, and take in peeks of the ocean and mountains, from ideally located end-unit with private back yard and deck. The beach and downtown Santa Cruz are within easy walking distance of this chic San Francisco style condo in the cherished Beach Hill neighborhood.

Offers a master suite with his-and-her closets and fireplace, and an open and flowing living room/dining room combo. 2 full baths and 1/2 bath.

This rental is a treasure not to be missed.

The space
On the 2nd floor, there is a master suite (1 queen bed) with his-and-her closets, fireplace and a private full bathroom. On the same floor, you'll find the second bedroom (2 single beds) and the 2nd full bathroom. On the 1st floor, there is a fully equipped kitchen, a kitchen nook, a dining room and a living room (1 pull up sofa) and a 1/2 bathroom. From the kitchen nook, you can access the outside patio with more table and chairs to enjoy the cleme

description:
Views, Views, Views, of the Monterey Bay. This two bedroom, two bath condo is centrally located in Aptos. Just a short drive to Santa Cruz or Monterey. Relax on the deck and watch the whales and dolphins swim by. Enjoy long walks on this twelve mile stretch of sand. The beach is just a very short walk from the condo, as well as coffee shops, deli's, market and restaurants.
Comfortably appointed with all the comforts of home.

The space
This space is wonderful for those who can not climb stairs. Straight in, no stairs whatsoever. So if you have a wheelchair or walker, this condo is perfect for you.
The master bedroom offers a king bed, large flat screen TV and attached bath. The guest room offers 2 twin beds. The hall bath has a tub/shower combo. Open living space with full bay views. Well appointed kitchen, for those who would rather prepare their own meals.
Comfortable deck with LP BBQ, chairs and loungers.

This 3-story home has three comfortable and unique bedrooms, a spacious, well-equipped kitchen, and two full bathrooms. It features premium amenities such as 4k TV, HiFi sound, Nest electronics, Nintendo game system, and custom art throughout.

- A laundry closet with washer and dryer.

name: Secluded, dog-friendly mountain cabin w/jungle gym, deck, outdoor firepit & more
description:
The space
Nestled in the Santa Cruz mountains, this peaceful and charming, pet-friendly Central California Coast vacation home is an ideal destination for relaxation. Get away from the demands of the Bay Area with a weekend in the mountains near Felton, not far from lively Santa Cruz. Ideal for families, there's a jungle gym in the large yard and plenty of space indoors for your whole group to feel right at home.

This mountain location is only a 30 minute drive from Santa Cruz's popular beaches and boardwalk. And yet, when you're here, it's like being in a quiet cabin in the woods. Both Quail Hollow Ranch County Park and Loch Lomond Recreation Area have plenty of outdoor activities and for a game of golf, just head to the Pasetiempo Golf Course, just 10 miles away.

When you are not out wine tasting at nearby vineyards or catching some waves at the shore, this Felton Getaway Cabin boasts tall, wood-beamed ceilings in the living roo

description:

Visit the Santa Cruz mountains and get away to the small town of Felton, California! This unique, two bedroom vacation home has everything you'll need to relax and take in the gorgeous, postcard-perfect, treetop views!

name: Flynn's Penthouse
description:
Due to the coronavirus, we’re taking extra care to clean and disinfect frequently touched surfaces between reservations
Rates are based on how many rooms you use. If you book 1-2 ppl you have access to 1 bdrm, 3-4 ppl 2 Bdrms, 5+ppl all 3 bdrms.
The penthouse is above Felton Music Hall which has live bands. You can hear loud music in the penthouse, as late as 1 am (but usually 11 pm) & a Church service, with a live band, on Sunday mornings starting at 8:30 am.

The space
The penthouse is a spacious 1500 square feet. It has 3 bdrs and 1 bath. It's located in town, it is in walking distance to many restaurants, unique shops, many hiking trails and two grocery stores.
Felton Music Hall's Restaurant (By Shockwave) is open
Weekends 4 - 9 pm.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the # of bedrooms they are booked for and the rest of the penthouse (no one else will be staying there).
There are 3 hall closets that
neighborhood_overview: Felton is located in the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains, just minutes to Roaring Camp Railroads and Mt Hermon Zip-Lines. We have several parks and trails for hiking or mountain biking. You can walk, zip-line or take a train ride through our redwood forest where the trees are typically 4 – 10 feet in diameter and 200 – 240 feet tall. We are just 10 mi to Santa Cruz’s beautiful beaches on the Monterey Bay, The Beach Boardwalk and Steamer’s Lane for surfing. The Monterey Bay Aquarium is 55 mi away and it’s 37 mi to the Silicon Valley.
host_about:
I have lived in Felton for over 40 years. I love the small town feel, the redwoods and being so close to the ocean/beaches. I love hiking in our local parks, hanging out at the beach and I love music.
I work in Felton Music Hall's box office. It's such a fun job. I enjoy greeting people, listening to all the different types of music that is play here and I love the food.

name: Oceanviews of Seabright Beach from this classic California beach house!
description:
Charming historic home with ocean views!

The space
Cypress-by-the-Sea is one of the original oceanside vacation cottages in the wonderful Seabright beach neighborhood of Santa Cruz. This ocean view home is just three houses up from the sands of Seabright beach! This historic home has been thoughtfully updated while retaining some vintage charm. This two story house has three bedrooms, and two baths. There is a separate living room, dining room, and laundry room off of the kitchen. There is plenty of space in this house for the family to gather after a fun day at the beach!

There are also several restaurants and cafes all within walking distance of this house, as well as the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.

Please Note: If booking through Airbnb, the 11% TOT tax is included in the nightly rate posted on Airbnb.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire house.
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

name: Sunny Home w/Pool near Beach & Santa Cruz
description:
Need a Healthy Retreat? Spacious, light-filled home with gorgeous views of orchards and vineyards. Lap pool (except in winter,) hot tub, basketball court and ping pong, organic produce in garden and 10 minute drive to the beach.
Great for families. Modern furnishings, porch swings, indoor and outdoor dining, organic bedding - more stars than you can count from the hot tub at night.
Relax, connect with loved ones and recharge your life.

The space
Great retreat for families.
Get a good nights sleep! Comfortable, new, high-end organic bedding.
The home is in a peaceful rural valley surrounded by nature, horse pastures and vineyards. 10 minutes by car to beach, shops and supermarket. Wonderful hiking and biking in vicinity. 19 minutes to Santa Cruz and 45 to Monterey.
No parties. Quiet hours from 10pm-8am.
Pool has a solar cover but is cool when it's not summer.

Cleaning during Covid: We follow Airbnb's e
neighborhood_overview:
Unlike our sister beach and boardwalk in Santa Cruz which gets packed with tourists, our closest beach -Rio Del Mar - is miles long and frequented by locals. Great place to go for a stroll, take the stairs to wonderful ocean views, hold a bbq and check out the amazing half sunk ship.
We're also close to renowned hiking under a canopy of massive redwoods at Nisene Marks park, local farmer's markets with fresh organics and home made delicacies. For folks who want to eat out, there are some terrific restaurants and the famous Aptos BBQ, for ribs and live blues.
host_about: Friendly and conscientious, Film Professor in Berkeley. I like to swim, hike, read and cook. I enjoy relaxed family time with my husband and son. We are also experienced Airbnb hosts (we've been renting out an apartment for 3 years) and we understand how to live respectfully in other people's apartments and homes.  Both my husband and my own family are European and we travel quite frequently.  We are multi-lingual - fluent German, French and some Spanish.

name: Caledonia Paradise  with sauna and jacuzzi
description:
Our home on Caledonia street was built in 1888! We have modernized it with vaulted ceilings and skylights, and have created a beautiful, private and relaxing backyard garden with hot tub and sauna.
Welcome to our home, we hope you enjoy it us much we do!

The space
We enjoy our time at home, playing the piano, relaxing in the tub, sauna or watching movies. The hot tub is professionally maintained on a weekly basis, so it is always in perfect condition and ready to hop in! We enjoy our gigabit fiber internet service, especially with my background in software engineering where working from home has often been faster than being in the office! We love our tandem bike rides so much that we have left a tandem cruiser available for your enjoyment!

Guest access
The entire property except the storage/office upstairs that will be locked.

Other things to note
The City of Santa Cruz charges an 11% Transient Occupancy Tax
neighborhood_overview: We love our neighborhood!  We are friends with all the neighbors, and we all take pride in taking care of our spaces.  We walk to our favorite grocery store, Shopper's Corner just two short blocks away, and we are also a close walk to downtown and the beach.  We are avid cyclists, and we are happy to live in a mountain biking paradise!  We especially enjoy our nearby Sante Adairius brewery, as well as many nearby restaurants from the simple, cheap, organic Charlie Hong Kong, to higher end Lillian's or La Posta.
host_about:
We are world travellers ourselves. Along with our three children we have travelled around the world. We love decorating and improving our home, and love living in it. We enjoy people and love to share our local knowledge with guests. We enjoy inspiring and being inspired by the friends we make. We live close to most a beautiful ocean and beaches and love to get in them everyday! From kayaking, stand up paddle and traditional surfing, cycling, hiking, and photography, we do it all. The focus is fun and we will put you in the right place to maximize yours.

Meeting people from around the world and travelling are our passions. We also enjoy sharing our home with others so they can experience our bit of paradise in special unique ways. We love hosting travellers because we think our home, and the area where we live in, gives visitors a true sense of what it's like to live where we do. Come experience our home as your home. Like a Local! We want to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We look forward to hosting you soon!

name: Rustic Redwood Cabin
description:
Rustic cabin in the redwood forest. This cabin is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy the beauty of the redwoods. Cabin sleeps 7 in beds, has a full kitchen, large deck with BBQ grill and large living room with cable tv. Cabin is about 30 mins to Santa Cruz, 1 1/2 hrs to San Francisco, and 1 1/2 hrs to Carmel by the Sea.

The space
Cabin has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Cabin is made entirely of exposed redwood, and has a live redwood tree growing through the living room. Cabin has a large living room and dinning room, plenty of room for everyone.

Other things to note
Cabin is located in a neighborhood and is a quite, relaxing place to stay. Please be respectful to the neighbors and keep the noise levels to a minimum. Noise travels in the woods. If you are looking for a place to party and get loud please look at other places to stay.
neighborhood_overview: Cabin is located in a neighborhood in the redwood forest. This cabin has a very comfortable and homey feeling, and very relaxing. Cabin is 10 mins away from Boulder Creek, CA, with restaurants and shopping.

Brand new beach cottage. NOTE: 30 DAY MINIMUM STAY, NOTHING LESS. Private entrance. Queen Murphy bed. Environmentally friendly - low VOC paint, natural cork floor, energy efficient. Free Wi-fi, cable TV. Quiet and private. All linens included. Full kitchen with dishes, silverware, pans, baking dishes, blender, toaster, coffee and tea maker. 2 1/2 miles from the beach. One mile to downtown. Private sitting area with great morning sun and cool in the afternoon. Desk for workspace.

A couple or single person

Guest access
laundry, on street parking

name: Cozy Getaway in the Woods, close to Beach
description:
This cute, newly remodeled studio is like a treehouse nestled among the beautiful Redwoods of the Santa Cruz mountains, but only 7 miles (or 15 minutes) from downtown or the beach.
The space is perfect for 2 adults or a couple with 1-2 children. Due to the layout, it's not good for 4 adults. I’ve also been informed that this space is “not senior friendly,” so if you have difficulty with steps, this may not be the place for you.

The space
This cozy retreat is loft-like with pitched dormer ceilings and slanted walls. It's a small space located above a stand-alone garage, so you may hear the garage door open and close occasionally. It's bright and airy, very quiet, and surrounded by beautiful Redwood trees.
The studio is completely open, so there is no solid separation between spaces, including the bathroom.
It's perfect for a couple or 2 adults with 1-2 kids. Not set up for a group of friends or all adults. Also not good for seniors who struggle
neighborhood_overview: The studio is close to either downtown Santa Cruz (7 miles to the beach) or Capitola and only 20 minutes from Los Gatos.  There are wineries nearby as well as some great restaurants nearby. Everything is within a 15 minute drive.
host_about:
I'm a people person and love to meet new and interesting people. I love the outdoors, especially the ocean as I surf as often as I can.  I enjoy nice walks, and like to window shop and pop into a nice cafe to try local goodies. I love trying new restaurants and new types of food. 
As a guest I am very quiet, clean, and enjoy a good cup of coffee or nice glass of wine. I don't smoke or do drugs and usually go to bed by 9pm. 
As a host, I want my guests to feel like they are staying in a place that gives them a warm hug and an escape from life's many stressors. 
The motto I try to live by is kindness and authenticity :)

name: Vistamar on Seabright Beach
description:
This historic craftsman house sits on one of the best beaches in Santa Cruz, Seabright Beach. The classic and stylish house provides deluxe atmosphere unmatched by most other vacation rentals.

Built in 1928, the 2-story house sits on a corner lot with 3000 square feet of living space. The house has 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, hot tub, basement with pool/ping pong table, separate TV room with 63' HDTV, large living room, dining room and master bedroom with expansive beach views.

Other things to note
Please note that during the summer and most holidays, we have 7-night minimum.
We do make exceptions so please ask.

Total Monterey Bay View and Watsonville, large deck, Barbecue, Fire pit, Ping Pong, Hot tub, wild life, 5 acres land, trampoline, large kitchen, professional appliances, fire place, film projector, large rooms, view from every room, telescope for moon/planet sighting, fruit trees, private decks...

name: Cozy modern family beach home
description:
Cozy & spacious updated family beach home located 1 mile from the Seabright Beach, Boardwalk, harbor, & downtown! Walking distance to amazing restaurants, shops, grocery stores, pharmacies & music venues. We also provide surfboards & boogie boards for your beach day adventures! We look forward to meeting you & to equip you with the best experience in our lovely beach town!

The space
Our home has a lovely cozy living room with TV for DVD movies only, coffee table to play games, and reading area. We have a closet in the hallway full of board games, great for any family! Our dining room and kitchen is a great place for people to congregate while making dinner and mixing your favorite summer drink! We have an awesome outdoor space with an out door shower, bbq, tether ball, hoola hoops, hammock, garden and lounge areas.
Our kitchen comes fully stocked with all condiments, spices, dish ware, cooking pans, utensils, coffee maker & ground coffee, modern large refri
neighborhood_overview: Our house is one of the most centrally located areas in all of Santa Cruz. We are a mile away from the beach, Boardwalk, and downtown. We are a few blocks away from some amazing restaurants including authentic Italian, Mexican, and Vietnamese. We also have 5 grocery stores within walking distance. A few nice bars and music venues are just a block away. We have 4 pharmacies within walking distance. There are a few pharmacies within walking distance as well. Our neighborhood is a great place to go on a bike ride, run, or walk. We have a great trail to run or walk on just a few blocks away called Arana Gulch, right near the harbor, which is a lovely walk as well. We are close to the mountains for great hikes & exploration. Taking a drive up the coast is beautiful & super fun to stop at the local fruit stands, farms, wine toasting, beaches, etc. we are about 1 hour by car from the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium and the beautiful Carmel Valley. I recommend going to Refuge in Carmel if you are
host_about:
Hi! 
Thank you for taking the time to view my profile!
A little bit about me.....
I am a jewelry designer & interior designer based out of Santa Cruz, Ca. I’ve lived in Santa Cruz for over 14yrs. One of my favorite things is to share with others about my town & create a beautiful cozy space to host friends, family & Airbnb guests. It brings me joy to make others happy & to enjoy the beautiful town I’m lucky to live in.

-Ali

name: Designer Retreat w/ Hot Tub, Huge Backyard Oasis
description:
Mid-century modern lux, designer home with its own private half-acre backyard oasis and canyon, right in the middle of West Side Santa Cruz. Take a hot tub dip under the trees and watch the wildlife, yet still be walking distance to restaurants and cafes, and only a mile to the ocean or downtown. This is THE place for people who are tired of staying at airbnbs that lack amenities or aesthetic quality. There is everything you need here to enjoy a luxury vacation.

The space
The house includes a hot tub, outdoor fire pit, designer furniture and decor, fully fenced in yard for pets, eco-friendly linens and supplies, TV equipped with Netflix and more, wifi, freestanding bathtub, and a chef's kitchen. It is filled with sunlight at all times of the day and there are french doors in every room. There is a VERY comfortable king sized bed in the master bedroom and a memory foam sofa bed in the second bedroom. Don't worry, it's a super comfy sofa bed! (We have all had bad e
neighborhood_overview: Our house is only a ten minute walk to the Westside wineries and breweries collective, and lots of delicious restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores. You can rent e-bikes to the beach or downtown in 5 minutes. Our house is only a 2-minute drive to the UCSC entrance, as well. We are happy to provide any information you need on things to do in Santa Cruz.
host_about: I am a history teacher who spends my time off as an an airbnb aficionado-- both as a traveler and a host!

Embrace a luxurious and whimsical lifestyle with your first step into the Famous and Historic Windmill Silo Beach Property!

Completely updated and restored to have function yet uniqueness for owners children, friends and family in an unbelievable playful setting. Custom designed touches and color are everywhere – both homes are totally unique! The Windmill kitchen sports tangerine orange cement countertops with stainless steal cabinets. The Silo kitchen keeps pace with zince counter tops and copper nails that set off the amazing colorful textured backsplash made from recycled San Francisco bus stop glass! Since the rooms are at different angles, the cabinets and beds had to be cust

The Windmill House is one of the original historic properties and has a stand out location! Nestled against the redwood trees next to the Soquel Creek and just a 5 minute walk to the busy little surf town.

name: "Nonnie's" Canyon View Retreat
description: "Nonnie's" Canyon View Retreat is perfect for a family getaway in the Santa Cruz Mountains. Spectacular canyon views and a large home packed with charm. Nestled in the Redwoods you are a short walk to the creek, Mount Hermon Conference Center, and Roaring Camp. Just a 10 minute drive to Santa Cruz and 30 to Los Gatos, you're in the heart of it all at Nonnie's! Parking for three small cars on site. This is a quiet neighborhood so no parties, and no more than 10 people in the home at a time.
host_about:
My wife and I work with a  non-profit called "International Students Inc." We love welcoming students and scholars to Cal Poly San Luis Obispo from around the world.  We are semi-retired and have four grown children and one grandson ~ each of whom continue to love going to Nonnie's house!  We love to take walks in the forest and on the beach.  We love to eat Indian food and Chinese food and Thai food!   If I were to go back to a favorite destination it would be Guilin, China.  My wife would choose Salzberg, Austria! I enjoy playing the piano and guitar, working in the garden and feeding the birds.

We recently inherited my parent's home in Mount Hermon which is home to us and three premiere summer camps for children, youth and families.  We invite you to come and be refreshed by experiencing the beauty of God's creation from the redwood forests to the beaches of the Pacific!

description:
Incredible modern home located on a private beach in Aptos. This home was featured in Architectural Digest and is one of the nicest homes offered for rent in the area. Open, bright floor plan. Living room and master bedroom have Nano doors that allow you to open them to the size of the actual opening to give you that Lanai feel. Large tiled deck offers incredible ocean views as well as as fireplace, hot tub and plenty of furniture to lounge on.

The space
Great for adults only, as well as extended families. This magnificent home offers a game room that opens right up onto the beach front patio with separate bar with fridge and TV as well as a pool table, ping pong table, large screen TV, darts, outdoor shower and large patio with sectional sofa and gas BBQ.
All four bedrooms are located upstairs and game room located downstairs. Very high end furnishings and finishes. You will feel like you are spoiling yourself when you stay in this luxurious home

This cute home offers two bedrooms and two full baths. An open concept living area, small balcony with a small BBQ, as well as a full kitchen. It also offers off street parking. Just steps to the sand. This home has a queen bed and a twin over full bunk in the guest bedroom.

Parking area can fit a full size mini van, however the garage works best for small to mid size cars.
