name: 750sqft/2rooms/pvt entrance, quiet neighborhood
description:
Your guest suite includes 1) private entry with smart lock 2) living area with queen bed, couch, tv, microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator, kitchen utensils and 3) en suite bedroom featuring a queen bed, dresser and large closet. The entire unit spans 750sq ft.

You’ll have shared access to a beautiful backyard which includes a grill, hammock, fire pit, waterfall, couches, lounge chairs, an abundance of trees, sun, and sometimes morning fog.

Guest access
Please use the driveway for unloading and loading only and park your vehicle on the street. Thank you.

Other things to note
Trash/recycle pick up: Tuesday morning. Trash and recycle bins are located next to the garage if you wish to remove your trash. Extra trash bags are available on bottom of waste basket.

Gardeners/house cleaners: Thursday mid-day for about two hours.

If using electric heater, please turn off before running any appliances, especially hai
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Rolling Woods where you’ll find tree lined streets, gentle hills, peace and quiet except for the occasional leaf blower. Privacy and tranquility prevail. Please feel at home and ask if there is anything you need to make your stay complete. For example, early check-in or check-out are possible. Would you like suggestions where to eat, sightsee or need directions? Please ask!

The most special part of the Rolling Woods neighborhood is its proximity to Henry Cowell State Park which is two blocks. Tie up your boots and hike or hop on your mountain bike without getting in the car! Rolling Woods is also close to Silicon Valley (approximately 20 miles) and some of the world’s finest beaches (5miles).

name: Cozy, beach vibe, spacious room
description:
Super cute, cozy & spacious room. The guest bathroom is right next door. Everything is recently updated with new paint, decor & extremely comfy mattress. There is a closet, dresser & desk set up for any work or art our guests would like to do. This room can fit 3 people ( extra fee after 2 people)there is a full size bed and a twin size floor mattress. Our family is super low key, we have a 9 yr old & friendly bull dog that stays outside most of the time. We look forward to hosting you!

The space
This room is centrally located 1 mile from the beach, Boardwalk, & downtown. It’s just a few blocks away from some of the most amazing restaurants, grocery stores, and shopping. This listing is for a guest bedroom and bathroom. Everything is recently updated, clean & cozy.

Guest access
Quest access is through our front door. You then enter through the living room to your room, about 20 ft. Next door in the hallway is the bathroom access.
neighborhood_overview: We are located 1 mile from Seabright beach, The Boardwalk and downtown. We live a few blocks away to many amazing restaurants, grocery stores and pharmacies. We are located in between West Side Santa Cruz and Capitals, about a 10 min drive.
host_about:
Hi! 
Thank you for taking the time to view my profile!
A little bit about me.....
I am a jewelry designer & interior designer based out of Santa Cruz, Ca. I’ve lived in Santa Cruz for over 14yrs. One of my favorite things is to share with others about my town & create a beautiful cozy space to host friends, family & Airbnb guests. It brings me joy to make others happy & to enjoy the beautiful town I’m lucky to live in.

-Ali

name: Sun Savvy ~ Just Steps to the Beach
description:
NOTICE: Due to Santa Cruz County Covid-19 Ordinances, I am not allowed to offer shared use of house 'common spaces', only the master bedroom with private bath and outside entrance. The outside amenities are still available.

Located on a quiet 'no outlet' street....steps to the sand and one of only 9 World Surfing Reserves! Resident only traffic makes this an idyllic neighborhood...you can even hear the waves break. Two lagoons with nature trails and a very large beach are a few minutes walk.

The space
A roomy 1200 sq.ft house (2 BR, 2 BA) on 6000 sq.ft lot offers privacy and room to roam.
Your master bedroom is 13'x12' plus a large lighted closet with racks & shelves, private tiled bathroom with tub/shower and your own sliding glass door to the large backyard. Discretion is assured as there are no shared walls between bedrooms.
The Tempur-Pedic king bed has soft 100% cotton linens, fluffy non-allergic pillows and cozy down comforter.
Gu
neighborhood_overview:
What you find in walking distance (1-2 km)
~ Quaint beach village, wharf, cliffs & coves.
~ Picturesque yacht harbor with watercraft rentals.
~ Sand volleyball courts, free beach parties with
live bands.
~ Restaurants offering fresh seafood, views, and a
dozen international cuisines plus micro-brewery
pubs.
~ Weekly local farmers market, Trader Joes,
Whole Foods, other organic, regular & ethnic
food markets, award-winning coffee bistros.
~ Ocean view library, theaters, large medical clinic.
~ a full array of merchants, salons, olympic swim center,
fitness clubs and climbing walls.
host_about:
Growing up surfing brought me to Santa Cruz.....and I never left. 
I won't live without clean air, pure water, art & Nature. 
A bit uncompromising yet spending a lifetime self-employed has, more or less, allowed me to live on my own terms. 
I was a retail merchant of beachwear & skateboards, transitioning into manufacture of skateboards/wheels and sponsoring the 1978 World Champion Downhill Racing Team.

The next two decades, I turned an avocation into a vocation, as a wine wholesaler. 
Then followed another decade as  a  producer and marketer of  an artisanal California extra virgin olive oil, which the LA Times twice nominated as one of the 'Top Five Calif. Olive Oils of the Year'. 
Lately I have been managing a private sports lodge in North Lake Tahoe.

name: Oceanview Aloha Living In Seascape
description:
Oceanview Seascape home offers inviting private room & bath. Enjoy amenities of a coastal resort community home, perfectly situated in a cul-de-sac, at a fraction of the cost of local accommodations. Walk to the beach, resort & village. Enjoy restaurants, surfing, biking & golf. Relax in hot tub after a game on the sport-court. Walk out the back door & hike the 200-acre nature preserve with breathtaking views of Monterey Bay. Ample in-room refreshments are provided. An Aloha time is guaranteed!

The space
Refreshments include purified water, juices, teas, coffeemaker with fresh ground caffeinated & decaf coffee, snacks, cookies, fresh fruit, & breakfast biscotti. Dogs are absolutely welcome, & our neighborhood is renowned as a canine-friendly community! We are fully stocked with basketball, squash, badminton & cornhole/bean bag toss equipment for your enjoyment on the sport-court.

Guest access
Your private room and attached bath, living room
host_about: I especially enjoy meeting new people and making them feel welcome. My husband and I love to cook, entertain and enjoy good conversation.  I volunteer in many different capacities. Among my interests are jewelry making, gardening and hiking.  As a performer in two  local troupes I sing, tap dance, and direct cabaret shows. People tell me they enjoy my sense of humor and fun-loving spirit.

name: Quiet Sunny Room in Santa Cruz
description:
Sunny spacious upstairs bedroom with vaulted ceilings and comfy queen size bed.

Enjoy staying at this centrally located beautiful Santa Cruz home by the yacht harbor, just ¾ mile from Twin Lakes beach and 5 minute drive to downtown. Many nice coffee shops and restaurants close by (Harbor Café, Crows Nest, Java Junction, Linda’s Seabreeze Café, Charlie Hong-Kong’s, Dharma’s)

The space
Very close to many natural food shops: Staff of Life, New Leaf and Whole foods… where you can get outstanding organic produce as well as smoothies, veggie drinks and hot bar food.

Guest access
Guest is encouraged to use the dining and kitchen areas as needed, but other areas of the house are private and not permitted for guest use. Common areas are kept clean and neat. Dishes, pans and some cabinet space are available as well as fridge space. Lovely backyard with deck and slate tile patio.
neighborhood_overview: House is quiet, especially after 9pm. House and neighborhood are very clean and quiet.
host_about: Santa Cruz resident for over 35 years.  After a 20 year computer engineering career I became a massage therapist, nutritionist and author. I value my alone time, am very quiet but also am a good resource to answer questions especially about ideas for healthy things to do in Santa Cruz.

VERY CLEAN. We are committed to Airbnb's Enhanced Cleaning Protocol.

name: Sparrow Valley Retreat- Social Distancing Retreat
description:
Practice social distancing with a Sauna and soaking tub. Get away from the Chaos.

Beautiful, private, relaxing, quiet cabin nestled in the Redwoods. With a large wrap around deck, outdoor bar, tree swing, rock climbing tree, outdoor tub, sauna, and hiking trails to the creek, anyone will feel recharged after a couple night stay. Guest will have full access to our off grid cozy cabin, with chopped wood to start a fire, full kitchen, internet, a claw foot tub with a modern Boho-chic feel.

The space
This cabin is located on 12 acres of pristine Redwood forest, surrounding my hawks, owls and rich ecosystems.
We have had many guests comment on insects and animals. Be aware that there is a possible spider web or potential mouse. We do our best to clean webs and trap mice. However, there might be one or two that we miss. If you are afraid of wild life or insects you may encounter them on our property.

Guest access
Please no on
neighborhood_overview: There are a few property mates living on property. They are private and you can not see or hear them from the cabin.  The closest neighbors is a few acres away and asks that people drive very slow past her house because of dogs and dust.
host_about: We are a family of four who like to travel the world, eat amazing food and do outdoor activities.  We have been working hard on our property for the past four years.  Our property is off grid with all the amenities needed to be a happy, comfortable and relax. We are fun loving, energetic and always inspired by new ideas and projects.  Come check out our amazing property and get away from it all. Work on that book that you have been putting aside or just disconnect and sit in our custom made sauna and soaking tub.

name: Bessie
description:
Bessie is a very livable 30' Silver Streak trailer set on beautiful flat, sunny land just a stone's throw from the coast. Set at 1000' elevation just above Davenport, the climate is ideal year round. There is a full kitchen and bath although the shower and trailer are not ideal for tall guests. I know your pet is the cutest pet in the world and so amazing it’s almost human but I still cannot allow them.

The space
Guests can enjoy dining outside or at the built-in counter indoors. Bessie is set in a sunny spot bordering a Christmas tree farm. The 10 minute drive to Davenport or the 20 minute drive to Santa Cruz is very scenic and pleasant. There is limited cell service in Bonny Doon but Bessie does have WiFi.

Other things to note
We have great well water so please do not bring water in plastic bottles. I’m involved with Save Our Shores and am very interested in getting people to stop using single use plastic.
neighborhood_overview: The space is generally very peaceful but we are in a neighborhood so you might hear kids, mowers or other equipment at times.  At night coyotes and owls are common and the crows like sunrise.  Occasionally the stray peacock, wild turkey or rooster can be heard in the distance.  I do have a neighbor with very bright lights at night which does not impact the interior but stargazing immediately outside can be compromised.
host_about: I was raised in Santa Cruz and have called Bonny Doon home since 1998.  I love to travel, hike, practice yoga and work on the land.   I am very knowledgable about the area and am happy to help you  plan your stay while you are here.

this apartment is located on the bottom floor of the main house. Private kitchen includes oven, fridge, microwave, and toaster

We Love Aptos Santa Cruz and have many suggestions for you regarding the unbeatable experiences in this area.

name: Ocean view studio in Capitola Village - Location!
description:

Only 20 minutes north of Monterey, the location offers one-and-a-half miles of secluded pristine beaches, and a plethora of choices for your vacation, including just hanging out on the beach and taking in the spectacular sunsets.

description:
Light and beachy, this cozy downstairs rental will become your home away from home. Just a few steps from the beach, you can play on the sand all day then take a short walk into Capitola Village where there are many restaurants, bars, and shops. The cities of Santa Cruz (Beach Boardwalk) and Monterey (aquarium) are a short drive away, as are several state parks. Let Capitola be your hideaway while you explore all the beauty and fun experiences this lively area has to offer.

The space
Situated in the second row from the water, the Dolphin House (the downstairs unit) is just steps from the beach.

We can provide towels and bedding for 4 people. Free parking is available (in specific locations as noted on the parking permit) with the parking permit provided upon your arrival.
host_about: I grew up coming to Capitola and am so happy to offer other families a chance to build joyous memories like I did both as a young person and with my own kids. Though recently renovated, the Dolphin House has been in our family since the 1970's. I love to travel myself, so I know how wonderful it is to find that "home away from home" feeling where one can truly absorb their surroundings. May the Dolphin House be that home away from home for you!

Sunny Seabright 3 Bedroom/1 Bath. Affordable, Comfy AND great location. Walking distance to the Boardwalk, Wharf, Harbor, nearby restaurants and bars, and beautiful Seabright Beach.

The space
Our place on Park Ave consists of 2 separate units. This is the upstairs unit. The 3 bedroom/1 bath is 1000 sq ft. The kitchen opens up to the living room area and is stocked with all the basic cooking utensils needed and miscellaneous extra's, pots and pans, bowls etc..
There is olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, basic seasonings, coffee pot, filters (I keep coffee on hand) tea, sugar, and some non perishable snacks. Also dish soap, basic cleaners, hand sanitizer, paper towels, foil, saran wrap. The bathroom is stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hand soap (as well as a basket of misc toiletries) We have plenty of board games and cards. The place is perfect for a group of 6-8.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is in  a quiet residential area with a blend of permanent residents and vacation homes.  We have great neighbors that keep a watchful eye on the area.   What everyone loves best about our place is that there is so much to see and do that is within walking distance.   My favorite nearby places are, The Seabright Brewery,  Tramonti Italian (owned and operated by Italians!), Betty's Burgers, Linda's Seabreeze Cafe (best breakfast in Santa Cruz).  Engfer Pizza also nearby and for the coffee connoisseur, you have to check out Verve Coffee.   Days Market located next to Tramonti's, is a quirky little market that has been there for well over 50 years, and has a little bit of everything.   Personally love to walk to the harbor, sit out at Aldo's and watch the boats, or a bit further you can go over to the Crows Nest restaurant and bar next to the harbor and at the beach.  A morning or evening walk to the wharf is always nice.  And did I mention the Boardwalk is close by? In fa
host_about: I have been an  RN for 30 years now, the past 18 have been with the VA.  I enjoy my work very much.  Also I am a runner,  I started a running program end of March in 2013.  First a 10k, then half marathons, a marathon, and found myself at my first Boston Marathon in 2015.  I have 3 children, 29, 26 and 20.  My youngest is in the Army.  My husband Roy  is retired from IT, but now has a business building custom sheds.  I enjoy traveling, especially to Italy , meeting people and being a host of my family's beach place in Santa Cruz.

name: Coho Beach House: walk to beach & shops, sleeps 10
description:
Welcome to our beautiful Santa Cruz beach house. Here, you will have the best of both worlds: You will be within walking distance of the beach, as well as coffee shops and more, but at the same time you will enjoy a peaceful, quiet retreat, with plenty of free parking space. This large, airy house is bright and modern and offers all the amenities of a true home, including a gourmet kitchen. It is the ideal place for a comfortable weekend or a longer getaway in the best possible setting.

The space
This 2,500 sq ft beach themed house, built around 2009, is comfortable and immaculately clean. With its bright spaces and high ceilings, it provides ample room for a large family or for a small group.

* The four bedrooms, two downstairs and two upstairs, are spacious and private.

* The master bedroom, with its king size bed, is tucked away in a downstairs suite with its own bathroom, including a walk in shower. It offers direct access to the out
neighborhood_overview: The Pleasure Point neighborhood offers a wonderful setting for your Santa Cruz stay.  It is wedged between Downtown Santa Cruz and Capitola, which are both within minutes of our house by car. Pleasure Point itself borders the ocean with its own beach, a beautiful beachfront promenade and a prime surfing spot. They all lay within walking distance from our house. Pleasure Point also offers a vibrant business district with a good selection of coffee shops, café and restaurants, also within walking distance. Yet our house stands on a quiet, peaceful block, of mostly family homes.  You can enjoy the ocean and city amenities, and then relax in your retreat nestled on a flag lot.
host_about:
The Coho Beach House is a great place to hang out and relax. You can walk to the beach, ride bikes, surf and lots more. There are lots of great restaurants and shops to visit. I’m easy going, creative and helpful. I want your stay and the Coho Beach House to be fun and safe. 


Interaction with guests:

Your host won’t be on the property but they’ll be available for anything you need during your stay.

name: Santa Cruz Studio w/ Private Yard
description:
A sunny little private spot, equipped with a private fenced yard with a fire pit, a kitchenette, and a cozy queen sized bed.

The space
Cute little studio with plenty of sunshine, a fully fenced private yard with a fire pit, Keurig Coffee machine, French press, and electric water kettle for morning coffee/tea, Full refrigerator, bathroom, a queen sized bed, and Apple TV.

neighborhood_overview: We love living here because of its close proximity to our local elementary school, and the large open fields surrounding us. It feels like country living but we are 2 min from the highway, and 7 min from the beach! Centrally located and gorgeous sunsets  are our favorite things about this space. We are about 10 minutes away from the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, 5 minutes to local beaches, and about 6-7 minutes to Downtown Santa Cruz.
host_about: A fellow Airbnb host, love to travel and explore new places! I’m a very clean and tidy host and traveler, and attention to detail  is something I greatly value. name: Redwood TreeHouse in Aptos Mountain Retreat & Spa
description:
Om Oasis is a beautiful and lush retreat center on several acres of a remote and peaceful 15 acre mountain top property. We host guests who wish to connect with the beauty of nature and experience peace. We are 10-15 minutes up the mountain and partially off-grid with little to no cell reception but with a great WiFi connection. There are a total of 6 guest accommodations (including this one) spread out over our developed 3 acres, making it always a very private experience and easy to distance.

The space
This brand new tree house accommodates up to 4 guests and is placed among towering Redwoods. This clean and elegant space comes equipped with a full kitchen, modern and lux bathroom, a living room with a pull out couch revealing a full bed, and a comfortable king size bed located atop a loft adorned by an octagonal hand crafted cedar panel ceiling and skyview. For reference, this tree house is 2 feet shorter and smaller in diameter than our cozier Cedar Tree Ho
neighborhood_overview:
We are located on a ridge top with excellent views of the sunset, moon, and stars. We're also ten minutes from the town of Aptos where you'll find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery/health food stores, and boutiques. The entrance to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Sea Cliff State Beach and Rio Del Mar State Beach are all just 12-15 minutes from our home.

PLEASE NOTE that we live on a windy private country road (not maintained by the city) with two-way traffic and parts that become one lane at times. Please drive carefully and be aware of this.
host_about: Hi there! Raine & her family live part time in Hawai'i/ part time at our beautiful Retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California.  Emberlie is the on-site manager, overseeing the property and booking. She provides body work and yoga classes, sound healing and spa services... with the intention to care for you during your stay! Happy Travels & welcome OM.

name: GLAMP with a Gourmet Breakfast!
description:
Glamp in a beautiful redwood glade in pure comfort! Your canvas cabin has a queen four poster bed with fine, fluffy linens that you will want to dive into. Awake each morning to a wake up tray with coffee or tea, delivered right to your tent! Savor a real farm to table breakfast served alfresco, (included). Take a refreshing dip in the pool or hot tub. Your private bath is just 100 feet away, yet your glamp site is private with no other tents or buildings in sight! No children please.

The space
We have high hygiene standards at our very small 4 room BnB. In response to COVID-19, we are following best practices of increased cleaning and disinfecting from the CDC, Santa Cruz Health Department and the California Hotel and Lodging Association. We use approved CDC cleaners and steam sanitization of soft goods like pillows and comforters. Public spaces are disinfected frequently during the day. Guestrooms and entries are widely separated and breakfast service is at s
neighborhood_overview: Just 3 miles from the exquisite Pacific Ocean Beaches, but set in the Giant redwoods of Bonny Doon. Surfing nearby, fish at our pond, hike Wilder Ranch or Henry Cowell trails a few miles away, visit Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and Pier, 9 miles away.
host_about:
My love of food, cooking, wine and art has lead me on a lifelong journey. Years ago, I was a restauranteur in Chicago, then a full time studio potter, then a career in corporate sales and marketing.

I've traveled extensively, usually on a quest to find indigenous, traditional regional foods. Desert beans in India, grilled squid from a street vendor in Hong Kong, fresh rambutan in Thailand, black mole in Mexico, and hay soup in Austria are just a few memorable tastes. I am inspired by these experiences and I cook with international flavors.

A few years ago, I began to dream about having a farm where I could produce more of the foods, meats, and wines that I love. That dream came true when we bought FlipJack Ranch. Ranch life suits me, waking up to gather fresh eggs, cuddling the baby chicks and baby bunnies,  walking out to see the garden with a cup of coffee in hand. The whole 'farm to table' thing is real here on the ranch and the sustainable, organic and free range food products are my inspiration for daily menus. I love to forage too, here or nearby,  bringing back mushrooms, salad greens or mussels for the table. 

As a traveler myself, I value warm hospitality and those little things that make a stay memorable. I love it when I can go to a place and just unwind, assured that everything is there and I can just relax. I hope to make your stay with us memorable.

name: 318 Seacliff Beach House
description:
3 Bedroom + Media Room, 2.5 bath home short walk to beach and restruraunts!

The space
Relax on the deck with ocean view (and see Monterey's lights twinkling at night across the bay), or take a short 400 foot walk to the Beach Gate Steps to Seacliff State Beach where there are miles of sand, picnic tables and esplanade for walking – and the famous Concrete Boat. Check out the playful seals, otters and occasional dolphin on your stroll along the beach. You can even enjoy having a bonfire on the beach, and roasting marshmallows or making smores.
Enjoy the open ambiance of this professionally decorated 3 Bedroom, 2-1/2 Bath smoke free home which sleeps 8, and has a gas Fireplace, a 6 burner gas BBQ, Jacuzzi, Flatscreen LCD TV with Comcast, VCR, DVD & CD, Wireless Internet (WiFi), Books, Board Games, and two Trail Bikes. The house has every amenity you could want with a new kitchen, hardwood floors and tasteful furniture, and a pantry stocked with condiments.
host_about:
Kendall & Potter was established as a real estate company in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The brokers Skipper Kendall and William Pottermoved to Aptos to fulfill their dream of working in a small town in Santa Cruz County. In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , they expanded their services to include property management and relocation from Santa Cruz to Monterey Coast.

Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

Rita has worked for Kendall & Potter in the property management and the Santa Cruz real estate industry for 20 years. A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. Current member of California Association of Realtors CAR and National Association of Property Managers, NARPM.

Kendall & Potter Property Management offers a variety of home services – including complete property management services, leases on unfurnished properties and rental homes in Santa Cruz, as well as Monterey Coast & Santa Cruz vacation rentals management and corporate housing.

name: Jewell by the Sea
description:
Jewell by the Sea beach house perfect for a family getaway near Rio Del Mar Beach. This bright and airy home has a beautiful covered outdoor dining room that seats up to 10 people complete with fans, chandelier, TV and patio heater. The backyard has a jacuzzi hot tub, patio, TV, and complete entertaining tiki bar! Beautiful updated kitchen with skylights and open beam ceiling is welcoming and open to the living space with bar seating for up to 6 people. We love this house and so will you !

The space
We are walking distance to Rio Del Mar Beach, the local grocery store and restaurants. Once you arrive, you can put the car keys away and walk to your local destinations. If you want to drive - you can head to either Santa Cruz or Monterey in minutes. Just a few minutes away is beautiful Nisene Marks Park and there are plenty of local wineries and micro breweries in the area.

Guest access
The driveway has space for at least three cars and
neighborhood_overview: Just a 10 minute walk to the beaches!  Rio Del Mar Beach also has free parking if you don't want to walk and there are a couple of little stores and restaurants right there.  You can also walk to Hidden Beach, a little more secluded and it has a small park at the entrance.  There is a summer rental shop at Rio Del Mar Beach if looking for surfboard, boogie boards and other beach essentials.  The coffee shop (Flats Bistro) is a perfect start for your morning walk along the beach trail.   Also, a 10 minute walk from our place is a full grocery store (Deluxe Foods), restaurants, drug store, nail salon, and bank.  If you are a golfer - Seascape Golf Course is a mile away.
host_about: Steve and Cindy have a Boston Terrier named Lucy.  We travel a lot to see our kids that live in different parts of the state and love to stay in homes instead of stuffy hotels.  We also have a home in the mountains listed on AirBnB so we know what it's like to have guests in our home.

description:

Many extras including television, DVD player with a small assortment of movies, microwave, AM/FM radio, fan, portable heater, ROKU streaming stick including Netflix, WI-FI, and plenty of outlets. neighborhood_overview: A quiet neighborhood — street parking only for this residence. The woods and hiking paths are just across the street. Many biking paths nearby. World famous Frisbee golf course, and Shakespeare Center within walking distance. Very close to grocery and food outlets. Not far from beach and downtown.
host_about: I am a person of many collections. I live and breathe art of many types, but tend to specialize in lit sculptures and costuming. I enjoy playing music with others. I am physically active and especially love swimming. I have 2 dogs and a whole bunch of birds. I am a writer of fiction stories, but — I am a storyteller by nature and have a vast and vivid imagination at my disposal. I appreciate the craftsmanship of earlier times, which is how came in to my life.

name: Pleasure Point Beach Cottage-
description:
Located in prime Pleasure Point area of Santa Cruz! Less than 50 ft from ocean and 2 blocks to world class surf and beaches. Recently updated beach unit is close to everything, but in a quiet location. Unit has living area, dining area, large bedroom with king sized bed, small bath and kitchen. Very small peek of the ocean from dining/living room window. Walk/ride to both 41st Ave and Capitola spots like Whole Foods, Verve Coffee, Penny Creamery, Pleasure Pizza and Gayle's. Prefer monthly.

The space

Yet, only steps to great beaches and surf, a wonderful scenic walk/bikeway along the ocean that takes you to 41st Ave and all the way to Capitola. It's a great little beach getaway for those living in Silicon Valley that want to get away or someone needing a short term place to live. Recently updated too!
host_about: I was raised in Monterey, CA and absolutely love the beach! Pleasure Point is my favorite beach area on the north coast because it is close to the Bay Area. Plus, great weather, lots of outdoor activities and lovely community. I love running on the beach path into Capitola, riding my bike to all the shops and restaurants and of course going to the beach with the family.

A simple and cozy abode for couple's getaway, outdoor enthusiasts, or solo travelers. Tucked away in a residential cul-de-sac with easy access to the harbor and local beaches via 2 complimentary beach cruisers.

Completed with a semi-outdoor restroom and hammock, the Savasana Studio is a great alternative for a relaxing and cost-effective way to stay in Santa Cruz!

The space
The space

BOHO 10'x12' studio with expansive deck to soak up the sun, nap or read a book in the hammock with a beer/wine in hand. The cozy and comfortable loft bed will certainly make you feel rejuvenated for more adventures! The studio has it's own private entrance and rests behind the main house in a residential cul-de-sac.

Savasana studio is perfect throughout Spring, Summer and Fall, however, due to the outdoor-focused setting, bathroom trips during cold winter nights are not for the faint of heart. Bring warm jammies!

name: Santa Cruz Beloved
description:
Santa Cruz! The best place to free up. Come enjoy the gorgeous California West Coast and breathe in the fresh Pacific Ocean air. Open for business and ready to serve you. Santa Cruz is a very special place. We are within easy walking to great surfing, Pacific Ocean beaches and cliffs, and the famous Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk amusement park. Easy drive or bike ride to mountains with glorious redwood trees. Minutes from Highway One north to San Francisco or south to Carmel and exquisite Big Sur.

The space
Santa Cruz Beloved is relaxing and charming. You sleep in a cozy cabana and enjoy a private patio space. The photos tell the story.

Other things to note
You have a private lockable sleeping cabana.
You will leave that sleeping space for the private toilet and shower. In the patio is your "kitchen" with personal refrigerator and limited cooking area (double burner hot plate). It is comfortable. It's an indoor/outdoor living experience.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is called "The Circles".
It is perfectly located near the water, convenient shopping, great restaurants, surfing, and all the best Santa Cruz has to offer.
host_about:
We are from Santa Cruz, Ca USA.
We are a couple in our 60's.

It's my pleasure to make your stay here relaxing and rejuvenating. Experience the comforts of home only a half mile away from the beach in Aptos/Rio Del Mar.
The room will be abiding by the Cleaning Disinfecting Process during this time
Be safe and enjoy life

We value your privacy, that is why we have installed a private gated entrance exclusively for our guests. Your master suite provides a quality queen bed and a private bathroom. neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Rio Del Mar Our neighborhood is quiet, friendly and well established. We all watch out for one another. Please be respectful of your surroundings. You will have a spacious parking space. This location is optimal for exploring the area. We are a half mile away from Rio Del Mar beach. There are also several other






beaches close by. Our town neighbors Carmel and Monterey should you wish to explore Carmel by the Sea or Cannery Row. Additionally, we are close to many national parks like Nicene, Point Lobos, and Ano Nuevo. If you have a passion for wildlife there's whale watching in Moss Landing.

Enjoy a peaceful bench while admiring the crashing waves and sipping your morning coffee. Live the beach lifestyle; bikes, wetsuits, beach gear, & more all for your use! Perfect for families or a group of adults.

description:
Studio Cruz is a private, fully furnished abode above our garage. It has a private entrance with a key code lock for your convenience. Inside you will find a queen sized bed, loveseat sofa, reclining chair, small kitchen area with sink, refrigerator & microwave & your own private bathroom. County permit #CO01929.

All are welcome here.

Thank you!

The space
This studio or mother-in-law suite is located in the downstairs of a single family home. It is private with a separate entrance from the back of the house. Guest access
Access to private backyard. The
neighborhood_overview: Located in a quaint, safe and quiet residential neighborhood. A short walk to the beach or town. Close to Seacliff restaurants and shops (Manuel's Mexican, Pizza One, Mary Anne’s Ice Cream, Ambrosia Indian food).  Burger in Aptos is a bar/restaurant close by that offers casual dining as well. Safeway grocery store, Aptos natural foods, and AJ’s natural food store both within 1-2 miles. A short walk from the house on Seacliff (0.2 miles away) will give you an incredible view of the Monterey Bay. A 2-3 mile drive to Capitola village and Rio Del Mar. Only 8-10 miles from the westside of Santa Cruz, downtown Santa Cruz and UCSC. Only about 6 miles to the harbor. Take a sailboat cruise from the harbor on the Chardonnay or O’Neil Charter. Take a surf lesson at Cowells. See the elephant seals at Año Nuevo. Kayak or bird/whale watch and eat great sea food at Moss Landing just 14 miles south. This cozy cottage has everything you need for a romantic and relaxing beach getaway!   The Cottage sleeps 4, and features lots of natural light with a modern and stylish decor, very comfortable beds, and all cooking/living supplies provided. Hardwood floors throughout, with granite kitchen countertops, open kitchen and living area, and private enclosed backyard with outside patio seating, and outdoor shower. This location is ideal!! Only a 4 minute, flat walk to the sand at Twin Lakes Beach! 6 minute walk to the Santa Cruz Harbor, The Crow's Nest Restaurant, and the coffee and gift shops located in the Harbor.

name: Cliff House in the Vineyards - Sage Room
description:
Enjoy a relaxing vacation or a weekend retreat in our spectacular home in the Santa Cruz Mountains. We are perched atop an incredible mountain vista, surrounded by more than a dozen nearby wineries. This area is known for some of the best Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinotage wineries in California. The experience is authentic and unhurried, with no crowds, wonderful people, and of course, wonderful wine.

The space
Sit in the hot tub and enjoy a glass of wine while looking over the tops of the redwoods in majestic Santa Cruz mountains!

Cliff House in the Vineyards is a 5000 SF luxury home perched on top of the Santa Cruz Mountains and is the perfect place for a romantic getaway, for hiking aficionados and for wine lovers.

The upper floor has a large common area including a bar and lounge area, dining room, a 2000 SF slate deck and gourmet kitchen, with picturesque views of mountain and vineyards.

This listing is for a deluxe, priv
neighborhood_overview: Cliff House is located on a well maintained private road with fast easy access from both Los Gatos and Capitola.  It is less than 3 minutes from the gourmet Summit Store.
host_about:
Linnea and I love wine, wineries, and the Santa Cruz Mountain wineries in particular. We frequently visited them for day trips from the valley but we couldn’t stay overnight as there were no accommodations. We serendipitously came across Cliff House, situated right in the middle of our very favorite wineries, so we made a life change from a city life immersed in stress, to what has become a beautiful vacation-forever retreat for us..

The house has four separated MBR suites on the lower floor enabling privacy for up to four couples (like a hotel).  The upper floor is a dream for those who want to enjoy one of the most scenic views in California. We are also very social, so we then took the next plunge into building an AirBNB which we wanted to feel and look like a charming, traditional BNB. Privacy in a natural wonder when you want it, and a social setting on the upper floor for those who want it. The Cliff House’s 5000 SF footprint, with a 2000 SF slate deck facing the sunset over the panoramic canyons and mountains has entranced everyone we know who have visited us here.

We still both work in the valley and we are passionate about our work, but we also love working on Cliff House and meeting wonderful people.

We hope to welcome you Cliff House in the Vineyards soon!

name: Fuente de Amor - A Glampzebo Oasis!
description:
Come to Santa Cruz and go Glamping in your private eco - gazebo - studio. Water cascades all night long as you dream. This little unit has everything you will need and more! Stay warm with a wonderful mattress heat pad and fireplace. Prefer to be outside... we got you covered! Relax by the outdoor firepit, play a game of bocce, snuggle up and enjoy your escape after spending a great day biking, hiking or playing in the ocean! Let go of the norm and let the outdoors in at Fuente de Amor.

The space
A good amount of love went into making a space that we could enjoy and now we want to share it with the world! At Fuente de Amor you will find a modern enclosed gazebo space in the center of a 1 acre farm setting. We offer a spectacular queen size bed with down comforter, 1/2 bathroom, 40 " Electric Fireplace, gas fire pit, outdoor shower, coffee / tea station and best of all a mesmerizing rock / flagstone waterfall to lull you to sleep!

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
We are directly north of Santa Cruz Downtown by 4.3 miles. Sitting on an acre of gentle sloped land dotted with oak, fir and redwood trees.
Our next door neighbors Ed and Helen are nice people that have lived here for over 40 years. They are avid collectors of building materials and boats. Please don't let their clutter distract you from enjoying your stay.
This unit is not in the woods. We are central to Scotts Valley and Santa Cruz!
host_about: I have been a Vacation Property Manager for Beach and Bays Vacation and Real Estate Services here in Santa Cruz Co. since 2013. Hosting Vacation rentals is my passion and maintaining a perfect balance between guest experience and owner satisfaction is my main objective. A mom with 2 teen age kids and 1 giant Newfoundland keep me on my toes but don't worry, your home will be in great care when I am in charge!  Looking forward to meeting  with you!

name: Beautiful room with private entrance
description:
Excellent location with easy access to Highway 1 and beaches.

We live in the same house as the listing and are the parents of two young children who are full of unbridled enthusiasm (and we have two kittens which only add to the energy in the house). You will hear squeals of joy, the pitter patter of footsteps, screams of dismay, and they wake up early (6 am!) If your goal is quiet and relaxation, this is not the listing for you. Pets welcome for an additional fee.

The space
Please read our full description before requesting to book. While we think that we have an amazing room to share with the AirBnB community, we know that it isn't going to be the best fit for everyone.

Beautiful bedroom with private entrance. Queen bed with an adjustable sleep number mattress to provide you with a restful night’s sleep. Your personal and recently renovated bathroom is located right outside your bedroom door and is stocked with towels, shampoo, condition
neighborhood_overview: We live in the charming family-oriented neighborhood of Live Oak located right in the middle of Santa Cruz. Our house is just 10 mins to downtown or the boardwalk or Capitola shops and beaches in the other direction.  We are one mile from 41st ave dining and shops, great locals beaches like Sunny Cove and walking distance to coffee shops, parks, and the Sunday Farmers Market.
host_about:
My husband, Jasper, and I are long-time residents of Santa Cruz. Our two small children keep us busy and fill our hearts with joy. We enjoy exploring the world as a family (recent visits include New Zealand and a Baja road trip), and we always seem to be plotting our next adventure. We are both local teachers and surfers. In our down time you can often find our family at the beach, farmers market or planning our next meal. We all love to eat!  

We are excited to open our home, and are happy to share all things great about this city.

name: 5+BD Victorian house Steps To Beach Boardwalk!
description:
PLEASE read ALL INFO below about the space CAREFULLY before booking!!

Welcome to Beach Hill, one of the most sought out neighborhoods in Santa Cruz. My cozy family-friendly Newly UPDATED & REMODELED, 1868 Painted Lady purple Victorian home is a quick and easy walk to the BEACH, BOARDWALK OR DOWNTOWN to the restaurants, bars, & cafes! View the beautiful Pacific Ocean as you step outside, and enjoy the soothing ocean breeze. This is your perfect destination to escape and relax, in paradise.

The space
1. **ATTENTION! VERY IMPORTANT TO READ THIS BEFORE REQUESTING TO BOOK!**

Airbnb collects occupancy tax for different areas of Santa Cruz, and on other listings you will see the tax on the check out line when you book. However, because of my location in the city limits, I must collect it and remit it myself. I so wish that Airbnb could collect it for me like the other listings but the city will just not allow it. Thus, I am forced to request it
neighborhood_overview: We are located on Beach Hill, a three minute walk down the hill takes you to Main Beach, with tons of restaurants, the boardwalk, and downtown is just a few blocks away. This is a very quiet residential neighborhood that is close to everything.
host_about:
Hello, I am Rex Solway! I have lived in Santa Cruz my entire life and know the town like the back of my hand. I enjoy traveling, fine dining, photography, and the ocean -- I wouldn't be able to live far from the beach! I would like to call myself an avid sushi lover, die hard Survivor fan, adore cats (but no worries if you have allergies, no kitties live here!), and often find myself critiquing the films and shows I watch with friends and family. I worship the sun, but thrive under the moon and the stars when it's dark outside. I’m always looking for the next adventure that awaits around the corner. 

I am personally dedicated to providing the best possible experience for you and your family, and will do my best to create a unique experience you'll never forget!

name: Sky Ranch
description:
Beautiful retreat in the Santa Cruz Mountains. We are doing a deep cleaning after every guest and will wipe down every surface including door handles, nobs, coutertops, appliances, etc with anti-microbial cleaners every cleaning.

This is an excellent mountain retreat with beautiful ocean views.
This is a wonderful one bedroom 400 sq. ft. home with a wrap around deck for relaxing into the evening.
The ranch is centrally located between San Jose and Santa Cruz in Los Gatos.

The space
Ocean views, cozy, rural, nestled among the redwoods.

Guest access
8 acres of orchards, gardens and birds. Charcoal grill on the deck overlooking the Monterey Bay. see the chickens as you enter the property. You will likely be greeted by Kane and Canella, our two very friendly pups.
neighborhood_overview: 20 minutes to the beach. Mountain bike trails close by.  San Jose is 30 minutes away but feels like hours.
host_about: We are Phil and Zeyna.  When you stay at Sky Ranch you get to experience the magic of the Santa Cruz Mountains.  We live on a family farm.  We love to travel when we are not in the field.

name: Westside Santa Cruz Beach House - Walk to beach
description:
Enjoy our clean beautiful, bright and well equipped Santa Cruz Beach House. It is a quick & enjoyable 5 min stroll to Natural Bridges State Beach and West Cliff Drive. This is Humpback Whale season and they are visible from the shore! This spacious two story home offers 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms with high-speed internet, a smart TV and work desk. This a perfect spot for beach and hiking lovers! It is well equipped with a surfboard, boogie boards, sand toys & beach chairs. You will LOVE it Here!

The space
Filled with natural light on a corner lot, this house offers so much! It is so comfortable and offers a beautiful backyard, You will feel right at home! Perfect home for families or a business group. The backyard is fully fenced with a pergola and seating around a cozy fire table. Enjoy a walk along the ocean cliffs & keep your eyes open for Humpback whales breaching off-shore, dolphins, seals, sea otters & other wildlife.

• To preserve our white car
neighborhood_overview: You will love this house and enjoy that it is just a few minutes walk to West Cliff Drive and Natual Bridges State Beach. This is an ideal family vacation place any time of the year! The house is equipped with bikes, beach chairs, sand toys and beach towels. West Cliff Drive offers white water views of boats, whales, dolphins, sea otters, pelicans and other wildlife. If you enjoy watching surfers catch the ultimate wave head to Steamers Lane near Lighthouse field. In the fall you will see 1000's of Monarch Butterflies during their annual migration. Walk or bike to westside cafes and restaurants, the Lighthouse, Natural Bridges, downtown, the wharf, bakeries and excellent breweries, wineries are a 10-minute bike ride away. Art openings in the neighborhood and a farmer's market each Saturday just .5 miles away.  The downtown farmer's market is on Wednesdays. Santa Cruz is the ultimate place to find fresh organic produce.   Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is an 8 min drive or 2.4 miles down De

name: Spruce Beach Cottage - Walk to beach
description:
Enjoy the charm that Spruce Cottage brings to the quaint town of Aptos. We are a short 10 min walk to Seacliff State Beach through a secret pathway. View the landmark S. S. Palo Alto cement ship, picnic on the beach, or dip in the ocean. Our cottage offers comfort with a beachy feel. We take great care in the comfort and safety of our guests. Our home is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized per the California Guidelines after each guest.

The space
Enjoy our State Park/Beach Pass during your stay. Visit the Elephant Seals at Ano Nuevo State Beach. The well-landscaped backyard is a perfect place to bbq and relax.

The house is well equipped with everything that you will need to have a comfortable home away from home. Sleep well on either one of the king-sized Tuft and Needle adaptive foam mattresses. In the living room, you will find a Roku 4K UHD TV so you can catch up on all your favorite Netflix or Amazon shows. There are many apps to choose from fo
neighborhood_overview: Spruce Cottage is in the quaint town of Aptos, in the beach community of Seacliff. Seacliff State Beach is a 10-minute walk through a secret pathway. See the landmark S.S. Palo Alto cement ship and elephant seals at Nuevo Ano State Beach.

200 steps to the beach! Furnished two story beach house with nearby restaurants, walking/jog path, whale watching, etc.

Open floor plan w/ open kitchen concept complete with tile kitchen counters and sit up bar. Cable and Wi-Fi. Two bedrooms and 1 bathroom/shower located on the 2nd floor up a flight of stairs.

Pet friendly!

Front yard with benches to enjoy the ocean air.

Interior amenities include washer/dryer, dishwasher, stove, and refrigerator.

2 car parking in the back.

name: Felton’s cottage
description:
Super cute cottage! Restored to its original character. Clean and ideal for a single occupant or a couple. Located on Highway 9 and only 6 miles to downtown Santa Cruz! 5 min from highway 17 for an easy commute. Open to essential workers...15 minutes to Dominican Hospital!

The space
Cute and comfortable home. Centrally located along highway 9. Close to downtown Felton and 6 miles to Santa Cruz.

Other things to note
There are other homes on same lot with over an acre of land.
Shared driveway
neighborhood_overview: Felton is a small beautiful community. There are wonderful hiking trails.  Good restaurants and shops. We are on a sunny lot and very easy commuting location. Super safe!
host_about:
We are a small family who loves the outdoors. We love Felton and its surrounding areas. Nature is our escape and Santa Cruz mountain offers that for us. We don't live on the property but are close by should anything be needed during your stay.
You might see my cohost or I watering plants and working around the property. 

We like to give our guest privacy and let them enjoy their stay at their own pace. However we are just a message away  and available if anything is needed.

name: Aptos Sea Haven
description:
You really are at the beach! Very short flat walk to the sand, no steep hills or long stairs to the beach. Restaurants,coffee shops,market and yummy Pixie's Deli,restrooms at the beach. We welcome everyone including pets. Your house has a beachy/nautical feel with cozy electric fireplaces in the livingroom and bedroom for chilly nights. Luxurious king sized bed with high-end linens for your ultimate comfort.

The space
Completely renovated, everything is new and ready for you when you're not at the beach. The entire upstairs will be yours with no one to bother you. Owners live downstairs but the units are completely separate.

We have boogie boards, skim board and 2 beach chairs, sand buckets and toys and plenty of beach towels for your use.

Guest access
Private entrance upstairs. Outdoor shower (with warm water!) at the bottom of the stairs to get the sand off before you or your dog go inside. Front yard to sit and relax with or
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is wonderful! People are so friendly, most people are happy to live by the beach. Anything you might need is within a few miles. The beach is steps from the house. You're welcome to use the front fenced area for your dog, just be sure to pick up after them. It's a little over-grown right now, we will be fixing it up in the fall.
host_about: We finally got the beach house we always dreamed of.  We live, work and play in Aptos and Jules tele-commutes. Our days in Aptos are precious and we spend them mostly on the beach, but it's also fun to zip over to Santa Cruz for the fun and excitement of the Boardwalk or the Wharf, or meet friends for dinner. We feel the beach is healing so get to the sand, lay down and let go of your crazy thoughts and worries...

name: Stroll Rio Del Mar Beach from this Private Studio
description:
Private studio is perfect for that romantic getaway near the beach, for a more enjoyable business trip, or as a base for travel throughout the Monterey Bay.

It is an eight minute walk down the trail to Rio del Mar beach. A 15 minute walk gets you to a nice restaurant, coffee shop, and deli. Its less than 7 miles to the Santa Cruz beach boardwalk, 35 miles to Monterey, and 38 miles to Carmel by the Sea.

The space
Guests enjoy a private entrance from the yard and a private attached master bathroom. Room is located on the second floor and has a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, and television. Room is very private.

Guest access
The room has a private entrance, private bathroom, and lots of privacy. The room also has a microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker.
neighborhood_overview: The room with private bath in this mid century home is just outside the area dominated by vacation home rentals, allowing for close proximity to the beach and area fun while maintaining peace and tranquility.  The yard is unique for the area, secluded from neighbors.  Private entrance from the yard.  The home and room exert a luxurious, yet somewhat bohemian, vibe.  Following your evening stroll on the beach, you will sleep sound on the luxurious pillow top mattress and resort quality bedding.  Wake up to a morning cappuccino at the local coffee shop.  Although located in a serene locale, it is only minutes to Safeway, CVS pharmacy, Starbucks, Ace Hardware, and all of the restaurants and boutiques Aptos has to offer. I
host_about: I am trained as a civil/environmental engineer (Ph.D. from the University of California at Davis) that now owns a historic theatre and a couple restaurants.  I enjoy travel and attending live events.  I also blow and cast glass and make neon sculpture.

name: Guest Cottage- Central Santa Cruz -Private - NEW
description: Quiet Guest Cottage.  Very Private.  Brand new. Clean/Modern/Comfortable.  Full kitchen.  Fireplace.  Off Street parking.  Sunny, private yard, surrounded by trees.  Centrally located. 1-mile to  SC Harbor.  1.5 miles to beach.  Perfect for exploring Santa Cruz and surrounding area.
host_about:
Jack & Lesley have lived in the Santa Cruz Community for over 30 years.  We continue to enjoy everything that this unique vibrant beautiful location has to offer every day.  I am originally from Western PA and Lesley is from the UK.  
We have hosted a steady stream of visitors over the years and always have a 'tour' surprise customized to our guests' interests and physical abilities.  
I know all the backroads,  sidestreets and hidden gems of Santa Cruz.
I can offer a cruiser bike tour across Santa Cruz from UCSC to Capitola Village with scenic stops and great food and drink along the way.

name: Deluxe Studio with Private Entrance near Capitola
description:
Come and enjoy the beautiful surroundings of Santa Cruz and Capitola in this newly remodeled, quiet studio with private, side-entrance. The house sits at the bottom of a private driveway where a parking space is available for your use. After you return from the beach, you can rinse off at the outdoor shower, which has hot water, and is right next to the studio’s entrance.

The space
The studio measures 308 square feet, has a microwave, refrigerator and teapot, and a private, full bathroom. You will be equipped with coffee, tea and necessary dishware and utensils. There is also a small table and two chairs, and a comfortable armchair. The queen-sized bed is also brand new and very comfortable, with new soft sheets, comforter and pillows. There is a large closet with shelves and hangers, where you will have room to unpack and store a suitcase. You will have plenty of room in the bathroom which has a full shower with an adjustable shower-head. There is a van
neighborhood_overview:
You will be less than one mile from the 26th Avenue beach in the Pleasure Point area. The studio is within walking distance of many shops, restaurants, movie theatres and grocery stores.
If you would like to discover neaby Capitola Village on a walking tour, sign up for Airbnb Experience "Walk and Sip Capitola Village". On this 2 1/2 hour tour, you will discover the historic charm of this area by walking hidden streets & secret paths, take in amazing ocean views and have a fun wine tasting. For more information, ask your host Michele, or follow link: https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/513662
host_about: Santa Cruz, hike, bike and swim

Two comfortably sized bedrooms each having a flat screen tv. Walking distance to the Seascape onsite restaurant and 7 minute walk to the beach!

description:
Our little getaway is a conveniently located literal breath of fresh air. Inside the house you'll feel like you’re in a hotel suite, while outside you'll feel like you're camping in the forest. You’re minutes away from adorable downtown Boulder Creek and in the magic of the Santa Cruz Mountains.

* Hi-speed Wi-Fi
* 2 TVs
* Full kitchen
* Keurig coffee maker
* Outdoor fire pit
* Indoor wall heater that keeps the place toasty (do not use pellet stove)
* Fans

Enjoy towering redwoods outside and cozy creature comforts inside. Our location makes a perfect launching and landing pad for adventures in the Santa Cruz mountains, whether they be in the forest or the at the beach. While Big Basin will be closed for quite some time, Castle Rock and Henry Cowell State Parks are open, and Santa Cruz is a favorite destination. Boulder Creek is super cool and cute, and you owe it to yourself to checkout the downtown area, just a m

name: Beach bungalow in Seacliff -1 Bedroom
description:
My place is close to Seacliff & New Brighton beaches. State Park Drive is walking distance with restaurants, shops, bus lines, grocery, etc. It's a 15 min. drive to Santa Cruz (via Highway) . It's a cozy (tiny) bungalow style from the 1940's. A great homebase for the area.

The space
1940's beach bungalow. Cozy, older home with funky decor. Front & back porch. The rental is for the whole house (minus one bedroom that is mine and closed off- I will not be staying in the house during your stay) one bedroom with a double bed, (a queen blow up mattress is available as is the couch as well), kitchen, bath, living room, etc. My dog and I stay in the converted garage in the backyard and share the backyard walkway with guests. He’s an older mid sized terrier mix and likes people.

Guest access
Full access of the entire house to yourselves (one bedroom is closed off and is mine) Use it as your own. Kitchen (gas stove, dishes & appliances, use whatever

Walking distance to a convenience store, gas, resturants, a skate park. A 20 min walk to grocery, library, bus and stores @ Soquel & State Park Drive. Nisene Marks state park is a 5 min. drive away in old town Aptos (shops, resturants, etc.), Rio Del Mar beach (parking and a few resturants), Seacliff state beach, and New Brighton state beach are all within a 5 min. drive of the house. The Village of Capitola (beach area) is a 8 min. drive away with lots happening (beginner surfing, sup, bars, resturants, shops) .

name: Easy Walk to Beach ~ Master Suite Private Entrance
description:
Following Covid-19 Industry Guidance for Santa Cruz County; enhanced cleaning and sanitation protocols.

Clean, Comfy, Cute Master Bedroom with Separate Entrance. Queen Bed and Two Floor Mattresses. Private Restroom with Bath / Shower Combo. Dresser. Microwave, Mini-Fridge, Tea and Coffee Station.

Plenty of street parking and a quite, family neighborhood. Convenient Location: A Short Walk to Local’s Favorite Sunny Cove Beach and many other hot spots!

The space
The space is very comfortable and locked off from the main part of the house. There is an organic latex queen mattress, two big fluffy gel pillows, two flatter pillows, nice fresh sheets, extra blankets and pillows, and two additional sleeping mats.

All bathroom products are organic and smell of relaxing lavender. Bath salts are provided for a soak after a long, fun day at the beach. Some basic kitchenette amenities are available as well; microwave, mini-fridge, coffee/tea

name: Charming Cabin and Cottage - Hot Tub, Dog-Friendly
description:
Come escape among the redwoods in the Santa Cruz mountains, relax under the stars in the beautiful hot tub and enjoy downtime (or worktime!) in our charming house.

The space
This is the perfect space for one or two families, a romantic get-away, or a retreat. However, it is not appropriate for large groups or parties.
While we are new to hosting on AirBnB, we have been renting our house to guests through Home Away for 8 years and have 81 reviews, averaging 4.9 out of 5 stars.
* All beds have allergy-friendly mattress covers and duvets (with duvet covers washed between guests).
* Relaxing hot tub under the stars- large, traditional, California bench style tub seats 4 (new hot tub purchased December 2018)
* Kitchen was recently remodeled with beautiful granite counters, new cabinets and appliances. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking with all the small appliances, pots/pans, etc that you need to create a delicious meal.
* 2 large dec
neighborhood_overview:
Suzanne’s home is located in Boulder Creek, California, United States.
Boulder Creek is an adorable small town - the closest town to Big Basin Redwood State Park. It has two grocery stores (one 'regular', one with local and organic foods), restaurants, a pharmacy, gas station, coffee shops, awesome antique and thrift stores, and places to get wonderful massages.
A favorite family outing is riding on one of the trains (steam and diesel) at Roaring Camp and Big Trees Narrow Gauge Railroad. We love taking friends and family on the steam train to the old-growth redwood grove at Bear Mountain, followed by a walk or hike next door at Henry Cowell State Park. We love spending the afternoon exploring the river and gorgeous river beaches. Zip-lining or tackling the sky-high ropes course at Mount Hermon's Redwood Canopy tours is another awesome outing - my mom went zip-lining there for her 70th birthday!
host_about: I'm a mother to three awesome kids, married for almost 24 years to my high school sweetheart.  We live in the San Francisco Bay area and have a wonderful community of dear friends here.  I love to read, spend time with my family, go to the beach, hike in the redwoods, and am a potter.

Boogie boards, surfboard, beach cruisers, and beach chairs for your enjoyment.
Enjoy being within walking distance to Verve coffee, Cat and Cloud, Capitola, and world class surfing at the Point.

The space
COVID-19 UPDATE: We are utilizing careful and enhanced cleaning, and will be continuing to do so long term. We have always used non-toxic cleaning supplies, such as vinegar and Seventh Generation disinfectant spray, but have begun to use bleach and Lysol as well. Our floors are cement and hypoallergenic, same goes for the quartz countertops in the kitchens and bathrooms that are disinfected. The hot tub is drained for the duration of the pandemic due to the restrict

host_about: Organic lifestyle and modern design.  We love the beach, outside, living in Santa Cruz, and California weather. Jen works in the field of natural medicine, and Chris is a holistic psychotherapist. Our daughter is a native Santa Cruzian, and very much enjoying growing up by the ocean. We love Santa Cruz for it's beachy vibe, and also the local natural health food markets and weekly farmer's markets.

The space

We live in the Santa Cruz Mountains about 20 minutes out of town off of Hwy 17 (you can get into town by taking the back roads-please do not penalize us in a review process for our location, only book because you want to be in the mountains off the beaten path). If you love animals and don't mind the farm life, then please be our guest in our comfy, elegant, well-designed studio with a touch of class and elegance. Inside you will find a large flat-screen TV with dish network channels, separate satellite internet, a full kitchen, a living room area and dining area, and a full bath. name: Country Retreat
description:
My home is located in the country. Looking out the living room window you will see our huge Redwood Tree. Beyond that you see Mountains and Farmlands. I am offering you the experience of staying in the country where you can have the feeling of being far away yet you are close to so many wonderful attractions: We are located approximately
one mile from the Watsonville Municipal Airport and The Beach is only 10 minutes away, Santa Cruz is 20 minutes away and Monterey/Carmel 30 minutes.

The space
We are in the County Farm Land where you can relax outside with Squirrels, Rabbits and Birds yet close to shopping Centers, Movie Theaters and Restaurants and only 20 minutes to Santa Cruz and 30 minutes to Monterey and Carmel.

Guest access
The Ranch style House is divided into two separate units (the house and the apartment) both totally self sufficient, and both recently refurbished. The House (you'll be staying in) Has a Living Room and
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is spread out with neighbors 100's of yards away. Some vegetable farmers and some interesting Organic Farming close by.
When you visit  Country Retreat in Watsonville, you will find a relaxing and spacious home on three acres  away from the hustle bustle of life in the suburbs or the city…You will pass through farm land and travel on a private  road to your adventure in the country.  If you would like to explore the area you will have more choices than you have time for.  Besides our close proximity to Santa Cruz, Capitola, and the Monterey Peninsula, there is a lot to do and see right here in Watsonville . Some of my personal favorites are listed below.
I always suggest that visitors check out  Gizdich Ranch. They are local apple growers and have a bakery/pie shop at the farm..They make amazing Apple pies, Berry  pies, and of course Pumpkin pies. Buy a whole pie to take home or you can have a good sized slice..plain or ala mode..either outdoor on the pic
host_about:
My name is Dan O’Bannon and I have been a self employed Cabinet Maker for the past 33 years and  have been working with  my right hand Man, my Son Matt, for the past 10 years.   I enjoy nature and animals.  My Cat, Will Feral, was a wild stray that I took in,  he keeps me entertained.  I enjoy watching and attending Baseball games,  watching movies,  listening to music, and spending time with family and friends.  I have done some background acting (although not lately) in a few movies and TV shows  over the past 15 years and had a lot of fun playing a Barbosa Pirate in the first  "Pirates of the Caribbean" movie with my Son and Brother.  I've also enjoyed singing and playing the guitar with my Son Matt and my Brothers in the past.  
I moved to Santa Cruz in 1970 and have lived at my Country Home in Watsonville for the past 20 years.  Keeping up three acres, running my business and spending time with family & friends keeps me busy!   I have a very full life and I am grateful!

name: Paradise Cabin Nestled Among the Redwoods
description:
What is paradise? If your idea of perfection is peace and quiet, beautiful redwoods towering around you and the open sky above, blue and beautiful by day, ink black speckled with more stars than you can ever count, then this is the place for you. Relax and meditate, or bring a few friends for a a personal or company retreat, you will find this space perfect for restoring your sanity, your humanity, and your connection with others.

The space
What is paradise? If your idea of perfection is peace and quiet, beautiful redwoods towering around you and the open sky above, blue and beautiful by day, ink black speckled with more stars than you can ever count, then this is the place for you. Relax and meditate, or bring a few friends for a a personal or company retreat, you will find this space perfect for restoring your sanity, your humanity, and your connection with others.

The site is smoking and 420 friendly, though we ask that you not smoke anything inside
neighborhood_overview: This is a magical place where the hundred-plus year old redwoods tower above you, yet leave the sky open directly above to let in the su  during the day and reveal the stars at night. The air is clean and the night is quiet and peaceful. We love to just sit out on the patio in the evenings and enjoy the space and the beauty of nature. Inside, we sleep deeper and more happily than anywhere else iiib the world. A cozy fire and a down comforter in this peaceful place is like heaven to us.
host_about:
I like to think I'm not your usual Silicon Valley tech guy. I've lived in Europe and Japan, and enjoy travel whenever I can. I love to meet new folks and make friends as I go.

My travel style is to go to a place I'm interested in and find a good home base, then go out adventuring from there, looking for interesting things that will engage and expand my life and my view of humanity and the world.

As a guest I'm usually quiet at home, I like to read when i travel, usually about the place I've come to explore.

name: Quiet peaceful private sunny
description:
This is a quiet peaceful 11.5 x 14’ studio attached to the back of the house. There are two large skylights which fill the room with warm light. Across the street, a 40 acre public park with hiking trails into the redwoods & to the creek which runs behind the house and studio. Located near the end of the road there is almost no traffic, no streetlights and no sidewalks. Redwoods tower above, home to hawks, owls and woodpeckers. Shopping, restaurants and Niscene Marks State Park 5 minutes away.

The space
The space itself is clean and quiet with all the bare essentials, a bathroom with toilet and shower and a small kichenette. Guests have access to the yard, deck, orchard and ping-pong table. Although very quiet with a secluded feeling it is just one minute to the freeway with shopping and great restaurants nearby. The beach and Niscene Marks State Park are about five minutes away. There’s also a 40 acre county park across the street that is used on the weekends
neighborhood_overview: The street borders a park 40 acre park and yet is just a few minutes away from shopping,  fine dining and the beach.

name: Riverfront Cottage in Redwoods w/ Decks + Beach!
description:
Nestled in the beautiful Redwoods, this quaint 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom vacation rental home is both private and comfortable. Whether you were drawn to the Ben Lomond area by the gorgeous beaches or small town charm, this 1940's home on the San Lorenzo River is sure to be the perfect home base for your Golden State getaway. Your group of 8 will have access to 2 spacious decks, 1,114 square feet of well-appointed living space, and more during your stay.

The space
Master Bedroom: King Bed, En-Suite Bath | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed, En-Suite Bath | Bedroom 3 (Lower Level w/ Separate Private Entry): Full/Queen Bunk Bed, En-Suite Bath

Upon your arrival, head into the spacious living room and melt into the reclining sofa. As you watch your primetime favorites on the flat-screen cable TV, you'll be bathed in natural light. Working from "home"? Take advantage of the property's speedy, free WiFi!

The fully equipped kitchen, complete with expansive countertop
neighborhood_overview:
Offering a unique mixture of serenity and convenience, this home sits just a stone's throw from the shopping, dining, and entertainment of the Ben Lomond area.

Just steps from the home, your private beach awaits! The San Lorenzo River offers a safe place for the little ones to splash around as the adults unwind on the shores of the pristine water.

Be sure to check out the historic mountain town of Felton during your stay. Located 2 minutes down the road, this quaint town offers delicious restaurants like The Cremer House as well as unique shops and an ambiance that can't be duplicated.

There are several beaches within 25 minutes of the home, making it perfect for those looking to make a splash. Whether you choose to fish at the Loch Lomond Recreation Area or swim in the Pacific, you're sure to make unforgettable memories under the California sun.
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve Vacation Rental, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

Not only are we a 10 minute walk to local New Brighton State Beach or a 1 mile jaunt to beautiful Capitola Village, we have a little kitchenette with a sink, microwave, fridge and a Keurig coffee maker. There is an awesome little market, AJ’s, that’s also just a 10 minute walk away.

The space
Private entrance and your own fenced-in patio area to come and go as you please. Your own driveway, private parking for one vehicle. Easy self check-in with lockbox. We have Comcast cable, wifi and Apple TV free for you to use.

New Brighton State Beach is a local beach that’s not too crowded. You can start a walk from New Brighton State Beach and walk along the coast to Seacliff State Park Beach where the Cement Ship is located or even to Rio Del Mar. You can see all the way to Monterey. If you're lucky, you can catch a whale breaching or dolphins jumping. It's a beautiful
neighborhood_overview: When turning into our neighborhood off the main street, take the 2nd right even though the 1st street has the same name, it's a circle.  The 2nd right is more direct and a lot smoother.

@aptos.cutest - follow us on Instagram!

The space
The house is equipped with a full kitchen, a fireplace, a spacious deck, and a patio with an outdoor pool  table. You will enjoy easy access to Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Seascape Beach Resort, Deluxe Foods Market, and Aptos Village Square. The house is within a 10 min drive to Capitola, 20 min to Santa Cruz and 40 min to Monterey.  Our large driveway easily fits two or more cars and there is plenty of street parking.

Guest access
You have access to the entire home.

Other t
neighborhood_overview:
The picturesque town of Aptos is in an unincorporated area of Santa Cruz County. It is a home to historic Aptos Village, and the gateway to the Forest of Nisene Marks State Park.

Redwoods and the sea in one idyllic setting!

Rio Del Mar means “River to the Sea” in Spanish, and was coined simply as a catchy-sounding name for a new subdivision in coastal Aptos. The name has no significance beyond that. The neighborhood is popular for a number of reasons, not least of which are a number of beaches close by.

The area is known for fog, although in truth the number of foggy days is not that great, and when there is fog, it often burns off by late morning or early afternoon, leading to warm and sunny days spring through fall. Winters are normally wet, with the heaviest rainfall occurring between October and March.

The house is located in a quiet family neighborhood. You can often spot deers in the back yard and wonder at birds from the deck.

description:
Spacious and modern 2 bedroom/ 2 bath Condo with high ceilings, a wall of windows and front balcony with an ocean view and overlooking the quaint Capitola village. 150 steps to the Beach, Capitola pier, boutique shopping and over 20 restaurants. Remodeled kitchen, gorgeous gas fireplace, WiFi, Big Screen TV and a back patio with a gas BBQ grill. Perfect for families, couples or girls/guys getaways! Sleeps 8 comfortably. name: This bungalow is located in the desirable Seabright Beach area in Santa Cruz!
description:
Charming and quaint, this 2 bedroom, 1 bath cottage offers a wonderful vacation in the realm of surf city in one of California's most desirable coastal strips, located just down the block to Seabright Beach!

This Seabright vacation cottage has been completely renovated, while still retaining the charm of the past! The main bedroom sleeps two in a queen-size bed, while the small second bedroom sleeps two in twin beds. The living room has a couch that folds to a twin bed. On-street parking is available. And located walking distance from the best beach of Santa Cruz, as well as cafes, restaurants, and the Beach Boardwalk. This home is one short block to the beach!
