name: Quiet Country Retreat
description:
My home is located in the country. Looking out the living room window you will see our huge redwood tree. Beyond that you see mountains and farmlands. I am offering you the experience of staying in the country where you can have the feeling of being far away yet you are close to so many wonderful attractions: We are located approximately
one mile from the Watsonville Municipal Airport and The beach is only 10 minutes away, Santa Cruz is 20 minutes away and Monterey/Carmel 30 minutes.

The space
We are in the County Farm Land where you can relax outside with Squirrels, Rabbits and Birds yet close to shopping Centers, Movie Theaters and Restaurants and only 20 minutes to Santa Cruz and 30 minutes to Monterey and Carmel.

Guest access
The Ranch style House is divided into two seperate units (the house and the apartment) both totally self sufficient, and both recently refurbished. When booking Quiet country Retreat you will be using b
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is spread out with neighbors 100's of yards away. Some vegetable farmers and some interesting Organic Farming close by.
When you visit  Country Retreat in Watsonville, you will find a relaxing and spacious home on three acres  away from the hustle bustle of life in the suburbs or the city…You will pass through farm land and travel on a private  road to your adventure in the country.  If you would like to explore the area you will have more choices than you have time for.  Besides our close proximity to Santa Cruz, Capitola, and the Monterey Peninsula, there is a lot to do and see right here in Watsonville . Some of my personal favorites are listed below.
I always suggest that visitors check out  Gizdich Ranch. They are local apple growers and have a bakery/pie shop at the farm..They make amazing Apple pies, Berry  pies, and of course Pumpkin pies. Buy a whole pie to take home or you can have a good sized slice..plain or ala mode..either outdoor on the pic
host_about:
My name is Dan O’Bannon and I have been a self employed Cabinet Maker for the past 33 years and  have been working with  my right hand Man, my Son Matt, for the past 10 years.   I enjoy nature and animals.  My Cat, Will Feral, was a wild stray that I took in,  he keeps me entertained.  I enjoy watching and attending Baseball games,  watching movies,  listening to music, and spending time with family and friends.  I have done some background acting (although not lately) in a few movies and TV shows  over the past 15 years and had a lot of fun playing a Barbosa Pirate in the first  "Pirates of the Caribbean" movie with my Son and Brother.  I've also enjoyed singing and playing the guitar with my Son Matt and my Brothers in the past.  
I moved to Santa Cruz in 1970 and have lived at my Country Home in Watsonville for the past 20 years.  Keeping up three acres, running my business and spending time with family & friends keeps me busy!   I have a very full life and I am grateful!

The master bedroom has a queen bed, the second bedroom has a full bed, and the third bedroom has two twins. name: Contemporary Seabright Beach House
description:
Steps from the sand, this contemporary Seabright beach home is the perfect upscale beach getaway.

The home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths and sleeps 6 comfortably. Master bedroom features a king bed and private bath with deep oval soaking tub. Two guest rooms feature a queen bed and two twin beds. The living area is tastefully decorated and thoughtfully appointed with push button fireplace, large 4k TV, Jambox, PS4, etc...

Did we mention the living area has a direct view of the beach and ocean?

The space
The house is not set up to be a bare bones rental. This is our dream weekend getaway house that just happens to be rentable. As such the details are thought through. The bathroom floors have radiant heating, the living area floors are solid maple, the kitchen appliances are quality stainless, etc...

Everyday basics like a fully stocked kitchen, towels, hair dryers, toiletries, bottled water, etc... will all be provided.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is fantastic. The beach, Yacht Harbor, Boardwalk, shopping & restaurants are all an easy walk.

We particularly love waking up and walking over to Linda's Seabreeze Cafe for Santa Cruz's best made from scratch breakfast specials.

The legal fire pits on the beach are a popular evening to-do for those who like a cozy outdoor get together.

Monterey Bay Aquarium, San Francisco, or the redwoods are an easy drive if you're looking for day trips.
host_about:
During the week I spend most of my time working in Fintech in Silicon Valley. My wife and I are Airbnb guests when we snowboard in Tahoe and hosts when we open up our beach house in Santa Cruz.

We like to travel, sail, watch Formula1, and lounge at the beach.

This is our second time listing on Airbnb. We recently moved and were superhosts on our previous listing.
Our wonderful home is a great place to spend a family/friend vacation. It has ocean and sunrise/sunset views. It's very kid friendly. Just a few min. drive to downtown Capitola, Newbrighton state beach, and epic hiking. Enjoy BBQs on the giant deck, privacy and tons of indoor/outdoor space. Our yard is huge, clean, organized, well cared for and is great for kids. Our house is eco friendly.

The space
Please note:
We have dogs, but we take them with us and they won't be on the property when guests stay.

Property managers live on site in their own apartment. They have their own entrance and amenities. Chances are you won't see them at all during your stay. However, Melissa is an awesome nanny and often provides childcare for guests. Major bonus!

Please note: We have a trampoline and pool/hot tub. The pool has a stable and sturdy
neighborhood_overview:
We live on a small cul de sac on the mountain overlooking the ocean and the Carmel mountains with sunrise and sunset views. We are just up the road from the famous AJ's natural food store where you can get everything you need. And a few min. drive to some of the best beaches in the area. Newbrighton state beach and Capitola beach.

Our house is incredibly spacious, has lots of natural light and has seamless flow from inside to outside. It's great for kids.

Please note:
We have space for 3 to four cars in our driveway but we ask that you not bring more than four cars as we live on a small street. Our street is nice and quiet.

Our location is a short drive to many fabulous restaurants like Home, Cafe Cruz, Suda, Discretion Brewery and so many more. Also close to a great movie theatre and food stores like Whole Foods, Safeway, New Leaf, Costco and Trader Joes.
host_about: Our family loves nature and adventure. We also love creating a comfortable cozy home for ourselves and our guests. Santa Cruz is a fabulous place to vacation and we are happy we can share our home for people to experience the beauty here.

name: Mountain Cottage, Cozy and Well-Equipped
description:
The private cottage is tucked behind the main house, out of street view. Convenient driveway parking is provided for our guests. Enjoy the birds, river views, and local flora and fauna from the private deck. From time to time you may see a spider, smell a skunk, or hear a chainsaw. That's all part of the charm of mountain living! Ben Lomond is a charming mountain town, and our cottage is one block from most local services. It's an easy stroll to downtown, where you'll find locally-owned shops.

The space
Please remove your shoes once inside to protect the wood floor. The separate bathroom has a slate tile floor, so remember to bring slippers or warm socks. We have provided fluffy socks to borrow if you forget your own. Many toiletries are provided for your use, including shampoo, conditioner, body cleanser and lotion, face wash and night cream, makeup remover wipes, and SPF protection. Denise is an esthetician; she loves skincare products and would love to lighten
neighborhood_overview: We live in a residential mountain neighborhood. There are no sidewalks, but there are plenty of beautiful redwood trees, including some very large old trees on our street. It's a 5-minute walk to historic downtown Ben Lomond. Enjoy coffee shops, restaurants, and local theater. Visit the very popular Mountain Feed store to find gifts or homesteading supplies. There are an antique store and a second-hand clothing store minutes away. It's faster to walk than drive downtown! Some of these small businesses may not be open yet because of quarantine. Feel free to send inquiries to me, I'll check for you if you like.
host_about: Denise was born and raised in the Santa Cruz and San Jose area and has spent the last 20 years calling the Santa Cruz mountains her home. Denise's family has been involved in musical theater and making music since they moved up here. Denise was able to experience a life dream of traveling to Italy and England in 2018. She is thrilled to be meeting people from all over, and share stories of travel and adventure!

Two bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms. Walking distance to our very remote stretch of “private” beach. Conveniently located halfway between Santa Cruz and Monterey, it’s a very quiet neighborhood with a rural feel yet easy drive to all the great central coast spots. Minutes to amazing hiking in Nisene Marks state park. Short drive to mountain biking in the Santa Cruz mountains. 30 minutes to Monterey bay aquarium. A little over an hour to San Francisco. I know I’m biased, but we’re seriously the best location on the central coast with the most gorgeous stretch of beach in Santa Cruz county.

neighborhood_overview: It’s a quiet street in a rural neighborhood. About a 15 min walk to our private beach. You’ll see hawks and deer during the day, hear the owls and coyotes at night. When the ambient noise is low, you’ll hear the ocean from the house. The coastal fog lingers in the mornings and comes back to cool the evenings, and leaves the afternoons full of crystal clear air and ocean views.

description:
CAPITOLA OCEANFRONT VACATION HOME! Charming 1 Bedroom Capitola Village Condo sits BeachFront with astonishing views of the Monterey Bay and Pacific Ocean. Picture Perfect Post Card views.

Registration Certificate CV_TORC 16-059

The space
Our Charming 2 Bedroom Capitola Village Condo sits above the water and Beach with astonishing views of the Monterey Bay and Pacific Ocean. Picture Perfect Post Card views from the living room, Master Bedroom and Large Patio Balcony. Ocean views from every room.

Guest access
Beach, Local Restaurants, local bars, nightlife, music coffee Shop, shopping, Pier, beach and surf rentals
neighborhood_overview:
Capitola is an intimate beach village tucked in a river valley in Santa Cruz County on the Monterey Bay. Located an hour away from San Jose and an hour and a half from San Francisco, Capitola enjoys a lively population full of tradition and an interesting history.
The City's wharf and riverside areas remind one of a village in France or perhaps a Mediterranean coast in Italy. Capitola Village is located along a wide beach with a breathtaking view of Monterey Bay and is home to numerous craft galleries, boutiques and restaurants. It is here where the Begonia Festival takes place each Labor Day weekend, featuring flower-draped floats and the must-see sand castle contest. Each fall the village also hosts the Annual Capitola Art & Wine Festival, which brings in over 170 artists, 10 wineries and numerous food vendors. Other visitor attractions include the Capitola Historical Museum, Capitola Wharf, and the Capitola Mall.

Voted one of the best beach locations on the Californ

Perfect place to escape to the beach. Set in a private gated community, you are only 100 yards away from feeling the sand through your toes. Our home is your home and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do. Bring your family and friends and enjoy life at the beach.

The space
With 180 degrees unobstructed ocean views, the house comes furnished with sheets and towels and a well stocked kitchen. Seascape Golf Club is just a 1/2 mile away and food shopping for all your needs a mere 1 mile away. Want to have a bon fire on the beach? Go ahead!

host_about: We are a family of four that lives to travel the world, absorb new cultures and meet new friends .  As we have had wonderful AirBnb experiences at other people homes we would like to make our home open  to you and hope you have similar experiences. Come to the beach!

name: Cozy Cottage in the Santa Cruz Mountains
description:
Welcome to the Santa Cruz Mountains! Nestled among Oak trees, our cozy cottage has its own private entrance and is only 5 minutes from restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops, a microbrewery and more. We live two miles from Highway 17 and only ten miles from Santa Cruz beaches. The cottage has a spacious bedroom with the comforts of home and a separate living/work space. We are in the main house and are available if you need anything or have questions, but will respect your privacy.

The space
The cottage consists of a living/work space which includes all necessary tableware, a mini refrigerator/freezer, microwave, toaster oven, coffee maker, purified water, butter, and basic spices. There is a small dining table for eating or working, a comfortable micro-fiber couch to lounge and/or watch TV from and a leather massage chair. There is a DVD player and many movies to keep you and your family entertained. Or, unplug completely and enjoy the books, games and puzzl
neighborhood_overview: We live only minutes from coastal redwood trees and there are several hiking trails nearby. We have provided maps of the area, information about local restaurants, microbrewery, coffee shops, and grocery stores. The town of Scotts Valley is very family friendly, and also appeals to those inclined to slow down and relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city.
host_about:
I am the proud Mama of two, active teenage daughters. They keep us busy and we love every minute of their whirlwind!

I am a teacher and my husband is a veterinarian in San Jose. We both commute over the hill and really enjoy coming home to our peaceful paradise in the Santa Cruz Mountains. 

We love animals and always have quite a few critters. Currently, we have two older dogs and a big, lazy cat. This is the fewest number of pets we have had in a long time!

name: Santa Cruz Mountains Redwood Serenity
description:
Quiet and serene, set among the redwoods and a small fruit orchard in beautiful Bonny Doon. Tastefully decorated in native redwood, with wood flooring and plenty of natural light. With a ten minute drive to the beach and miles of hiking trails nearby, there are unlimited opportunities to explore and discover. Bonny Doon is also a favorite for cyclists. Downtown Santa Cruz is less than a 30 min. drive. Perfect romantic hideaway or active adventure base for a special visit to the coast.

The space
This beautiful studio apartment is newly built, approx. three years old. It boasts a full kitchen and gorgeous wood floors with radiant heat. Located in Bonny Doon, it offers peace and quiet while being 30 minutes from Santa Cruz, 10 minutes to Davenport, and 20 minutes to Felton by car. Bonny Doon beach is about 8 minutes away, and Beauregard Vineyards winery is a short 5 minute drive. Designed to be spacious and open, with a natural connection to the outdoors, it is pe

host_about: Adventurous nature-loving 68 year old retired music teacher. Animal lover, hiker, cyclist and world traveler.

Santa Cruz country requires masks, both indoors and outdoors unless jogging.

name: Sunny room in a creative family home
description:
Lovely bedroom located inside a family home with unattached private bathroom access. Perfect getaway for a couple or a small family of 3 (2 adults & 1 child). Enjoy kicking back with your favorite book while snuggled up in the reading nook or a soak in the hot-tub outside under the stars. The bedroom has a smart TV with Netflix and Amazon to enjoy. We are located in Mid-Town Santa Cruz and a quick walk to grocery stores and restaurants. This family home is clean, comfy and a little quirky.

The space
The owner lives on-site with her teenager, and runs a full-time working salon in the front half the house during working hours 9 am - 12pm on weekends. She only serves one client at a time so there isn't a lot of traffic coming and going. I ask that you are mindful to my son regarding bedroom noise.

Guest access
You are welcome to enjoy the backyard, hot-tub, and private bathroom. There is no kitchen access. However, there is a coffee mak
neighborhood_overview: Located in Mid-Town in beautiful Santa Cruz. A quick 7 min drive to downtown, the beach and Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.  This location is perfect because you are literally in the center of it all.  There is a small park just down the street and a little free library across the street from it.
host_about: I am a single mom (half of each month), and operate a beauty salon in the front portion of my home.  I work regular hours, and spend my private time taking dance classes,improvisation classes,  capoeira (martial arts), sewing, reading or visiting with friends.  My home is warm and inviting, a little bit cluttered from living a busy life, but comfortable and clean.  I also teach brasilian dance on Sundays and design costumes for brasilian dance, rennaisance and Dickens' faires and halloween.  I love going to the beach when it is sunny and warm, and am lucky to live in one of the most beautiful and unique beach towns in the United States.  I am not a vegetarian, and cook most of my meals at home, only going out for food occassionally.  I'm home most evenings, and usually stay awake until around 11pm.  I drink alcohol, and am 420 friendly.  I used to smoke cigarettes, but recently quit, my guests are asked to smoke outside on the back deck.  My house is available infrequently for rental, as I live and work here full time.  When I go on vacation, I will make the house available on airbnb.

description:
Come relax in my warm and inviting Tuscan Country Home located in the country setting of Watsonville. The house is inspired by my Italian heritage and offers a welcoming hideaway and central access to Santa Cruz and Monterey. Stay for a cozy evening respite or a long weekend to soak up the majestic redwoods, bask in the sun on one of the many local beaches, or venture between dozens of local attractions. Visit us on Instagram for more pictures and guest stories: @tuscancountryhome.

The space
The Garden room is the east-facing master suite on the corner of the house. Whether you prefer to wake up to the sunrise over the eucalyptus grove and orchard or get a few extra hours of rest, the Garden Room is the perfect space to unwind. The room incorporates an off-white palette and textural finishes to create a refreshing environment. The attached master bathroom features double sinks, a bathtub and shower, and a large mirrored vanity.

The Nest room is a war
neighborhood_overview: The home sits in a quiet neighborhood on two acres overlooking an orchard, pasture, and eucalyptus grove. Off-street parking is provided with plenty of additional parking as needed. Access to Highway 1 is just minutes away.

Perfectly located in the community of Rio Del Mar, you can experience all that Monterey Bay has to offer in this completely remodeled one bedroom, one bath condo. The beautiful wrap around deck provides an expansive panoramic view of the entire Bay - from Santa Cruz’s famed Pleasure Point to Monterey’s beautiful Pacific Point. Inviting patio furnishings offer the perfect place to
relax after a long walk on the beach or enjoy outdoor dining while soaking in an ocean sunset.

The space
The view continues inside with wrap around, floor-to-ceiling windows and an open-concept kitchen, dining, and living room with a cozy, wood burning fireplace. The bedroom also has an ocean view where you will sleep blissfully listening to the waves in a king-size bed. A modern, memory foam sofa sleeper is in the living area and an accordion door can be closed to separate the bedroom from the living area. This unit comes with an enclosed one-car garage which holds the washer and
neighborhood_overview: Just steps to some of Rio Del Mar’s local favorite restaurants: Cafe Rio and  Pixie's Deli. Aptos Village is a short 5-minute drive and offers quaint shops, a variety of restaurants, plus 30 miles of maintained trials for hiking and running among majestic redwoods in The Forest of Nisene Marks State Park in Aptos Canyon.

Welcome to our home! Situated at the Santa Cruz mountain foothills, it is surrounded by beautiful Redwood trees and is a 5 minute drive from/to the beach. Aptos Village is only 2 minutes away and offers many new shops, wine tasting , cafes and restaurants. Feel free to use the hot tub and enjoy the surrounding peaceful nature. There is a beautiful park Nisene Marks that you can hike in close by. We hope to accommodate your needs in any way possible and look forward to your stay!

You will have your own bedroom, but bathrooms will be shared. Common areas are living room and kitchen.

name: Mediterranean Villa Santa Cruz-Winter Surf Getaway
description:
Welcome to our Mediterranean Villa in sunny Aptos Wine Country, (yet just 10 min to beaches)conveniently located between Silicon Valley and Pebble Beach. Enjoy this 3000 sq. foot home set on an acre of full sun, with a gated entry, hot tub, BBQ, fire pit, ping pong table & large patio* Perfect for a peaceful family getaway. Close to beaches/surf, golf and wineries (2.5 miles). So much to see and do! The options are endless (see pics for a few ideas)

The space
We spent time carefully designing this gourmet kitchen with concrete countertops, two islands, 42 inch range with large griddle (great for pancakes!!), 42 inch refrigerator, two dishwashers and wine refrigerator. Perfectly designed for many hands to be at work on different culinary dishes at the same time, our intention was to create this space for bonding with friends and family and making memories together in the kitchen as we know a huge part of the day is spent here! This gourmet kitchen is part of a la
neighborhood_overview: This property is Central to many activities, close to the freeway yet a sunny peaceful retreat from the city. 5 minutes to Deluxe Foods Gourmet Food Market, 10 minutes to other Grocery stores & the beaches/surfing. Award winning wineries are only 2.5 miles away. We love uber for this!! Nisene Marks is a beautiful park boasting tall trees, hiking trails, mountain biking trails. World Class Pebble Beach Golf is a beautiful drive, about 40 minutes) down the coast. Stop through Monterey and Cannery Row on your way there. Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, the Harbor, the Winchester Mystery House, Los Gatos, San Francisco, it's really up to you! If you want to relax and read a book in the beautiful back yard, or get out and explore the Monterey Bay and greater San Francisco Bay, you have access to it all.
host_about: Our family enjoys traveling to new places and spends most of our vacation time traveling for our kids sports. We live in an amazing place with so much to see and do, and are excited to open this up to others when we are traveling.

description:
2 Bedroom, 1 Bath Condo in desirable Live Oak Neighborhood

The space
Rare quiet and private ground floor end unit facing Schwann Lagoon! This 2 bed/1 bath luxury condo has been completely renovated including hardwood floors throughout and is beautifully furnished. It’s located in the quiet Live Oak neighborhood and situated only two blocks from Twin Lakes Beach. It is also just one block from restaurants and a Sunday farmers market. Santa Cruz Harbor, Capitola Village, and the Boardwalk are just a short drive or bike ride away. Equipped to meet all your needs away from home, this cozy condo features a queen bed in one bedroom and a twin with twin trundle in the second bedroom.

Amenities include: two smart TV's, WiFi, full kitchen, dining area and single bathroom. Enclosed double-sized private patio off of living room is a perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee and store your surfboards. You also have access to a gym, swimming pool, BBQ and on sit
neighborhood_overview: Walking to  restaurants, beach  and harbor, awesome views of woods and lake.
host_about:
Kendall & Potter was established as a real estate company in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The brokers Skipper Kendall and William Pottermoved to Aptos to fulfill their dream of working in a small town in Santa Cruz County. In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , they expanded their services to include property management and relocation from Santa Cruz to Monterey Coast.

Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

Rita has worked for Kendall & Potter in the property management and the Santa Cruz real estate industry for 20 years. A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. Current member of California Association of Realtors CAR and National Association of Property Managers, NARPM.

Kendall & Potter Property Management offers a variety of home services – including complete property management services, leases on unfurnished properties and rental homes in Santa Cruz, as well as Monterey Coast & Santa Cruz vacation rentals management and corporate housing.

name: Amazing West Cliff Ocean View House
description:
Possibly the best ocean view on West Cliff Drive. This home is on "world famous West Cliff Drive" is unique to have a 180 degree "sunrise to sunset" unobstructed view of the ocean "as far as the eye can see". All year long, you can observe daily sea life such as otters, pelicans, humpback whales, dolphins and sea lions. And in winter-migrating gray whales. And steps to Natural Bridges beach!

The space
All newer design center furnishings and high quality beds.
neighborhood_overview:
West Santa Cruz is a great quiet friendly neighborhood! Easy to bike around. Ocean front bike path right at your door and can easily get to Swift Street coffee shops and restaurants by bike or walk! Steps to Natural Bridges beach. The house is located less than one walking block to Natural Bridges Beach. Natural Bridges is a State park with a lovely beach where the family can spend the day surfing, boogie boarding, or wandering around tidal pools.
No need for your car, but 3 car garage and easy parking.

The space
The living room and dining rooms have floor to ceiling glass, with French doors that lead out the patio and garden. Fireplaces in the living room, master bedroom, and patio. name: Aptos Getaway
description:
Aptos is a beautiful destination. Relaxing, comfortable private one bedroom with private entrance self check-in, private full bath, desk with large work area. Near golf course and short drive to Rio Del Mar Beach for occasional whale watching. Beach chairs available. One mile to grocery store, boutiques, coffee shops, fine and casual dining. Easy access to freeway, 35 miles to Monterey or 10-20 minute drive into Santa Cruz.

The space
Seating is available inside your room or out on the deck. You may see a deer or two on the hillside outside the bedroom window.

Guest access
You will have access to your private deck and private bedroom with full bathroom.

Other things to note
You must be able to climb stairs. We can drive up the driveway to unload your things but there are still some stairs to climb.

Aptos Village has Nicene Marks State Park for hiking and many places to eat and drink. You can listen to the blues every night at Aptos Street BBQ. Saturday mornings Farmer's Market is held at Cabrillo College.
host_about: My husband and I have raised three children and we are now "empty nesters." We are excited to share our lovely home on Airbnb, Inc. We live in a great community and enjoy walks on the beach, eating out, attending concerts, art shows and wine/beer establishments. We like to cook together and occasionally entertain. I love a good cup of coffee and a book. I like movies, Aqua man, Star Trek, Les Miserables, Belle, National Treasure, and I even like exercise. I like to learn new things too. I am signed up to learn cake decorating.

name: Location Location Location Pleasure Point Bungalow
description:
*LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION*
Welcome to the best in Santa Cruz...AKA Pleasure Point.
Walk out the door and down the street to world class surf. Our simple cozy bungalow is perfect to unwind. Built in 1928 our adorable older beach bungalow is so very Santa Cruz. Pleasure Point Beach Bungalow is a surfer/beach lover's dream. The Bungalow itself is so healing, tranquil and cozy.
Dogs Welcome. Please not cats. Dog fee is $125.00 for first dog. Each additional dog is $50.00 there after.

The space
*LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION*
Within the first block to the ocean, the Pleasure Point Beach Bungalow is located in the BEST spot in Santa Cruz. Perfect place for a down to earth person looking for a Santa Cruz beach vibe.
Welcome to our lovely Pleasure Point Beach BUNGALOW (PPBB). Built in 1928 our adorable beach bungalow is very simple and truly what old Santa Cruz is about. Quirky, cozy and quaint we are located in the best beach location i
neighborhood_overview: I love everything about this neighborhood.  I love how I know my neighbors.  I love how walking down to check the surf is difficult just because of the friends you see along the way.  We don't have sidewalks and we like it that way. What we have are backyard bbqs and each other.
host_about: Hey Airbnb folks thanks for taking the time to check out my profile and the Pleasure Point beach cottage.  I've now spent most of my life in Santa Cruz and I am a big fan of keeping the integrity of Pleasure Point, architecturally and as a community. My house was built in 1928 which is a big representation of the history of this area.  As this area was once one of the last "surf ghettos" in California it is known by its sweet beach cottages and community feel.  I pride myself on maintaining my cottage for others so they can experience old Santa Cruz.  Traveling and surfing or maybe surfing and traveling are a few of the greatest loves in my life. There is so much to be learned when visiting other places, peoples and stepping outside our comfort zone.  My love for surfing has taken me across the globe and I've definitely seen there is always an exchange in life:  In order to get respect it is important to give respect.  I've been humbled more than once in the ocean and on land. ;-)  Please enjoy enjoy enjoy Santa Cruz and this sweet little cottage in the heart of Pleasure Point.  Bienvenidos.

name: Room w sep entrance & priv bath in tranquil Dome
description:
The dome house is located in a very special neighborhood on a private road, between Redwoods and Oak trees in the Santa Cruz Mountains. We are at 750 feet elevation with a peek of the ocean, just a six mile drive to the beach & Capitola Village. Enjoy the peace, and quiet and the spectacular views from this hill top location. The property sits on 5 acres with hiking trails and a private access to biking or swimming in Nisene park. A true Shangri-la where you can enjoy the local nature & culture.

The space
Cozy, peaceful, bright private room with separate entrance, facing the back of our property, decorated with our own art, and an adjacent private bath. You will have a view of the majestic redwoods on the property and millions of redwood trees in Nisene forest. The bed is a queen size with a memory foam topper. Everything in the bathroom and kitchenette is remodeled or new. Unfortunately there is no cooking permitted, as there is NO kitchen. But the space has a s
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a private road, everybody is super friendly, we are like a community of friends, zero crime, coffee shop is a four minute drive away. We have a secret entrance to the Nisene forest with miles of jogging, hiking, and Mountain Bike trails, and in summer you can enjoy a private swimming hole at the Soquel Creel. Other than that it is just very quiet, perfect to unplug and tune out.
host_about: Connie and Frank are both artists living in a geodesic dome. Both work either on improving the property or they stay in the dome and create art. They occupy the rest of the Pau Hana Dome, so they are around to answer questions or give suggestions about the area or what to do. They will interact with you as little or as much as you want. Their style of hosting is laid back and chill. Sometimes they talk too much because they get excited telling guests about the area and the dome etc.

Large, flat screen TVs with cable, and free movies available in the resort gift shop lobby. The home is lovely, comfortable and ideal for a family stay or couples retreat. The space

For longer visits, ask about mid stay maid service! Our Lobby staff can help with adventure activities, bonfires, restaurant recommendations & more.

Enjoy our fully furnished beach condo.

No renting "in the blind" only to find there's no one on hand to help you.  You'll be welcomed in the Lobby, provided keys, directions & tips on local interests you might enjoy.  If you've forgotten something, visit our expanded Lobby Store.

name: 2 bedroom/2 bath Oceanview Apartment
description:
This apartment is brand new construction seated in the charming village of Aptos, CA. Enjoy this bright, sunny location with ocean views. The front deck is perfect for enjoying a glass of wine in the evening. New growth surrounding this location with a natural food grocery, local gourmet coffee shops, restaurants and boutique shops. Walking distance to the beach and Nisene Marks Forest with hiking and mountain bike trails.
2-bedroom and 2-bathroom with washer/dryer and top end appliances.

The space
There is an elevator available for use. This apartment is above a retail office space which will be active during the day but closed in the evening. Very quiet.

Other things to note
This is an urban setting. The apartment has excellent insulation, however there will be street noise when the windows and sliding doors are open.
neighborhood_overview: Located in a new development with natural food store,  local coffee shops, and retail shops.
host_about:
Joe and I (Kathy) are excited to be hosts in the Air bnb community.  We love the concept of sharing our space with our “neighbors” throughout the world.  

This apartment is our second home and “get away” place in the city.  We live in Aptos -an hour from the city along the coast in the Santa Cruz area (between San Francisco and Monterey/Carmel).   We love to come up and experience urban life, get to know more about this amazing city, eat all the wonderful food, and then retreat back to our small coastal town.  

Joe works in the commercial real estate business and I am a retired ergonomist-turned Air b-n-b host.   If you decide to stay with us, we look forward to hosting and making your stay in San Francisco an easy and memorable one.

name: Restful Refuge at Ranchitos Del Sol
description:
Enter your peaceful room from a private entrance and deck with a view of the spacious garden, Monterey pines and eucalyptus trees. Enjoy a "continental breakfast" including organic tea, coffee, homemade granola, fruit and yogurt at the private table outside your room. Listen the call of Great Horned Owl, Red Shouldered Hawk, and California Quail on our 1/2 acre in a serene neighborhood in the Aptos Hills. Black Tail Deer are common visitors in our front yard.

The space
Your reservation includes two bedrooms that share a bathroom in between.
Guest Room #1 has a queen bed and faces the backyard from a private deck and entrance. This room includes a small refrigerator, microwave oven and coffee maker. Guest Room #2 has twin beds and shares a bathroom with Room #1 only. The private bathroom has a shower over the tub. This configuration is perfect a couple or for friends traveling together who want separate bedrooms and share the one bathroom. It is also perfe
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a tranquil neighborhood with very little traffic as our private road is "not a through street." Most properties are 1/2 to 2 acres. (We're on 1/2 acre) We are about a 10 minute drive from Rio del Mar State Beach, Nicene Marks Redwood State Park as well as Aptos Village. The area is well known for mountain bike trails and fantastic surfing. Our neighborhood is delightful for walking and taking in expansive views.
We have a list of local wineries.
host_about:
"Live in the present moment with an open heart and vast view"
is one of my favorite reflections. I cannot live without time to pause, breathe and smile. I take refuge in old growth redwood trees near our home as well as 
walking Sunset Beach at low tide. Being very new at hosting  I'm grateful we have a home to share and for the folks at Airbnb for making it possible.

Grand Cayman includes cable TV, free Wi-Fi, a private bathroom with a shower, mini fridge, microwave, kitchen sink, dinnerware, Keurig coffee maker, snacks, hair dryer, Capitola Hotel Signature Bath Products, iron and ironing board. Grand Cayman is intended for four guests,Our daily continental breakfast is also included with this room. What are you waiting for, book today!
neighborhood_overview: We are located at the center of the Capitola village, on the coast of Monterey Bay, 35 miles from San Jose, California. Our rooms and serene courtyard are an unbeatable oasis of relaxation, with the beach just outside the door.
host_about: Our beautifully furnished, boutique hotel is located in the heart of the Capitola Village.  We are family owned and operated and our passion is delighting our guests!  We offer a continental breakfast, afternoon cookies and tea and weekend wine and cheese service, all included with your stay!  If you are looking for the perfect destination next to the Pacific Ocean, look no further!

description:
Enjoy the Redwoods while relaxing in self-service, wood-burning heated Cedar Hot Tub ($150 fee) or by indoor woodstove ($50 fee). Cozy, remote cabin surrounded by Redwoods, perfect for quite guests who want to get away from it all & can be respectful to our neighbors & follow all house rules. Limited Cell. New satellite WIFI available for online conference meetings: screen sharing only (without camera or video as not enough bandwidth) or Instead relax, unwind & reset.

The space
Cozy 3 bedroom, A-frame cabin with open floor plan. Bedrooms are not private & have an open ceiling with doorways covered by curtains. Bathrooms have folding doors. Upstairs is accessible by an outside staircase or an inside ladder. Children must be supervised when using the ladder & cabin is NOT childproof in any way.

Enjoy the self-service wood fired, hot tub, surrounding decks, and the amazing beauty of the Redwoods.

Guest access
Guests have acce
neighborhood_overview:
As as courtesy to our small, tightknit community, all neighbors are notified of guest count and arrival/departure dates.

Cabin is in the middle of a Redwood Forest surrounded by working cattle ranch with nearby and visible neighbors who take trespassing very seriously. Private road to our cabin it to only be used for accessing cabin via auto, IT IS NOT A WALKING TRAIL FOR AIRBNB GUESTS. Cows are not to be disturbed or approached.
host_about: We have enjoyed sharing our cabin with family and friends for over 20 years and we look forward to hosting a quite retreat for guests who can be respectful to our neighbors.

name: Jaw-Dropping Beach-Front Retreat!
description:
Open for rentals!

THIS...
...Is not your typical beach house and location.
A stunning, modern and fun aesthetic inside.
Jaw-dropping panoramic ocean views outside.

The space
THE HOUSE…
…Is a three-story home comprised of 4 bedrooms and 2-1/2 bathrooms. Two balconies provide 180° Monterey Bay ocean views overlooking Rio del Mar beach and the renowned SS Palo Alto “cement ship.” Swing in the hanging rope hammock chairs with your sunglasses on while basking in the warmth of the afternoon sun...the kids playing on the beach in front of you. Relax on the balconies with a glass of wine while watching the brilliant red, orange and yellow sunsets.

THE EXPERIENCE…
…Is one you’ll never forget! You think it ever gets boring watching dolphins and whales off your back balcony? It does not. Perhaps the sound of the crashing waves doesn’t relax you? It always does. Or, maybe the feel of the sand under your feet doesn’t sweep you
neighborhood_overview: THE LOCATION on “the island” of Rio del Mar in Aptos is a prime spot for beach fun, water activities, and nearby dining. You can stay there and never leave…or…go explore nearby Capitola, Santa Cruz and Monterey. There are an unlimited number of activities and sites including wine tasting, golfing, surfing, hiking, and beautiful drives. Walking distance is Cafe Rio Restaurant, Rio Market, Pixie Deli,Flats Bistro, and SeaBreeze Tavern.

Walk to the beach, coffee, deli, market and restaurants in less than 2 minutes. Close proximity to Highway 1 and major shopping areas.

name: 4 Bdrm 3.5 Bath Townhouse
description:
4 Bedroom 3.5 Bath Townhouse in a small town home complex in the center of Scotts Valley. We are conveniently located 15 minutes to the beach, 10 minutes to Henry Cowell Redwoods State Park and 40 minutes to the San Jose Airport. Scotts Valley is the gateway to the beaches and redwoods. We are walking distance to grocery stores and restaurants.
This is our home so you will have a large fully stocked kitchen, linens, soap and other essentials.
No smoking. No parties or events.

The space
4 Bedroom 3.5 Bath Townhouse in central Scotts Valley. Located close to shops, Sky Park, Henry Cowell State Park and only 10-15 minutes from Santa Cruz and the beaches. Come and hike, bike, surf or just relax.
We can accommodate 2 cars in the garage. Please verify the car you are planning on bringing prior to booking so we can let you know if it will fit.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole house minus a couple of locked closets.
neighborhood_overview: We always recommend guests check out Henry Cowell State Park to see the giant redwoods. Make sure you navigate to the main entrance off Hwy 9 and not the camping entrance off Graham Hill Rd. We also enjoy the pedestrian path that winds along Sky Park which is just a 0.25 miles from our place. We like House of Bagels if you enjoy a good bagel, Kao Sook if you like Thai, and Ambrosia if you like Indian. In Santa Cruz one of favorite restaurants is West End Tap & Kitchen which is close to a number of breweries and wine tasting rooms. For casual fast but tasting dining we like Burger. and Charlie Hong Kong. If you're an ice cream fan Marianne's is a Santa Cruz staple. Places in Santa Cruz that we often bring friends and family include: West Cliff Lighthouse and pedestrian walking/running/biking path, Wilder Ranch State Park coastal bluff walk, Santa Cruz Boardwalk & Wharf, and whale watching, kayaking and fruit stands in Moss Landing. If you're staying a while other beautiful areas that ar
host_about: My wife and I are nurses. We enjoy running, biking, hiking, and anything outdoors. We are pretty low key, but like to think we have fun! We really enjoy traveling. We spent half a year in South America, half a year in New Zealand, and a few months in Central America. We have also traveled quite a bit in the US.

description:
Perfect for families looking for a beach getaway, staycation or social distancing. Enjoy panoramic ocean views and listen to the sound of the waves. Our home is just steps from the sand in a quiet gated community, with 2,300+ sq. ft. and five bedrooms, including two master suites, an upstairs living area that is bright and open with large windows, two front decks and a high open-beam ceiling over a comfortable great room with wood-burning fireplace, media room and a well-accessorized kitchen.

The space
5 bdr, 3 bth home, white water views, driveway, garage, stocked with amenities including new ping pong table

The ideal destination for your next getaway:

•Amazing location fewer than 100 steps to the sand; listen to the waves while you drink your morning coffee!

•Panoramic ocean views of sunsets, see city lights from Santa Cruz and Monterey

•Two spacious master suites, each with private decks; upstairs master bath featu
neighborhood_overview: Pajaro Dunes is a private beach community located on a secluded 1.5-mile stretch of Monterey Bay. It’s quiet and relaxing, with extensive walking/biking/jogging trails, and courts for tennis, bocce, volleyball, basketball and horse shoes. It’s a short 15 minute drive to Santa Cruz/Capitola or 30 minutes to Monterey/Carmel. The entire Monterey Bay Areas has excellent restaurants and world-class golfing, with key attractions including Monterey Bay Aquarium, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and shopping.

name: Santa Cruz Hideout
description:
The Hideout is a very private space located on the west side of Santa Cruz between Natural Bridges beach/West Cliff Drive (1.2 miles) and UCSC (1.4 miles). The Hideout has keyless entry, private entrance, private yard, full kitchen, air conditioning, washer/dryer, reverse osmosis water, you name it! Privacy is #1! Interaction with the owners is entirely optional. The Hideout is just 300 square feet but has all the amenities.
You must have completed the ID verification process to book.

The space
You must complete the Airbnb ID verification process to book the Hideout.
The Hideout's greatest asset is its private setting behind a locked gate with key-less entry. Interaction with the owners is entirely optional. You have your own private yard and patio with furniture and a beautiful setting for outdoor relaxing or meals.
The Hideout's proximity to UCSC (1.4 miles), the beach / West Cliff drive (1.2 miles), and the Boardwalk (2.7 miles) make i
neighborhood_overview: The Hideout is located on a hill near the north border of Santa Cruz.  The neighborhood is mostly quiet with a mixture of families and student households.  Near the bottom of the hill is a repurposed packing complex now with many great food, beer, and wine destinations.  Local and large national grocery chains are just over a mile away.
host_about: Hi, I am Michelle.  My husband and I love adventures and fun.

name: Cabin at Juju Paradise:Santa Cruz Redwoods Retreat
description:
Nestled in a redwood grove below the main house, Juju Paradise has a 288 square foot cabin. Equipped with everything you need for a perfect forest getaway, this cabin is great for relaxing under the redwoods, reading a book, and getting away from it all. Take a hot shower under the redwoods- open air and enclosed by live edge redwood slabs. Equipped with a propane stove and oven, composting toilet, and LED lighting- you will not long for the traditional amenities of the city.

The space
*420 Friendly* However, please no smoking inside the cabin.

We have 30 acres of redwoods in the Santa Cruz Mountains. The property has 50+ of Meyer lemon trees you are welcome to help yourself.

The cabin is equipped with a Natures Head composting toilet. If you are not comfortable using a composting toilet, please do not request a reservation. If you are staying for more than one night, you may need to watch the urine levels. We will empty it for you upon req
neighborhood_overview: Located 3.1 miles from the Aptos Post office up Cathedral Drive. The cabin in is nestled in the redwoods for the perfect escape from the city.
host_about: Cal and Zaharah just celebrated their anniversary in Singapore where they got married 30 years ago. Cal works on the property at the redwood lumber mill. Zaharah enjoys gardening and crocheting. They live in the bottom unit of The Juju Paradise, so they are always around to answer questions or give suggestions about the area.

name: Sunny Beach Bungalow Near Scenic West Cliff Drive
description:
Welcome to your very own second-story apartment and private deck, perfect for sunning and watching the sunset. Located in the heart of the Westside of Santa Cruz, blocks from scenic West Cliff Drive, you’ll be walking distance to the legendary Steamers Lane surf spot, the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, beautiful Natural Bridges State Beach, and local wineries, breweries, and eateries.

The space
In addition to a huge, sunny patio, the apartment includes 1 large bedroom with a queen bed, a sofa bed in the living space, and room for a pack-n-play/baby bed in either room. Full bath, spacious kitchen, WiFi, full cable (including HBO, Netflix, Prime, and Hulu, a flat-screen TV, and laundry.
You will enter the apartment through a shared backyard (my husband and I and our 6-year-old boys live in the main house downstairs), but from the backyard you will have a private staircase and entrance to the apartment.

Guest access
The entire apartment and
neighborhood_overview: Take a morning walk down West Cliff Drive to the Lighthouse and watch the waves and surfers. Stop by Steamer Lane Supply for a breakfast quesadilla and coffee or homemade cookie.  Check out the Monarch butterflies (depending on the season) in Lighthouse Field State Park, and then head down the steps to the beach for some saltwater and sand therapy.  Later in the day, walk though the neighborhood to Swift Street Courtyard where you can likely catch live music at one of the many local wineries, grab a beer at the brewery, shop and local boutiques, and eat farm-to-table meals at  Kelly's French Bakery, West End Tap and Kitchen, Bantam, or get something yummy to go at New Leaf market.
host_about: My husband and I, with our twin 6-year-old boys, a hound-mix puppy, and two black-and-white cats live in Santa Cruz, we love hosting, and we love traveling. We are happy to provide recommendations and local tips to make your visit one to remember.

Gaze at a massive blue ocean and look for whales. Slow your monkey mind. Meander at sunset. Contemplate. Relate. Toast to possibilities. Beach toys. Be a kid...sleep deeply, play. Boogie board, build a castle! Dash through the surf, hop into the outdoor shower, then sink into a blissful hot tub. Barbecued fish and salad for dinner? Perfect.

name: Beautiful Remodeled 1 Bedroom Seascape Resort!
description:
This beautiful newly remodeled 1 bedroom is located in the amenity-rich Seascape Resort in Aptos, CA. This vacation rental is perfect for a romantic getaway, or a week away from it all with the family. There are 3 pools, Sanderling's restaurant on-site as well as restaurants and shops across the street. The beach spans for miles. Walk the grounds or simply enjoy the pools, beach and restaurant. Sleeps 4 adults comfortably with a pull out sofa and an extra sleeping mat.

The space
Newly remodeled and gorgeous! Bright, sunny light and expansive ocean views!

There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

name: Ocean view!  Fantastic Seascape Resort 1 Bedroom-Newly Remodeled!
description:
Rare larger corner unit! This beautiful, ocean view unit is located in the amenity-rich Seascape Resort in Aptos, CA. Walk on the gorgeous beach, this vacation rental is perfect for a romantic getaway or a week away from it all with the family. There are 3 pools, hot tubs, Sanderling's restaurant on-site as well as restaurants and shops across the street. The beach spans for miles. Walk the grounds or enjoy the pools, beach and restaurant!

The space
Newly remodeled and gorgeous! Bright, sunny light and expansive ocean views!

There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not available to private rent
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

description:
There are 2 units that can be rented separately or together Unit #1 "Trestle" and Unit #2 "Riverview". This is to reserve both units together. The units are owned by the Architects who designed and built them. The Capitola Village is one of the most charming beach towns on the California coast and we are happy to put you right in the heart of it in excellent accommodations. You are a short walk or bike ride from the beach, bike and surf board rentals, many excellent restaurants and shops.

The space
There are two side by side units on the property, this reservation will be for both of the units. You will share a stairway and back yard if you are renting one unit. If you rent both you will have the property to yourself. You will have a private garage and laundry facilities and parking for 2 smaller cars (Large trucks and SUV's will need to park on the neighborhood streets or the City Lot directly across the street). The home is three stories so expect stai
neighborhood_overview:
The Capitola Village has great breakfast, lunch, dinner, desserts and shopping all in walking distance. The beach is family friendly with beginner surf breaks and depending on the swell can be great for advanced surfers. During the summer there is music on the beach and movie nights, Capitola is host to the Art and Wine festival, Hot Rod show, Wharf to Wharf race, Mermaid Triatholon, Monte Foundation Fireworks, check the Capitola Village website for more information. Gayles Bakery
You can walk to all the local shops and restaurants, Nob Hill Grocery is a short 2 min. drive away, public transportation is available. To the North is 41st avenue with more restaurants, and surf shops, ice cream and world class surf breaks (Pleasure Point, The Hook, Jacks), to the South is New Brighton State beach, great lazy beach days with mellow surf. The forest of Nisene Marks has endless trails for mountain biking and hiking through the redwoods, located in The Aptos Village, a short 5-10 minu
host_about: This beautiful home is owned by two architects.  We love Capitola.  We work here, we play here, our families are part of the community here.  You will see us surfing, playing beach volleyball, fishing, and enjoying the outdoors.

The space
The cottage is fully equipped with WiFi, cable,TV/DVD, a gas fireplace in the Master bedroom. BBQ enclosed backyard.
Comfortable sleeps 2 adults with 2 children.
neighborhood_overview: As you step out the front gate you are a short walk from Lighthouse Field State Park, which is adjacent to the scenic West Cliff Drive. An easy walk to the Santa Cruz Musical Wharf, the historic Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Main Beach, Cowells Beach, and some fine restaurants and shops.You can also watch the surfers at world-famous Steamer Lane. Further along West Cliff, you'll find several smaller, less populated beaches and coves along the way to Natural Bridges State Park--where Monarch butterflies make a twice - yearly stop on their annual migration.

The Pajaro Dunes spans for 1.5 miles. My home is perfect for families or a romantic getaway. Nearby is Moss Landing or the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.

You can access all the amenities for the community including tennis courts, basketball courts, duck pond, and the private grill located on the porch. There is a convenience store 100 steps from the house, the community is gated and secured 24 hours a day. Kitchen is fully stocked including a coffee maker. Or another option is going into town to eat: there are many great seafood and Mexican restaurants in the town of Watsonville.

name: Mt. Madonna Forest Room with incredible views
description:
Welcome to Mt. Madonna!

I have a quaint bedroom to sleep in and a deck to take in views of the Forest and the ocean at the same time.

Two friendly people live in this home, its quiet and cozy.

We have good reception for cell phones, but no wifi to offer unfortunately so you would need your own hotspot.

There is a shared bathroom with a person who lives here, no cooking but we have a coffee maker and small fridge in the room with fantastic views from the deck.

That's all we have up here.

The space
We are on top of the mountains!

Its a very curvy highway road to get to the property, and getting out requires going right only out of the drive way~~

If you can handle some traffic and skilled driving, we have a home on the side of a mountain staring at the entire ocean.

From here you can walk into a forest, drive 20 minutes to the beach, wineries, breweries or just relax on the
neighborhood_overview:
We are in the mountains and there are a few RVs, workshops and homes on this property... Yet it's amazingly quiet and luscious. We are on acres.

Everyone up here appreciates privacy and refrain from making loud noises. There are two people living in the home who will give you plenty of privacy.

Sunny quiet upstairs bedroom with vaulted ceilings and twin bed.

Many nice coffee shops and restaurants close by (Harbor Café, Crows Nest, Java Junction, Linda’s Seabreeze Café, Charlie Hong-Kong’s, Dharma’s). Close to Dominican hospital.

Very close to many natural food shops: Staff of Life, New Leaf and Whole foods… where you can get outstanding organic produce as well as smoothies, veggie drinks and hot bar food.

I value my alone time, am very quiet but also am a good resource to answer questions especially about ideas for healthy things to do in Santa Cruz.

name: Whiskey Hollow, A Cozy A-Frame in the Redwoods
description:
Romantic retreat! Wake up to bird song through the skylights, lounge on the deck under the redwoods with a cup of coffee, luxuriate in the oversized bathtub with candles, and cozy up in front of the wood fireplace. Whiskey Hollow is a true get-away! Nestled in the woods, you would never guess that you're only 2 miles from downtown Felton, 1.5 miles from Henry Cowell State Park, 15 minutes from downtown Santa Cruz, and 20 minutes to the beach. Super cozy and--did we mention? Romantic!!!

The space
Charming, cozy, peaceful, this A-Frame cabin in the woods is the perfect place for a romantic get-away. Snuggle up in the comfy queen bed in the loft, and morning will greet you with a stunning view of the redwoods without even having to leave the bed. (Did we mention it's romantic??)

When you do muster the energy to start your day, a fully equipped kitchen awaits and provides the opportunity to cook a big breakfast, lunch or dinner. Felton offers two nea
neighborhood_overview:
If vacation means not cooking, downtown Felton offers multiple dining opportunities just five minutes away. A few of our favorites: Cowboy Bar & Grill, The Cremer House, and Redwood Pizza . Scotts Valley is about 15 minutes away and offers all the amenities of a city (in case you're craving a fancy cupcake, See's candy or want to catch a movie on the big screen). Drive a few more minutes and you're in Santa Cruz at the beach, where you can find fresh crab, locally roasted coffee (Verve!), and a vegan bakery, as well as the renowned Bookshop Santa Cruz--a must if you are a book lover.

Nearby activities include hiking, surfing, zip-lining, mountain biking, and Roaring Camp Railroad. In the cabin you will find a binder filled with our dining recommendations (as well as addresses, phone numbers and hours for each restaurant), information on local activities ranging from Pescadero down to Carmel, and books about the area to help you plan your stay. One of our favorites: Ren

name: Modern Capitola VillageBeach "Riverview" Unit
description:
This is for 1 unit called "Riverview". There are 2 units that can be rented separately or together Unit #1 "Trestle" and Unit #2 "Riverview". The units are owned by the Architects who designed and built them. The Capitola Village is one of the most charming beach towns on the California coast and we are happy to put you right in the heart of it in excellent accommodations. You are a short walk or bike ride from the beach, bike and surf board rentals, many excellent restaurants and shops.

The space
There are two side by side units on the property, this reservation will be for one of the units. You will share a stairway and back yard if you are renting one unit. If you rent both you will have the property to yourself. You will have a private garage and laundry facilities and parking for 2 smaller cars (Large trucks and SUV's will need to park on the neighborhood streets or the City Lot directly across the street). The home is three stories so expect stairs
neighborhood_overview:
The Capitola Village has great breakfast, lunch, dinner, desserts and shopping all in walking distance. The beach is family friendly with beginner surf breaks and depending on the swell can be great for advanced surfers. During the summer there is music on the beach and movie nights, Capitola is host to the Art and Wine festival, Hot Rod show, Wharf to Wharf race, Mermaid Triatholon, Monte Foundation Fireworks, check the Capitola Village website for more information. Gayles Bakery
You can walk to all the local shops and restaurants, Nob Hill Grocery is a short 2 min. drive away, public transportation is available. To the North is 41st avenue with more restaurants, and surf shops, ice cream and world class surf breaks (Pleasure Point, The Hook, Jacks), to the South is New Brighton State beach, great lazy beach days with mellow surf. The forest of Nisene Marks has endless trails for mountain biking and hiking through the redwoods, located in The Aptos Village, a short 5-10 minu
host_about: This beautiful home is owned by two architects.  We love Capitola.  We work here, we play here, our families are part of the community here.  You will see us surfing, playing beach volleyball, fishing, and enjoying the outdoors.

name: Cliff House in the Vineyards - Wine Cellar Room
description:
Enjoy a relaxing vacation or a weekend retreat in our spectacular home in the Santa Cruz Mountains. We are perched atop an incredible mountain vista, surrounded by more than a dozen nearby wineries. This area is known for some of the best Chardonnay, Pinot Noir and Pinotage wineries in California. The experience is authentic and unhurried, with no crowds, wonderful people, and of course, wonderful wine.

The space
Sit on the deck and enjoy a glass of wine while looking over the tops of the redwoods in majestic Santa Cruz mountains!

Cliff House in the Vineyards is a 5000 SF luxury home perched on top of the Santa Cruz Mountains and is the perfect place for a romantic getaway, for hiking aficionados and for wine lovers.

The upper floor has a large common area including a bar and lounge area, dining room, a 2000 SF slate deck and gourmet kitchen, with picturesque views of mountain and vineyards.

This listing is for a deluxe, private
neighborhood_overview: Cliff House is located on a well maintained private road with fast easy access from both Los Gatos and Capitola.  It is less than 3 minutes from the gourmet Summit Store.
host_about:
Linnea and I love wine, wineries, and the Santa Cruz Mountain wineries in particular. We frequently visited them for day trips from the valley but we couldn’t stay overnight as there were no accommodations. We serendipitously came across Cliff House, situated right in the middle of our very favorite wineries, so we made a life change from a city life immersed in stress, to what has become a beautiful vacation-forever retreat for us..

The house has four separated MBR suites on the lower floor enabling privacy for up to four couples (like a hotel).  The upper floor is a dream for those who want to enjoy one of the most scenic views in California. We are also very social, so we then took the next plunge into building an AirBNB which we wanted to feel and look like a charming, traditional BNB. Privacy in a natural wonder when you want it, and a social setting on the upper floor for those who want it. The Cliff House’s 5000 SF footprint, with a 2000 SF slate deck facing the sunset over the panoramic canyons and mountains has entranced everyone we know who have visited us here.

We still both work in the valley and we are passionate about our work, but we also love working on Cliff House and meeting wonderful people.

We hope to welcome you Cliff House in the Vineyards soon!

name: Luxury on the California Coast
description:
Luxury on the California Coast.
With bedrooms spread out your family/friends can be together in the common areas; the kitchen/family room or the lower level recreation room; with a pool table, dart board, bar area, large screen tv, board games, dvd collection. If you need privacy you can retreat to your room, or the library with fireplace. There is a gas fire pit that overlooks the ocean. Nearly every room has an ocean view.

The space
There is a gas BBQ on the balcony off the family room/kitchen area. Large lawn overlooking the ocean. Sound system on the main level of the home, you can plug in your phone to play your own music. Piano in living room, with CD's for self playing option.

Other things to note
The home is a private estate accessed through a quiet neighborhood. Respect for our neighbors peace in their home is of high importance to us. The main driveway is shared by one other home, all vehicles must be parked inside of our ga
neighborhood_overview: Private path to the beach with coded gate for access to and from the beach. 10 minute walk house to sand. There are stairs down the hill.

name: MoonSpirit Studio in Bonny Doon
description:
Do you like nature, trees, and a view of the night sky? Want to feel like you are far away, but only 15 minutes to Santa Cruz? This studio is surrounded by nature, 10 minutes from the beach! Clean, spacious, and fully equipped, can accommodate a small family or group of friends, has mini fridge and kitchen area. Bathroom has shower and tub. Kids, pets, and all families🌈 are welcome here.
Wineries nearby 🍷

Post CZU fire conditions are stable, inquire about roads or any concerns.

The space
Spacious, fully equipped studio. Queen bed and separate twin sleeper sofa. Clean, light, healing space. 2 kids fit nicely on the sofa, but for 2 adults I could add a comfortable padded cot to the room to sleep 4 . The Studio is connected to the main house, but it allows for a great amount of privacy. It has a small private yard area.

Guest access
Private patio space and entrance. The studio has ample parking.

Othe
neighborhood_overview: Quiet forested neighborhood.   Big, beautiful properties with deer wandering the yards.  Bonny Doon is just a skip from Santa Cruz proper. Up in the forest, quiet and beautiful with great privacy.

name: Cozy Cottage in Seabright Beach
description:
You are invited to experience Santa Cruz at the 'Seabright Cottage'.

This move-in ready 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home has been recently updated, that provides guests ample of natural light. From the open-concept kitchen and living space to its charming loft area, there's a please room for the family to enjoy! Walk to the deck upstairs to relax and unwind.

Situated near Seabright Beach and well-known restaurants and coffee shops. Don't miss out!

The space
Why choose this house?

✔ Proximity to Seabright beach where you family can enjoy and see the seals, dolphins and otters. The kids and kids at heart will surely love!

✔ Close to well-known local restaurants, coffee shops and bars within few minutes!

✔ You can park 2 cars tandem in the driveway.

✔ There's a futon and television in the loft area.

✔ The house has a walk-in closet and a deck upstairs.

✔ Free use of wifi

✔

name: Perfect house for a beach getaway
description:
Charming beach house on a private street just 1 block from Seacliff and Rio Del Mar beaches. With 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, and a large bonus room, there's space for everyone. The roomy kitchen was completely remodeled in 2019 and new 6-person hot tub added in 2021.
Close to everything, but away from the crowds, this is the perfect place for a getaway - BBQ on the main deck or soak up the sun on the roof deck.
(Sorry, NO parties, NO pets)

(NOTE: 11% county tax will be added to all reservations)

The space
The house is well appointed and ready for you to enjoy. The kitchen has everything you'll need, including some basic herbs and spices. Linens are included, plus there are board games, video games and a bumper pool table.
neighborhood_overview: Just a short walk to Cafe Rio, the Pixie Deli, and the Flats, and a 10 minute walk to the Aptos pier and the Cement Ship.

name: The Historic “Doll House” built in 1909
description:
Historic Home in Ben Lomond built in 1909. The home is named the “Doll House” named after the original family owners the Dahzeils
The Doll House is large and beautiful. Located on the San Lorenzo river with its own private beach and beach entrance. We have many beautiful sunning decks with gardens for relaxation. The top of Doll House is available and has its own private entrance and amenities.

name: LARGE OCEAN VIEW HOME ON PRIVATE BEACH 623
description:
Large family home with 4 + bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, large open concept 2nd floor living area with ocean views. This beach home is across the street from the beach. Beach access in just a short two min walk to the end of the street, going south. . Large deck great for gathering and just enjoying the sun. Located in a beach front gated community, right in the middle of Monterey Bay. Enjoy your time spent with the family on the huge deck overlooking the bay or staying warm by the fire.

The space
Spacious home with new furnishings and updated decor throughout. All of the bedrooms are on the first floor along with one full bathroom, with the living space and kitchen on the second floor including an additional bathroom.

Other things to note
This home does offer some beach chairs and beach toys. Located in a gated community with a private beach. Bon Fires are authorized on the private beach, please bring your owner fire ring.
Starter pac

neighborhood_overview: Conveniently located, between Felton & Ben Lomond.  A short drive down scenic hwy 9 to the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, Henry Cowell Park and the Giant Redwood trails, or Big Basin Park with trails that go to the Pacific.  Roaring Narrow Gauge Railroad  station is just 3 miles south!
host_about: Greetings! I'm Nicky at the Treehouse in the Redwoods.  The stretch between Santa Cruz Mountain Redwoods, and the Half Moon Bay beaches has so much variety, including the wonderful marina, and our local West Point beach, adjacent to Mavericks Big Wave surf Beach. Half Moon Bay has a quaint downtown with lots of amazing restaurants, and a variety unusual Art, as well as amazing shopping opportunities.  The St Cruz mountain area, is just a few miles from the Beach & Boardwalk, Old Railroad rides and Redwood Parks hiking.   Redwoods Treehouse is our way of sharing the CA coast experience we enjoy with others.  We are close by & always available for the needs of guests.

name: Unique Beach Front Multi-Family Home 389
description:
This spacious updated home is great for large multi-family groups. Enjoy life at the beach in Rio Del Mar right across from the largest stretch of beach in the county. The guest studio is available by the week for an additional cost of $1008 weekly when renting the main house with kitchenette, bath, two twin beds, fireplace with ocean views. Unfortunately this home DOES NOT supply linens, sheets and towels due to how many this home sleeps: You may rent them by contacting Deanie at 831-254-1817.

The space
Large home with an open concept floor plan, has 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Fully remodeled kitchen with double appliances and full ocean views from throughout the front of the home. The main living space is on the first floor with two bedrooms and the second floor has four bedrooms, two baths. This home as an amazing enclosed sleeping quarter on second floor balcony and huge back deck with BBQ and outdoor seating.
neighborhood_overview: This beach front property is located on Beach Dr in Rio Del Mar a short walk to restaurants, coffee, and a a market. Also a close 5 minute drive to all the necessities, grocery, local restaurants, gas and banks. Take advantage of the short drive to Nisene Marks State Park right off of Aptos Village.

description:
Luxurious, Unique & Spacious Home with Great Views is 4 Minute Walk to Ocean!

Modern style and upgrades abound in this comfortable, spotless, sparkly home. Spacious home with great floor plan. Lovely, private backyard.

Wonderful, quiet and safe beach neighborhood. All the benefits of a great Seacliff location without any of the traffic. Seacliff offers so much for your beach getaway. Marianne’s ice cream, great restaurants, coffee shops, and a groceries are all with a 10 minute walk.

The space
Gorgeous, super clean, and extremely well located four bedroom home in the best neighborhood in Seacliff.

Fall asleep to the sounds of the ocean waves crashing, wake up to the beautiful views.

Seacliff offers so much for your beach getaway. Marianne’s ice cream, great restaurants, coffee shops, and a grocery store are all with a 10 minute walk.
The iconic cement ship is just a few minutes away. And Seacliff is one of the best stretches of beach on the Monterey Bay. You can walk for miles in either direction.

name: Beach-Front Home On The "Island"!
description:
Open for rentals!

The space
Location Location! This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is among the sought after Rio Del Mar beach-front homes on the "Island". You can walk onto the sand from your sliding glass door in the living room, enjoy your coffee from the upper deck while looking out to sea, and listen to the sound of the ocean while falling asleep.The first floor has a fully equipped kitchen, laundry room, full bathroom, and living room with tv, fireplace, and large window looking out to the ocean. Upstairs is the other full bathroom and three bedrooms with a deck.

Guest access
The whole house!

Other things to note
Do not use patio for self use. Do not climb on seawall. No more than 2 cars per house. Parking is first come first serve along street.

I recommend purchasing travelers insurance due to potential shutdowns
neighborhood_overview: Rio del Mar Beach: View the dolphins and seals swimming up and down the ocean during the strolls on the beach. Bring your binoculars for whale watching! Other activities include boogie boarding, surfing, swimming, sea shelling, and building sand castles. It is the perfect playground for everyone!

description:

Minutes to epic trails for hiking, trail running, or cycling or Santa Cruz beaches. Perfect for a weekend adventure! Close enough to have great access but remote enough to avoid the traffic of Downtown Santa Cruz. You can surf or paddle board in the ocean and explore the redwoods all in one day plus great road riding, gastric-pubs and local festivals.

Arrive at your solar powered vacation and enjoy a glass of complimentary local wine!

In the morning, enjoy organic fair trade coffee or a variety of teas. Your breakfast includes a variety of instant oatmeal, breakfast bars, or fruit. Then enjoy self-guided yoga on your private deck-Yoga mats are provided for you.

description:
This beautiful and rare studio is located in the amenity-rich Seascape Resort in Aptos, CA. Walk on the gorgeous beach, this vacation rental is perfect for a romantic getaway or a week away. There are 3 pools, a hot tub, Sanderling's restaurant on-site as well as restaurants and shops across the street. The beach spans for miles. Walk the grounds or enjoy the pools, beach and restaurant!

The space
Rare, 3rd floor unit (elevator access) with gorgeous ocean views!

Newly remodeled and gorgeous! Bright, sunny light and expansive ocean views!

There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

Refer to the Guest Welcome Binder upon arrival for additional information on the property and local attractions.
