name: Remodeled Beach House w/Roof Top & Deck Ocean View
description:
Open for rentals!

The space
The house has four distinct levels. The roof top deck gives sweeping ocean views from Carmel to Pleasure Point. Sunbathe or enjoy an evening glass of wine or beverage while watching the Monet inspired sunrise/sunset with oranges and pinks. In the evening take in the stars and admire the silvery moon and Venus.

The upper level stretches out onto a deck with an ocean view. Sip your morning coffee/tea while watching the sun rise. Settle into the plush velvet couches while viewing your favorite sports team, movie or tickle the ivories on the baby grand piano. The kitchen's glass tile reflects the ocean's blues and greys complimenting the Ukrainian granite counters. There is also a cozy sitting area on the way to the rooftop stairs…a place to daydream or to cuddle up with a favorite book.

The first level is for dreaming & playing ping pong or foosball! The bedrooms are on this ground level. The showers are kind for tho
neighborhood_overview:
It is truly an inspiring place and our hope is to replicate part of it here in Seacliff to inspire and encourage people to pursue their dreams ....especially those that encourage good in the world.

The house is a short two blocks stroll to Beach Gate Path and is within walking distance to Manuel's, Marianne's Ice cream, Aptos Coffee Roasting, Persephone's and the Village of Aptos.

There is something for everyone - Over 20 miles of contiguous beaches, hiking trails at Nicene Marks State Park, Bike trails, wineries, breweries, beach boardwalk, paddle boarding, surfing and even a new skateboard/mountain bike park nearby. Take scenic day trips to Carmel, Monterey and San Francisco.

description:
The space
Get away from it all at this private, rustic-yet-charming home nestled among the towering redwoods. This is the perfect place to enjoy your friends and family with a summer barbecue on the lovely, furnished deck built around redwood trees. Gather around the gas fireplace and relax with your group after a long day of exploring the woods.

Santa Cruz is just six miles away, where you'll find the University of California at Santa Cruz, the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, lovely beaches, restaurants, and entertainment! Enjoy creative and tasty American cuisine in the relaxing atmosphere of the Cowboy Bar and Grill, only one mile away. Henry Cowell Redwoods State Park is less than two miles away and offers breathtaking hiking trails, fishing, picnic spots, bicycle routes, and camping. The Bigfoot Discovery Museum is a little over a mile miles away, featuring collections of popular culture, history, and a fun gift shop. Red
host_about:
Greetings from Team Vacasa! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)

We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 

Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

name: Tentrr Signature Site - Artemis
description:
This campsite is steps away from stunningly beautiful hiking, bicycling and horse trails in the redwoods that open up to the ocean and Santa Cruz mountain views to the west; to the east is a working farm with an orchard, chickens, baby goats, one horse, one baby horse, one pony, one giant mule, and a wild Kiger mustang that may be grazing near your site. It is a roughly 4 mile hike or ride to the ocean from the tent. The house is not far from the site, but the tent is still very private.

There is a platform in the redwood stand behind the tent with an extra toilet and place to hang the solar shower (which is sunning on a chair 30 yards away in the orchard). Behind that campers will find the gate to the park, and the trail which is just beyond the gate. Either direction is beautiful. Note, the 5 horses came come and visit you, do not worry, they will not hurt you.

Very important: in order to make a fire in the interior tent stove, you must bring your ow
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We make it dirt simple to unlock the outdoors.

Tentrr campsites are secluded on beautiful, private land so you can relax and recharge in peace. Our sites are equipped and ready for you - so go solo or bring the whole crew (including the dog) – this base camp is just the beginning of your adventure.  More than just a bed in the bush, Tentrr also curates outdoor Experiences and Extras to help you effortlessly plan your perfect trip.

Each campsite includes a large canvas tent on a raised platform, wood-fired stove, queen-sized bed, 5-person dome tent, 2 Adirondack chairs, camp table, camp benches, storage box, fire pit, campfire grill, trash can, 5-gallon water container, outdoor sun shower, and outdoor camp toilet.

name: La Casita @ CasaV between Monterey & Santa Cruz
description:
La Casita at the Vojvoda Family Estate once was home of a prized show horse! Surrounded by apple orchards in the beautiful Corralitos area of Watsonville, La Casita is dressed in fresh farmhouse decor. WiFi,CableTV,Coffee/Tea/Bottled Water. For an added layer of relaxation, catch a Yoga class in our on site Greenhouse Studio. Local Brew/Wine & Beaches all within 5 min. We pride ourselves on safety, cleanliness & privacy at the highest level of hospitality. We know your stay will be a delight!

The space
La Casita/Retreat house is a great lil spot that is centrally located in Santa Cruz County. 40 min to the stunning Monterey Peninsula, 30 min to the ever so popular Santa Cruz and 60min to the iconic San Francisco Bay Area! Ask us about hosting your next event at our estate or simply treat yourself to a few delightful upgrades during your stay ie: homemade meal time in the Greenhouse, a wonderful Candlelight Yoga/Meditation class, or some Fireside S’mores! We ar
neighborhood_overview: Watsonville/Corralitos is known for its rich history in agriculture with the absolute perfect coastal climate. The Corralitos Mrkt is a landmark that is home of the famous Corralitos Sauage! Get a few links warmed to go and head over to one of our amazing Brew/Wine spots nearby. Gizdich Ranch is another jem right in our backyard, where you can enjoy a lil slice of heaven with homemade fruit pie a la mode! Authentic Mexican cuisine is plentiful in our area, Cilantros being our #1 pick and Imura #1 for Sushi. We love where we live and are excited to share it with you!
host_about:
We are a couple of  high school sweet hearts who were born raised and work in Santa Cruz County. We have 3 adult children who live on the Vojvoda Family Estate. We are all in the hospitality business at different levels; ie, Firefighters, Interior Design, Wine, Dance, Yoga.... We enjoy hosting home cooked meals with family & friends, love a good picnic hike, and adore where we live. It is our mission to allow our level of hospitality be highlighted in your adventure here.
Cheers and Safe Travels
Kirt and Natalie Vojvoda

name: Large sunny private room/bath, mins. to Capitola
description:
We live on a quiet street in the trees but are mins. from downtown Capitola, Newbrighton State Beach and the freeway.
Our house is south facing and has sunshine all day long.
We have coffee, tea, a mini fridge, microwave and a table and two chairs offered for guests to use in the room (not pictured).
The house is large and the room is very private. It even has an ocean view!
Bonus the bathroom has a huge soaking tub!
Room has blackout curtains.
Please note the fireplace is not working right now.

The space
Our house is very cozy and clean.
You enter through the front door and go up stairs in the main enteryway to access the master bedroom upstairs.
Please note that we are a family of five with 3 kids. (3.5, 5 and 11) They can sometimes get rowdy but they go to sleep by 8/8:30 and wake up around 7 so they should not cause you any noise disruption at night. =)
We are very organized, but of course having kids leads to ran
neighborhood_overview:
Our street is walking distance to the amazing AJs market! Think breakfast burritos, hamburgers, organic produce, etc. Our neighbors are quiet and our neighborhood is in the trees. We have a resident hawk that flies over all day. And often have deer in our yard.
We are mins. away from beautiful Newbrighton beach and Downtown Capitola. You can often see sea otters. Dolphins and even whales! Our favorite thing to do in Capitola is rent a boat off the pier and go out in search of sea life! We even saw baby dolphins once!

You name it, weʻve got it!

name: Just One House to Surf/Ask About Season Discounts!
description:
Sleeps 10 adults/teens (no exceptions), plus 8 younger children, 10 Day Visitors (8 am-10 pm), & 3 Dogs.(Note:Base rate in for 8 Guests, Instant booking is for up to 10 guests. Contact owner for addt'l requests.Spacious home, ideal for families, reunions and retreats. Great access to beaches, deck with ocean views, fireplaces, and well stocked kitchen.
*Read listing thoroughly prior to booking as there are no refunds on cancellations, no exception.*
Find SPECIALS under "Other things to note".

The space
Now going on our 12th year of hosting our many wonderful guests! Here is why our guests return year after year to A Great Beach House in Santa Cruz:
•Clean linens, including Beach Towels
•Our ability to customize 3 of the bed rooms to your needs as couples sleeping in comfortable king beds, or as pairs of singles in extra long twin beds
•Lots of extra sleeping areas with beds, innerspring futons or sofa sleepers with pillow tops to add
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a relatively quiet neighborhood and varies to busy depending upon the day of the week, holiday, time of day, weather, surf and wildlife activity. From 10 pm - 6 am cars parking is strictly forbidden and enforce by the CHP.

One house down is staircase access to the very popular 26th Ave Beach, which is popular to surfers, other surf related sports enthusiasts, dog owners, dog lovers, fisherman, beach combers, birds and wildlife watchers, and much more. And, that's just one house away!

We are a 10 minute drive to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and 6 minutes to the Capitola Esplinad, with great restaurants and boutiques. We are relatively close to majestic redwood groves, wineries, mountain biking, antiquing, are just a few of the many attractions.

*****

Just outside your room and down the hall are a washer/dryer and full bath including a tub. We also added a new internet mesh network.

You’ll have shared access to a beautiful backyard which includes a grill, hammock, fire pit, waterfall, couches, lounge chairs and an abundance of trees, sun, and sometimes morning fog.

The space
Welcome to Rolling Woods where you’ll find tree lined streets and quiet except for the occasional leaf blower. Privacy and tranquility prevail. Please feel at home and ask if there is anything you need to make your stay complete. For example, early check-in or late check-out are possible. Would you like suggestions where to eat, sightsee or need directions? Please ask!

name: Juju Town: A Santa Cruz Redwoods Retreat
description:
Nestled in the redwood mountains below the main house, Juju Paradise has a 160 square foot A-frame cabin. There is a 224 square foot deck that opens via a huge swing door from the A-frame. Equipped with everything you need for a perfect forest getaway, this cabin is great for relaxing under the redwoods, reading a book, and getting away from it all. Equipped with a propane grill, and LED lighting- you will not long for the traditional amenities of the city.

The space
*420 Friendly* However, please no smoking inside the cabin.

We have 30 acres of redwoods in the Santa Cruz Mountains. The property has tons of Meyer lemon trees you are welcome to help yourself to.

The guests will use a Natures Head composting toilet in the outhouse. If you are not comfortable using a composting toilet, please do not request a reservation. If you are staying for more than one night, you may need to watch the urine levels. We will empty it for you upon request.
neighborhood_overview: Located 3.1 miles from the Aptos Post office up Cathedral Drive. The cabin in is nestled in the redwoods for the perfect escape from the city.
host_about: Cal and Zaharah just celebrated their anniversary in Singapore where they got married 30 years ago. Cal works on the property at the redwood lumber mill. Zaharah enjoys gardening and crocheting. They live in the bottom unit of The Juju Paradise, so they are always around to answer questions or give suggestions about the area.

name: Modernity w/ View & Easy Access to Mountain Trails
description:
Due to the fact that there are travel restrictions around the country, we are only accepting reservations from local guests. This is a great location to shelter in place and to get away for a time. To all of our friends out there, we look forward to hosting the broader community again soon.

This colorful and modern guesthouse stands in bold juxtaposition to its beautiful natural surroundings. It is magical in the afternoon, and especially at sunset when everything seems to sparkle.

The space
About the accommodations: The guesthouse is a large studio apartment (approximately 900 sq. ft.) equipped with a full kitchen, laundry, and dining area. The comfortable king-sized bed sits behind a privacy wall. The studio features sliding glass doors that bring in ample light and views of the valley and mountains. In this room there is also a couch that is easily converted into a twin bed. The area outside the sliding glass doors is just for you. The adjoining
neighborhood_overview: Our property sits on a bluff above a quiet and well-spaced out neighborhood. The Quail Hollow Ranch mountain trails are about 100 steps  away and offer a peaceful walk or a great workout, whichever you prefer. They extend from 2 to about 4 miles, looped and depending on where you decide to go.   We feel extremely fortunate to be in such a location at this time of shelter in place and social distancing.
host_about: We are a family of four plus a dog.  We are from California and lived in Mexico for 6 years until 2017.  We love meeting new people, exploring this beautiful area where we live, and traveling, too.

name: Sunny Private Room in the Banana Belt
description:
Enjoy your private bedroom and bathroom in the hot and sunny banana belt of Santa Cruz. The space is newly remodeled with bamboo floors and opens onto the sunny deck. The deck and yard is shared with me when I am home but everything else is private. The walls are shared with my house, though I have made efforts to soundproof.

Given the current state of COVID-19 we are taking extra precautions to clean between each guest. I will also provide sanitary wipes.

The space
We are located conveniently just off of the free way a 10 minute bike ride or drive to downtown or the beach. This central location is convenient to all parts of town and it is possible to walk downtown in 15-20 minutes as well. Our house is on a quiet cul de sac with plenty of parking and little traffic.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their own room and bathroom and may share my deck.
neighborhood_overview: Grant street park is right across the street which is a nice family spot. The river levy is also 2 blocks away which is a pretty walk or bike route to downtown or the beach.
host_about:
I have lived in Santa Cruz for 19 years because I absolutely love it! I am an avid naturalist and hiker as well as science teacher. I love to dance, and play drums, I also surf and practice yoga regularly. I am happy to point you  in the right direction for any local activities.

For years, I traveled the world,  and am happy to help guide you through  Santa Cruz, the Bay area and CA. I  especially love Spanish speaking countries and latin culture. I speak Spanish, dance salsa and samba and play samba drums, our small community is rich with arts from around the world!

name: Downtown condo sleeps 4, with pool and city views
description:
Located on 4th floor, this 2 bedroom one bath condo is within walking distance to downtown Santa Cruz and one mile from
The Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. Sleeps 4, each room has a bunk bed (one with queen on bottom bunk). Condo complex has pool, and a laundry room as well. One dedicated carport parking spot.

The space
Full kitchen, one bathroom with shower and tub. There is a nice little patio off the living room with neighborhood views and a peek of the ocean. Cable tv and WiFi included. This is an older building and older condo, but a great central location and close to everything.

Guest access
Guests enter through locked front door.

Other things to note
This is an older building, condos are privately owned and a mix of seniors, students, couples, etc. The complex is locked at the front, take elevator or stairs to unit on 4th floor.
neighborhood_overview: One block from downtown Santa Cruz. Take the pedestrian bridge in San Lorenzo park (end of  the block) and walk straight into downtown Santa Cruz- no more than a 5 minute walk. 15 minute walk to the Boardwalk. 10 minute drive to UCSC.
host_about: I have lived in Pleasure Point for  over twenty years and I love it!! I am very active, and love being a block from the ocean, as well as within biking distance to some epic trail rides in the Santa cruz mountains. I have travelled all over the world, and I always love coming home to my sweet little neighborhood by the beach:)

It's close to cafes, restaurants, New Leaf Market, tasting rooms, breweries, Boardwalk, and more! It's great for families, a romantic getaway, or a fun couples trip.
Recently remodeled kitchen and bathroom.
Lovely, comfortable, and ready for your stay.
Please no parties or smoking. Note: no television!

Queen Bed with Bamboo Sheets, Dresser, Closet and rocking chair

Full Sized Bed with bamboo sheets, dresser, closet

Twin day bed sofa, mid century love seat and chair.

Kitchen:
Recently Remodeled with Quartz countertops, fridge/freezer with icemaker and filtered water, dishw
neighborhood_overview: The Westside is full of tons of fun and it's all walking distance from the house- wineries, breweries, restaurants, parks, a little library, and tons of cafes. You're close to world class bike trails, beaches and surfing. The Long Marine Lab/ Seymour Center & Natural Bridges beach and Monarch Butterflies are all right down the street!

Redwoods meet the ocean in Aptos Village. Located in serene Nisene Marks Forrest surrounded by old growth redwood trees. One mile to new stores and restaurants in Aptos village. 5 Minutes to the beach! 15 minutes to Santa Cruz, 10 Minutes to Capitola.

We just finished remodeling our 700 sq ft studio. Full kitchen with new appliances, large bathroom, work space, dining and lounging furniture, TV with Cable. Street parking and passcode lock on door.

Cozy studio in the redwoods 5 minutes to the beach. One mile to Aptos village. Great location.

description:
Designed around comfort and style and perfect for relaxing after a day exploring Santa Cruz. There's amazing restaurants nearby and the kitchen is also equipped for a home cooked meal.

The space
This space is open concept with a living space seamlessly leading to the kitchen, bedroom and bathroom.

The apartment is located downstairs to a main home where the owners reside. There is another apartment downstairs as well.

Other things to note
Although we love pets, we have some guests with severe allergies and for that reason cannot allow any pets.

name: Redwoods meet River walk to town in Santa Cruz Mtn
description:
A beautiful getaway in the redwood forest of Boulder Creek with two bedrooms and a bath. There are plenty of windows and a skylight to let the beauty of nature in, redwoods from every room and right across from the river. Half hour drive to Santa Cruz for beaches and the boardwalk. The town of Boulder Creek has everything you could ask for in a small town. Come for work or play, either way the tranquility shall inspire you.

The space
A tranquil spot in the beautiful town of forest town of Boulder Creek (5 min walk), close to relaxing beach city of Santa Cruz home of the Boardwalk and Pacific Garden Mall. Also at to foot of Big Basin State Park.
The house is on the river, a short walk to swimming holes. You can sit and listen to the river from comfort of the house or balcony. You can see redwoods from every room. A lovely fireplace for mellow evenings.
A great place for a retreat, a family vacation, or a base of work. Enjoy

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Nature abounds...  peaceful perch like a tree house in the redwoods. I love the sound of the river thru the windows. Many great parks close by including Big Basin and Henry Cowell. The town has great chinese, sushi, pizza and Scopazzis a fine restaurant. There are a couple markets, one being a health food store; Joe's bar makes great drinks and has music sometimes. There is a pharmacy, boutiques, and hardware stores all close by.
host_about:
Happiness... that is my motto! Thus comfortable, fun-loving, creative! 
Hmm I like beauty, and I work to bring that into all realms of my life... including my rental! When I travel I want to feel comfortable, secure, and like my needs matter... so as a hostess I want to bring this to you... nice towels and linens, bottle opener and blender, tv with netflix etc.  Everything you need is within walking distance...market, restaurants from fine restaurants to great happy hours, and shops that range from antiques to boutiques.  New Orleans is Great People, Music, Food, Architecture, and Livin!!! You can even go sportsfishing, plantation exploring, or check out the French Quarter. We have it all!!!

name: The Madrone House, a secluded nature retreat.
description:
Preference to health care workers & first responders. Our sunny, "nature retreat" remote home is located in the Santa Cruz Mountains close to Ben Lomond, Felton and Santa Cruz. It is surrounded by a redwood/madrone forest, with amazing views from a lovely deck. Within a short drive, there are many nearby hiking and biking trails, an incredible lake with fishing at Loch Lomond. You are 10 min. from many restaurants 20 min. to Santa Cruz, 25 min. to UCSC. We have a full kitchen & laundry.

The space
Nature retreat like setting. The property is very private (but not too remote, only 15 min. to town) with no other houses nearby sitting atop a very steep mountain. Truly a destination property...YOU WON’T WANT TO LEAVE! Unwind/Re-Boot on sun decks with sweeping mountain views ! Savor the Sweet smells & Bounty from Fruiting Trees.

Other things to note
The house is located in a remote, rural, steep area where there are no street lights and the road
neighborhood_overview: Nearby eateries, Casa Nostra (Italian Dining) & Spankys (breakfast/brunch) are two of our favorites located in Ben Lomond (20min. drive) as well as Cloud 9 for great coffee. Zayante Creek Market & Deli is good for a quick pick up, but we choose Ben Lomond Market or Wild Roots (organic) in Felton for groceries and so much more!
host_about: We are a mother daughter team. We love the way nature helps to slow us down and want to share that sense of calm at The Madrone House.

name: 2 BD - Ocean Views at Seascape Resort!
description:
Located on the north bluff of amenity-rich Seascape Resort, this immaculate 2nd story unit offers stunning ocean views and is within close proximity of the pools and jacuzzis. Unlike many of the other units, this one is close to an elevator making it easy and convenient to access with luggage or beach gear. This newly remodeled condo has new appliances and furnishings that offer comfort and luxury for your perfect beach vacation.

The space
There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not available to private renters. Pools and hot tub are accessible and pool towels are provided to guests in the unit.
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

Refer to the Guest Welcome Binder upon arrival for additional information on the property and local attractions.
host_about: We are a Real Estate and Property Management company located in the heart of Santa Cruz and Capitola.  We offer clean and fun getaways for you and your guests!

name: Surfer's Paradise
description:
This is one sweet little space located on the sunny west side of Santa Cruz, and directly across from Lighthouse Field State Beach.  This property is under new ownership and has been completely and lovingly remodeled, featuring lots of natural light, an updated kitchen and bathroom and huge newly landscaped backyard!   This truly is a surfer's paradise - just a two minute walk to the famous surf spot of Steamer Lane, but also conveniently located to the nearby Santa Cruz Surfing Museum, and the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.    Plenty of parking for two or more vehicles - and easily walking distance to the Santa Cruz Wharf and downtown Santa Cruz.

*Please note there is an added pet fee of 35$ per night per pet.
*A rental agreement must be signed upon booking

Thank you for your interest in Beachnest Vacation Rentals! For best booking rates, please book through Beachnest Vacation Rentals directly, at (831) 722-0888 or visit our website www.beachnest.com!

name: The Lilley Pad - Mount Hermon, Near Conf. Center
description:
Address is: 14 Mound Ave., in Mount Hermon. Closest Airbnb to the MH Conference Center. The Lilley Pad was recently remodeled inside including a new Kitchen, all new floors and paint. The house is about 2000 square feet inside. The master bedroom is on the upper floor and has a walk-in closet and bathroom with shower, the other two bedrooms are on the lower floor and have a Jack and Jill bathroom with shower/tub combo. Plus Family Room. Most of the furniture is brand new in July of 2019.

name: 3 BD Victorian Flat Steps to Beach and Boardwalk
description:
PLEASE read ALL INFO about the space CAREFULLY before booking my home!

Welcome to Beach Hill, one of the most sought out neighborhoods in Santa Cruz. My cozy family friendly updated & remodeled 1868 Painted Lady purple Victorian home is only a few minute stroll to the beach, the Boardwalk, many restaurants, bars, & cafes! Walk to downtown in ten minutes. View the beautiful Pacific ocean as you step outside, and enjoy the soothing ocean breeze. The perfect destination for an escape to paradise.

The space
**ATTENTION! VERY IMPORTANT TO READ THIS BEFORE REQUESTING TO BOOK!**

Airbnb collects occupancy tax for different areas of Santa Cruz, and on other listings you will see the tax on the check out line when you book. However, because of my location in the city limits, I must collect it and remit it myself. I so wish that Airbnb could collect it for me like the other listings but the city will just not allow it. Thus, I am forced to request it d
neighborhood_overview: You can't find a better getaway in Santa Cruz. Come stay in a beautiful classic Victorian home that is close to 150 years old right by the beach and boardwalk. Get away from the hustle and bustle as you're on the very top of the hill, but all you need to do is walk two minutes and you're in the center of it all. Downtown is very close by, perfect if you want to park your car and explore Santa Cruz by walking around. Beach Hill is a fantastic neighborhood and is one of the most historic areas in Santa Cruz.
host_about:
Hello, I am Rex Solway! I have lived in Santa Cruz my entire life and know the town like the back of my hand. I enjoy traveling, fine dining, photography, and the ocean -- I wouldn't be able to live far from the beach! I would like to call myself an avid sushi lover, die hard Survivor fan, adore cats (but no worries if you have allergies, no kitties live here!), and often find myself critiquing the films and shows I watch with friends and family. I worship the sun, but thrive under the moon and the stars when it's dark outside. I’m always looking for the next adventure that awaits around the corner. 

I am personally dedicated to providing the best possible experience for you and your family, and will do my best to create a unique experience you'll never forget!

name: Little Cabin
description:
Backyard creekside cabin retreat overlooking Boulder Creek. Relax among redwood trees and listen to the creek rushing below. This modern, private studio is conveniently located in town for easy walking to local markets, shops and restaurants, but feels a world away. Several redwood forest and the coastal state parks are close by and day trip destinations include Santa Cruz, Monterey, Big Sur, Silicon Valley and San Francisco. We are in the Santa Cruz Mountains and 35 mins from the SJC Airport.

The space
Little Cabin is a private, backyard studio overlooking a year round creek. A redwood fairy ring encircles the 20ft x 10ft back deck and there is also a fenced side yard with a picnic table for extra outdoor space. We are located within easy walking distance from Boulder Creek with active neighbors around us, yet the cabin has a secluded treehouse feel. Perfect for a couples getaway and/or for exploring nearby redwood forests and coastal state parks. Several forest
neighborhood_overview:
Little Cabin is within easy walking distance to several local markets, shops and restaurants. Historic Boulder Creek has a rugged and independent spirit and is the gateway to Big Basin, California's oldest state park where you can walk among ancient redwood trees. Outdoor and nature enthusiasts will enjoy the close vicinity to numerous state and county parks and beaches. Santa Cruz and the Pacific Coast Highway 1 are only 20 minutes away. We are located in the heart of the Santa Cruz Mountains in the San Lorenzo Valley and a 35 minute drive from the San Jose International Airport.

Located right across from the largest stretch of beach in Santa Cruz County. This home is walking distance to all your vacation needs, without even leaving the Rio Del Mar neighborhood. If you want to grab a latte, croissant sandwich, or an artisan pizza there is Flats Bistro. Next door there is Cafe Rio, for a sit down restaurant experience with a beautiful outdoor patio to enjoy the beach at dinner only open after 3pm. If you just want to pick up some mustard you forgot at home there is a corner market with all your quick needs. Don't forget about pixie deli, great beer and wine selection also best for lunch but have amazing french toast or breakfast burritos!

name: Tentrr Signature Site - Creekside Paradise
description:
We only have one campsite so you can have a completely private experience in the beautiful Santa Cruz redwoods next to beautiful Browns creek. Welcome to your Tentrr Campsite!

Welcome to your Tentrr Campsite!

If you need to reach me prior to arrival, you can reach me at 831-662-2641 - My name is Mark, I am your camp host.

We take the rules very seriously, if rules are broken, we charge and in some instances will ask campers to leave with no refund. This is a leave no trace campsite. If you leave a trace, we must charge for our time to resolve this.

Our goal is to have a breathtakingly beautiful campground for each camper to enjoy when they arrive so this means leave no trace.

If you call me prior to your arrival and we understand each other, we will leave the campground completely to yourself with no interruptions.

Camp Rules:
1. You must bring any and all wood you burn. do not gather fallen branches
neighborhood_overview:
Some nearby area attractions:
1) Beautiful public access deep redwood forest hiking 1 mile from camp with breath taking views of the Monterey Bay and beautiful Carmel By The Sea.
2) Excellent wine tasting along Brown's Valley Road the the rest of Corralitos. These wines are some of the finest wines in the world, especially the Pinot's.
3) Award winning local brewery, Corralitos Brewery 3 miles from camp. Authentic local small micro brewery. Super fun place and local people.
4) 15 Minute drive to spectacular beaches on Santa Cruz.
5) 20 Minute drive to Beach Boardwalk amusement park. Over 100 years old a huge attraction. Full-on old-fashioned beach boardwalk with rides and a wonderful arcade.
6) 35 Minute drive to the Monterey Bay Aquarium. A world class Aquarium with a stunning display of jelly fish and other amazing sea creatures.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We make it dirt simple to unlock the outdoors.

Tentrr campsites are secluded on beautiful, private land so you can relax and recharge in peace. Our sites are equipped and ready for you - so go solo or bring the whole crew (including the dog) – this base camp is just the beginning of your adventure.  More than just a bed in the bush, Tentrr also curates outdoor Experiences and Extras to help you effortlessly plan your perfect trip.

Each campsite includes a large canvas tent on a raised platform, wood-fired stove, queen-sized bed, 5-person dome tent, 2 Adirondack chairs, camp table, camp benches, storage box, fire pit, campfire grill, trash can, 5-gallon water container, outdoor sun shower, and outdoor camp toilet.

From salvaging all the original siding & keeping the original weathered open beam roof to the electric toilet (uses no water) to the heavy insulation throughout, staying cool in summer, warm in winter & quiet all the time. All drain water is used to water flowers. This light and airy studio is very cozy and has an attached private deck with a BBQ and plenty of seating.

The space
The studio cottage is ideal for 2 people (for companions that would like separate beds, message me and I'll have the pull out bed made up). Featuring a 50 inch TV with Roku & a Blu-ray-DVD/CD player, 2 Sky lights, stove top, toaster oven, microwave oven, refrigerator, Weber Q BBQ, a queen bed and a couch that pulls out into a queen sized bed. Dresser drawers, a space to hang clothes and a private bathroom

neighborhood_overview: We're walking distance to town, about a mile, where you will find a very nice coffee house, a bakery, Italian restaurant with live music Wednesday thru Saturday, an authentic German restaurant, a breakfast house and if you want to watch sports or dance to live music there is a venue for that too
host_about:
Hi I'm Julio- 

I’m a bay area native,  born in San Francisco and  raised in the South bay. I moved to Ben Lomond about 20 years ago.  I feel very fortunate to call the Santa Cruz Mountains, (specifically the San Lorenzo Valley, which encompasses Boulder Creek, Brookdale, Felton and of course Ben Lomond)  my home.


I enjoy getting out for hikes with Rio, my trusty German Shepherd & co-host. I also enjoy dining out at local restaurant and cafes. If you're looking for suggestion, I can usually offer a couple. 


If you have any questions, please feel free to ask. 


Cheers!

name: Steps to Black's Beach
description:
Steps to Blacks Beach (Twin Lakes). Walk to farmers market, cafes, beach volleyball at the crows nest, and great surf. We think it's the best street and location in Santa Cruz with actual beach access! Completely separate unit.

The space
The totally separate upstairs space includes 1 bedroom (king bed), 1 full bath, small kitchen/eating area, and living room with full size bed in loft space. The living room also has a couch that can be used as a twin bed. The deck overlooks our street which is steps away from beach access at the end of our street. There is a smart TV (hulu, Hulu live, hbo), wifi, and outdoor seating with a BBQ. Pretty much everything you need for a great beach vacation!

Guest access
Your space is completely separate with your own entrance, kitchen, laundry, and patio with bbq. No shared spaces except the driveway where renters park on the left side of driveway.

neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to beach, volleyball nets on beach, corner store, two Italian restaurants, a windmill cafe, farmers market on Sundays, a Hawaiian restaurant, taqueria and more.

Brand new construction! This beautiful upscale and well-designed home offers 4 bedrooms and 4 baths with redwood views. Enjoy relaxing after a long day or being in a quiet space while working remotely. The home offers high-end appliances and has heated floors. With creek and redwood views, you will feel away from it all. We take great care in the comfort and safety of our guests. Our home is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized after each guest per CA guidelines.

The house has a large open floor plan with hardwood floors throughout and stone tile in the bathrooms and kitchen. The master bedroom has a king-size bed, a private balcony, redwood views, a large closet, and a beautiful ensuite bathroom with a soaking tub for relaxing. The two other rooms offer queen-sized beds and two full bathrooms. Experience luxury in the well equipped and designed home. Thoughtfully built with fast WiFi and a quiet workspace.

name: Redwood Retreat
description: Welcome to our home! Situated at foothill of the Santa Cruz mountains, it is surrounded by beautiful Redwood trees and is a quick 5 minute drive from/to the beach. Aptos Village is only 2 minutes away and offers many new shops, cafes and restaurants. Feel free to use the hot tub and enjoy the surrounding peaceful nature. We hope to accommodate your needs in any way possible and look forward to your stay!
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is situated along Nisene Marks State Park, making it a perfect location for any guests looking to go hiking or explore Aptos' unique nature. Our street is therefore very quiet while just minutes from the shopping center, beach and freeway.

name: The Artists' Tree House
description:
This charming home is perched in the trees with views of the forest through the windows and skylights. Five minutes from the mountain town of Boulder Creek if you need groceries. We aim to give you the most comfortable stay and modern amenities. If you are a remote worker, we have a work space in each bedroom with a large monitor and desk. Dogs are welcome. Smoking outdoors is permitted. Located 35min to Santa Cruz, 1:30 to downtown SF and 45min to San Jose. Hot tub under the redwoods and relax!

The space
Amazing back deck under the redwoods for hot tubs and bbq's. Yes, the hot tub works year-round! Cozy Bedrooms. Fully functional modern kitchen. Wifi is business tier, with monitors and office space in both bedrooms. Pet friendly with trails nearby. Paved roads allow accessibilty for all vehicles. Please enjoy your stay at our home.
neighborhood_overview: Home to Big Basin, the best state park in California, Boulder Creek has charming restaurants and local events. Come visit nature and get away from the City.
host_about: Love my dogs, my family, surfing, art and traveling.

name: Peacock Suite - Views of cow pasture and redwoods
description:
Peacock Suite is a private, light-filled hideaway nestled in the redwoods, yet a short drive to downtown and the beach. It has a deck and patio for outdoor dining and sitting, views of redwoods and a cow pasture out the front door. Relax on the deck and enjoy views of the redwoods, stroll down the street and visit the cows or go hiking on the trails in the park right across the street.

Santa Cruz County Transient Occupancy Certificate #AB00225

The space
The Suite is located on a small fruit and vegetable farm. It shares a building with a workshop and office for the farm. The suite features a modern interior which has been recently remodeled with a fully-equipped kitchen, laundry and large bathroom with separate toilet.

Internet access via Xfinity Extreme+ Pro with 600 MBps download and 15MBps upload speeds. Suitable for remote video conferencing.

Other things to note
For the comfort of our guests with allergies, Peacoc
neighborhood_overview: Although close to town, Peacock Suite has the feel of a rural area. There are many operating farms, vineyards and orchards nearby. DeLaVeaga Park is across the street and has lots of hiking and biking trails, picnic areas and sports fields as well as a golf course and frisbee golf course. It is a short 5 minute drive to restaurants, coffee shops, brew pubs and shopping.
host_about:
I'm a private pilot and part-time flight instructor. I love to travel and get to know people in far-off places. Recently, my wife and I flew our Cessna to Cuba and we have also flown all over the US and to Europe. 
When we're not traveling we love to hang out with friends and family. My wife, Barbara, and I met and got married in Spain while we were both working there; me as a software engineer and she selling juggling balls (she is an excellent juggler, I am a rank amateur). I speak fairly fluent Spanish with a pronounced Castilian accent.
We enjoy doing some hobby farming and have a permaculture garden in development as well as some vegetable and fruit gardens that are beginning to produce well.
I was born  in Jamaica and go back there regularly to visit. Barbara is from Southern California.

name: Mountain Lady monthly
description:
Gorgeous cozy home! Available for a longer stay . Easy Commuting to Santa Cruz and the rest of the Bay Area.
Relax in the backyard and enjoy the BBQ! Read a good book while you hear the fire cracking in the fireplace.
There are two comfortable queen beds in the super large bedroom. The bathroom has a claw foot tub and there is a walk in closet. Enjoy the vintage gas stove in the remodeled kitchen. All cotton bedding provided.

The space
The home is super comfortable and clean. The yard is large and relaxing. We r in the heart of Santa Cruz mountains but still close enough to downtown.

Guest access
We have over an acre in the property. Guest are welcome to enjoy the backyard, front yard and even rides their bikes around the driveway.... our kids love doing that.
neighborhood_overview: Safe neighborhood.
host_about:
We are a small family who loves the outdoors. We love Felton and its surrounding areas. Nature is our escape and Santa Cruz mountain offers that for us. We don't live on the property but are close by should anything be needed during your stay.
You might see my cohost or I watering plants and working around the property. 

We like to give our guest privacy and let them enjoy their stay at their own pace. However we are just a message away  and available if anything is needed.

name: Redwood Hilltop Retreat
description:
This mountain family home is perfect with breathtaking views of the Santa Cruz Mountains. The large wrapping deck provides the perfect space for indoor-outdoor living, while the indoors offers a cozy feel with a wood burning fireplace and all the essentials of a well loved home. Located in a redwood forest with 260 degree sweeping views. 10 mins to Santa Cruz, 40 min to Monterey, 5 min to Mt Hermon Center. Excellent location for sightseeing and activities.

The space
One of the newer homes in the area built among a serene forest sanctuary in a very private setting where your family can relax, unwind and enjoy nature. Feel free to have coffee or BBQ on the very large deck and enjoy the birdwatching as you oversee the canyon with excellent views across the valleys to the mountain ranges. Long sweeping driveway with a large parking area for 4 cars. There is some flexibility with our second bedroom sleeping arrangements. The room is set up with a King bed and can be d
neighborhood_overview: Mt. Hermon is a small community near Felton,  just a 10-minute drive to Santa Cruz and beaches. The area is full of inviting trails to explore, wonderful redwood forests with beautiful creeks and idyllic scenery. We’re a few minutes from the Mount Hermon Christian Conference Center which offers a world class Zip Line course through the redwood canopy. The Mt. Hermon coffee shop, book store, and soda fountain are open for guests (check their schedule for days/times). Roaring Camp’s steam train ride through the redwoods and to the beach is 5 mins away, perfect for families and guests. Henry Cowell Redwood Park offers incredible forest views and a self-guided tour of ancient redwoods. Safeway grocery store, Wild Roots Organic Grocery store, Pete's , White Raven and Mountain Roasting Coffee shops, CVS drug store, and restaurants less than a mile away.
host_about: We’ve enjoyed Santa Cruz, Felton, Mt Hermon and its surrounding areas for generations. Our family would love to welcome you to stay at our wonderful home that’s blessed us for many years. I love the outdoors and enjoy the beach, fishing, hiking, bike riding and nature photography to name a few! We have a wonderful community here in the mountains and coast, come and visit to be renewed, refreshed & explore the many things to do and see from mountains to the sea!

name: Rest Ashore OCEAN FRONT Condo Pajaro Dunes
description:
Rest Ashore is the perfect place for your beach dream getaway. Our custom high end remodeled condo has it all: beamed ceilings, fireplace, gorgeous kitchen and bathrooms, brand new furnishings and a fully stocked kitchen. On the first floor (no stairs) and south facing for extra warm days making it perfect for BBQing on the open patio. Take a few steps out the front door to enjoy miles and miles of unobstructed views of the ocean and beach. Fall asleep to the gentle noise of the crash waves.

The space
Pajaro Dunes Shorebird has hiking and biking trails, tennis courts, pickle ball, a small general store and gift shop. It is perfectly located between Monterey and Santa Cruz allowing easy exploring to surrounding towns.

Other things to note
Your stay at our condo offers many things:
2 foam surfboards
Fishing pole and sand crab catcher for catching striped bass and perch.
Sand toys
4 beach chairs
4 beach towels
3 t
neighborhood_overview: Pajaro Dunes Shorebirds, is in a private gated community open to guests and homeowners only. The town, Watsonville, is a quaint small farming town offering locally grown fruits and vegetables.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Lisa- my husband and I were born and raised in the San Francisco Bay Area.  We have two teenage boys and two happy dogs.
We love to travel and rent other Airbnb's as a way to see the world and experience life.  We enjoy all things outdoors- running, biking, hiking, snowboarding, wake boarding, surfing... the list goes on and on.  
We are blessed to have the best of both worlds- an oceanfront condo and a mountain cabin.  We invested a lot of hard work and love into making them our perfect family getaways and we can't wait to share them with you!

name: Seaside Getaway 118
description:
Enjoy a true beach house getaway in this charming two bedroom two bath home, located steps away from Rio Del Mar state beach. Ocean views from the upstairs living area, master bedroom, and wrap around deck. Soak up the on sun on this spacious deck with plenty of outdoor seating and a gas barbecue. Enter the home off the 1 car carport and up stairs to the bedroom level. The second floor has an open floor plan including a fully equipped kitchen, cozy living and dining area with a gas fireplace.

The space
This is a multi level home can be accessed off the carport at the top of a flight of stairs. Both bedrooms and one bath are on the entry level along with a washer and dryer. One room offers a queen Tempurpedic bed with partial ocean views, the second room offers a full over full bunk bed and walk in closet. The living room, kitchen, deck and another full bath is on the second floor.

Other things to note
The owner of this property is highly al
neighborhood_overview: Rio Del Mar is located in Santa Cruz County  with one of the longest beaches in the county.  A very nice community great for families who are looking to avoid the congested touristy area. Also in the neighborhood we have Pixie Deli which is great for breakfast burritos, lunch, and local beer and wine. There is a small market at the corner  for all your small needs throughout your vacation, otherwise there is a Safeway and Deluxe Foods for larger quantity of shopping. For dining in there is Cafe Rio that offers a great happy hour with drink and food specials or Flats bistro for take out they specialize in coffee and artisan pizzas.

name: Quiet, cozy  guest cottage
description:
Charming studio with a queen memory foam bed. Has a bathroom and shower. Microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker included in space. Lots of privacy in this stand alone converted shed.

Private walkway to entrance, separate from the main house.

Walking distance to New Brighton Beach ( .7 miles from door to sand), a quick drive to Capitola Village.

The notes saying we cancelled last minute were due to covid and the restrictions on travel and the recent wildfires in which we housed an evacuee.

Guest access
Guests have access to the walking path to the left of the main house to the Cottage in the back of the property. There is a fence dividing the main house and the guest space for privacy.

Other things to note
If you have any questions or suggestions or need anything, please let us know. We are usually quick to respond!
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood close to the beach and Capitola Village. It’s 1.6 mile walk down to the village and Capitola Beach. A shorter walk will take you to nearby New Brighton beach. If you don’t feel like walking you can always get in touch with ride services like Lyft or Uber.

name: 180°OceanView+HotTub+AquariumPasses+EBikes+Surfbrd
description:
Incredible beach home with sweeping views of the ocean. Watch the waves crash from your bed. Directly in front of Pleasure Point, a world class surf spot.
180° upstairs decks to lounge & enjoy the ocean and views of the ocean from every room in the home.
Hot tub, cedar sauna, 4 electric bikes, surfboards, stand-up paddle boards, ping pong table, and professional table tennis robot!
Guest passes (4) to the Monterey Bay Aquarium included (normally $50 each).

The space
This is a historic beach home, truly one of a kind. Beautiful wood work throughout and stunning views from every part of the house. Master bedroom with soaking tub built into the corner of the room. Light a fire in the gas fireplace in your room and draw a bath from which you can see the ocean and watch the moonrise over the water.
Two sections of deck upstairs to lounge and enjoy the sunshine, watch the surfers and keep an eye out for whales, or simply relax in the hammock.
neighborhood_overview:
Pleasure Point is by far the best neighborhood in Santa Cruz. Surf, bike, walk, explore, beach time, shopping. It has it all. Right outside the door are 6 different surf breaks (from beginner to more advanced) and a multitude of beaches. The area in front of the house has a dedicated bike/walk path out front along the ocean with access to the beach throughout.
Directly up the street a few blocks is 41st avenue, where all the surf shops, restaurants, and coffee shops are.
When you book we also send you a list of recommendations for all our favorite things in the area with a color coded corresponding map!
host_about: Long time Santa Cruz local. We love travel, cooking, backpacking, live music, mushroom hunting, surfing, meeting new people and turning them on to the joys of our wonderful home town.

name: New Luxury Beach House with Game Room
description:
Rebuilt from the ground up in 2018 using the finest materials. I am a Home Builder and Surfer. The house has European oak hardwood floors and custom finishes throughout. During the day, enjoy walking to the beaches, surfing, and shops only minutes away. After a day of fun in the sun, BBQ with friends and family. Then, gather around the warm cozy fire pit or hang out in the game room shooting pool and watching sports!
Bikes, boogie boards, surfboards, beach chairs included for guests use.

The space
We never intended to rent this house. it was built for our family. But, college tuition and life changes so now, we are giving renting a try. All furnishings are new. The kitchen is well equipped and ready for cooking your gourmet meals. High ceilings with lots of windows, glass and natural light. Hand hewn beams on the ceiling and lots of detail throughout. This is a great house for someone who values being in a fine home instead of a worn out and tired be
neighborhood_overview: Come ready to hit the world class surf at Pleasure Point and the Hook or go for a short walk and check out the specialty shops in Capitola Village.  Within 15 minutes, you can be at the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk ready to ride the Historic Giant Dipper coaster.
host_about: We are a family of 6 that loves the beach.  Matthew is a custom home builder and Theresa is a homemaker and choir director.  We met in church and have been happily married for 25+ years.  We have been blessed with 4 amazing children, 3 of which are in college and one high schooler.  The beach house is a great place for us to go and relax and connect as a family.  We hope you enjoy our house.

name: Peacock Cottage - Country life, close to town
description:
Peacock Cottage is a private retreat nestled among redwood trees on the outskirts of Santa Cruz. One has the feeling of being in a rural are even though it's five minutes to downtown Santa Cruz and the beaches. The house has a covered deck, patio with outdoor dining area and an enclosed garden. The fully-equipped kitchen is large and bright with an open plan living and dining area that faces out to the deck and back yard.

Santa Cruz County Transient Occupancy Certificate #AB00225

The space
The cottage is set in a one-acre hobby farm ("Peacock Farm") which has a permaculture food forest and other fruit and vegetable gardens. Across the street is a large cow pasture and behind is a big park (DeLaVeaga park) with hiking and mountain biking trails, sports fields, picnic areas, a golf course and a frisbee golf course. There are only a few other houses on the street so the house feels very private.

Cottage has Xfinity Extreme+ Pro internet access
host_about:
I'm a private pilot and part-time flight instructor. I love to travel and get to know people in far-off places. Recently, my wife and I flew our Cessna to Cuba and we have also flown all over the US and to Europe. 
When we're not traveling we love to hang out with friends and family. My wife, Barbara, and I met and got married in Spain while we were both working there; me as a software engineer and she selling juggling balls (she is an excellent juggler, I am a rank amateur). I speak fairly fluent Spanish with a pronounced Castilian accent.
We enjoy doing some hobby farming and have a permaculture garden in development as well as some vegetable and fruit gardens that are beginning to produce well.
I was born  in Jamaica and go back there regularly to visit. Barbara is from Southern California.

name: Coastal Neighborhood Home 1
description:
The two bedrooms are comfy and sunny with a full bathroom. Each room is to a separate booking. So the bathroom may be shared. This newly updated home is minutes from parks, trails and beaches. Enjoy the beautifully landscaped backyard and a fragrance free environment. Lite breakfast available to share indoors or out. There is no WiFi at this time. Starbucks and other area WIFI spots close by.

The space
Driving times: Sunset State Beach 15 mins,
Monterey Airport 29 mins,
Santa Cruz Fairgrounds 7 mins,
Santa Cruz downtown 30 to 45 mins.

Guest access
You will have access to the TV and dvd player in the living room, the use of the kitchen and a large dining room. Also enjoy chairs outside on the decks, use of a small smokey joe for bbq ing and off street parking.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbors are super friendly, and you may walk to restaurants, shopping (Target) all within a mile.  It’s a short distance to the local airport if you are flying into Watsonville.
host_about: I love to cook healthy meals without dairy and wheat, sometimes vegan and often with meat.  I can't live without my big backyard space... with my hammock and rocking chairs. I love to drive and go to music events. I can't live without the beaches and hiking trails around me.  I'm into wildlife, esp. birds.

name: ♛ 5,700 sq. Luxury Villa, Oceanview, Infinity Pool
description:
**Vacation rental only. No weddings or events**

Rustic Mediterranean style villa with modern influences. Meticulous attention to detail is apparent throughout this home, making it an exceptional choice for your holiday. This property offers extraordinary indoor/outdoor spaces including a theater, chefs kitchen, incredible master bath, infinity pool/hot tub and sweeping views of Monterey Bay. Every detail has been thought of, from the furnishings and accessories to the materials selection.

The space
Plentiful and secure gated courtyard parking along with the use of a 2 car garage.

Featuring a chefs kitchen, with top end appliances including Wolfe, Subzero, (3) Miele dishwashers, and cast iron sinks while maintaining a warm rustic European feel.

French limestone, reclaimed pine floors, double arched ceilings, and French provincial stone throughout along with a custom lighting control system add to the one of a kind ambiance inside
neighborhood_overview: Perched on a hillside, this large and private lot is situated on a quiet country road yet just 7 mins from shops, restaurants and 15 mins from beach! You have incredible 180 degree views of Monterey Bay and Santa Cruz and Capitola below.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Jay, an Airbnb user since 2011.  I've been fortunate enough to host amazing travelers for the past nine years while exploring over 90 countries on all continents myself. 

I feel strongly about supporting the sharing and crowdsourcing community. Connecting with travelers as a host and locals through my own travel with Airbnb, are priceless experiences. Understanding the world through it's people is one of my life goals. I also own a boutique travel company, Trip Coaching, so knowing cities like a local is very important to me. 

I look forward to meeting you and learning about your piece of the planet!

name: Traditional Japanese Farmhouse
description:
Traditional Japanese farmhouse on five acres. Tatami rooms or loft. Two miles from UCSC. Five miles from downtown Santa Cruz. Adjacent to 100's of acres of open space. Both rooms in house and separate outbuilding for sleeping are available. Possible to use yurt for stays of one month or more.

The space
Can expect quiet, uninterrupted time. OK to bring most pets. Horse facility available next door. Riding on the open space land is allowed.

Guest access
Private space is traditional tatami rooms. Sleeping on futons. As in traditional home rooms separated by shoji.

Shared spaces are kitchen and living area in traditional style and bathroom with ofuro tub.

name: Studio Villa
description:
Great neighborhood. All night you will be hearing the crashing waves, with a peak of the ocean. Private entrance to room, and own private bathroom. Outdoor patio with small refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker. Access to the beach is 6 to 8 blocks away on Beachgate Way. To go the the beach, you can park by the stairway, and it will take you to the beach. I also rent out the studio next to this one so you will have to be on the quiet side. No kids, dogs. No other visitors or guests allowed.

The space
This home has been on the Annual Symphony League Home Tour two times, and also in the local newspaper as the Fanti-Sea house. Beautiful entrance to Studio, with a peak of the ocean. Lots of plants. Completely fenced yard in safe neighborhood. Many restaurants and shops within a mile from studio. Neighborhood great for walking and hiking. No other guests or visitors allowed, or Security Deposit may be withheld. When you first inquire please tell us a bit about yourse
neighborhood_overview: Very private, great neighborhood for hiking and walking.
host_about: I have lived in Santa Cruz County for over 40 years. Very active in sports.  I am licensed to care for foster children, and have been doing this for over 8 years.

name: Quiet La Selva Retreat, large back yard & deck
description:
Very quiet getaway (that means no loud groups, meetings or parties!!) 1.5 miles from the beach. Lovely back yard, large deck & 5 patios where you can find sun or shade any time of the day. Deck has lots of seating, umbrellas, & gas grill. Large dining room & 2 living rooms, one w/ TV and the other w/ fire place. Open living space, high ceilings & skylights. Kitchen fully stocked with basic supplies, lots of cooking equipment. Many stairs - gusts must be able to climb stairs.

The space
Quiet neighborhood - no parties or meetings, please be considerate of neighbors.
On private cul-de-sac shared with 3 other neighbors (please keep your activities to our property not on the cul-de-sac).
High speed internet and cable tv. Smart TVs in Master Bedroom and upper living room.
2700 square feet - offers lots of different spaces for hanging out.
Kitchen has all of the essentials including
Coffee maker
Toaster oven
Toaster
Waffle make
neighborhood_overview: La Selva Beach is a very quiet community on the beach located conveniently between Santa Cruz and Monterey.  Only a few miles from both Watsonville and Aptos where there are plenty of restaurants, shopping, cool thrift stores, movies, flea market on the weekends.
host_about: High School History teacher who loves to travel

From the moment you step foot into this beautiful mountain side retreat till the moment you leave, you’ll have a trip unlike any other! Because of its location, you can easily access the stunning trails of the Santa Cruz Mountains, play some golf at nearby world-class facilities or maybe partake in wine tastings from over 41 local wineries! Discover what makes Santa Cruz so special, today!

Going someplace new is always exciting. And what would that adventure be without a great place to lay your head at the end of the day? That is where I come in!

name: YURTle the Turtle
description: YURTle the Turtle is located in the Santa Cruz mountains in California. We are 20 minutes to the beach and SC beach boardwalk amusement park. 20 minutes to Big Basin Redwood State Park. 10 minutes to Henry Cowell State Park. Two hours to San Francisco. Hiking, swimming, world class surfing, fishing, boating.  Many wineries and breweries close by. Sit on the deck and enjoy the lovely old growth oak trees and sounds of the nearby creek.  I will meet and greet you to show you around upon arrival...
neighborhood_overview: We have coffee shops, small town grocery store and are close to Redwood State parks, world class surfing, hiking, swimming, boating. There are a couple great local pubs nearby as well.
host_about: There is an outside bathroom for your convenience so there is no need to come into the main house.  We are in a very beautiful area, 20 minutes to beach or famous Big Basin redwood park.  Henry Cowell is 10 minutes away.  Surfing, fishing, hiking. Great location.

name: Capitola Village retreat steps to sand and action
description:
The house is just steps to the center of it all. Located 6 doors down to the beach, restaurants, coffee shops, and more. Everything you need is within walking distance. Come enjoy the beach, sun, surf, and charming Village! No pets allowed. Parking is tight... the beach is in sight (garage for a small car, but parking pass lets you park for free anywhere bear by. Frequently there is parking in front of the house)

The space
This home in the heart of Capitola Village. The kitchen features granite counters and stainless steel appliances. You are in the middle of the Village and just steps away from the beach. Park your car and walk everywhere! Grab a boogie board and head to the beach. walk a few blocks and rent paddleboards or kayaks, stroll along the river, grab an ice cream cone, eat at a fantastic restaurant, or shop at one of the boutiques. You will never run out of fun activities.

Guest access
Washer and dryer

Other things
neighborhood_overview: Capitola is a great, artsy community, just outside the hustle and bustle of Santa Cruz.

This 3 bedroom plus bonus is fully remodeled and very spacious for the whole group have there own space or gather in the various living areas. Our beach house is located about a 5 minute walk from Rio Del Mar state beach and much more. Enjoy the sunny days out with a barbecue on the large front balcony or have fun with family and friends around the natural gas fire pit located in the enclosed front patio.

The space
This home is plenty big for multiple families or large groups to vacation. Starting with the 3 bedrooms all with large beds and a bonus room that has two pull out singles that also functions as a TV room. There are plenty of areas to gather and spend time with friends and family indoor and outside, also a fully remodeled kitchen that is plenty large for prep and cooking space. There is a two car garage to have your car in a safe convenient place throughout your vacation.

Other things to note
Check in and out through the Cheshire

name: Walk to the Beach and Boardwalk from the Seabright Serenity
description:
In the coveted Seabright Beach area of Santa Cruz, this lovely home is set along one of the most charming coastral strips in California!

The space
This rental offers the quintessential California surf vacation, located in the desirable Seabright Beach area to the southeast of Santa Cruz; a bustling, booming little beach zone suitable for old and young alike!

This two-bed one-bath PET-FRIENDLY unit is the bottom floor of a duplex. The upstairs unit is occupied by the owner's of the property.

It is conveniently located within walking distance of the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, as well as the yacht harbor, Seabright Beach and a whole host of popular restaurants and coffee shops.

The Seabright Serenity is cozy and comfortable. The Seabright area is the perfect location to enjoy all that Santa Cruz has to offer, you can walk to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk which features rides, arcade games, laser tag, miniature golf and bowling.
host_about: I enjoy spending time with my family, going for long walks on the beach with my husband or cheering for the kids in their various sports events.  My favorite activities are surfing, swimming, and hot yoga/ pilates.

name: Twin Lakes Beach Cottage
description:
Seaside cottage with modern nautical accents located a short walk to beautiful Twin Lakes Beach and a 1.2 mile walk to the Boardwalk. This cottage features three comfortable bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and an updated fully equipped kitchen. The cottage also has a cozy family room and wonderful furnished outdoor spaces, perfect for relaxing after a fun day at the beach, Boardwalk, or exploring vibrant downtown Santa Cruz. Come enjoy this beach side getaway with family and friends!

The space
Thank you for choosing our Twin Lakes Beach Cottage for your stay.

Parking is available in the driveway or on the street.

Entrance will be through the patio door. You will be provided an entrance code before arrival.

Some facts about our house:

• TVs get basic cable – The Xfinity remote controls the TV and the cable.

In the Living Room:
- Use either the Comcast or the TV remote to turn on the TV . Use the TV re
neighborhood_overview:
Twin Lake Beach Cottage is located on quiet street/alley a short stroll to a beautiful beach. Nearby you will find several places to grab a bite including the Crow's Nest and Cafe El Palomar on the beach, Johnny's Harborside at the nearby boat harbor, the Harbor Cafe and L&L Hawaiian BBQ, to name a few. You can also rent equipment or arrange for surf or paddle board lessons on the beach or arrange for a boat tour at the harbor.

For those who like the excitement of the Boardwalk Amusement Park it is only a short drive or walk away as are the wharf (look for the elephant seals) and Santa Cruz's vibrant downtown. There are various museums in the area including The Santa Cruz Museum of Art and History downtown, the Seymour Marine Discovery Center, and the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary Exploration Center. For further exploration or a hike in the redwoods, consider the short drive to U. C. Santa Cruz.

With a prime location near world-class surfing and a short walk to the beach, this 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath, 1,502-square-foot beach home offers all the essentials - perfect for a family or friends getaway!

In-Unit Laundry | Rooftop Deck | Off-Street Parking

name: Bronson St. Retreat (30 day min rental)
description:
Private bright & sunny! Leave your car & explore.

Location is one of the best features of this private 1 bedroom unit that you'll have all to yourself. Enjoy Seabright beach an 8 min walk away (0.5 mile) and Verve coffee as a neighbor so close you can smell the beans roasting. Hot or cold weather, it's always easy to sneak off to the beach. Or chill on your own private back patio as the first sun of the day cracks open overhead. Everything's close; it's an incredible place to come home to.

The space
1 bedroom, living room with a kitchenette setup.
Gets great sun through the large sliding glass door that faces east over the back yard.

The unit consists of your very own private 1br/1ba space connected to a larger home. Entry through the side of the house opens into your private back yard. There's a nice patio for a sitting area, BBQ, and bikes along with an area for gardening that's been known to produce some great tomatoes, squash, and
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet neighborhood with an AMAZING coffee shop only a few steps away (Verve). Locals love to take walks through the neighborhood with their dogs on the way to the beach or nearby restaurants. The climbing gym brings some foot traffic by during the day/evenings as well but they're all great people and friendly.

Tucked away on Bronson St in Santa Cruz. A few houses down from Verve Coffee Roasting and Pacific Edge climbing gym.
1 block parallel to Seabright Ave. Super close to Linda's Cafe and all the great restaurants nearby (Seabright Brewery, Tramonti, Engfer Pizza works, and the brand new Seabright Deli). A few minutes from Shopper’s Corner, Whole Foods, Akira Sushi, and Sante Adarius SC Portal taproom.
Santa Cruz Harbor, Johnny's Harborside, and Crows Nest are all a nice walk away.
host_about: Bay area native, UCSC allumni (Film). Empty-nester with a son in college, enjoys photography, real estate, and the awesome brewery scene that's come up in town. Happy to help with tips and tricks to make your time in this amazing location great!

description:
First and foremost we want guests to know we run a commercial ozone machine during the cleaning processs to ensure we stay healthy and our guests stay healthy during COVID.

Our farm is in south Felton, which was not damaged by the fires, we are within walking distance to Henry Cowell Park, 2 minutes to downtown Felton by car, Roaring Camp Railroad, and Mt. Hermon Adventures. Santa Cruz Beaches are a 15 minute drive away. Felton restaurants are open!

The space
We have 4 different vacation accommodations on the farm so it is possible to book a large friend or family gathering. All spaces are their own units with a good separation of space.

We have a beautiful piece of property just minutes from town. On our 5 acre farm we have full sun so we are able to grow a variety of fruit trees, tomatoes and flowers. We also have a variety of chickens, goats and horses. We operate a seasonal farm stand as well.

name: Full Ocean View Cottage!HotTub AquariumPassesBikes
description:
Our cute beach home offers the best Santa Cruz location! First house in from the ocean, with fantastic ocean views. Watch whales passing by from the deck, soak in the hot tub, or take the bikes to the Boardwalk and Wharf down the street. Enjoy shopping and dining at the outdoor mall in downtown Santa Cruz and microbreweries that Santa Cruz has to offer.
Use our 4 guest passes (hard copies to be returned) to the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

The space
Our home just received a head to toe face lift and is ready for your enjoyment. A modern yet comfortable design approach was used to enhance the natural beauty of the setting. Design features include:

*An open floor plan that maximizes natural light and unobstructed ocean views.
*Approximately 1500 square feet with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath that can comfortably accommodate up to 6 guests.
*Both bedrooms have queen sized beds and both living room sofas have a queen sized pull out bed with memory foam
neighborhood_overview: You will be staying in what we believe to be the best neighborhood in all of Santa Cruz. A dedicated run/walk/bike path goes along the ocean on West Cliff Drive from the Santa Cruz Boardwalk/Wharf to Natural Bridges State Park. Our home sits smack dab in the center of this path, providing unparalleled access to everything you would want to see or do in Santa Cruz (that is, if you even want to leave the beach directly in front of the home). Ditching the car and walking or biking to dining, activities, shopping, and entertainment will never be easier.

description:
Large bedroom suite, with a king size bed, jacuzzi tub, desk, Kuerig coffee maker, refrigerator and freezer, very comfortable down couch, TV/VCR, & movie library. There is a large private patio area all to yourself with a fire pit and cozy patio furniture. BYOWood
The suite is locked off from the main house with its own private entry.
We use a commercial ozone machine during the cleaning process, wipe down all surfaces with approved cleaners and follow the Airbnb cleaning protocol for COVID19.

The space
You are welcome to visit the farm animals during your stay and wander our beautiful farm. We are also walking distance to Henry Cowell Park where you can visit the ancient redwoods. Walk a little farther and you can ride the steam train at Roaring Camp Railroad. We have a nice little restaurant with outdoor seating 3 blocks away or you can drive into downtown Felton in 2 minutes. The beaches in Santa Cruz are a short 15 minute drive away. The Zip l
neighborhood_overview:
Our beautiful little town of Felton was not damaged by the wildfires. We are walking distance (3 blocks) to Henry Cowell Park. You can also walk to Roaring Camp Railroad by walking through the park. It is about a mile walk to the Railroad.
It is 2 miles to town, where there is a variety of shops and restaurants. We have a very good restaurant 3 blocks from the house with very nice outdoor seating.
You can reach Santa Cruz quickly by driving down highway 9 through the beautiful redwoods. It is 6 miles to Santa Cruz from our farm and the best way to reach Santa Cruz without dealing with the beach traffic.

name: A Nest at the Beach!
description:
This Original Seabright Beach single story cottage was converted in the early 1900's to a two story Craftsman Bungalow. The home is furnished with nautical decor. Wake up each morning to the gentle reminder that you're as the beach with the sound of waves and sea lions barking in the distance.

The space
Upstairs sunroom looks out to the bay and municipal pier beyond. Peaks of the ocean from three other upstairs bedrooms. The Upstairs bathroom is large with old fashion clawfoot soaking tub (please note it does not include a showerhead, it is a bathtub only)

Downstairs has a large living room, large dining room, large kitchen with eating nook, also a private bedroom off the front porch, and the west bedroom with its own enclosed sun porch. The home sits on a corner lot surrounded by a well kept lawn and garden with many cozy sitting areas, some with a view of the beach. A welcome retreat after a long day at the beach.
neighborhood_overview: The beach neighborhood is normally quiet, with foot traffic to and from the beach. The harbor is a couple blocks away, During the Summer months there is a free shuttle at the harbor to get you and your guests across to  the restaurants and other beaches on the other side. The neighborhood is always fun with lots of young and old walking in their beachware having a great time, children love this area as do parents and grandparents. Neighbors are very pleasant and enjoy all the new faces and happy atmosphere the beach crowd brings.

name: Seaview Condo - 150 Steps to the beach!
description:
Spacious and modern two bedroom, one bath condo, with high ceilings and a fabulous ocean view! Look out at the ocean from the kitchen bar, living room, hallway. 150 steps to the Beach, Capitola Pier, boutique shopping and over 20 restaurants. Remodeled kitchen, WiFi Big Screen TV and a back patio with a gas BBQ grill. Perfect for families, couples or girls/guys getaways! Sleeps 8. Covered parking for 1 car, dirt parking for additional car. Renter must be at least 25 years old.

The space
Our condo is one level with two bedrooms and one bath and a queen sofa couch in the living room. Ideal for 6 but sleeps up to 8 people. The condo has high ceilings and is very open and airy with a wall of windows and a great ocean view. We also have a small patio in the back with table and chairs and a BBQ grill. The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, cooking utensils, dishes and silverware. Our condo has everything you will need to have a wonderful vacation at the beach.
neighborhood_overview: Capitola Village is so charming and unique.  The Capitola Pier is amazing and the beach spectacular.  There are wonderful restaurants and boutique shops less then a block away from our condo.  You are also close to 41st Avenue where there are grocery stores, a movie theater and amazing surf shops and boutiques.  Don't miss out.  Capitola is a one-of-a-kind small beach village!

Brand new bed & mattress. Original art, nice sized closet. High ceilings and ocean breeze that comes through your window.
