name: Unique Sculptured House with Private Beach Access
description:
Escape from the outside world to this one of a kind Sculpture House. Enjoy its unique design, white rounded walls, sitting nooks, gas dome fireplace, and beautiful tranquil gardens. Sit back and relax in the rounded sunken bathtub. This is the perfect romantic getaway and just one block away from a private beach. We take great care in the comfort and safety of our guests. Our home is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized after guests per California Guidelines.

The space
The Sculpture House offers everything you will desire to feel away from it all. The outside space is just as unique as the interior. The newly remodeled kitchen is equipped with everything you will need to create a delicious meal or take a walk up the glass spiral staircase to your bedroom.

La Selva Beach sets between Watsonville and Aptos. It is about a 25 min drive to Santa Cruz.

Guest access
The entire property is for you to enjoy!
neighborhood_overview: La Selva Beach is a quant small beach town.  The neighborhood is quiet and Not far from majestic redwood forests. North of Watsonville and south of Aptos.  La Selva Beach has a gorgeous coastline. Manresa State Beach is within walking distance or enjoy a private beach, both are ideal spots for surfing, coastal camping, and watching the sunset. The Monterey Bay is a haven for marine life and birds. Nearby restaurants and antique shops await you!

Gated Community | Resort Amenities | 1,050 Sq Ft | Free WiFi

Perfect for beach-lovers and anyone seeking a quiet retreat, 'The Nest at Pelican Point' combines endless relaxation with easy access to the stunning Monterey Bay, Santa Cruz, and on-site amenities ensuring you won't have to travel far to enjoy the areas best-kept secrets.

Hardwood floors throughout; organic cotton bedding + towels. Room has walk-closet and tall chest of drawers.

Views that go on forever of forest and Monterey Bay. Lots of wildlife. Household is environmentally conscious, so is fully solar, on a well, and uses only nontoxic and unscented cleaning products. We compost!

soquelbedandbreakfast.com

Guests have access to living room, dining room, kitchen, decks, laundry room.

name: Main Beach 5000sf luxury-great 4 social distancing
description:
Ultimate vacation destination for your gathering- Luxurious home across from beach & wharf in the heart of Santa Cruz fun! You'll enjoy over 5,000 square feet of luxurious accommodations- 9 private rooms (most w/ adjoining baths) beds for 20 guests, including 2 full chef's kitchens w Viking appliances &stunning views, and a full outdoor kitchen w/ an enormous patio w/views of the entire Monterey Bay. Multiple master suites w/ 4 king beds, 3 queens & 4 bunks (8 twin beds). Come relax and enjoy.

The space
Finest finishes with old world travertine flooring throughout, granite counters, soaking tubs, rain showers and much more! 4 car garage with outdoor shower for cleaning off the sand when you return from the beach. Home elevator for guest with accessible needs.

Your group can walk to just about everything, or just sit back and enjoy in this spectacular retreat. Located directly across the street from the beautiful Santa Cruz Wharf, famous Cowells Beach
neighborhood_overview:
Your group can walk to just about everything, or just sit back and enjoy in this spectacular retreat. Located directly across the street from the beautiful Santa Cruz Wharf, famous Cowells Beach, and the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary Visitor's Center. Walk to the world famous Santa Cruz Boardwalk, where you can enjoy mini-golf, rollercoasters, bowling, an arcade and more. Take the summertime trolley offering service to downtown Santa Cruz with a stop outside your front door. Walk to the lighthouse museum at Lighthouse Field or hop on the old fashion locomotive train to Roaring Camp Redwoods. Enjoy 30+ restaurants and shops, rent surfboards, watch the whales and dolphins. Plan some time to drop in the exclusive Jack O'Neil Lounge and listen to some live jazz.

Note: City has strict restrictions against parties, so no large parties/events are allowed. Santa Cruz City Vacation Rental Permit#'s: STR18-108 & STR18-109

name: Rustic Modern 1 BR  in Sunny Seabright
description:
Our Seabright Beach place has been in the family for over 50 years. A recent remodel brings the space up to date with our goal to make it especially comfortable and light, a retreat where you will be able to relax after a day of adventure, wine/beer tasting or beach fun. Or just hang out and read a book in the cozy recliner or on the patio.
Sleep in a comfy king size bed in a room with black out window coverings. The living room has queen sleeper and roll out bed in the bedroom closet.

The space
Our place is unique in that it is 2 units, a duplex, with one place situated upstairs and the other at street level. This 1 bedroom sits below a 3 bedroom that is currently occupied with tenants. We have added sound proofing materials to the flooring above as well as extra insulation in the ceilings to help reduce the sound transfer. It has really helped out. We ask our upstairs tenants to be especially mindful when there are guest below. You can mainly hear f
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is nicely situated where you can easily walk down to the Boardwalk (no need to drive!), yet we are just across the river (walk the famous train trestle) so not in the hustle and bustle of the Boardwalk area. Also walk to beautiful Seabright Beach, enjoy a wide variety of delicious restaurants nearby , including the Brewery, Enfer Pizza, Tramonte, Bettys Burgers, and more. There is coffee, tea, smoothies, bagels at Java Junction or find nearby Verve coffee Roastery where they roast the coffee on site. Take a stroll down to the Harbor, enjoy calamari at Aldo's. The nearby Ocean View park has great slides for your kids. This park is also known to our kids as the "wax paper" park. They would take wax paper on the slides to go faster! I love that we can hear the roar of the Big Dipper, excitement from the riders, the barking of the sea lions, and at times the crash of the surf.
The neighborhood is mostly residential, a few vacation rentals, but neighbors tha
host_about: I have been an  RN for 30 years now, the past 18 have been with the VA.  I enjoy my work very much.  Also I am a runner,  I started a running program end of March in 2013.  First a 10k, then half marathons, a marathon, and found myself at my first Boston Marathon in 2015.  I have 3 children, 29, 26 and 20.  My youngest is in the Army.  My husband Roy  is retired from IT, but now has a business building custom sheds.  I enjoy traveling, especially to Italy , meeting people and being a host of my family's beach place in Santa Cruz.

name: One of a kind full River and Ocean view!
description:
This one of a kind unit is situated at the very end of the beautiful Pajaro Dunes gated community. This unit offers the best views in the entire community with a full river and 180 degree full ocean view. Just steps from the sand, watch your children play in the sand while enjoying the view from the deck of beautiful sunrises and listen to the waves from the King size Master bedroom. Unit is fully updated with beautiful granite, new appliances, queen sofabed, and a 2nd bedroom with two twin beds

The space
This unit is very unique due to it's location. Because it is situated at the end of the community south of the State Beach, you will have the most privacy and are afforded both River and Ocean Views. Only a handful of units offer both River and Ocean views, and is a very quiet location situated opposite of the public beach. Very rare to have a fully updated unit with such one of a kind views that is well decorated and exceptionally clean and well cared for.
neighborhood_overview: Pajaro Dunes is a private HOA offering tennis courts, basketball courts, as well as a sand Volleyball area for guests. The beach is private and stunning. A short 20 minute drive to quaint Capitola or 30 minutes to Santa Cruz. Monterey is roughly a 30 minute drive to the Pier and all that Monterey has to offer. Great local restaurants await with a short 10 minute drive into Watsonville. Enjoy Moss Landing with a short 15 minute drive and Phil's famous fish house featured on the Food Network.

name: Sunny West Cliff Beach House with Ocean Views
description:
Located less than 1 block from West Cliff Drive and Natural Bridges State Beach in the coveted Westside neighborhood of Santa Cruz.

This modern, open floor plan home has vaulted, open beam ceilings, dramatic architecture, gorgeous ocean views and is filled with natural sunlight. The house has 3 decks and a large backyard to lounge and enjoy the ocean breeze!

The fully updated kitchen features granite countertops, a built-in fridge and dishwasher, and top of the line appliances and cookware. The dining room table seats 8 guests and looks out on the tropical, fully-fenced backyard. The sunken living room has a new, leather sofa, gas fireplace and a half bathroom. The Master Suite is located upstairs with a private terrace, en suite bathroom and vaulted, open beam ceilings.

Enjoy relaxing and sipping coffee on the ocean view deck, taking a sunset stroll on West Cliff, walking to nearby restaurants, having picnic in the park and so much more!
neighborhood_overview:
The Westside neighborhood is one of the most desirable areas in Santa Cruz. This home is located less than 1 block from West Cliff Drive and Natural Bridges State Beach - Voted the #1 and #3 Attractions in Santa Cruz by TripAdvisor.


West Cliff:
A popular walk from Natural Bridges State Park all the way to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk (3-4 miles). West Cliff runs along the ocean the whole way, and is pedestrian and bike-friendly with beautiful views of the Monterey Bay. There are occasional visits by whales and you’ll frequently see dolphins, sea otters, seals, and many sea birds.
Walk out the front door, turn right, at the end of the block you can cross the street and take a big step down to the path on West Cliff. Or for a gentler access to the path, turn right at the end of the block and there is a cross walk to cross to the seaward side and of the West Cliff path.

name: Modern Bungalow in Soquel w/ Hot Tub!
description:
Modern and cozy bungalow with hot tub located in the heart of the Soquel Village. Only a 5 minute walk to the numerous restaurants in the Soquel Village, a 7 minute drive to Capitola Beach, and a 15 minute drive to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk! There are 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in the main house, with an additional, detached unit with a queen-sized bed.

The beautifully decorated living area features a wood burning stove, plenty of comfortable seating, a desk/office space, and a TV with DVD player. There are 3 bedrooms located on the 1st floor of the main house: The Master Bedroom has a king-sized bed, en suite bathroom and a sliding door leading to the outdoor patio.
The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms both have queen-sized beds and share a bathroom. The 4th bedroom is located up a spiral staircase and has a queen-sized bed and lounging area. The detached bedroom is private and cozy with a queen-sized bed, desk and direct access to the outdoor patio area.

250 sq ft bedroom with king bed, gas fireplace, wet bar, ceiling fan, private deck, cable TV, two comfy chairs

Guest access

host_about: My husband and I had this house built in our favorite Santa Cruz neighborhood, flat streets instead of the hills surrounding the city. We are avid pickleball players (I also referee at pball tournaments). We enjoy traveling the country to indulge our "addiction."

name: Escape to "Enseñada Del Sol" Beach House
description:
Our lovely beach home, Enseñada Del Sol, is just over a block from Sunny Cove beach. It is the perfect space to enjoy a relaxing and private Santa Cruz experience. Our spacious custom built home was lovingly designed and decorated in a beautiful and unique Talavera style. High end finishes and thoughtful touches abound at Enseñada Del Sol. Our home is a delightful sanctuary that is a clean, well-appointed and safe place for family and friends to gather and enjoy all that Santa Cruz offers.

The space
**Highlight of Coronavirus Precautions ** We consider everyone's health and safety of paramount importance as we all confront the unfortunate and isolating events resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic. We want our guests to stay healthy and safe. With this goal in mind our cleaning staff completes a full cleaning and disinfecting process between guests and we air the house out before new guests arrive. We want all guests to stay healthy and have a wonderful time!
neighborhood_overview:
Enseñada Del Sol is in a fantastic and very central location. The beautiful tide pools at Corcoran beach are just down the street, and a very short walk (less than two blocks) will take you to Sunny Cove or Santa Maria (or "Mo's", as locals know it), both great family beaches! Mo's is a great beach to take a quiet and invigorating long walk.

There is a Starbucks around the corner and there are a number of tasty restaurants within walking distance; and don't miss out on the fun local brewery. On Sundays, there is a charming little Farmer's Market only a short walk away.

The Boardwalk, the Wharf, Capitola Village and historic downtown Santa Cruz are all just a quick 10 minute drive. The Yacht Harbor and Twin Lakes Beach (with the Crow's Nest, Cafe el Palomar and Java Junction) are a three minute drive or a nice 15 minute walk away. The area is extremely bike and walking friendly, so why not enjoy the area without dealing with the stresses of traffic!!!
host_about:
I live in Santa Cruz, California with my wonderful wife Katharina and our son Oliver. I am a professional Airbnb host and a teacher and Katharina is an amazing person and an incredibly talented creative director. Oliver is a bright, energetic and friendly fellow that loves the water, bike riding, exploring and solving the mysteries of the universe. We have one incredibly friendly and mellow cat (Dexter), six chickens and we enjoy spending time with friends--hiking, biking, great home-cooked meals, good wine and beer, and generally enjoying all that life has to offer.

We have a passion for travel--nothing is more exciting then finding yourself in a new and unfamiliar place with nothing to do but explore and interact with new people!

We are also extremely responsible people. We own our home and take great pride in having a place that is clean, comfortable and inviting. As guests in other people's homes, we feel the same responsibility and respect for their space.

name: 24’ Yurt in beautiful half acre garden
description:
Nestled in the Santa Cruz mountains just 4 miles from the beach, 5 miles to Davenport and 9 miles from Santa Cruz (12 minutes by car) sits a magical Yurt situated in a beautiful private fenced half acre garden in Bonny Doon. Experience all that Santa Cruz has to offer then get away from the noise, traffic and bustle of the city and relax in this peaceful place.

The space
The yurt is 450 sq.ft. of living space with multiple glass windows,wood floors and exotic Moroccan rugs. There is a sink with hot and cold water inside. This is a heated, insulated luxury accommodation . Do not mistake this for a “camping” situation. The newly constructed modern bathroom is detached but only 2 steps from the front door.

Amenities include a small refrigerator, electric kettle, toaster oven, hot plate, coffee maker, plates, cutlery, cups, glasses, etc. Snacks, teas, coffee and a bottle of wine are included. There is a small patio where you can relax and hang outside and
neighborhood_overview:
2 minutes away is the Bonny Doon ecological reserve. Over 500 acres of hiking trails including the famous “Moon rocks” (see photos). Half a mile down the road visit Beauregard vineyard and tasting room 🍷. A little further is Davenport, a scenic little town with restaurants and beaches.
Also nearby, experience giant redwoods in Henry Cowell State Park, Big Basin State Park and Fall creek. Visit Wilder ranch. See the elephant seals at Año Nuevo then enjoy numerous quality Westside restaurants of every description.

name: Beach retreat with stunning views
description:
The Copper Nest is an ideal getaway located steps from the beach in the gated community of Pajaro Dunes where the Pajaro River meets the Pacific Ocean. This newly designed three bedroom home is customized to create a serene beach retreat for you and your guests.

This newly designed three bedroom home has a well equipped kitchen and outdoor seating, game, and BBQ areas.

There are stunning ocean and agricultural views from every room.

Close to California's popular food and travel regions.

The space
Newly designed in 2019 with high end amenities. A large master suite features a king bed and spectacular ocean views. There is a bedroom with two twin beds, and a bedroom with a king bed.

All areas have smart TVs with the family room featuring The Frame TV which doubles as customizable art to help you feel right at home.

The loft area features an American Leather down sofa which has a pull out queen memory foam ma
neighborhood_overview: Close to Monterey, Carmel, the wine tasting region of Carmel Valley, and Santa Cruz.
host_about:
We have always wanted to have a beach house and were so excited to find one we loved in 2019.

We live in Turlock, California and have four children. I am the director of a nonprofit that supports grieving children. 

I love to go to the beach for fun and explore new restaurants and scenic places in the Monterey Bay region.

name: Westside Charming Victorian Home
description:
We love our old 1910 Victorian home for its classic fine touches and great character. It provides the feeling of a farmstead but very centrally located to everything. Walking and biking distance to amazing parks, restaurants, coffee shops, breweries, down town Santa Cruz, West Cliff, the North Coast and UCSC biking/hiking trails.

The space
Close to EVERYTHING you need.
- 20 minute walk to down town Santa Cruz, shopping and local wineries/breweries etc
- 30 minute walk to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and West Cliff
- 5 minute walk to Thai food, sushi, Italian, BBQ, Mexican (the list goes on and on)
- 5 minute walk to local park

Charm and Character
This classic Edwardian house is from 1910 and built with style. The rooms are large and provide plenty of space for cooking, dining and lounging together or separately. The house is spacious yet very cozy.

Large Back Yard
Set on a large 8k+s qft lot there is plenty
neighborhood_overview:
Family friendly: A great neighborhood for families and those looking for a safe and inviting community. A mix of old historical houses with families and some student rentals.

Parks: Trescony park and Westlake park are just blocks away and one of our favorite go to spots for kids. Trescony park is set within a beautiful community garden.

Food: Within 5 minutes you can walk to a grocery store, great coffee, Thai food, Italian, Sushi, BBQ, and Mexican food. A 20 minute walk gets you to local breweries, wineries, distilleries more restaurants and larger grocery stores.

Attractions: Within 20 minutes walking to down town Santa Cruz, West Cliff and Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. A short 5 minute drive gets you to UCSC Campus or the beautiful North Coast and Wilder Ranch.

name: The Cottage at Seacliff
description:
Welcome to the Cottage at Seacliff! This charming one bedroom cottage has been renovated & is waiting for you! You will step inside to an island inspired retreat with original hardwood floors. Relax in this warm, inviting home & enjoy the ocean views from the front windows. A fire in the large fireplace in the evening lets you unwind from your day of fun! You can also sit outside on the back deck with your favorite drink & enjoy the beautiful, private backyard .

The space
If cooking is your thing, then you will love this kitchen! It is fully equipped & includes a microwave, built-in refrigerator & double oven. The master bedroom offers a great night's sleep! French doors in the bedroom open to the deck. The sofa in the living room is ultra plush & also opens to a queen size bed with a high quality mattress. We do not accept pets in consideration of guests with allergies. Seacliff Beautification Award winner!
neighborhood_overview:
The Beach: The cottage is steps from access, via two foot paths, to the beautiful Seacliff State Beach. This beach is known for its fishing pier and concrete ship, The Palo Alto. The beach is also a popular swimming spot and has restrooms and showers. There is a long stretch of sand backed by bluffs, and covered picnic facilities as well. The park also has an interpretive/visitor center. Highly recommended. Enjoy watching the sea lions play and the dolphins swimming by right off the coast! The distance to the beach path is a short block away.

Whether you enjoy surfing, playing beach volleyball, or hiking along the coastal bluffs, Seacliff State Beach offers something for everyone. A place to picnic with the kids, or the perfect place for a romantic sunset stroll!
Activities: You are minutes away from so many activities! We have included a book of things to do during your stay.
The Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is 15 minutes(8.5 miles) away.
You may want

name: TWO COMFY UNITS, POOL, PARKING
description:
The property is located 3.4 miles from downtown Santa Cruz and is adjacent to the Pasatiempo Golf Course.

The space
NOTE: The safety and security of our Guests and Team Members have always been our priority.
We are taking additional precautionary measures to ensure our facilities are maintained to the highest standards and to do our part in reducing the spread of coronavirus.

Go for a swim in the pool, enjoy a sunset stroll on the beach, or go swimming, surfing, or sailing in the beautiful Monterey Bay (just 10 minutes drive away). Hike, jog, or bike among the majestic California redwoods or visit some of our local wineries. Within a short drive is the classic Santa Cruz Boardwalk, or venture further afield to Monterey and visit Fisherman's Wharf and the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

THE UNITS

These are 2 separate units located up close or right next to each other. The price is for BOTH units.
Each 250sf unit features:
- 2

host_about:
Going someplace new is always exciting. And what would that adventure be without a great place to lay your head at the end of the day? That is where I come in!

As an avid traveler myself, I know how the little things can set the pace for a new experience! You want something hospitable and inviting to give you a remarkable experience that no one else can give you. A heated pool, or jacuzzi at the end of the day to relax in, or a nice meal within walking distance? Down to beds that cozy and homily. Sounds good? Well, you have come to the right place.

We offer handpicked accommodations in remarkable properties for a  top-notch experience with a few added extras. As well as tips, recommendations, and 24/7 customer support to make sure that your experience is the best it can be!

name: Hillcrest Hideaway- Happy Place to Stay- Sleeps 5
description:
Hillcrest Hideaway is A Happy Place to Stay with an unbeatable location just a stones throw away to the seashore at Seacliff Beach. View the glittering Pacific Ocean from your front yard as you breathe in the sea air.
Our modern attached unit is fully furnished with contemporary beachy décor. There's 2 bedrooms 1 bath, kitchen, private entrance, driveway, outdoor shower & a private enclosed patio in the back. A fresh open space that is clean & functional. Fantastic for a getaway or gathering.

The space
Hillcrest Hideaway is fully stocked - like home away from home. The unit has an outdoor shower to wash off the beach sand. Cook up your favorite cuisine with pots, pans, cooking utensils, plates glasses, mugs, microwave, toaster, tea pot & coffee maker. Even though there isn't a washer & dryer available, across the street is Sno-White's laundromat facility. There's a liquor store & a burger joint, and many places to dine within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: Aptos is a quaint town in an unincorporated area of Santa Cruz County that includes several beaches.  It is also the home of historic Aptos Village, and the gateway to the Forest of Nisene Marks State Park. Hikers, runners and mountain bikers enjoy 30 miles of trails. The park spans 10,000 acres where the regeneration of second-growth Redwoods coexist with new foliage. A vibrant new town center graces the heart of Aptos Village, a pedestrian-friendly spot where Marianne's ice cream, Manuel's Mexican, small-batch coffee shops, destination eateries, local wineries, farmers market, dog friendly stops & ocean views combine to add local flair to this mid-county destination.

name: Lower Westside Sanctuary by Natural Bridges  Beach
description:
From our family of beach bums to yours: welcome to our newly remodeled, coastal sanctuary on the quiet lower Westside of Santa Cruz. Stroll 5 minutes to Natural Bridges Beach by day. By night, stargaze from the saltwater hot tub or gather around the gas fire pit.

Wildlife abounds: from our resident hummingbirds and butterflies at home to occasional seal, otter and whale sightings at Natural Bridges. Hungry/thirsty? Stroll 10 minutes to the heart of Santa Cruz’s beer, wine, and foodie scene!

The space
Because this property started as our family's beach house, it's well-stocked for families (and other groups of up to 8) to have an excellent time in Santa Cruz.

We provide boogie boards, beach chairs, and Ice coolers. Or just hang out at home and make use of our free + fast WiFi, and flat-screen TVs in the living area and two of the bedrooms.

Plus we stocked the kitchen for real cooking at home, with everything you need to prep me
neighborhood_overview:
The lower Westside of Santa Cruz is a quiet, family-friendly haven that's still close to all the action. It's just a 5-minute walk to Natural Bridges Beach and State Park, which is known for its wildlife, including shore birds, migratory whales, seals and otters. Not to mention the Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary at the Park—visit in late October and into November to observe peak monarch migration.

For a bit more activity, you're also just a 10-minute drive to the Beach Boardwalk and within walking distance of Santa Cruz's thriving and creative brewery and winery district. The Seymour Marine Discovery Center—a community-supported marine science education center affiliated with UC-Santa Cruz—is also nearby.

Stunning view in sublime setting in majestic Santa Cruz Mountains. Architectural gem. 9 and 13 minutes from Santa Cruz and Los Gatos, respectively. Excellent balance of convenient commercial access ( 5 minutes from central Scotts Valley), but having a feeling of bucolic isolation (1300 ft altitude) with an unobstructed view of mountains, forrest and ocean.

The space
2700 ft 2. 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, living room. Decorated with elegant touches from around the world. Access to 4 acres of land with BBQ, patio and jacuzzi. Jaw-dropping views. Fireplace. Sun room. Large office. Absolute serenity.
neighborhood_overview: Isolated in the mountains, but only 0.5 miles off of the 17 highway providing easy access to vintage Santa Cruz or elegant Los Gatos and the rest of silicon valley.
host_about: Chief Medical Officer for NYC Office of Emergency Management. Infectious disease/tropical medicine doctor. Often traveling...

name: 4790 Surf Rider's Oceanfront Hideaway *Hot Tub*
description:
Opal Cliff home on the cliff with complete ocean views and hot tub.  2 Night Min during Off Season and 4 Night Min during Holidays & Summer.

The space
Welcome to the Opal Cliff Oasis beach house. Located just outside of Capitola Village in the pristine Opal Cliffs neighborhood, this gorgeous beachfront beach house with full ocean views and a hot tub in the backyard has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and sleeps 6-8 guests. 

Santa Cruz Vacation Rental located in the pristine neighborhood of Opal Cliffs. With stunning and breathtaking views of the Monterey Bay from the fenced backyard, this beach house has it all! Kendall & Potter was established as a real estate company in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The brokers Skipper Kendall and William Pottermoved to Aptos to fulfill their dream of working in a small town in Santa Cruz County. Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

Rita has worked for Kendall & Potter in the property management and the Santa Cruz real estate industry for 20 years. A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. Current member of California Association of Realtors CAR and National Association of Property Managers, NARPM.

Kendall & Potter Property Management offers a variety of home services – including complete property management services, leases on unfurnished properties and rental homes in Santa Cruz, as well as Monterey Coast & Santa Cruz vacation rentals management and corporate housing.

name: Soquel Sea View Villa
description:
COVID orders could impact your travel plans. Before booking, PLEASE check the rules. Out of state visitors may be required to quarantine.

Enjoy modern architecture and panoramic ocean views. Vaulted ceilings, open floor-plan, gas fireplace and interior waterfall/Koi pond with tropical plants create an impressive space to relax. Master suite with teak wood floors, ocean view, hot sauna, and sitting/yoga area.

The space
Gorgeous ocean view sunsets from private hot tub roof deck and attractive garden. Views from every room. This hillside villa provides an ideal quiet retreat for adults in good physical condition. If you're fine with staircases and like to walk or run, it will be ideal for you, because it is a nice walk to the beach (1.4 miles, 26 minutes per Google Maps) - otherwise it's a six minute drive. Hardwood floor in MBR suite in front of hot sauna is ideal for a couple to do yoga. Lots of steps, some winding, into the house, and also up to the
neighborhood_overview: We're on a private drive near the end of a dead end street. Very quiet area, so we need to be mindful of the neighbors. Close to beaches, restaurants, wine tasting.  Soquel is a cute little coast-side town. Walk to wineries (Bargetto), tasting rooms, antique shops, restaurants. If you like to walk like we do, you can walk to the beach at Capitola Village (1.4 miles and 26 minutes according to Google). Otherwise a short drive or ride-share.  This is Santa Cruz metro area. Just a little distance from the crowds makes for a peaceful stay. Great Thai food and many other options.
host_about: I have always enjoyed the coast side and spend most of my free time here while working in Silicon Valley. My wife and I loved this Airbnb so much we bought it to retire here eventually. name: Ocean Views, Steps to Rio Beach, Clean & Beautiful
description:
Ocean views, big gorgeous deck, just minutes walk to the beach.
This bright, airy and spacious home is the perfect place to enjoy Rio Del Mar beach and Seacliff State Beach.
With ocean views from both inside and outside, you'll enjoy pink sunrises and spectacular sunsets, right from the comfort of home.
A full kitchen makes it easy to enjoy meals at home while taking in the views.
Everything has been freshly remodeled and the home is wonderfully clean with attention to fun detail throughout.

The space
Fall asleep to the sounds of the ocean waves crashing. Watch the most amazing sunsets. Dine alfresco on your gorgeous deck or enjoy a meal in the sunroom and take in the nearly wall-to-wall views from there. The home features a lovely fireplace for snuggling. Beautiful woodwork and trim throughout the 1930’s house. Comfortable beds and quality furnishings. And the kitchen has everything you need to fix a quick meal or a full feast.
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is on a small side road just moments away from the beach. The hilltop location makes for some of the best ocean and hill views in the area. The iconic cement ship is part of the beautiful view. The walk to the beach is just a few minutes. A deli, beach-front coffee shop, corner market, and great dining are a quick walk away.
You can walk for miles and miles on the beach. Enjoy amazing sunrises and sunsets from the house and from the beach, beach comb for sea glass and sand dollars, or just relax!
This is a quiet family home, definitely not a party house, but a great place to get away and have fun with friends and family!
host_about: Independent traveler, mother of 3 boys, business owner, non-profit development consultant, emcee and auctioneer.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

Refer to the Guest Welcome Binder upon arrival for additional information on the property and local attractions.
host_about: We are a Real Estate and Property Management company located in the heart of Santa Cruz and Capitola.  We offer clean and fun getaways for you and your guests!

name: Seabright Bungalow walking distance to the Beach!
description:
The Beach House Getaway is just a few blocks from gorgeous Seabright Beach, & just a few minute drive to to downtown Santa Cruz' restaurants and shopping. Guests will love the recently remodeled kitchen and relaxing living room. The outdoor deck is perfect for BBQ’ing, and the unique ‘Crow’s Nest’ on the outdoor upstairs deck is a perfect spot for morning coffee or an evening beverage.

We also offer guests 2 beach cruiser bikes you can use to explore the area as well as plenty of beach gear.

The space
Great location near the beach and walking distance to restaurants and shops in the Seabright neighboorhood.

Seabright State Beach, known to locals as Castle Beach, is a south-facing beach with the reputation of being the warmest, sunniest beach on the Monterey Bay. Great for families, this State Beach has restrooms, lifeguards*, and since Castle Beach Retreat sits at the beach's main entrance, there are no stairs or cliffs to negotiate.
neighborhood_overview: Just a few blocks from Seabright beach, the bungalow is located in the heart of the Seabright neighborhood, walking distance to the beach and restaurants, and just 2 miles from downtown Santa Cruz.
host_about:
Hi there, thanks for stopping by!  I’m the Founder and Owner of Springboard Property Management.  I offer full service property management services for Property Owners looking to rent out their homes or cabins on AirBnB.   If you're interested in my property management offering, feel free to contact me directly.   

Travel junkie, food and wine enthusiast.   

I'm available to answer any questions you may have about any properties that I manage.   You can reach me via text or mobile phone.

I've owned the Lakeside Cottage in Arnold, Ca for 9 years now.   It's a very unique experience that our guests truly enjoy.    After successfully renting the Cottage on AirBnB and (Hidden by Airbnb) for the past several years, I've begun offering up Hosting services to friends and families who are also interested in driving additional revenue from their vacation homes.

I manage over 20 properties in Arnold, Dorrington, Bear Valley, Hayward and Santa Cruz, as well as at my home in Livermore.   Being an AirBnB host and guest allows me to pursue two of my true passions, travel and meeting people from all over the world.  



I travel extensively for both business and pleasure, and take great pride in ensuring that our guests have an unforgettable, enjoyable experience during their stay with us.

I enjoy immersing myself in the local culture when I travel, and much prefer a small, quiet getaway than a loud, rambunctious hotel, which is why I have so much in common with many of my guests.   

I'm a huge foodie and wine fan, and can usually be found checking out the local fare, outdoor activities and local wine selection during my travels!

I'm always more than happy to chat via text or directly with our guests, prior to their stay, discussing potential options for hiking, dining and any other activities they may look to enjoy.    

I have two young children, 15 (Dylan) and 13 (Ava), who are the light of my life and always keep me from taking life too seriously!

name: Manresa Surf House -2 bedroom
description:
Manresa Surf House
Santa Cruz is known around the world for its Surf, Coulter, Climate, music, arts & outdoors activities. The Santa Cruz Surf House offers its guests a unique opportunity to experience Santa Cruz like a local. Just 0.3 of a mile to one of the best beaches in the county

The space
Santa Cruz is known for world class waves and was the first placed surfed outside of Hawaii. Manressa and La selva beach have great exposure to pick up both northwest swells in the winter and south swells in the summer. The inside whitewash is great for learning to pop up on a surfboard for the first time. For experienced surfers there are dozens of sandbars up and down the beach. Dodging the crowds means more waves for you and your friends.

Pet fee $100

name: Sweet Studio in the woods- perfect for 1 or 2
description:
Come visit this hidden gem in the oak trees; a place out of time in the heart of a quiet, friendly neighborhood set in the midst of the one-hundred-year-old Mount Hermon Christian Conference Center. Our studio is a perfect hideaway for one or two people, with access to local hikes in the redwoods canyons of Mount Hermon, Henry Cowell State Park, Roaring Camp Railroad, the beaches of Santa Cuz or wherever the road takes you!

The space
We’re proud of what we’ve done with the studio! Decorated tastefully in blues and grays, it has little touches that nod to our French ancestry. Entering via a private entrance reveals a surprisingly cozy space, low ceilings, exposed beams & comfortable bed. Heart redwood planks, taken from the original 1927 construction, accent newly painted walls. The rustic patio is sheltered by oaks and invites quiet moments of conversation & reflection. Secured behind two locked doors, this studio includes a mini-fridge and microwave, both a Keur
neighborhood_overview: We are just down the street from the famous Mount Hermon Adventures Canopy Tour and only a 15 minute drive to the ocean. Visit the Mount Hermon Adventures website to book a tour through the canopy of our majestic redwood forest.

description:
This beautiful apartment is located on the 1st floor of our Searenity triplex just steps away from Rio Del Mar State Beach, where you can enjoy long walks, beach fun, surf or just relaxing in a beach chair. We are close to many wonderful Restaurants, Coffee Shops, Golf Courses and State Parks which are just a few attractions you can experience during your stay. A perfect getaway spot for a couple, family and/or friends.

The space
This two bedroom spacious apartment is located on the first floor of our triplex. It will sleep/accommodate four people very comfortably, but can sleep up to six with the sofa bed for two additional people. It offers a comfortable living room space which includes a queen size memory foam sofa bed, chair-and-half, 48" flat screen TV on full motion wall mount.

The kitchen includes a full size refrigerator, electric stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, keurig coffee machine and many kitchen amenities for cooking some yummy meals

name: Hidden Garden Suite, Private Hot Tub and Garden
description:
Private, peaceful, and rural, yet close to everything - beaches, mountain biking, redwood forests, restaurants, golf courses and so much more! The Hidden Garden Suite at Sand Rock Farm is a large, private bedroom with windows that look out onto gardens and trees. You will enjoy soaking in the large, outdoor Jacuzzi in the garden just outside your room or walking on the nature trail loop. You may see deer, fox, turkeys, banana slugs, and other interesting wildlife. Two dogs allowed - $65 per.

The space
A stay at Sand Rock Farm is like having your own private park. This historic property was the site of Santa Cruz County's first winery and it is now a wedding venue and vacation rental. There are five total rental suites. Owners and caretaker live onsite in separate units but are not visible from the Hidden Garden Suite and will not be intrusive during your stay. The kitchen is shared and best suited for storing and reheating food (it is shared and therefo
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is rural with rolling hills, many old growth trees and plentiful wildlife.  The property itself is like a private park.  It has a gated entrance to ensure privacy and security.  Neighbors and roads are not visible from the property.
host_about: We are a family of three, happy to be living at beautiful Sand Rock Farm in Aptos with our chickens, dogs and cats.   Derek is a chef and also does all of the maintenance and projects at Sand Rock Farm.  Jen is an event planner/baker and is the general manager.  Kjell is a surfer, skateboarder and aspiring film-maker and musician.  Life is good at Sand Rock Farm!

name: Quiet Beach Cottage in the heart of Capitola
description:
Nestled into the heart of Capitola, this beach cottage is walking distance to the best of Capitola. Newly remodeled stunning two bedroom home, two bath, with a Pottery Barn pull out couch, this home is built for comfort and relaxation.

Walking distance to Capitola Village(1 mile) and pleasure point (.5). Just blocks to the beach, local breweries, restaurants, shopping and iconic surfing.

This home was designed for a peaceful getaway!

The space
Fully stocked kitchen, weber barbecue, washer and dryer, indoor/outdoor eating, Netflix and more!

Other things to note
This home is tucked into a quiet and peaceful neighborhood and is by no means a party house. Strict rules for noise between 10 PM and 8 AM. This house is designed to sleep no more than 6 people(possible acceptance for additional children/infants- just ask). Please respect our home and neighbors!
host_about: Welcome to my home! I grew up here with my Mom, who loved this house and Santa Cruz with all her heart. As a host, I hope you enjoy Santa Cruz, and Capitola in particular, and the many sites and activities this beautiful beach town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

name: Rio Del Mar Beach House, walk to the beach
description:
Experience an amazing California beach vacation at this beautiful house located in the quiet Rio Del Mar neighborhood of Aptos. The Rio Del Mar Beach House is just a two-minute walk from Rio Del Mar and Seacliff State Beaches featuring 20 miles of walkable sand in both directions (down to Monterey or north to Santa Cruz)!

The space
Designed to be both relaxing and stylish, this house celebrates small coastal details and beach house necessities like an outdoor shower, hot tub and fire pit.

Guest access
Guests will enjoy the entire house and backyard.
neighborhood_overview:
Rio Del Mar is a gorgeous beach and one of the few in the area that allows bonfires. At the end of the pier you can see the famous S.S. Palo Alto a/k/a "Cement Ship". Look one direction down the large stretch of beach and see Monterey in the distance. Look the other direction and you can see past Capitola to the East Side of Santa Cruz.

Fun activities in the area include wine tasting, hiking in Nisene Park, paddle boarding, biking, lounging on the beach, swimming, surfing, bonfire at the beach, walking along the sand and more!

description:
This charming retreat is two minutes away from an organic grocery store, a wine bar, and the popular restaurants of Aptos Village. Enjoy the sunny deck with peeks of the ocean, just a 10 minute drive from the beaches of Aptos.

The space
The house is perfectly situated on a large property in the hills just outside Aptos village, only 5 miles south of the city of Santa Cruz. This is a one bedroom, two bath house, with a separate sleeping area for additional guests in one of the two living rooms. The house is just 5 minutes away from miles of world class mountain biking and hiking trails in the State Park Forest of Nisene Marks. You are also located just one and a half miles form the beautiful sandy beaches of Santa Cruz county.

name: Steps to the beach! Charming, walkable bungalow w/ patio & 2 fireplaces!
description:
The space
With an unbeatable location mere steps from the best beach in Pleasure Point, this coastal bungalow will fill your next Santa Cruz getaway with sunshine, ease, and relaxation. This cottage provides the perfect escape for families, couples, and surfers in search of world-class breaks, offering an outdoor shower to rinse off the sand, a washer/dryer for your swimsuits, and a sun-splashed patio where you can barbecue and dine outback. Curl up each evening in the warmth of two gas fireplaces (in the living room and back bedroom), and choose a Netflix favorite to watch with your loved ones.

What's nearby:
This home sits less than two blocks from the golden sand and ocean waves of Moran Lake Beach, in a supremely walkable neighborhood of Pleasure Point close to surf shops, restaurants, breweries, and coffee houses. name: Santa Cruz Surf Inspired Stay Close to Beach
description:
Experience a slice of the Santa Cruz culture in the heart of Pleasure Point. Pointside contains lounges, dining areas, a game room, 10' projector screen and a beautiful outdoor oasis with a wood burning fire pit. It's your ultimate vacation space with rustic glam and stylish interiors that represent the surf culture. Chill or peddle your way on our beach cruisers, within seconds to many local restaurants, cafes, bar/tap rooms, retailers or along the cliffs of the Eastside.

The space
Pointside surrounding area was in the must see movie Chasing Mavericks featuring Gerard Butler telling the story Jay Moriarty and Frosty. We have an original surfboard hanging in the space that Jay surfed on huge Maverick days.

Pointside is very unique and very private. We have designed the space for both private and meeting/event space as a hip vacation spot that you will never forget. The space is remodeled with new amenities for you to enjoy.

Visit santacruz.
neighborhood_overview:
Pointside is immediately next to Verve Coffee, Betty Burger, New Bohemia Brewing, Family Cycling Center, Oneills Surf Shop, Zen Trading Co., Buell Surf, Zameen at the Point, Boardroom Skate, Eastcliff Cafe, Billabong Shop, Penny Ice Cream, Chill Out Cafe, Eastside Eatery, Rip Curl, Suda, Famous Pleasure Pizza, furniture stores, yoga studios, salons, crossfit,and much more.

Drive to everything else you may need very close by, movie theater, Whole Foods, CVS, BevMo, Big 5 Sporting, and much more.

name: Beach Cottage near Sunny Cove and Santa Mo's
description:
The beloved Cottage returns with a new host and listing! Our lovely, bright and welcoming two-bedroom, one-bath beach cottage is a close walk to Santa Maria Beach (Santa Mo’s) and Sunny Cove Beach. It has four comfortable beds and is spacious enough for up to six people, and is especially set up for couples and small families.

If you need something larger or have another group looking to stay nearby? Check out "Find Your Escape at "Enseñada Del Sol" Beach House", our place right next door.

The space
***Highlight of Coronavirus Precautions*** We consider everyone's health and safety of paramount importance as we all confront the unfortunate and isolating events resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic. We take the threat of exposure VERY seriously and we want our guests to stay healthy and safe. With this goal in mind our cleaning staff completes a full disinfecting process between guests and we keep the home empty for a minimum of one full day after a chec
neighborhood_overview:
The Beach Cottage Near Sunny Cove and Santa Mo's is in a fantastic and central location. The beautiful tide pools at Corcoran beach are steps away and a very short walk (less than two blocks) will take you to Sunny Cove or Santa Maria (or "Mo's", as locals know it), both great family beaches! Mo's is a great beach to take a quiet and invigorating long walk.

There is a Starbucks around the corner and there are a number of tasty restaurants within walking distance; and don't miss out on the fun local brewery nearby! On Sundays there is a charming little Farmer's Market, also a short walk away.

The Boardwalk, the Wharf, Capitola Village and historic downtown Santa Cruz are all just a quick 10 minute drive (or less then 20 minute bike ride). The Yacht Harbor and Twin Lakes Beach (with the Crow's Nest, Cafe el Palomar and Java Junction) are a three minute drive or a nice 15 minute walk away. The area is extremely bike and walking friendly, so why not enjoy the area w
host_about:
I live in Santa Cruz, California with my wonderful wife Katharina and our son Oliver. I am a professional Airbnb host and a teacher and Katharina is an amazing person and an incredibly talented creative director. Oliver is a bright, energetic and friendly fellow that loves the water, bike riding, exploring and solving the mysteries of the universe. We have one incredibly friendly and mellow cat (Dexter), six chickens and we enjoy spending time with friends--hiking, biking, great home-cooked meals, good wine and beer, and generally enjoying all that life has to offer.

We have a passion for travel--nothing is more exciting then finding yourself in a new and unfamiliar place with nothing to do but explore and interact with new people!

We are also extremely responsible people. We own our home and take great pride in having a place that is clean, comfortable and inviting. As guests in other people's homes, we feel the same responsibility and respect for their space.

name: Tentrr Signature Site - Sunrise Point
description:
Sunrise Point is a micro climate of the Santa Cruz Mountains with an elevation of 2,000 feet about sea level. Sometimes above the fog and clouds and some times in the thick of it! You will be surrounded by Bay(Myrtle), Black Oak, Madrone, Big Leaf Maple and Douglas Fir trees.

Sunrise Point is where Gia-Fu Feng and Jane English translated the LAO TSU, TAO TE CHING between 1968-72. An older contemporary of Confucius. The site is one of the originating points for the San Lorenzo river as a very slight trickle during the heavy rains. There is a private road and a few short trails to walk on with benches to sit and take in the beauty of the sights and sounds.

The space
Come, relax, unwind, and reconnect with Nature.

Other things to note
Be present to all the sights and sounds because that's where its at! Many different types of birds are always around if your still and quiet you'll see and hear may of them. You will hear a morning

host_about:
We make it dirt simple to unlock the outdoors.

Tentrr campsites are secluded on beautiful, private land so you can relax and recharge in peace. Our sites are equipped and ready for you - so go solo or bring the whole crew (including the dog) – this base camp is just the beginning of your adventure.  More than just a bed in the bush, Tentrr also curates outdoor Experiences and Extras to help you effortlessly plan your perfect trip.

Each campsite includes a large canvas tent on a raised platform, wood-fired stove, queen-sized bed, 5-person dome tent, 2 Adirondack chairs, camp table, camp benches, storage box, fire pit, campfire grill, trash can, 5-gallon water container, outdoor sun shower, and outdoor camp toilet.

name: The Nests at Camp Cruz. A Redwood Glamping Retreat
description:
Located a short drive from the bay area in the majestic redwoods, Camp Cruz is a "glamping" facility perfect for couples, families, or friends who want a camping-like get away without giving up basic living comforts. It offers guests a choice between 2 private bedrooms: the Raven’s Nest and the Owl’s Nest. There is a fully equipped covered outdoor kitchen, hot showers, and much more. Ideal for physical distancing, enjoy a private cathedral of redwoods to unwind and recharge in nature.

The space
Please read ALL the details in this listing before inquiring to book! This is an outdoor retreat facility offered to enjoy and connect with nature. Perfect for guests looking to unplug, WiFi is not available, but there is a Verizon cell signal.

The “Nests”:
Guests will choose between the Raven’s Nest (aircrete dome) and the Owl’s Nest (yurt) when booking at Camp Cruz. To be clear, we only accept one reservation at a time, so whether you’re just one cou
neighborhood_overview: Our listing is located on just over 4 acres in a redwood forest up a canyon. Our location has a park-like setting. Our guests will have private use of the camp area without any neighbors, other than us, in proximity.  Having said that, our closest neighbor is a Buddhist Retreat Center, which for the most part, is a quiet sanctuary.
host_about: We are a family of four. Ismael is a teacher who runs a local nonprofit outdoor education program for underserved youth. Molly is a labor and delivery nurse. We have two fun loving boys. Our home, where the glamping retreat is located, is a private campground in the redwood forest. It is a beautiful and serene forest setting with a running creek and lots of wildlife.

name: Sun Porch Suite w/Jacuzzi Tub, Porch, Garden Views
description:
Private, peaceful, and rural, yet close to everything - beaches, mountain biking, redwood forests, restaurants, golf courses and so much more! The Sun Porch Suite at Sand Rock Farm is a large, private bedroom with windows on three sides that look out onto gardens and trees. You will enjoy soaking in the large, 2-person Jacuzzi in the big bathroom, rocking on the porch, or meandering on the nature trail loop. You may see deer, fox, turkeys, banana slugs, and other interesting wildlife.

The space
A stay at Sand Rock Farm is like having your own private park (almost) all to yourself. This historic property was the site of Santa Cruz County's first winery and it is now a wedding venue and vacation rental. There are only five total rental suites. Owners and caretaker live onsite in separate units but will not be intrusive during your stay. The property is gated and sits on ten private acres without any visible neighbors or roads.
Up to two well-behaved dogs ar
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is rural with rolling hills, many old growth trees and plentiful wildlife.  The property itself is like a private park.  It has a gated entrance to ensure privacy and security.  Neighbors and roads are not visible from the property.
host_about: We are a family of three, happy to be living at beautiful Sand Rock Farm in Aptos with our chickens, dogs and cats.   Derek is a chef and also does all of the maintenance and projects at Sand Rock Farm.  Jen is an event planner/baker and is the general manager.  Kjell is a surfer, skateboarder and aspiring film-maker and musician.  Life is good at Sand Rock Farm!

description:
Historic Sand Rock Farm is a 10-acre property perfect for family groups or friends who want to share time together but ample space to retreat into privacy. The 5 bedrooms all have their own private bathroom and Jacuzzi tub (4 in-room and 1 outdoor). There are 3 bedrooms upstairs, sleeping a total of 8, and 2 bedrooms downstairs that can sleep 10. World-class beaches, surfing, wineries, epic bike trails, golf, whale watching, hiking, fishing, antiquing, sight-seeing and more are minutes away!

The space
You and your guests will enjoy an authentic, unique experience and people of all ages love exploring the historic farm house, history and grounds. Kids love to scooter on the long driveway or play games in the large lot that overlooks the house. Everyone enjoys gathering in the recently remodeled chef's kitchen, around the fire pit or in front of the wood burning fireplace to relax, cook, and enjoy conversation.

beach cottage just a few steps from the world famous Steamer Lane. Walk to the most beautiful beaches, boardwalk, quick bike ride to Downtown and UCSC.

name: Searenity in Rio Del Mar - Unit B
description:
This beautiful apartment is located on the 2nd floor of our Searenity triplex just steps away from Rio Del Mar State Beach, where you can enjoy long walks, beach fun, surf or just relaxing in a beach chair. We are close to many wonderful Restaurants, Coffee Shops, Golf Courses and State Parks which are just a few attractions you can experience during your stay. A perfect getaway spot for a couple, family and/or friends.

The space
This two bedroom spacious apartment is located on the second floor of our triplex. It will sleep/accommodate six people very comfortably, but can sleep up to eight with the sofa bed for two additional people. It offers a comfortable living room space which includes a queen size memory foam sofa bed, Love seat, accent chair, 48" flatscreen TV.

The kitchen includes a full size refrigerator, electric stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, keurig coffee machine and many kitchen amenities for cooking some yummy meals.

The
neighborhood_overview: As this unit is close to the beach, weekends can be very busy with traffic (people looking for parking) and many people out enjoying the surroundings. It's a little tourist beach town and during the summer can get a bit noisy during the day.

Walking distance to Twin Lakes Beach, restaurants and coffee shops and the Santa Cruz Yacht Harbor. kayaking and water sports at the beach and yacht harbor.
Once a month cleaning - $75 for more than 1 month stay.

Darling vintage home. peaceful spot close to the beach and Schwann lake. Large deck, hardwood floors.

Guest access
entire house and full back yard

name: Sunny Santa Cruz Bungalow
description:
Our new 650 square foot bungalow is light, bright and located in a unique neighborhood (tucked between a school and a tire shop—with a cool founder’s cemetery a block away) that is a 15 minute walk to the Santa Cruz harbor and Twin Lakes beach. The open floor plan and nearly 200 square foot covered porch are ideal for relaxing and enjoying the beautiful front yard (including a chicken coop). Your location is within a two mile bike ride of all of Santa Cruz and Capitola. It’s a great space!

The space
Enjoy your clean, spacious and private temporary beach home with close access to all of the best parts of Santa Cruz. You’ll love the high ceilings, open floor plan, modern amenities, private patio and your own laundry room. The large covered front porch faces a sunny and beautifully landscaped front yard--it's a great place to enjoy a meal or simply relax with a favorite beverage.

The location is central to the best parts of Santa Cruz and is less than tw
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is a unique mix of residential, industrial and somewhat unusual. Our house is tucked between a small school and a tire shop (that is open M-F during normal house and Saturdays until noon). We’ve lived here ten years and the tire shop is a great neighbor. There is also a really cool Santa Cruz founder’s cemetery a block away—it’s a great place to walk around and explore the history of the areas early settlers.
host_about:
I live in Santa Cruz, California with my wonderful wife Katharina and our son Oliver. I am a professional Airbnb host and a teacher and Katharina is an amazing person and an incredibly talented creative director. Oliver is a bright, energetic and friendly fellow that loves the water, bike riding, exploring and solving the mysteries of the universe. We have one incredibly friendly and mellow cat (Dexter), six chickens and we enjoy spending time with friends--hiking, biking, great home-cooked meals, good wine and beer, and generally enjoying all that life has to offer.

We have a passion for travel--nothing is more exciting then finding yourself in a new and unfamiliar place with nothing to do but explore and interact with new people!

We are also extremely responsible people. We own our home and take great pride in having a place that is clean, comfortable and inviting. As guests in other people's homes, we feel the same responsibility and respect for their space.

name: Santa Cruz Mountain Glamping in the Redwoods
description:
Glamour camping at it's best! Located in the Santa Cruz Mountains, our property is surrounded by huge redwood trees and manicured gardens. A tree deck was recently built into the redwoods and a new canvas tent erected with a floor futon to comfortably accommodate guests. An ideal spot for hikers, bikers and surfers looking to experience outdoor living with modern amenities at a reasonable price. Excellent spot for star gazing & bird watching. And if there’s a full moon, you’re in for a treat!

The space
This is an outdoor experience so if you dislike bugs and wildlife, this location is probably not for you. Visitors sleep on a full size futon (sleeps 2) with sheets, blanket and pillows. A small refrigerator, toaster oven, electric kettle, gas BBQ grill, large cooler, hammock and locking storage cabinet are also provided. There is also a gas fire pit for guests to enjoy.

Guests use a dedicated restroom facility that includes hot water, a heated bide
neighborhood_overview: The Glenwood area is located in Santa Cruz County and is registered as California Historical Landmark #449.  Majestic redwood trees and mountain streams surround this former ghost town.  Throughout the neighborhood, you may see wild turkeys, deer, foxes and other wild species so please drive slowly on the mountain roads. There are several horse farms in the neighborhood and the Glenwood area is renowned as a bicyclists haven with winding roads near a small creek.  Recent road work has added new bike lanes and the newly built Glenwood Preserve offers extensive hiking, biking and horse trails just 3 miles down the road...all free!
host_about: I'm a citizen of the USA and Barbados.  An interesting mix of a Barbadian father and Japanese mother.  My wife is also Japanese.  We have a teenage son who is the sunshine of our lives.  We lived in Tokyo for 8 years and returned to Santa Cruz, California where we currently reside. Barbados is our second home where we enjoy hosting visitors as well.

We provide off-street parking in a private parking area. This gorgeous apartment is adjacent to our Architectural firms offices. The Bombora apartment has its own private entrance. A very quiet location.
3 min walk to the famous Gayle's Bakery
4 min walk to the Capitola Village shops and restaurants
5 min walk and your toes are in the sand

The space
We provide some fun details like. A surfboard, beach chairs, beach towels, and a beach wagon to bring your gear down to the beach.
neighborhood_overview: We are right in the middle of everything that you may need.  Grocery stores are close, you will have a very good breakfast and lunch cafe right down the street (Avenue Cafe).  Our location is right where you want to be for a great vacation.  A short 10 min drive and you are hiking or mountain biking in the Forest of Nisene Marks.
host_about: This beautiful home is owned by two architects.  We love Capitola.  We work here, we play here, our families are part of the community here.  You will see us surfing, playing beach volleyball, fishing, and enjoying the outdoors.

description:
Oceanfront Beach House with views from every room!
Steps from the beach. Gorgeous sunsets on the spacious deck with views of Santa Cruz coastline.
Prime location, Rio-del-Mar beach, walking distance to coffee shop, restaurants, ice cream store and State Park.
Perfect for a Romantic get away or a family vacation!
Includes Outdoor shower, Cruiser bikes (2), Boogie boards (2), Kayaks (2), sand toys, Beach chairs (4), Beach towels (8), Wetsuits, various sizes (7), games, volleyball are included.

The space
*Private backyard, tranquil waterfall, dipping pool, propane BBQ, outdoor seating.
*Coffee Bar. Complimentary artisan local coffee & english tea.
*Fully equipped kitchen with Microwave, Toaster Oven, Full size Stove, Rice Cooker, Nutribullet & Juicer.
*Full size Refrigerator with filtered drinking water & ice maker.
*Full size dining table and wood burning fireplace.
*WiFi, Sonos speaker, Record player, board games
neighborhood_overview:
Prime location on Beach Drive. Miles and miles of sandy beach to walk on.
Easily access local hot spots including SS Palo Alto Cement ship, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Aptos Village, Capitola, West Cliff, Mystery Spot and more! Lots to do and see.
host_about:
We are Holly & Mike, fellow travelers who enjoy exploring new places! 
We love spending time with our family, walking on the beach, playing in the ocean, cooking & hiking.

State of the art 3D capable 55' flat screen TV with cable, Blue Ray, Netflix, and Hulu!

name: Santa Cruz Airy Modern Midcentury
description:
Our Airy Modern Midcentury home is located minutes from the beach and redwoods, behind the gates of Pasatiempo, a world class golf course. Ideal location for a serene family vacation in Santa Cruz, California! The forest in the back of the property ensures privacy and fresh air. The gated community ensure very low traffic. There is a golf cart for your personal use, to visit the three restaurants: Hollins House, MacKenzies, and Back Nine.

The space
The house offers a very flexible floor plan. All four bedrooms have their own private bathroom. Expansive decks and backyard offer outdoor quiet and privacy. One bedroom suite is in a sunny attic space; two bedroom suites are on the main level; a fourth bedroom suite is garden level and the space next to it is a personal home gym.

Guest access
You can access everything.

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview:
Our home is located in the hilltop neighborhood of Pasatiempo, Santa Cruz, just five minutes above downtown Santa Cruz. It offers spectacular views and privacy. You can walk to breakfast, lunch, and dinner at Hollins House, Back Nine, or McKenzie's Grill. The world class golf course, Pasatiempo, can be played by guests for a fee. The course architect was famed Alistair McKenzie. He designed more than 50 golf courses including three that remain top 10 golf courses in the world: Augusta National Golf Club, Cypress Point Club in Pebble Beach, and Royal Melbourne Golf Club in Australia. Pasatiempo was his favorite, and it is where he built his final home, two doors down the street.

There is also a seasonal pool for guests to use.

Two master suites with en-suit baths. One room offers a king bed with a queen size pull out and the other offers a queen bed. Each room has its own TV with cable. There is a third full bath off the hall, so you never need to share bathrooms. This end unit condo offers the largest de

name: The Coastal Cool Beach House in Santa Cruz
description:
This home is the perfect spot for a fun filled visit to Santa Cruz. It's conveniently located just 10 minutes walking distance, to the Main Beach and the Santa Cruz Boardwalk as well as downtown Santa Cruz. Look no further if you're wanting a comfortable place to relax that's located right in the heart of all Santa Cruz has to offer.

The space
The house has a shared wall & driveway with another house located on the same property. On-property parking is only available for 2 cars, one spot is in a one car garage & one in the driveway (driveway spot is identified in the checkin instructions).

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire house minus a couple locked closets for owner's belongings.

Other things to note
Located so close to many attractions, there is potential for noise (both street noise from cars, people as well as laughter and screams from fun being had at the Boardwalk).
neighborhood_overview: Located right next to a beautiful walking path leading to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk and only 10 minutes from Downtown, this location can't be beat!

name: Redwood Creek Retreat
description:
Located in Santa Cruz but not in town, you'll be able to go for a hike at Henry Cowel or one of the many trails nearby then kick back and rest in comfort. Nestled behind our house among the redwoods you will have a relaxing stay in this unit with views of a trickling creek below and the sounds of Great Horned owls in the evening. Very private location just off Glen Canyon Road and only minutes from downtown Santa Cruz.

The space
Once upon a time, this structure was a game room that we converted into 2 inlaw units. There is a deck with a sitting area just outside of the unit. Keyless entry and Alexa integrated controlled lighting make this unit super easy to access and use. Mesh WiFi on the property once you arrive to keep you connected as you unwind and relax. The kitchenette is complete with a mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, glassware, flatware, and utensils but does not have a cooking surface. You might not want to cook anyway when you have access to al
neighborhood_overview: We are tucked away and we like it like that as will you:) Redwood Drive (intersecting road across from our driveway entrance) is a popular area for people to park and walk up and back. We're in a valley so it's very quiet and other than the chirping of birds we have deer, raccoons, wild turkeys, possums, coyotes that visit frequently. Depending on the time of year we have the Monarchs... and sometimes Big Foot.
host_about:
Michael Jimenez and Karimar Santiago are both originally from Puerto Rico but have lived in california for a while. They have a little 6 pound MaltiPoo dog named Bonnie and she’s got them both wrapped around her little paw. While Karimar is the actual owner, Bonnie only has eye for her papa... they are inseparable.

Michael is an award winning experiential designer and Karimar is a dedicated PhD psychologist. Since March 2020 the live events industry shut down so Michael shifted gears and meticulously designed the two units that exist today. Microsoft, Oracle Salesforce, GE and Cisco are some of the clients that Michael has designed expositions for so this was a natural fit. Karimar also works from home so they are always available to answer any questions to make your stay as comfortable as possible. 

Surf season: October is when the waves start pumping. Santa Cruz is world renowned for it’s quality and abundance of surf spots. Our location allows for easy access to all of the spots that Michael takes advantage of. A life long surfer and waterman that has traveled the world to fill the stoke he is always available to chat about surfing. When he’s not working you’ll find him and Bonnie at the beach. If your interested in surfing lessons or Stand Up Paddling either can be arranged. If your coming specifically for surf or mountain biking we have ample secure storage and work areas if you need to make a repair.

description:
This beautiful, newly remolded apartment is on the 3rd floor of our triplex. It is just steps away from Rio Del Mar State Beach, where you can enjoy long walks, beach fun, surf or just relaxing in a beach chair. We are close to many wonderful Restaurants, Coffee Shops, Golf Courses and State Parks which are just a few attractions you can experience during your stay. A perfect getaway spot for a couple, family and/or friends.

The space
This two bedroom spacious apartment is located on the third floor of our triplex. It will sleep/accommodate six people very comfortably, but can sleep up to eight with the sofa bed for two additional people. It offers a comfortable living room space which includes a queen size memory foam sofa bed, Love seat, accent chair, 48" flatscreen TV.

The kitchen includes a full size refrigerator, electric stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, keurig coffee machine and many kitchen amenities for cooking some yummy meals.

name: Spectacular Santa Cruz Custom Beach House
description:
Beautiful custom beach house, steps away from surfing, swimming, and tidepooling. Non-stop ocean and lagoon views. Outdoor shower and hot tub. Upstairs deck and BBQ, two gas fireplaces, radiant heat throughout, soaring cedar ceilings, high-end beds with sheets and towels to match. Cedar-lined closets, gourmet kitchen, water filtration system, electric skylights, and extensive nature light. Wifi, basic cable, four flat screen TVs, and custom living room sound system. Manager on site.

The space
Watch the sunset from the deck, enjoying wine from the wine fridge. Pull together incredible meals in the kitchen that boasts every amenity, and serve them on a cherry dining room table. Walk to a dozen restaurants, take the bus downtown or to the Boardwalk, or just soak up the rays and the cool ocean breeze.
neighborhood_overview: The area from Twin Lakes at the harbor, to Pleasure Point in Capitola, is a haven for Santa Cruz residents.  There is almost no public parking, so your sparsely-crowded beach spot will be enjoyed primarily by locals, like yourselves.  Walk to the Sunday Farmers Market, or dozens of cafes and restaurants.  Or just pack a picnic, and spend your day on the sand.

name: Beach Condo (S220)
description:
Beautiful condo with updated furnishing and ocean views from the 2nd floor. This condo is ideal for a family of four with a queen and two twin beds. The beach is just a 3 minute walk from the front door; enjoy a long walk on the beach or a short walk to your bonfire. Bonfires are allowed until 10 pm. The sunsets are a must see on every evening of your stay. If you enjoy bird watching; Pajaro Dunes is a bird sanctuary. Just the sounds of the birds in the cypress trees will relax you during a walk around the near by lagoon. Come and enjoy all that Pajaro Dunes has to offer.

description:
3rd night FREE! 3rd night for the price of two active almost year round, excluding holidays. Located on the ground floor, Shorebirds 71 offers a rare ocean view. Enjoy a view and sounds of the ocean from the moment you walk up and while BBQ on your private patio. The access to the beach is a short walkway away include 3 steps to the sand, depending on tide. With a sleeper sofa, Shorebirds 71 is ideal for a couple or a family looking to simplify their ocean access while maximizing their ocean view.

description:
Shorebirds 55 has just finished remodeling the kitchen. This condo is a well laid out condo ideal for two couples, offering two king beds as well as two full bathrooms. With spacious common areas, and large couches in the living room over looking the breaking waves of the Monterey Bay, this condo is perfect for a weekend getaway or your next vacation. name: Seashell House, walk to Capitola Village and Beach
description:
Come enjoy this brand new, thoughtfully designed beach house that is both equipped with all the amenities you need (including a wine fridge!) and is also perfectly located within walking distance to everything this amazing area has to offer - great restaurants, grocery stores, the mall, and of course, the beach!!

The space
This is a 2 story house with a spacious living area downstairs and all bedrooms upstairs. The backyard area is also private and great for spending time with friends and family.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the whole house.

Other things to note
The house is located off a main road so there is potential for road noise.
neighborhood_overview:
This is arguably the best neighborhood in the Santa Cruz area! The house is located in the perfect spot, right by Whole Foods, delicious restaurants like East End Gastropub, and the Capitola Mall. Capitola Village and the beach are just a short, 10 minute walk which is amazing because parking by the beach & in Capitola Village can be tough. Capitola Village has shopping, restaurants, wine bars, ice cream parlors, and more!

41st street is also only a 10 minute walk which is another stretch of great restaurants, shopping, and awesome beach views where many locals surf.
host_about: WeHost is a small team that is laser focused on hosting guests at amazing vacation rentals! We believe that memorable vacations are centered around beautiful homes that are comfortable and stocked with all the amenities that make for an amazing stay.

name: Your own Personal Campground!
description:
Amazing Central coast location just a few exits south of Capitola and Santa Cruz.

The space
Great modern Trailer on beautiful 10 property in Aptos. It’s like having your own private campground with a sunny deck, camp chairs and propane firepit! Awesome outdoor shower too!

Guest access
Guests have great privacy and can wander around the upper part of property including the nature trail.

Other things to note
Queen bed in rear of trailer as well as a U shaped dining area with table. Guests need to bring sleeping bags. Pillows and extra Blankets are provided.

Pets are allowed but only with prearranged permission and require a $15 fee.

name: Re-live childhood summer camp memories!
description:
Did you love summer camp as a child? You will love this unique 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom house which sits at the heart of a traditional camp. Enjoy the peace and quiet of the redwood forest from our spacious deck. Bring your tennis racket, volleyball, or basketball and challenge your friends to a game, or explore our large property and reminisce about past summer camp fun! Enjoy miles of hiking trails and the great outdoors.

The space
You will feel as though you are in the middle of nowhere on a private estate, although it is an easy drive to Capitola (10 mins) and Santa Cruz (20 mins). Food and beverages, including alcohol, must remain inside the Village Inn due to wildlife and respect for other tenants. It is a moderate walk along a paved walkway from the parking lot to the Village Inn, please note that no vehicles are permitted to drive into camp. The Village Inn is limited to 6 guests due to the size of the kitchen/dining area. It is equipped with a microwave, t
neighborhood_overview: Peace and nature abound! Village Inn sits at the center of a children's summer camp which will not be in operation, and so is a unique and quiet retreat. The Village is home to wild turkeys, deer, and other wildlife, and redwood trees tower overhead. Locally, you will pass a winery that offers wine tasting, and the little town of Soquel has a couple of breakfast, lunch, and dinner spots. Within 15 minutes, you can access Wholefoods, major supermarkets, banks, and the popular Capitola Village.  Local beaches and surf spots are  also an easy drive.
