description:
This beautiful, ocean view unit is located in the amenity-rich Seascape Resort in Aptos, CA. Walk on the gorgeous beach, this vacation rental is perfect for a romantic getaway or a week away from it all with the family. There are 3 pools, hot tubs, Sanderling's restaurant on-site as well as restaurants and shops across the street. The beach spans for miles. Walk the grounds or enjoy the pools, beach and restaurant!

The space
There are no daily housekeeping services. The property is cleaned before arrival and after departure. We provide hand soap, dish soap, dish towels, hand towels, bath towels, wash cloths, paper towels and toilet paper. No daily personal soaps/shampoos are provided.

Concierge services, front desk services, towel service, access to the shuttle, fitness facility, bonfires and bike rentals are not available to private renters. Pools and hot tub are accessible and pool towels are provided to guests in the unit.

Free Ameniti
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of Santa Cruz off Highway 1, Seascape Beach Resort gorgeous accommodations overlooking the Monterey Bay.

You'll find the comforts of home; each accommodation has a kitchen and gas-burning fireplace with a beach home feeling, which is why Seascape is unlike any other Monterey Bay resort.

With 17 miles of Monterey Bay beach to explore, spacious all-suites accommodations, delicious fine dining, and a full range of activities to choose from, Seascape is the premier Santa Cruz luxury resort. Seascape provides everything to make your Santa Cruz lodging experience memorable, including a host of resort options and both free and paid amenities. It all adds up to being one of the best Monterey Bay resort destinations you'll experience.

name: Redwood Retro Surf Retreat
description:
Located in Santa Cruz but not in town, you'll be able to surf all of the world-class point breaks like Steamer Lane and Pleasure Point then kick back and rest in comfort. Nestled behind our house among the redwoods you will have a relaxing stay in this unit with views of a trickling creek below and the sounds of Great Horned owls in the evening. Very private location just off Glen Canyon Road and only minutes from downtown Santa Cruz.

The space
Once upon a time, this structure was a game room that we converted into 2 in-law units. There is a deck with a sitting area just outside of the unit. Keyless entry and Alexa integrated controlled lighting make this unit super easy to access and use. Mesh WiFi on the property once you arrive to keep you connected as you unwind and relax. The kitchenette is complete with a mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, glassware, flatware, and utensils but does not have a cooking surface. You might not want to cook anyway when you
neighborhood_overview: We are tucked away and we like it like that as will you:) Redwood Drive (intersecting road across from our driveway entrance) is a popular area for people to park and walk up and back. We're in a valley so it's very quiet and other than the chirping of birds we have deer, raccoons, wild turkeys, possums, coyotes that visit frequently. Depending on the time of year we have the Monarchs... and sometimes Big Foot.
host_about:
Michael Jimenez and Karimar Santiago are both originally from Puerto Rico but have lived in california for a while. They have a little 6 pound MaltiPoo dog named Bonnie and she’s got them both wrapped around her little paw. While Karimar is the actual owner, Bonnie only has eye for her papa... they are inseparable.

Michael is an award winning experiential designer and Karimar is a dedicated PhD psychologist. Since March 2020 the live events industry shut down so Michael shifted gears and meticulously designed the two units that exist today. Microsoft, Oracle Salesforce, GE and Cisco are some of the clients that Michael has designed expositions for so this was a natural fit. Karimar also works from home so they are always available to answer any questions to make your stay as comfortable as possible. 

Surf season: October is when the waves start pumping. Santa Cruz is world renowned for it’s quality and abundance of surf spots. Our location allows for easy access to all of the spots that Michael takes advantage of. A life long surfer and waterman that has traveled the world to fill the stoke he is always available to chat about surfing. When he’s not working you’ll find him and Bonnie at the beach. If your interested in surfing lessons or Stand Up Paddling either can be arranged. If your coming specifically for surf or mountain biking we have ample secure storage and work areas if you need to make a repair.

For work:
+ Ultra-fast WiFi
+ Desks in private rooms

For play:

+ 2min to river beaches @ Highlands park

+ 20min to world-famous Santa Cruz beach boardwalk

The space
Our home was originally built in 1902 and is one of the oldest continuously standing homes in the San Lorenzo Valley. Carefully restored and updated, the home has both modern amenities and historic charm.

Other things to note
The house sits on a gently sloping 1.5 acres, fully fenced and gated. Guests will be provided with a secure gate code to enter the property.

name: The Tuscan Country Cottage
description:
Find all of the peace of the Italian countryside in this charming, one of a kind artist’s studio complete with a kitchenette, queen bed and private bathroom and shower.

Set in a rural suburban neighbourhood, the cottage takes inspiration from the host's travels to Italy with antique pieces and unique design elements incorporated throughout to cultivate the feeling of being in the Tuscan countryside.

The space
The entrance to the cottage is adorned with an arbor of climbing grape vines that frame an outdoor dining space and antique farm table, available for guests to use at any time of the year.

The doors to the cottage open onto a sun-soaked deck and picturesque orchard with an acre of fruit trees. A bright deck chair and iron cafe table make for the perfect spot to wake up to the sun rise and hear morning birdsong, or relax with a book and glass of wine in the late afternoon light.

name: The Nisine Marks Forest Room @ 420 Hacienda
description:
The beautiful Nisene Marks Forest Room is in the downstairs wing of the Hacienda property. The room's rich, elegantly carved dark wood furnishings complement the incredible view of the forest canopy outside. The sun peeks out behind centuries-old Redwood trees each morning, greeting the day with a fresh dew and spirit of calm.

The space
There's a beautiful hand-painted bathroom immediately next door, and convenient, access to laundry, kitchen, Himalayan Room, and large outdoor patio WITH FIREPLACE where you can sit and watch breath-taking sunsets every night.

WIFI, Cable TV, Mini Frig in Unit


Our backyard and patio are great places for a fire and smores. We offer a smores kit for $20. We always have extra blankets outside for your comfort by the fire. Or join us at our famous 4:20pm happy hour upstairs at our balcony that overlooks the ocean. (Please ask us about the details of our 4:20pm Happy Hour)

name: Alcove of En-LIGHT-enment @ The 420 Hacienda
description:
The Alcove of Enlightenment is a room with an immersive lighted experience and psychadelic artwork unlike any other. Nestled in between our meditation lounge and the Redwood room, this unit allows you to experience visual stimulation through the use of lighting sources and techniques.

This room has a lovely well-lit king-sized bed and a shared 2 sink bath/shower bathroom just outside your door. You will have your own combination door lock. WIFI, TV Small Frig, Smart Speaker in room.

The space
Multiple light sources are used to create different perceptions of the same space thru the use of light. The lighted headboard offers different effects- while a fairy lght, blacklight, salt rock light and lava lamps unearth separate beauties in the artwork and decorations.

name: Recently remodeled home, situated in Capitola Village on Riverside Drive.
description:
Recently remodeled home, situated in Capitola Village, Just steps away from the beach and esplanade.

The space
This open-floorplan features stellar workmanship, from porcelain tile floors in a weathered-wood-style finish, to millwork and finishes with custom white wainscoting, baseboards, and top-notch casing at doors & windows, plus high quality cabinetry & built-ins. The kitchen includes stainless steel counters, Big Chill appliances, artful lighting & a pantry convenient to both the kitchen and the garden/patio/bbq area. There are two off-street parking spots in paved space next to the house.

There are no pets allowed at this property.

name: 5min Walk to Beach, Spanish Charm 3br 3ba
description:
This is a beautiful 2 story, 1900sq ft home about a 7 minute walk to the beach. 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 3 walk-in closets, 2 living areas, dining area, new kitchen, great sized backyard and a large sun-drenched porch. This is an incredible opportunity for a family to spend some quality time right by the beach, close to all the beautiful outdoor amenities that Santa Cruz has to offer. We are close to the forrest and great restaurants too.

The space
This house is as cute as a button with Spanish charm close to the beach and forrest. Each bedroom has its own bathroom and door to outside. There are two living areas and a private sun drenched deck. The home just got a brand new kitchen, new herringbone floors and new paint. You can walk to the stairs that go down to the beach in about 7 minutes, and Nisene Marks state park is just a 5 minute drive away. name: Sunny & serene, two-story, oceanfront condo w/ a shared, heated pool & free WiFi
description:
The space
Kick back and enjoy the ocean view from one of two furnished balconies at this sunny and serene, beachfront getaway in the Seascape Resort. Bright and very welcoming, this gorgeous condo features an impressive, open kitchen with Costa Esmeralda granite slab countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. Dine together at the table for six and the adjacent pub-height table for two. And then settle into the comfortable central living area with a Netflix-equipped flatscreen TV, an enormous sectional sofa, a gas fireplace, and balcony access. Additionally, there is a comfy TV room at the front of the condo—perfect for the kids or for sneaking off to read a book or grab a quick afternoon nap. Guests will also enjoy access to the shared on-site heated pool.

What's nearby:
Find yourself right in the heart of the beach action with Sumner Beach to the north and Seascape Park Beach to the south. Walk over to Seascape Village
host_about:
"Greetings from Team Vacasa! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)

We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 

Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway."

name: 420 Hacienda
description:
The 420 Hacienda offers an entire 420 experience. You can learn about and experience cannabis from educated, licensed cannabis workers. Our property is themed, but is a premier property as well. A mile from the beach, and only 20 feet to the backyard redwoods. Each room is individually themed, and offer unique sensory stimulation.
The Bob Marley Beach Bungalow is a seperate rental, but both can be rented for a total of 12 guests total for entire house-minus host bedroom- and the Bungalow.

The space
The 420 Hacienda is a large, two level hacienda with upper and lower level patios front and back. Custom tile work along with hand painted sinks offer a unique experinece. A large, 9ft deep-end heated swimming pool adjoins a bungalow and large new hot tub with bluetooth music link and there is a code activated front gate with exit opening.
host_about: Family man, traveling executive, outgoing music lover

name: Glass Castle(Glasstle) ocean views on mountaintop
description:
Affectionately named "The Glasstle" this house perches on top of a ridge in the Santa Cruz mountains. Sliding glass walls allow for ocean views towards Monterey and La Selva. 3Bed/2Bath comfortably sleeps 6 +2 more on a sofa-bed. Amenities include: Claw-foot bathtub, steam shower, radiant heating, library, huge digital media library with a projector, 36 acres of land with hiking/biking trails. The property is near the top of Nisene Marks state park and Soquel Demo Mountain Biking forest.

The space
The house is framed with aluminum and is mostly glass on the walls, allowing you to feel you are outside all the time. At night you can either see the lights of the city below or the milky way above. It is also close to Mt Madonna county park and Uvas Canyon park. High Speed internet on property.

name: Magical & Romantic Beachfront Home at Pajaro Dunes
description:
Beautiful oceanfront condominium with an unobstructed view to Monterey Bay & the Pacific Ocean; just 20 minutes south of Santa Cruz & 30 minutes north of Monterey/Carmel. Newly remodeled with granite counters, new kitchen appliances, paint, furniture, tile and carpeted floors. Electric fireplace adds to the magical ambience this home embraces. High ceilings, just steps to the beach. Convenient parking. 2 bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms, 1200 sf. A great place to kick off your shoes and relax.

The space
Feel the romance the moment you walk in the door. Electric fireplace takes the chill off the winter days and makes for a great place to read or write. Need a break from work? You will find it here.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home with the exception of the Owner's Closet.

Other things to note
Check in is 4 pm, check out is 11 am

Please do not ask for an early check-in or late chec
neighborhood_overview: Tranquility reigns here.  Peacefully quiet with the Monterey Bay/Pacific Ocean almost at your doorstep.  When you enter into this private community, you will leave the rest of the world behind.  There are walking trails, a lagoon, nature center, tennis and pickle ball courts (pickle ball equipment is provided for this fun sport), and  a resort store which has quality gear, including unique kites that you can fly on the beach. And, the sunsets are truly amazing!
host_about: also known as Jo, or Jo Piazza Chisholm.  To verify my identity, you are welcome to go to my LinkedIn page for an outline of who I am.  In short, I have been a Real Estate Broker in Silicon Valley for over 40 years, and a vacation rental specialist in Kauai, Hawaii for 45 years.  I am very experienced in the vacation rental business and it's probably why I have "house rules" I need my guests to agree to.  I love my properties and take good care of them and my guests.  I am always available and try to go the extra mile to make your stay a memorable one.

name: Sunny, cozy, and peaceful Seabright home!
description:
Welcome to our sunny home in the adorable Seabright neighborhood! The unit is a short stroll from multiple beachs, Santa Cruz Boardwalk (currently limited operation), harbor, fine dining, breweries, downtown, and a great city park. Despite being close to all Santa Cruz has to offer, the unit is tucked away next to a green belt providing serenity and security for your family.

The space
The unit features 2 bedrooms, one with a comfy queen and the other with a two-twin trundle that can be converted to a king. There is a third trundle bed that is also available for a fifth person. The twin room is kid-friendly with a variety of toys and books to occupy your little-ones. The unit has an open, sunny feel with plenty of seating and space to relax between beach adventures. You'll have access to ATT fiber broadband Wifi, a TV, and blue ray player ready to sign in to Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, drip coffee maker, microwave, toaster,
neighborhood_overview: Seabright is the gem of Santa Cruz neighborhoods. It is on the eastern side of the river and retains local charm and a slow-paced vibe that the more touristy neighborhoods lack. Our place is on the western edge of Seabright making access to downtown and the Boardwalk a breeze.  Our street is very laid back with hardly any traffic. Ocean View Park is right around the corner with a playground and  large grassy area.
host_about: I live and work in Santa Cruz and love living by the beach!

name: Manzanita Treehouse - Coastal Mountain Art & Abode
description:
The Manzanita Treehouse offers a clean, quiet and peaceful place to call home. Nestled in the Santa Cruz mountains in a private community just 15 minutes from the beach and moments away from California's beloved redwood forests. This space was created for those looking to connect with nature and the local community. Beautiful wooden stairs lead to our shared deck space, home vineyard and hot tub. Artsy bedrooms, kitchenette and bathroom with tub allow you to enjoy the inside as much as out.

The space
We recently bought this house with the intention of creating a space for friends and family to gather safely and peacefully. We want to extend this invitation for travelers that are looking to escape the city, enjoy some local coffee and a digital nomad lifestyle or grab a surfboard and jump in the ocean.

The large deck and Redwood Tree canopy create the feeling of far off mountain retreat, with squirrels climbing the trees and a our local flock (aka r
neighborhood_overview: Mt Hermon is a private community that originated as a Christian community in the early 1900's. There are around 400 households, a large conference center, a youth camp, an adventure ropes course and hiking trails. It is a family neighborhood so be mindful of speed when driving and being loud after hours. Parking is limited to one spot per booking. Nearby parking available.
host_about: Hello my name is Max. I am a globetrotting, food chopping, story swapping, mountain climbing and outdoor dining guy. I owned small businesses my whole life and enjoy working with new businesses to find creative ways to connect. My partner and I just bought our first home in Santa Cruz mountains with the intention of creating a space for peace and opportunities. We love to share this space with friends and family in a safe and healthy way.

Full use of main bathroom with jacuzzi tub, living room with big screen TV & DVD player on request.

Patio garden with gazebo.

name: Beautiful Beachhouse steps to the Beach and Wharf!
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom condo one block from the beach. 1500 sq ft, with all new modern furnishing, new high end linens and mattresses. 2 queen beds plus 1 bunk bed (full bottom/twin top). Sleeps 6-7 people. Patio with beautiful views. Steps to the main beach, to Cowell beach for amazing surfing, the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, and the Santa Cruz Wharf. You can walk to downtown Santa Cruz in 10 minutes. It is a quiet and comfortable oasis in a location that you can walk anywhere you need to go!

The space
Very relaxing and beautifully furnished. Views are extraordinary! Surfing, Paddle-boarding, and kayaking one block away. A great getaway for a family for a longer stay.

Other things to note
Free Parking pass included
neighborhood_overview: Steps from the Santa Cruz Boardwalk, and Cowell Beach for incredible surfing.  Paddle-boarding, kayaking and rentals available on the wharf.   Just a 10 minute walk to downtown.

name: Beach Hill Rest & Relax-3 King Size Bedrooms!
description:
Relax in the Golden Corridor of Beach Hill, Santa Cruz! Beach Hill is just above the Boardwalk, 3 blocks down to the beach and a short walk to downtown! Enjoy the quiet neighborhood before strolling down to the Boardwalk and West Cliff for fun beach activities, surfing, amusement park rides, and people-watching! Great trails for walking & running & biking close by! Head to downtown for great restaurants and night life or eat at the Wharf. It's all close and convenient!

The space
This home has been recently renovated. The bedrooms are spacious and stay cool in the summertime. The kitchen and living area have great lighting with a fireplace and a tv with Hulu and Netflix and Amazon. The tv in the living room is set up with an Apple tv. There is also a comfortable patio right off the kitchen where you can bbq and keep warm next to the fire pit. There is also a downstairs patio with 4 Adirondack chairs and a teak table that can be accessed through the sliding gl
neighborhood_overview: The house sits on top of Beach Hill! You are blocks from the hustle and bustle of downtown on one side and the beach on the other.  It's a great central location! There is a walking path to downtown, and another walking path along West Cliff Drive.
host_about:
I am an active person who loves to run and ride bikes and be outside.  I love to see the world and meet and know people from different countries and backgrounds.  My goal is to see the world on my bike...
I have been an airbnb guest a few times and have enjoyed the experience.  I hope to be a super hostess and will need your feedback to be the best!

name: In the heart of the Redwoods/10 min from the beach
description:
Spend the holidays in this charm & modern cottage. Located on a large, sunny, quite 3/4 acre lot. It boast many areas of outdoor space. It has very comfortable beds and is spacious enough for up to six people. The master bedroom is large and open with french doors to access to the deck where you'll rest in the hammock and watch wild animals passing by. Great commute location, 5 minutes to town, Henry Cowell State Park, Felton Park, Roaring camp, and only 10 minutes from the Santa Cruz beach.

The space
The whole house and outside areas
neighborhood_overview: Henry Cowell Redwoods park. Santa Cruz beach’s. Mount Hermon park.  Roaring Camp. Many trails.

You are within walking distance to all Seabright restaurants and cafes, and a ten minute walk along the bike path to the wharf and downtown.

The space
There is a small patio area in the back for you to enjoy as well.

name: Beach Vacation Getaway
description:
Beautiful private getaway minutes to the beach. Great location to access either Monterey or Santa Cruz, quiet and private. View of the ocean out the window and from the yard. Plenty of space for kids and well behaved dogs. Microwave, mini-fridge and coffee pot included. *We are a lively family with 3 teens. This location may not be suitable for people with young children or babies requiring absolute quiet for naps or early bedtimes.

The space
Comfortable and quiet. Perfect for the family getaway or executive wanting a break from city life.

Guest access
We have a lovely patio for you to sit and enjoy our outdoor seating.

Other things to note
This is a great location for bicyclists and surfers!
neighborhood_overview: Close to the beach and nature walks. Convenient to local restaurants and small grocery.
host_location: Manderson-White Horse Creek, South Dakota, United States
host_about:
Founder/Director of Earth Tipi who's mission is "Connecting resources and people to create sustainable housing and grow food on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation".

Our rental business is a family affair. When I am out of town my father in law Gerald and brother in law Luke welcome guests in my place. The land belongs to Gerald and the structures belong to me. 

A portion of the price of your reservation is used to support programs for girls on the reservation during the summer. For the past 3 years, this has been a summer camp for girls offered in July.
neighbourhood: La Selva Beach, California, United States

name: Cozy, sunny cottage in the redwoods near HWY 17!
description:
Come enjoy our cozy, private, super clean cottage in the redwoods! Our sunny one-bedroom, one-bath cottage in Los Gatos Mountains, Santa Cruz County is 3 minutes to HWY 17, 10 minutes to downtown Los Gatos, 25 minutes to world-famous Santa Cruz beaches, 10 minutes to Santa Cruz Mountain wineries and great mountain biking trails! It is spacious enough for up to 5 people, and is especially set up for couples and small families. Well-behaved dogs are welcome--big yard is fully fenced in!

The space
Large fenced-in yard—perfect for dogs! Also includes a beautiful wood deck with a sitting area facing the woods and rows of lavender and roses.

Guest access
All areas on an acre of mostly sunny land accessible, except the main house, pool, pool cabana and fire pit. Pool is not fenced once you enter the property, so please do not let any kids roam in that direction. By staying at the cottage, you agree that you are 100% responsible for the safet
neighborhood_overview: Wineries, hiking and mountain biking trails.  City of Los Gatos is a ten minute drive away.  Santa Cruz is a 25 minute drive on southbound Highway 17.

name: Beautiful Mid-Town Bungalow in Santa Cruz
description:
Lovely restored 1930 bungalow located in the sunbelt of Santa Cruz. An ideal location for exploring Santa Cruz. Walk to downtown, Whole foods and Shoppers Corner within close walking distance. The house has a completely private back yard with fruit trees and gardens. The house has lots of old world charm and will be an ideal cozy home away from home.

The space
This house is a very sweet 1930s bungalow with lots of charm and character. Cozy space.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire home except the back bedroom. There is a active pottery studio in the backyard. I may be there working a few hours a day during the workweek.

Other things to note
Cori has a pottery studio in the back yard. She may be working in there for a couple hours during the day.
neighborhood_overview: This is a sweet and safe neighborhood.
host_about: Rick and I have been together for many years. We are just beginning a life as empty nesters. We work hard to be able to play hard as much as we can mountain biking, dirt biking, skiing, hiking in the Sierras and travelling to other beautiful beachy towns. Life is good.

name: Brand New Luxury Home - Steps from Capitola Beach!
description:
Brand new luxury home in the heart of Capitola Village, just a 2 minute walk to Capitola beach and downtown, home to some of the most charming restaurants, bars and shops!

This features high-end appliances and designer touches throughout. Best of all, this house comes with a 3 car garage!! All rooms comes with a desk and chair, and strong Wifi!

Come relax with your friends and family in this stunning modern beach house just steps away from the beach!

Ask me about longer term rentals rates

The space
** High-end appliances and luxurious finishes throughout: soaring ceilings, radiant heat (warm floors), electric car charger, and designer furnishings.

** Attached 3-Car Garage, with electric car charger

** Fully Stocked Kitchen - with pots, pans, plates, bowls, glassware, utensils, coffee maker.

** Washer & Dryer (in-unit)

** Cable TV, Netflix, Disney+, Amazon Prime TV, Spotify
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location!!! This home is located right in the heart of Capitola Village and steps to the beach! Downtown Capitola is home to some of the most charming restaurants, shops, tap houses and wine bars!  Even though you are only steps away from all the action, this house is tucked away in a quiet and safe street that has gorgeous views of Depot Hill and The Trestle. Wake up every morning to stroll down Capitola's charming Riverview Ave. (right across the street), walk down to Capitola Beach and onto the Wharf. Pleasure Point is also only a few minutes walk away! This is truly a beach lover's dream getaway.

Because of its location, you can easily access the stunning trails of the Santa Cruz Mountains, play some golf at nearby world-class facilities or maybe partake in wine tastings from over 41 local wineries! Discover what makes Santa Cruz so special, today!

name: Blue Agave Guest House in the Mountains
description:
Our 'Blue Agave House' is a renovated 1950s Vagabond trailer, situated on a perch in the Santa Cruz Mountains--with modern comforts, a clean relaxed style, and a beautiful view. Enjoy an espresso as the sun rises over the forest or a campfire under the starry night sky. Nearby are several wineries, outdoor activities and areas to explore. About halfway between Santa Cruz beaches and Silicon Valley and about an hour from San Francisco, it's close to the action, but feels like a peaceful retreat.

The space
Vagabond trailers offered sleek mobile living in the 1950s, and this one (a 30-footer from 1952) provided a lot of space and all the comforts of home. The main seating area is perfect for 2-4 people to chat and socialize, with a couch that can fold down into a bed. The fully stocked kitchen includes a table for working or eating, a very functional cooking space with large sink and appliances (refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, double hot plate, and a Nespress
neighborhood_overview: The Santa Cruz Mountains are magical, beautiful, serene and welcoming. If you like forest hiking, biking, bird watching, picnicking, wine tasting, or simply being quiet in nature, our immediate neighborhood provides a perfect retreat, and there are lots of options close by. A couple miles down the road, the Summit Store known for excellent deli offerings, coffee drinks or any grocery needs. Local wineries provide gathering spots for locals and tourists. More civilization and a wide array of activities can be found on the coast (Santa Cruz/Monterey Bay), the Valley (Los Gatos, San Jose), or in neighboring mountain towns (Felton, Scotts Valley).
host_about: Our family lives in the Santa Cruz Mountains, where we have a vintage trailer that we enjoy and sometimes rent it out for others to enjoy. My husband and I love to create spaces that make people feel comfortable, happy and inspired. I also make jewelry ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) My husband works at Stanford and co-founded a Santa Cruz brewery ( (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Beach, Bocce & Burrata
description:
Beach, Bocce & Burrata
Enjoy this 1000 square foot duet which has been completely renovated with Como bleached hardwood flooring (after the Italian lake), a gourmet kitchen and 2 ½ baths. Downstairs there is a great room which includes a beautiful 36” Hallman red imported Italian Range, large porcelain slab island with handmade red Mexican pendants, sleek cement wood cast counters and living area complete with a new smart 48 inch TV.
Take a walk on the beach which is only a 7 minute walk.

The space
Upstairs, there are two cozy bedrooms with queen beds, Comcast voice remote televisions with private bathrooms with hand cut sea blue tile and sea creature accents, another shower in the master bedroom with white tile and rock stone shower floor. Both showers have outstanding rain showerheads and handheld high-quality faucets. Each bed is dressed with imported Italian bedding. One bedroom looks out on the Seascape Sports Club and tennis courts and the other o
neighborhood_overview:
At the Seascape Resort enjoy Sanderlings Restaurant or have a beer or Pulp Friction margarita in their bar or on their patio overlooking the azure blue Pacific.

Just across the street from our front door is Seascape Village. The Village features Palapas, a regional favorite Mexican restaurant, Hong Kong Restaurant, Village Host Pizza Parlor and South Point Taproom and Coffee Bar. In addition, local family-owned Seascape Market offers everything you need. We are minutes from many acclaimed wineries and vineyards located in Aptos and Corralitos, the Napa Valley of Santa Cruz. We enjoy Lester, Alfaro and Storrs winery. They treat you like family.
host_about: I am from San Jose. In my free time I like to spend time at our townhouse in Seascape, play golf and tennis, and read good books.

name: Beachfront at Twin Lakes Beach
description:
Romantic Retreat, Beachfront Cottage, Stellar Location.  The Beach is your backyard, Walk to the Santa Cruz Yacht Harbor, the Crow's Nest Restaurant and more.  

Lyn's Beach Cottage is filled with charm matched only by its incredible location!  This beachfront cottage is a private oasis, perfect for a retreat for a couple, or couple with up to two smaller children. Enjoy all the activity and excitement of the beach and at night, let the sounds of the ocean lull you to sleep.
 

The Cottage is located in a quiet neighborhood and situated on Twin Lakes State Beach. Easy access to one of the loveliest beaches in the county is just steps away, where walks along the shoreline and sand castles await. You may not want to leave, but it's also just a short walk or bike ride to the Santa Cruz Yacht Harbor, Capitola Village, and the Boardwalk for a day of fun.  

Equipped to meet all your needs away from home, the cozy cottage features a queen bed in the bedroom

name: Capitola Classic yet Modern Bungalow
description:
A classic yet modern Capitola bungalow ideally located in the safe and quiet Upper Village neighborhood--quiet enough to still hear ocean waves on a good night. The location offers walking distance to the Capitola Beach, as well as all the activities and nightlife that The Capitola Village has to offer; yet it is far enough away to take advantage of the local life, artesian shops/restaurants, nearby amenities, and serenity of this scenic and historic coastal area.

The space
The bungalow itself is super comfortable and casually stylish. It has been fully renovated with the conveniences of a modern home and has its own off-street parking stall. It has an inviting yet secluded front courtyard and porch with a relaxing atmosphere; and a secure beautifully landscaped private and quiet backyard complete with outdoor dining area, firepit and lounge seating, outdoor shower, propane BBQ equipment, and a cedar soaking hot tub. All undeniably perfect for a relaxing stay
neighborhood_overview: The bungalow is located in a great quiet neighborhood with long term residents.  Most neighbors are extremely friendly and respectful and request the same of our guests.  Great location within walking distance of the local markets, great restaurants, shops, and amenities.

The space
Hidden away in the Santa Cruz mountains an hour away from the Bay Area and just thirty minutes to Santa Cruz. This is my primary home but I travel often for work. My loss is your gain as it is too beautiful not to share this little slice of mountain paradise.

There are two master bedrooms each with its own full bathroom, as well as a half bath downstairs. Each room has a queen bed and there is also a queen and a twin sized air mattress and extra bedding. There is an empty dresser and closet space available in both bedrooms, and a washer and dryer. There are bathroom essentials such as towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hair dryers in both bathrooms.

The

Featuring a family area, three large bedrooms, two bathrooms, a well appointed kitchen and an outdoor deck for relaxing. With close & full access to tennis, basketball & sand volleyball courts and beautiful walking paths, this is the perfect escape with family and friends. Enjoy sunsets and sightings of dolphins and sea otters with miles of secluded beach.

The space
It is really important to us that each space in our condo feels welcoming to our guests. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes and appliances to meet all of your cooking needs. There is a washer and dryer available. The master bedroom is a favorite and has the very best views of the dunes. It is the only room that has heated floors which is wonderful on colder nights. All the other bedrooms and living room have their own heater and thermostat. Each bedroom has a TV w
neighborhood_overview:
Pajaro Dunes is a truly special place.
It is located in Watsonville CA. Watsonville is perfectly located between Monterey/Carmel and Santa Cruz. You are approximately 20-40 minutes to all that Monterey/Carmel & Santa Cruz has to offer... The Wharf, Aquarium, Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Beautiful Carmel, Big Sur, endless hiking trails and the list goes on. Watsonville food, grocery & shopping options are about a 10 minute drive away. Some of those options are Target, Ross, Nob-Hill, CVS, Mcdonald's, El Pollo Loco, Thai, Sushi, Cilantros and many more. Just 5 minutes down the road from Pajaro is a new Starbucks and across from it is a gas station & more restaurants & hotel are coming soon. DoorDash and Nob Hill deliver to our condo & has been a convenient option during the Covid-19 pandemic.
host_about: A little about me.. My husband & I recently purchased this condo in Pajaro Dunes. It has been a dream of ours for years. We both grew up going to Pajaro & loved every moment. We knew we wanted our 4 children to make memories there too. Our condo has been a much needed retreat for us & we are looking forward to sharing it with others through Airbnb. Thank you for looking at our listing!!!

host_about:
Kendall & Potter was established as a real estate company in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The brokers Skipper Kendall and William Pottermoved to Aptos to fulfill their dream of working in a small town in Santa Cruz County. In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , they expanded their services to include property management and relocation from Santa Cruz to Monterey Coast.

Kendall & Potter continues to be seen as one of the leading forces in Santa Cruz Property Management and Real Estate.

The Real Estate Division of the company was sold in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Kendall and Potter remained brokers of the Property Management Department until (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rita Law, DRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , now owner/broker, purchased the property department in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and has been on site ever since.

Rita has worked for Kendall & Potter in the property management and the Santa Cruz real estate industry for 20 years. A Board Member of the Aptos Chamber of Commerce, past Board Director of Santa Cruz Tourist and Convention Center and Vacation Rental Managers Association. Current member of California Association of Realtors CAR and National Association of Property Managers, NARPM.

Kendall & Potter Property Management offers a variety of home services – including complete property management services, leases on unfurnished properties and rental homes in Santa Cruz, as well as Monterey Coast & Santa Cruz vacation rentals management and corporate housing.

It’s a sweet little loop. 10-15 min to run, 20-25 to walk. Gorgeous path
host_about: I am a female entrepreneur. I run my own business globally and from home. I travel a lot, teaching retreats and workshops all over.  I love my work and I love my life. I also really love hosting at my beautiful beach house on the lagoon.  I am an acupuncturist and an incredible masseur,  so if you'd like to get a massage and/or acupuncture while you're here, just let me know upon booking and I'll do my best to accommodate.

neighborhood_overview:
Capitola is California’s oldest seaside resort town and continues to be a popular spot for those looking for a picturesque, quaint and relaxing vacation destination. Capitola has a unique charm with its beautiful beaches and historic and colorful architecture, reminiscent of a Mediterranean village.
The perfect spot to visit year round, you will find an idyllic sleepy beach town in the Winter months and a bustling beach destination in the Summer months. There are many special events each year including the Capitola Art and Wine Festival, the Begonia Festival, Holiday Open House and Tree Lighting, Wharf to Wharf Race, Hot Rod and Custom Car Show and more…

Most of all, it is just fun to walk around and explore our eclectic mix of boutiques and restaurants. You will find unique gift shops, wine tasting rooms, galleries, apparel shops, surf shops, and more! Relax on the beach or get a little more adventurous and learn to surf or paddleboard during your stay, you can even re

name: Beautiful Seascape Home w/ Ocean Views 841
description:
Beautiful 4 bedroom 3.5 bath, 3 level home across the street from the Seascape Beach. One of the larger, nicer homes located inside the private gated area of Seascape. First level has a garage with a ping pong table. The second floor has three bedrooms with deck access and two full bathrooms. Third level has the master with full bath, 1/2 bath, kitchen, dining area, living room, and ocean view deck . Very nice views from this third level, most popular homes for returning guests year after year.

The space
This well appointed home is in a gated Seascape community, with beach access right across the street. We provide 2 gate passes to access the security gate, there is parking for 4 cars comfortably. This property can easily sleep 10 people, perfect for two families. You will need to be able to go up at least 2 flights of stairs to reach the family room and kitchen.

Guest access
Guest have full access to the property, there is no garage parkin

This immaculate home is a perfect location for the classic Santa Cruz getaway!
It is located a half block off West Cliff Drive and just a block from the wharf and beach. It is a short walk to the boardwalk, Lighthouse Surf Museum and downtown Santa Cruz. The wharf is known for dining, night life, viewing sea lions, fishing and boat tours. name: Vintage Charm Close to Downtown and Beaches
description:
This beautifully & newly renovated studio with separate entry and private bathroom is in the middle of everything Santa Cruz has to offer: downtown, beaches, boardwalk, West Cliff Drive, bike paths, etc. are an easy walk or bike-ride. The studio is also a quiet area for remote work. We are pleased to host you and help make your experience great. You may also access the common-space gardens and hot tub in the spa-like back yard (upon request).

The space
We welcome you to our updated studio appartment in our 110 year old craftsman house. The studio has the original bay window, fir floors and a high coved ceiling, while the entryway and bathroom have been fully updated. We hope you enjoy the comfortable queen bed and sitting area, as well as a table and chairs for dining, or working. There is high-speed wi-fi, coffee maker, and a area to prepare food. Come and go through your private entrance and enjoy the little park across the street for sunset.
neighborhood_overview: We are across the street from a small neighborhood park with playground and the neighborhood is filled with 100 year-old homes with beautiful gardens and lovely neighbors.  Please respect our peaceful little neighborhood.
host_about:
Hi!  I am a 63 year old, active, social, love nature, professional (worked 36 years in the analytical instrument industry, raised 2 kids who are now independent and employed.  I consider myself a generally successful, responsible & friendly person.  I love good wine and healthy food; I love to travel, cook, ride my bike, hike, and go to music festivals.   After using Air BnB as a guest for many years, I am so pleased to be able to share my newly renovated room in the 110 year old home in Santa Cruz.   I am excited to welcome you to share my home!
Kindly,
Leslie

name: Oceanfront Condo, steps to the sand
description:
Only steps away to feel the sand between your toes. Listen to the waves, watch the sunset and sunrise. View all the ocean's beauty through the large front room windows or right on the deck. This beachfront property is the perfect getaway. The beach is YOURS! No crowds, no noise except the ocean waves. So peaceful! Located on the ground level this 1 bedroom unit sleeps 4 people with an additional wall queen murphy bed. Relaxation is only a click away.

The space
Newly remodeled has all the comfort and feel for a great getaway. The patio is set with adorironach chairs perfect for reading watching and listening to the waves with your favorite glass of wine or cup of coffee. Enjoy the birds walking across the sand. The sunset and sunrise are beautiful you will not want to miss either one.

Other things to note
Pajaro Dunes not only offers amazing sandy beaches but while staying with us you have full access to tennis courts, volleyball, basketbal

host_about: I love traveling, hiking and meeting new people.

name: Monthly Rental In Santa Cruz- 5 Blocks from Beach
description:
Location, location, location!! Blocks to West Cliff Drive! Updated, fully furnished remodeled 2 bedroom 2 bath house on the West Side of Santa Cruz. Easy freeway/commute access. Close to UCSC, West Cliff, Downtown Santa Cruz. Beautifully remodeled kitchen with Stainless appliances, leathered granite counters and modern cabinets. Bamboo flooring downstairs,new plush carpeting upstairs. Beautiful private gated courtyard perfect for outdoor seating and intimate gatherings. Driveway and street parking. Built in closets designed to keep your closet organized and neat. The master bedroom has a large walk out patio perfect for watching the sunset with a glass of wine or enjoying a morning coffee. Full bathrooms on both floors. Stackable washer and dryer with linen storage in the first floor bathroom.
Available monthly. All utilities included, wifi, cable tv included.

name: Remote Garden Home with Redwood Views
description:
This beautiful mountain home offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Enjoy an open floor plan with a kitchen that overlooks redwood trees and has an Italian 6 burner stove, new fridge, marble countertops, cork flooring. You'll have wooded views from every window. You'll feel secluded from everything and yet less than 2 miles from Scotts Valley.
Two queen beds with fairly new well cushioned mattresses. All linens provided.

The space
The house is private and surrounded by gardens on all sides and a view to Lima Prieta and the redwood forests.’ There is a grove with picnic tables, an orchard down below the grounds, and a rose and grapevine garden. It is quiet, and 1.8 miles to Scotts Valley with all its amenities. The road leading to the house is steep and .7 miles long leading you to the top of the ridge top where the house is situated. You'll enjoy the peace-of-mind knowing that the wifi is strong.

The house has two heat sources, a heating system

name: Westside Santa Cruz Home- One Block to West Cliff
description:
Experience coastal living in this Santa Cruz home ideally located on the West Side where you are steps away from breathtaking West Cliff Drive and the Pacific Ocean. Whether you want to relax and unwind surrounded by nature or have a launchpad for more active fun and adventure, this newly landscaped 3 bedroom home provides everything you will need for your stay. Located just 30 miles from Silicon Valley and SJC airport- ideal for those craving an oceanside getaway.

The space
When you step into the home, an abudance of sunlight invites you into the open concept living/dining and kitchen areas.
The living room is outfitted with large sectional and 70" flat screen smart TV as well as a foosball table for entertainment. The well stocked kitchen has thoughtfully been filled with everything the chef in your group could need.
Dine either at the table, sip coffee at the island or take your meal outdoors- indoor and outdoor living are very easy here.
Th
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood in sought after westside Santa Cruz- away from the hustle and bustle of the Boardwalk/Pier area. Come stay one black to scenic West Cliff Drive where you can walk along the shores of the Pacific and enjoy the best sunsets in Santa Cruz. Conveniently located to many local restaurants, coffee, bakeries, breweries, wineries- all in walking distance!

name: Boat house
description:
It’s not a real boat house! But it’s a cute and corky tiny house and the kitchen was repurposed from a boat! It has cozy sleeping loft with a skylight that allows you to look up at the stars.
This tiny boat house is located on the edge of pleasure point and walking distance to the ocean, surf, beaches and shopping! Just one mile to one of the best surf spots. Come enjoy this adventurous fun studio!

Guest access
The boat house is a corky old Santa Cruz style tiny studio with a private yard. The unit is private but does share a wall so please keep noise to a minimum.
- You will have access to your private entry and yard.
-There is a main living room/ kitchen area. -The kitchen has a built in manual burner stove, coffee maker and full fridge.
-The loft boasts a queen size mattress and tv.
- The bathroom has a nice rain shower.

Other things to note
You will need to be able to climb a ladder to get to the bed. Please

name: Capitola Beach Cottage is home away from home
description:
This charming cottage is located in the heart of Capitola! Walking distance to the beach, Capitola Village, boutique shops, restaurants and world famous Gayle's Bakery. This sweet home features an open layout and gets plenty of sunshine. It has a beautifully landscaped yard, modern floors, and a futon couch for the occasional overnight guests. We have a BBQ, beach chairs, and plenty of storage for your own diving and surfing gear. Close to highways 1 and 17. A total gem!

The space
This sweet cottage is comfortable, cozy and is perfect to feel right at home in the best beach town on the west coast.

The master bedroom is and spacious with a comfortable and quality queen size bed & an extra large closet.

The second bedroom features a comfy full size bed situated to wake up with a view of the garden through a glass door.

There is small building in the back yard that is perfect for a mediation room, an office or extra storage.

name: Hoppy Horse Farm Yoga Studio
description:
Welcome to Hoppy Horse Farm! Our sustainable "micro studio" is super cozy, completely private, and surrounded by native chaparral and overlooking beautiful views of horses and live oak forests.

We are a 10-acre family farm nestled in the beautiful Santa Cruz Mountains. We are about 5 minutes from multiple redwood forests, rare Zayante sandhills and 10 miles from Santa Cruz/the coast.

Please contact us for additional information about horse boarding during your stay!

The space
The newly built studio is equipped with a toaster oven, fridge, hot shower, automatic composting toilet, fast speed WiFi,
boutique wood burning stove, and private deck with a gas BBQ! There is parking available a short distance from the cabin.

Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, wildlife enthusiasts and animal lovers! The cabin is overlooking the horse arena, so you'll likely be visited by a few curious horses, two (very friendly and lar
neighborhood_overview:
We live up a private road in the unique Zayante Sandhills, surrounded by huge Ponderosa Pines and old growth Live Oak Forests.
We are minutes from State Parks like Quail Hollow Ranch, Henry Cowell, Fall Creek, Big Basin, and less than 10 miles from Santa Cruz's famous beaches.
Our town of Ben Lomond is small and sweet, with a couple good restaurant's, a bakery and local grocery store. More restaurant's and larger shopping centers like Safeway can be found 10 minutes down the road in the next town of Felton.
host_about: Born and raised in the Santa Cruz Mountains, CA. I live a sustainable, eco friendly life with my boyfriend and my cats. I love nature, animals and traveling. My favorite days are filled with horseback riding, gardening and being with friends & family!

name: Cottage in the Santa Cruz Mountains
description:
Enjoy a relaxing vacation surrounded by nature! This serene Cottage provides the tranquil environment needs to help you get grounded and enjoy the simple things in life. It feels secluded and private while also being less than 5 minutes to Scotts Valley eateries and shopping, 8 minutes to beautiful redwoods and hiking trails at Henry Cowell, 15 minutes to Downtown Santa Cruz, and 20 minutes to the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk.

The space
The Cottage is a spacious studio with a queen bed, loveseat couch sitting area, smart TV for streaming (no local or cable channels), high speed Wifi, and kitchen area with bistro dining. There is one bathroom with a shower and tankless water heater.

The property is shared with the main house which is roughly 5 feet away and separated by a corrugated fence. The parking area is shared.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire studio, but we do have a few cabinets locked for owner's supplies.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.
host_about: WeHost is a small team that is laser focused on hosting guests at amazing vacation rentals! We believe that memorable vacations are centered around beautiful homes that are comfortable and stocked with all the amenities that make for an amazing stay.

name: Private suite, walk to the beach
description:
Cozy master suite with private entrance, private en suite bathroom with bidet, and lovely patio... 12 minute walk to Manresa State Beach, one of the best, most gorgeous beaches on the Monterey Bay. Within 2 miles are restaurants, groceries, fitness/tennis club, Seascape Resort and coffee shop. Neighborhood grocery store is a 5 minute walk. Additional area attractions: Forest of Nisene Marks State Park, Elkhorn Slough, multiple golf courses and more.

The space
Clean, comfortable and conveniently located on a quiet street in a beautiful beach-side neighborhood. Electric kettle, french press coffee or tea and Wifi included. A second guest is possible for an additional $35/night.
neighborhood_overview: La Selva is a picturesque small town with an abundance of vacation homes - full-time occupancy is maybe 75%, resulting in a quiet, unspoiled feel.  This home is located on a particularly quiet street walking distance to beach, store.  A great area of bike riding, walking... a perfect home base for exploring Santa Cruz and Monterey Counties.
